story:
ReMask is a respirator of new generation with the built-in germicidal lamp from uviol glass and two filters. Two LED strip lights that light up during breath are located on the front side of the mask, they give futuristic design.

One battery charge is enough for 5 hours of use, full battery charge takes 1.5 hours.

ReMask neutralizes viruses, bacteria and other infectious microorganisms by virtue of the germicidal lamp.

Carbon filter is located in front of the lamp, spunbond polyester layer is located behind the lamp, they additionally clean air from pollen, viruses, aerosols, bacteria, smog and fumes.

Color respirator can be selected in the designer after the end of the campaign. Colors can be applied to 1. Mask. 2. The embossing on the mask. 3. LED strip.

For an additional price, you can choose the picture which we will print on your mask.

 

 

 

ReMask conforms to TP TC 019/2011 and has the FFP3 protection class.

We sincerely believe in the bright future of our planet...

story:
Hi dear Friends!

Here I try to collect money for the surgery on my eyes.
The operation is unfortunately inevitable and should be done in the Summer 2015.

My name is Alexander (Sasha) Pubants. I am 58. I have two places where I live now alternatively - Germany and Spain. In the both places I am actively working on different projects for the welfare and prosperity of the people: I am using my knowledge, skills and experience in meditation and other spritual practices that I obtained thanks to my eminent spiritual masters. These my activities among others different aspects require studies and tutoring that are connected with intensive reading, writing and working with computer. So, the condition of my eyes is important for me and (I humbly suppose) for others...

Unfortunately already some years I am suffering from progressing catharact, that is developing on the background of strong myopia and astigmathism. In my case additionally to the basic treatment I need  Laser diagnostics and treatment and special synthetic lenses for implantation.

Thank you very much for your kind participation!

story:
We all know someone on dialysis. It could be one of our friends or family members. After all there are more than 2.3 million patients being treated for End Stage Renal Disease ("ESRD") globally, with over 600,000 receiving treatment in the US. ESRD ("Dialysis") patient numbers continue to grow steadily at 8% annually worldwide and most of this growth is attributed to an aging population, increasing obesity, diabetes and hypertension due to genetic predisposition as well as increasing adoption of Westernized dietary habits.   .
 

PRESENT TREATMENT FOR DIALYSIS PATIENTS

The only treatment for ESRD is Dialysis or a kidney transplant, if you are that lucky, as the vast majority of patients waiting for kidney transplants will pass before a new organ becomes available for them. 

The average mortality rate for US Dialysis patients is about 20%. This means that approximately 20% of US Dialysis patients will not survive each year.

                          This is unacceptable!

     

                     Meet the  WAK™                

The WAK™ is a miniaturized dialysis machine that can be worn as a belt by a patient.  The WAK™ operates on batteries and weighs less than 10 pounds, allowing patients to wear the device continuously instead of being tethered to conventional dialysis machines several days a week for many hours. 

                                      

We believe with the approval of the WAK™,   millions of Dialysis patients in the US and around the world will no longer be tethered and chained to a refrigerator sized machine for 3-4 hours a day, 3 times week, and spend the days between such treatments recuperating from the effects of Dialysis.

The WAK™ is being Developed by Blood Purification Technologies, Inc. ("BPTI"), a Washington state Corporation. 

There are five trials required by the FDA.

We believe Trial #1 will be successfully completed by Mid May, 2015 and at the present time results have exceeded expectations. 

While most of the costs of Trial #1 have been paid, BPTI still needs approximately $400,000 to complete Trial #1. Your assistance is vitally requested.

WHAT IS THE PURPOSE OF THE FOUNDATION ?

The Wearable Artificial Kidney Foundation is an IRS approved Charitable Organization that has been formed for the purpose of both raising awareness to the plight of Dialysis patients and addressing several unmet needs in the treatment of Dialysis patients. The object of its research goals are:

• Improve the quality of life of Dialysis patients and reduce their mortality.

• Provide a clinical solution for treating small children that require chronic Dialysis. Today, many infants and small children cannot receive chronic hemodialysis because their blood volume is too small. The miniaturized size of the WAK™ will, for the first time, allow babies to be dialyzed on a chronic basis.

The Foundation will be doing so by funding the neccesary research, including FDA human clinical trials on the Wearable Artificial Kidney, which has already had successful human clinical trials in Italy and the United Kingdom.

The Foundation needs only one thing - FUNDING and it needs it Critically !!!!!

REASONS TO DONATE TO THE FOUNDATION

It is critical to move the WAK™ through all 5 planned clinical trials in order to allow the use of the WAK™ by the general public. It is the goal of the Foundation to improve the lives of millions of Dialysis patients and give them back their lives, through the use of the WAK™.

 THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT

 Even if you don't donate money to the cause, you can still be a huge help assisting us in raising awareness of the failure of standard hemodialysis treatment to provide a true quality of life to Dialysis patients.

Please share this campaign with your friends, and family, whether in person or on social media as virtually everyone knows someone on Dialysis.  Thank you for your support from the bottom of our heart.

The content of this campaign is the sole property and responsibility of, and has been developed exclusively by the Foundation. The Foundation is not affiliated with any University, Medical or Commercial enterprise and is an IRS approved 501(c)3 Charitable Organization. Please note: donating to this campaign will not influence patient recruitment or enrollment in the FDA Trials, as we have no involvement other than funding.

story:
Esja Shriver, 12 years old, won the BMX World  Championship 2014 in the Netherlands for Team USA— now she's defending her world title. Support these sporty girls by sending them to the BMX World 2015 in Belgium. 


WATCH OUT, WORLD!

Esja and Katja started racing in Southern California. It did'nt take long for these sisters and their siblings to make their mark in BMX regional, national, and world! 

Their winning ways continued — Esja at the 11 year old world finals got Lane 1 for winning every round of the race held in Holland last year.


The Shriver Sisters interviewed by their mom Merideth in Lakewood, California.


Cycling is a good sports that everyone shares around the world. BMX or bicycle motocross is a cycle sport started in the early 1970s when children in California, USA began racing their bicycles on dirt tracks.


Your help inspires everyone to excel in a fun sports accessible to all — parents raise healthy and strong children enjoying outdoors with family and friends. No longer just for motocross stars' fun, racing and stunts, BMX allows girls to become world champions in sports, and in whatever they choose to be. 


7 BMX Kids - 2 goes to World Championship; 1 Defends her title for TEAM USA


WHERE DOES YOUR SUPPORT GO?

Esja defending her BMX Bike World Championship title and Katja participating in Zolder, Belgium needs race entry fees, flights, food & lodging, transportation.

Your funding goes to:

  • Airfare USA-Belgium-USA, 2 athletes and 1 coach/ mom  4,500 usd
  • Accommodation for 3 pax on July 13-20, 2015 in Belgium 1,400 usd
  • Local transportation and food expenses for 3 pax 1, 100 usd

Esja, Katja and Team Shriver encourages increased presence for women in all forms of cycling. By supporting their bid to the BMX World and Olympics, you'll help promote women in sports and issues of gender in cycling. With your help, we're also raising:

  • Continuous training budget and support for Olympics qualification
  • Help to build the ‪‎Philippines‬' first ‪BMX‬ for Girls and Women Community! 
Girls BMX celebrates women's riding and what it means to be women on bikes!


THANK YOU FROM TEAM SHRIVER!

I'm Merideth, a trained teacher and cellist from Cebu, Philippines before I moved to the USA. Papa Richard — coach and trainer —  works in real estate property management. Together with 7 seven kids, 1 less than one year old, we're the Super Shrivers — crazy about sports and BMX!


Our family consists of younger sisters and brothers waiting for their hand-me-downs, and a baby born in 2015!  Although we're a busy bunch, 3 of our girls aged 8-12 qualified for the BMX Worlds. 

HELP GIRLS EXCEL 

Younger sister 8 year old Katja is joining Esja to the World Championship. They've been working very hard and we know they can pull it through, taking home the world titles again. We seek your support to:

  • Compete and win at the BMX Bike World Championship races in Zolder, Belgium on July 13-20, 2015.  Esja defends her title while  Katja competes for the first time internationally.

  • Show the world the hopes, dreams, and aspirations of hard-working and persevering girls who do sports! 
  • Start and become an active member of the Philippines' first BMX for Girls and Women Community!   

The amount of your contribution is flexible as much as your engagement. Please share the project with your friends and family and encourage them to support this worthy cause, especially if they have girls  at home!

OUR COMMON MISSION

Expand the world of girls in sports, and give them possibilities of becoming champions at the home turf or in the international arena. Be a part of this exciting journey!

IN THE MEDIA

"Another world title came for the USA on Thursday when Esja Shriver (Crestline, Calif.) outrode the rest of the 11-year-old girls to cross the line for the gold medal. She bested second- and third-place finishers Maia Colman Savage (NZL) and Mariane Beltrando (FRA)."  Team USA scores 11 more challenge class medals 



"Esja and Richelle Shriver race BMX. They started racing in Southern California. It did not take long for these two sisters to make their mark in BMX. Esja was a Novice for 10 days. Richelle was a Novice for 7 days. Esja raced and beat the girls. Because of rider count, she sometimes had to race the boys. She beat them. Sometimes she had to race against older boys. She beat them too. It got to the point where some boys would not race if Esja raced, some by their choice and some by their parents’ choice. " So Cal Sisters Come Home | RacerBMX.com
  • UCI BMX World Championship Rotterdam – BMXMAG
  • Esja Shriver - USA BMX / BMX CANADA - Rider Profiles
  • 38 titles awarded at 2014 Amateur BMX National
  • Fabmx1 » Les « Shriver Sister's », la nouvelle sensation X 3 
  • Video and Image Gallery



Little racers. Esja and Richelle are on the track, making mains and chasing titles. And right behind them is the rest of the Shriver crew ready to leave their own mark on BMX racing. 

Career Highlights:

Esja Shriver: 2014 World BMX Champion, 2014 Western Division Champ 11-girl, 2014 National Age Group #1 for 11 girls, 2014 California State Champion for 11 girls, currently leading in NAG points for 2015, currently a handful of points behind the leader and running third in Amateur Girls, and chasing the Amateur #1 plate.


Katja Shriver: 2014 National Age Group #1, 2014 Western Division Champ for 8 girls, 2014 California State Champion for 8 girls, Race of Champion #1, currently leading in NAG points, running 7th in Amateur Girls, and chasing for that #1.


YOUR AMAZING ECO-FRIENDLY, POWER-PACKED PERKS 

Thanks to SunnyBAG GmbH  Austria and Suntori Ltd. Finland, you'll get intelligent and environmental friendly products for mobile energy supply, including the world's first GoPro ACTION Solar Case successfully crowdfunded in Indiegogo! 

Light and robust SunnyBAG LEAFallow easy fixing on other bags, tents, windows and everywhere you need it.  A solar backpack offers enough storage for your daily life stuff — SunnyBAG EXPLORER offers mobile energy supply in nearly every situation.

Use the world's first GoPro Solar Case while surfing, biking, skiing, snowboarding and never run out of power while filming your most exciting adventure.


SunnyBAG reinvented a solar-powered protection case for GoPro lovers with integrated solar-technology, making it possible to charge your GoPro with sunlight.

SUPPORT AND SHINE!

Sponsor Girls Who Do Sports Projects. Girls in sports are still pretty rare around the world. In 2015-2016, we're sharing with you exciting stories that make up the girls pro events. We'll feature Team USA Events scheduled around our annual race calendar. Take part in making Girls involved, and even excited in Sports. We appreciate that you're here to cheer us on!

BUILD BMX FOR GIRLS AND WOMEN COMMUNITIES 

With your sponsorship, we'll  start the Philippines' first BMX for Girls and Women Community creating the first project from my hometown in Cebu. There's still a lot of street kids and low-income families who need their children to stay out of trouble. By engaging young people actively in sports and community building, we hope to bring brighter futures for less privileged kids! Follow Esja, interact with us, and contribute to our community. We grow only with love and support from you. 
Thank you for your contribution. Get girls to do sports! X0XO

story:
Save Luna

Hello everyone,

 Clare's beautiful pug dog, Luna, is seriously ill and needs emergency vet care. Luna is only 1 year old. She was found unresponsive yesterday morning (3rd May) and has been at the emergency vet (in Fyshwick, ACT) since. Her condition is critical. The vet has said that Luna has what is known as liver shunt, which means her liver is not filtering out the toxins it is supposed to. This in turn, is causing serious neurological issues and Luna needs treatment fast! 

Clare is our good friend and housemate and we are all trying to do what we can to keep Luna alive! But please, we need your help!  Clare is a great person- she is studying to be a special education teacher and also currently works two jobs (one as a disability respite carer and the other as an learning support assistant). But there is a problem. Clare has already spent every penny she owned on the last 24hrs of emergency vet care. The vet has estimated total testing/treating costs of up to $10,000, and that is just to get Luna stabalised. Clare has already borrowed from family and friends and has run out of options. The vet is not willing to do the life-saving CT scan and surgery until Clare can show she has the money to pay the bills. 

Luna's is so incredibly young and is such a gentle and lovely dog. She brings a lot of joy to Clare and our house and every person (or animal) she meets, We need to save her and we wouldn't be appealing for money unless we were desperate! Please please help us out with anything you can currently spare.

Thank you so so much, 

Sophie xx

story: My son and I got put Into a sticky situation with our living situation, Trying to get child support wages garnished but unfortunately my apartment manager is only giving me until the 15th to bring in the money. I know I won't be able to come up with the full amount by then so I'm asking for help to get started on a new roof for us.

I know I won't be able to come up with the full amount by then so I'm asking for help to get started on a new roof for us.

story:
Zen Honeycutt, Founder of Moms Across America and an international speaker seen on CNN, C-SPAN, and Dr. Oz, spoke to Monsanto’s 800 Shareholders at their headquarters in St. Louis, Missouri in January. With the help of the Organic Consumers Association and John Harrington of Harrington Investments ( a shareholder), Zen was able to represent Harrington at the meeting. Thanks to Zen's impassioned plea, a referendum giving shareholders access proxy to vote on their Board of Directors passed with a 53% "Yes" vote! 

This was an historic meeting in which a mom was able to speak up on behalf of her children – and children around the world – addressing the impact of the toxic chemicals created by Monsanto. [Read or listen to the full account: www.momsacrossamerica.com/blog] Later the same day, The Wall Street Journal, one of the most-trusted financial papers in the world, wrote an article about Monsanto’s Shareholders Meeting. They quoted Zen:

Representing – and delivering – our voices

This campaign will provide the funding to send Zen Honeycutt to the largest chemical companies in the world and speak at their shareholder meetings on behalf of our children, their mothers, and American citizens. Zen's proven ability to speak with her heart – boldly and clearly –  is opening eyes across America to the dangers of toxic herbicides and GMOs. First and foremost, Zen is a concerned mother, which makes her voice that much more authentic, powerful and passionate. 

Zen's goal is to have every shareholder in the room reconsidering their investment, and the company considering a new direction. If she speaks for a referendum to guide the company in a new direction, she intends to get it passed.

$8000 will cover trips to at least five other companies (such as DOW, Dupont, Syngenta, BASF and Bayer) with a $1500 budget per trip: 

  • $500 per flight; 
  • $200 for hotel for 2 nights; 
  •  $100 for meals; 
  • $200 for babysitting;
  • $500 speaker fee (after other costs covered)
  • Funds needed for buying at one stock share of each company, and
  • Funds needed for creating binders of scientific studies to present at the meeting. 
Any additional funds will go towards attending  more meetings and support the publication of Zen's upcoming book "Unstoppable Love," the story of her journey for health, freedom and our cause to continue to raise awareness about GMOs.

From Zen's forthcoming book, "Unstoppable Love":


THE IMPACT OF YOUR CONTRIBUTION 

You will be funding the transformation of the food system, our health and our future. Your contribution will provide a voice for Moms across America, who are struggling with health issues in their children. Personal accounts will be publicly recorded at the shareholder meetings of the companies responsible for the impact. Prepared with studies and testimonials, Zen will represent you as both an impassioned mother and an informed citizen.

Zen has done this before and will do it again with your support. Read the full account of her presentation and dialogue with CEO Hugh Grant of Monsanto: www.momsacrossamerica.com/blog. 

Risks & Challenges

  • It is unlikely, because legally the companies must allow for Q&A for shareowners, but Zen might not be able get into the meeting if she is not able to speak for a referendum. (The referendum is a guarantee) Sometimes the companies say they are"full" to not allow activists in.  She will of course arrive very early to make this impossible for them . Most likely she will at least be able to speak for 3 minutes at Q& A.
  • If Zen is not allowed to speak she will attend anyway and bring the media with her. News reports will expose the censoring by a huge corporation of a single concerned mother's voice, representing thousands of other Moms Across America. She will do a press release. Past press releases were posted by 250+ media outlests with a reach of 132 million.

 Other Ways You Can Help 

If you cannot contribute but would like to help:

  • Organize or attend a rally at the meeting for support. 
  • Get the word out through social media and make some noise about this campaign. 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! 

Thank you!

story:
Dear friends, colleagues and family,

I am proud to run the 2015 TOKYO Marathon on February 22nd 2015, as a TSUNAGU runner and raise funds for Solaputi Kid's Camp*. 

I am asking your support to run a marathon for something big.

*Solaputi Kids' Camp is inviting children dealing with intractable diseases and their parents to the dream campsite equipped with medical care facilities.

You can find more details on the program in the below links. 

http://www.tokyo42195.org/2015en/charity/outline/

http://www.tokyo42195.org/2015en/charity/recipient-programs/program-3.html

http://www.solaputi.jp/en/index.html

Thank you in advance for your help and contributions. Let me know if you have any questions. 

Nikos

story:
Face2Face™ automatically analyzes the patient's facial expressions and applies this data to specially designed algorithms, watching for signs of PTSD and other mental illnesses. By recording and analyzing the patient's emotional response in real time as well as incorporating data from past sessions, the software will be able to detect patients in crisis before their situation deteriorates.


There is a wide range of applications in which Face2Face™ can make a positive impact. The Future Life team is currently looking at developing the software platform to specialize in the following areas of where mental and behavioral health take focus:

PTSD Treatment
Other Traumas: Sexual Assault, Urban Trauma, First Response
Predictive Behavior: Military, Non-Military
Deception Detection
Human Resources/Job Interview
Risk Assessment in Adolescents

With your help, we can conduct a study of veterans to refine the software and prepare it for wide use to help those impacted by PTSD.

 

************CAMPAIGN UPDATE AS OF DEC 20***************

Veteran Study Moves Forward. We are truly grateful.

Happy Holidays from Future Life, Armor Down, and AD Tech Team to all the families – moms, dads, and kids, Active Duty, and Veterans in America and around the world.

We have come so far in our goal.

Our Face2Face Indiegogo Campaign - Face2Face with PTSD has been a huge success, and has raised so far more than $1,700 to go back to our veterans. These veterans will be supporting a Proof of Concept Study with VA Boston starting as early as May 2018. Also, the funds raised are going straight back to the 50 veterans who will be participating in this project with Future Life, Armor Down, AD Tech and VA Boston.

Our emotions play a daily role in our lives every single day and moment. We feel pain. And we can feel joy. Understanding our emotions is critical for our well-being, mental stability, and for our success. Facial Microexpressions of Emotions or what we call FMEEs provide a revolutionary new way to help us reach our Emotional Intelligence Connection. E.I. is a game changer that has rarely been discussed in mainstream media.

VA Boston, which is part of the National Center of PTSD and the premier of PTSD R&D understands the significance of how Emotions can play the most vital part of screening, diagnosing, and treating PTSD. Instead of this way of treating subjectively, and the counselor telling you what is wrong; we can treat PTSD objectively. Real visual data that is shared with the Veterans’ who is being treated and with the counselors’ who is doing the treatment -- this ensures true and real results!

This is why we are working with VA Boston to launch this essential new study that will test the abilities of the new methodology of treating Veterans with PTSD. The research design has been completed and we are getting ready to execute the study with VA Boston. We all feel strongly about the outcomes. Many preliminary studies have been done before this study to ensure this VA Boston Proof of Concept Study will have significant data outcomes that we believe will be extremely positive. We are super excited to share this with you.

Please make a donation today. Your support and assistance will help us greatly speed up the process of getting the proof of concept study up and running. There is so much more work that needs to be done. But this is just one step you can take to feel part of something great we are doing together.

 

Thank you.

Sincerely,

John Kilmer

Founder, Chairman, CEO

FutureLife.US

story:
Kedves érdeklődő!


Magyar Máté vagyok a kaloriabazis.hu oldal alapítója. Az oldal három éve jött létre, jelenleg több mint 220.000 regisztrált felhasználója van, akik eddig összesen félmillió kiló túlsúlytól szabadultak meg. Szerencsére sokan várjátok el az oldaltól, hogy minél gyorsabb ütemben fejlődjön és elégítse ki az újabb és újabb felhasználói igényeket. Sajnos a fejlesztési ütem sosem volt túlságosan gyors. Ennek oka, hogy az oldalt kezdetektől fogva saját forrásból finanszírozom, a viszonylag alacsony reklámbevétel sajnos nem fedezi a kívánt fejlődéshez szükséges anyagi hátteret. Természetesen lennének erre bevált megoldások (több reklámfelület, fizetős regisztráció, fizetett cikkek megjelentetése, hírlevekből származó bevétel), de ezeket a módszereket elvi megfontolásból ezután sem kívánom alkalmazni.

Új lehetőségként viszont a közösségi finanszírozás a segítségünkre lehet. Persze minden azon múlik, hogy Ti erről mit gondoltok. Fejlesztési ötlet mindenesetre lenne bőven, ezek közül kiemelném a legfontosabbakat:
  • a mostani mobil verzió helyett mobil applikáció fejlesztése androidra és iOS-re
  • ételinformációk bővítése  (glikémiás index, rosttartalom, nátrium, telített zsírok aránya, keményítő, üres kalóriák, stb.)
  • több statisztia, új grafikonok
  • lekérdezések készítésének lehetősége akár egyéni, akár kutatási célokra. A lekérdezésekkel olyan egyedi kérdésekre lehetne bizonyított választ kapni, mint például, hogy ténylegesen többet fogytak-e azok, akik light margarint ettek a hagyományos helyett, vagy átlagosan mennyivel többet fogytak akik sportoltak is, vagy akár mekkora kalóriakerettel fogytak a legtöbbet. Lehetne a különféle fogyókúra irányzatokat is összehasonlítani. Ez az opció nagyon hasznos lenne az igazán hatékony módszerek megtalálásában, az áldiéták és álfitnesszételek leleplezésében.
A megcélzott összegből lehetőségünk lenne egy programozó napi nyolcórás alkalmazására az eddigi heti egy-két órás fejlesztéssel szemben! Az összeget teljes egészében a vázolt feladatok programozói díjának finanszírozására fordítanánk. 


Köszönöm a figyelmet,

Magyar Máté

kaloriabazis.hu

story:
Say NO to bad managers and YES to good managers with $1 & a tweet. See perks for for more fun or suggest your own.

At Rotten Manager, we are beginning with a basic premise :  being a manager is a major responsibility with a important impact on many lives. The problem is there are a lot of bad ones. This adds up to an enormous, mostly untold, human cost. We want to tell those stories. Life is short and a big part of it is at work or indirectly affected by work. We think helping to create more good managers is a problem worth working on. So we are building a feedback app for managers so they know where they stand relative to other managers, and so they can get better!  We explain this more below.

For now, we'll boil the ask down, any money at all you provide is a vote for better managers, and/or a social media shout out would go a long way to help us build momentum. 

Examples:

"You might be a #RottenManager if (insert your thought)" @ http://igg.me/at/rottenmanager " 

or "My boss (insert name) is NOT A #RottenManager. Support more good managers like her with $1 and a tweet @ http://igg.me/at/rottenmanager"

"Bad managers lookout, #RottenManager is coming for you @ http://igg.me/at/rottenmanager "

Feel free to get creative.

(We would not suggest you post any specific details about a current manager, however we would be happy to do so for you anonymously : use stories@rottenmanager.com)


Why are we raising money? What do we plan to do with the money?

"Rotten Manager" is a company dedicated to improving the world’s collective work experience by building better managers.

In support of our shared vision, Rotten Manager is designing an application that will act as an employee advocate and neutral facilitator – we call it “MaNudger”.  Whether they are a good manager or a bad manager, MaNudger will gently nudge managers to be a little better with simple bite sized advice powered by anonymous feedback from employees. We can all benefit from a little competition and data driven nudge in the right direction from time to time, but especially Managers.

 


COLLECTIVE POWER:

We know the chance of raising much money for this type of product idea (hr technology) through crowdfunding is small (but we'd love it if you prove this wrong). Every $1 is a vote for better managers and it say's collectively WE ARE STRONGER THAN YOU, AND WE WON'T PUT UP WITH THIS. We are trying to offer everyone some creative way to get involved and get something back in return. For now a gang people shoving in the right direction would be an awesome way to start this company! 

Other specific ways you can help:

If you've ever had a Manager

We have our own views, but we want your thoughts on what makes a good or bad manager? You might be a Rotten Manager if...


1. Have you ever had a bad manager? Given some basic ground rules**, will you share your story with us? Hate writing. Start with "You might be a Rotten Manager if... and just bullet out your thoughts"

2. If you share our passion for creating better managers, will you share our campaign with your friends and on social media? #rottenmanager

3. Have a little fun with us and contribute to our ability to solve the manager problem at the same time by buying a "Monumental Manager Memento" or choosing some other support option we provide. Even $20 helps us know someone cares and helps to build momentum on the campaign.


If you are a Manager

You probably know how difficult it is to be a good manager. If you are good, you know your flaws and you inherently want to get better. Maybe you wish you had a simple anonymous feedback device already. Maybe you want to be an early adopter of our "MaNudger".

If you work in Human Resources

If you work in HR, we have a prototype numbers driven solution that you can test now and you will get a chance to be the first in the world to have it. Take a look at our workshop + data option. These are great deals we worked up for this campaign.

What we’re offering for your support

1. Gratification in being on the forefront to make the world a better place to work.

2. Some really fun tokens of manager appreciation / depreciation that you can do with as you please. Throw them in a drawer, send them to a manager, give them to your children, or to a local neighborhood dog... whatever.

3. If you have a Rotten Manager, or did at one time, relief in knowing people care and you are not alone. 

4. A chance for someone in your organization to win THE WORLD'S WORST or WORLD's BEST BOSS AWARDS* 


Who we are / about our qualifications

Mike West has a long professional track record of innovation in Human Resources, with a knack for making great places to work even better.

Mike has a Masters degree in Human Resources and Industrial Relations from the University of Minnesota, has worked with data in Human Resources for over 15 years for companies such as Hallmark, Merck, PetSmart, Google, AstraZeneca, Otsuka, Children's Medical, Jawbone and Pandora.  Prior to this, in his glory days Mike held a series of jobs in retail and hospitality industries – believe us, he has seen plenty of bad managers.


Jaimie Saratella has a firm belief that doing work that can make our and others' lives better is the only work worth doing.

Jaimie has a degree in Political Science & Women’s and Gender Studies, working in the worlds of Political Campaigns, Non-Profits, and Restaurants. 

(The question is, which one of these does not belong with the others?  Actually, Jaimie reports these go together perfectly!)

For the last two years Mike and Jaimie have been working together on PeopleAnalyst – a company devoted to changing organizations for the better with a number driven approach to Human Resources.

And, yes! We’ve worked for some bad managers!


*World's Worst and Best Boss Awards

After assessing the number and content of comments, we will award one unlucky manager a “World’s Worst Boss” award, and his/her current and former employees will get an all expense paid Rotten Manager Party.  We are a startup, so think something closer to take out than dinner at the Ritz, but we will be creative and do our best to make it an event everyone will enjoy.

WE LIKE GOOD BOSSES.  We will also be awarding the “World’s Most Surprisingly Good Boss” award AND for this we will notify the newspapers and local news channels to let everyone know!  Good managers should be recognized and celebrated.

!! Don’t forget to share our campaign with your colleagues to boost your managers chance of winning... or is it losing? It’s all a matter of perspective !!


**Important Details and Ground Rules:

  1. Unless you tell us otherwise this is completely anonymous.
  2. We will never share or attribute story as being from you specifically, unless you want us to.
  3. We will never tell anyone you shared a story with us, unless you want us to.
  4. We are not here to publicly shame your bad manager. This will be handled professionally.
  5. You can contribute financially without sharing a story, or buying a memento, just believing this is a good cause.
  6. Please email your stories to Stories@RottenManager.com or post anoymously to our website RottenManager.Com
  7. Please include the name of your company and your manager. If you would like us to follow up with your manager, your manager's manager, or HR department, please include their contact information as well. At least one of us is a trained HR professional, and we are advised by trained HR professionals, so we know what we are doing, and can follow up in an confidential, discreet and professional manner.
  8. We won't share your email address or information with anyone, and we will make sure all stories are anonymized before sharing with your company contacts.
  9. Right to Make Appropriate Clause

If you want us to share your anonymous feedback with your manager or your HR department, it must be professional and appropriate. Any comments that we deem to be too personal or inappropriate will be edited before delivery.

Example: “My manager is a son of a *****, I hate his guts. He is an ***hole and a drunken llama could perform his job better than him.”

Will be edited to: “Your employees are displeased with your performance – you could be a better manager.  We suggest you start over with the basics.”

Our message to HR would go something like this: “We at Rotten Manager received notice that John Doe is a son of a ***** and 5 out of 5 of his employees hate his guts. We actually confirmed this – they are really sort of angry about the situation. They have rallied to purchase a llama to replace him, however have agreed to hold off until we have spoken to you. Will you please respond to this situation?”

Maybe that sort of loses something in the editing process, so send appropriate, constructive feedback to maintain the punch of your message.

This adds up to an enormous, mostly untold, human cost. We want to tell those stories. Life is short and a big part of it is at work or indirectly affected by work. We think helping to create more good managers is a problem worth working on. So we are building a feedback app for managers so they know where they stand relative to other managers, and so they can get better!  We explain this more below.For now, we'll boil the ask down, any money at all you provide is a vote for better managers, and/or a social media shout out would go a long way to help us build momentum. Examples:"You might be a #RottenManager if (insert your thought)" @ http://igg.me/at/rottenmanager " or "My boss (insert name) is NOT A #RottenManager. Support more good managers like her with $1 and a tweet @ http://igg.me/at/rottenmanager""Bad managers lookout, #RottenManager is coming for you @ http://igg.me/at/rottenmanager "Feel free to get creative.(We would not suggest you post any specific details about a current manager, however we would be happy to do so for you anonymously : use stories@rottenmanager.com)
Why are we raising money? What do we plan to do with the money?"Rotten Manager" is a company dedicated to improving the world’s collective work experience by building better managers.
In support of our shared vision, Rotten Manager is designing an application that will act as an employee advocate and neutral facilitator – we call it “MaNudger”.  Whether they are a good manager or a bad manager, MaNudger will gently nudge managers to be a little better with simple bite sized advice powered by anonymous feedback from employees. We can all benefit from a little competition and data driven nudge in the right direction from time to time, but especially Managers.
 
COLLECTIVE POWER:We know the chance of raising much money for this type of product idea (hr technology) through crowdfunding is small (but we'd love it if you prove this wrong). Every $1 is a vote for better managers and it say's collectively WE ARE STRONGER THAN YOU, AND WE WON'T PUT UP WITH THIS. We are trying to offer everyone some creative way to get involved and get something back in return. For now a gang people shoving in the right direction would be an awesome way to start this company! 
Other specific ways you can help:If you've ever had a Manager
We have our own views, but we want your thoughts on what makes a good or bad manager? You might be a Rotten Manager if...
1.
Have you ever had a bad manager? Given some basic ground rules**, will you share your story with us? Hate writing. Start with "You might be a Rotten Manager if... and just bullet out your thoughts"
2.
If you share our passion for creating better managers, will you share our campaign with your friends and on social media? #rottenmanager
3. Have a little fun with us and contribute to our ability to solve the manager problem at the same time by buying a "Monumental Manager Memento" or choosing some other support option we provide. Even $20 helps us know someone cares and helps to build momentum on the campaign.If you are a ManagerYou probably know how difficult it is to be a good manager. If you are good, you know your flaws and you inherently want to get better. Maybe you wish you had a simple anonymous feedback device already. Maybe you want to be an early adopter of our "MaNudger".
If you work in Human ResourcesIf you work in HR, we have a prototype numbers driven solution that you can test now and you will get a chance to be the first in the world to have it. Take a look at our workshop + data option. These are great deals we worked up for this campaign.What
we’re offering for your support
1. Gratification in being on the forefront to make the world a better place to work.
2. Some really fun tokens of manager appreciation / depreciation that you can do with as you please. Throw them in a drawer, send them to a manager, give them to your children, or to a local neighborhood dog... whatever.
3. If you have a Rotten Manager, or did at one time, relief in knowing people care and you are not alone. 
4. A chance for someone in your organization to win THE WORLD'S WORST or WORLD's BEST BOSS AWARDS* 
Who we are / about our qualifications
Mike West has a long professional track record of innovation in Human Resources,
with a knack for making great places to work even better.
Mike has a Masters
degree in Human Resources and Industrial Relations from the University of Minnesota, has worked with data in Human Resources for over 15 years for companies such as Hallmark, Merck, PetSmart, Google, AstraZeneca, Otsuka,
Children's Medical, Jawbone and Pandora. 
Prior to this, in his glory days Mike held a series of jobs in retail
and hospitality industries – believe us, he has seen plenty of bad managers.

Jaimie Saratella has a firm belief that doing work that can make our and others' lives better is the only work worth doing.Jaimie has a degree in Political Science & Women’s and
Gender Studies, working in the worlds of Political Campaigns, Non-Profits, and
Restaurants. (The question is, which one of these does not belong with the
others?  Actually, Jaimie reports these go together perfectly!)
For the last two years Mike and Jaimie have been working
together on PeopleAnalyst – a company devoted to changing organizations for the
better with a number driven approach to Human Resources.
And, yes! We’ve worked for some bad managers!
*World's Worst and Best Boss Awards
After assessing the number and content of comments, we will award one unlucky manager a “World’s Worst Boss” award, and his/her current and former employees will get an all expense paid Rotten Manager Party.  We are a startup, so think something closer to take out than dinner at the Ritz, but we will be creative and do our best to make it an event everyone will enjoy.
WE LIKE GOOD BOSSES.  We will also be awarding the “World’s Most Surprisingly Good Boss” award AND for this we will notify the newspapers and local news channels to let everyone know!  Good managers should be recognized and celebrated.
!! Don’t forget to share our campaign with your colleagues to boost your managers chance of winning... or is it losing? It’s all a matter of perspective !!


**Important Details and Ground Rules:


Unless you tell us otherwise this is completely anonymous.
We will never share or attribute story as being from you specifically, unless you want us to.
We will never tell anyone you shared a story with us, unless you want us to.
We are not here to publicly shame your bad manager. This will be handled professionally.
You can contribute financially without sharing a story, or buying a memento, just believing this is a good cause.
Please email your stories to Stories@RottenManager.com or post anoymously to our website RottenManager.Com
Please include the name of your company and your manager. If you would like us to follow up with your manager, your manager's manager, or HR department, please include their contact information as well. At least one of us is a trained HR professional, and we are advised by trained HR professionals, so we know what we are doing, and can follow up in an confidential, discreet and professional manner.
We won't share your email address or information with anyone, and we will make sure all stories are anonymized before sharing with your company contacts.
Right to Make Appropriate Clause



If you want us to share your anonymous feedback with your manager or your HR department, it must be professional and appropriate. Any comments that we deem to be too personal or inappropriate will be edited before delivery.
Example: “My manager is a son of a *****, I hate his guts. He is an ***hole and a drunken llama could perform his job better than him.”
Will be edited to: “Your employees are displeased with your performance – you could be a better manager.  We suggest you start over with the basics.”
Our message to HR would go something like this: “We at Rotten Manager received notice that John Doe is a son of a ***** and 5 out of 5 of his employees hate his guts. We actually confirmed this – they are really sort of angry about the situation. They have rallied to purchase a llama to replace him, however have agreed to hold off until we have spoken to you. Will you please respond to this situation?”
Maybe that sort of loses something in the editing process, so send appropriate, constructive feedback to maintain the punch of your message.

story: My names Shon Johnson, I'm 21 year young Track athlete. This program will help me achieve the goal that has been set for me since I was very young. That goal is winning the Olympics. To some people that is an unreachable goal, to me it is reachable. "I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me." With the Lord's help I know I will make it. The only obstacle standing in the way is not having the money to do anything that will help improve my ability. Some may say get a job. I do. I have a car note that I have to pay for. Also I am a full time student. Its limited hours I can work, and few business that work with my schedule. I am a hard worker. This means the world to me. Track is my life. I need every little bit you are willing to give. Thank you soo much, God bless.

story:
Short Summary

I am a native of New Mexico.  I grew up loving horses, but never had the opportunity to own one while still at home.  I graduated from the University of New Mexico with a bachelor degree in Business with a concentration in Finance and began working in the corporate world as a financial analyst.                                                                                                                                             

In 2007 I purchased a horse that I fell in love with.  She was supposed to be green broke.  The first thing she did was buck me out of the saddle.  I spent the next year learning natural horsemanship and brought my mare along without the use of aides or fear.   The confidence that I gained from this accomplishment helped in my decision to combine my loves: teaching and horses.

In 2010 I adopted a bright and beautiful child who had suffered great trauma.  In my search to help her healing process, I found Equine Assisted Therapy. After some research, I found that EAGALA was the organization that best matched my convictions and goals.  This powerful and experiential therapy guides clients to learn about themselves through the use of horses in a way that traditional therapy does not.  It bypasses the intellect and defenses that creates barriers and facilitates a healing internal and emotional connection.  This therapeutic method has allowed us to build a family and helped my daughter to heal.

I want every child to have the opportunity to heal and become the that they can be; to live effective and joyous lives.  I am reaching out to the community to ask for help in giving this opportunity to our children and to our future.  EAGALA requires and Equine Specialist, a Mental Health Specialist, a horse/s and clients.  The therapists are able to bill, but with your donations, we are striving to support the horses and their care and sustain the unique service our agency provides to all who need it. 

Ideally we hope our impact to be productive and happy, contributing members of society.  The possibilities include increased adoption rates, lower crime rates, increased communication among family members, lower recidivism for domestic violence and incarcerations, increased sense of personal confidence and reduced PTSD,  We want to empower people to strengthen from within.

We appreciate all donations of any kind.  If you would like to contribute in other ways, our team loves alfalfa and carrots.  We always need help mucking and brushing, or you may also adopt-a-horse.  Your compassionate consideration is greatly appreciated.

story:
Why choose me?

I am a seasoned health and fitness researcher and have been helping people all over the world lose weight quickly but safely. I know how to transform your overweight body into a smart and sexy body that turns heads. I myself have been training for more than 6 years. 

What You Get?

You just send me your fitness level, your current weight,height and fitness goal, I shall send you a detailed 7 day clean eating diet plan that will help you:

  • Cleanse toxins from your body and boost general health.
  • Speed up your body metabolism in record time.
  • Achieve the body shape of your dream the right way.
  • Turn your body into a Fat Burning machine naturally.
  • Blowtorch the most stubborn fat around your belly and butt- this will wow you!
  • Turn back your age clock and there will be a younger You exactly after 8 short weeks.
I shall also recommend you a full body detox plan that will help you super cleanse your body and remove every bit of harmful toxins from your body so that your body becomes receptive even to small walk. It will be a fun way for you to see your body losing extra weight, quickly, safely and naturally. Then I shall also send you a fitness plan that will start building muscles and losing fat. This basic version of training has helped most of the obese people come into a shape that they themselves admired. You too can reshape your body with the motivation that we provide you from the beginning to whenever you want by email. Just send us your questions and I shall reply you withing next 24 hours (even sooner). 
Where will Your Funds Go?
I am a researcher and health enthusiast so I shall use these funds into creating a well researched body weight fitness training program for you and I shall have to do it myself and also hire someone to help me in all this work by creating,proofreading, editing, publishing this material. So let us materialize this project into a reality and live a healthy life without any extra weight. :)

story:
About the Project


Hi, My name is Dave Spencer, and I am the founder of the Earthathon Relay. 

To be honest, I created the relay as a way to keep myself motivated to run during a time of financial struggle, when I simply could not afford to run in any of the local race events...they were just too expensive.

Not only did creating the relay motivate me to run, but in less than a year the relay has also motivated 1,500 others all around the world to run, walk, hike or jog more frequently.  We need your help to keep this momentum going!!!

Our Goals

We want to motivate and encourage as many people as possible to exercise more frequently. So we are raising funds for Marketing and Business Development.

  • Branding - Our goal is to make the Earthathon Relay well-known.
  • Marketing - Launch new campaigns on social media.
  • Sponsors - Seek corporate sponsors.
  • Charities - Team up with charities to help fundraise for specific causes.
  • Go Green - Encourage Earthathon runners to clean up our environment, for example, run/walk to work, or pick up trash and recyclables found along the running trails.


More Perks for Members

  • The relay is FREE to participants.
  • There is also an optional annual Membership. Members get perks.  With adequate funding, members could be offered more perks.  For example a t-shirt, tank-top and/or running medal (see below).
  • Apparel - The Earthathon Relay currently offers print on demand apparel, but we'd like to find ways to make them more affordable, or a perk of membership.

 
  • Medals - The Earthathon Relay currently offers "virtual" medals, but our goal is to make these "virtual" medals "reality".  The more medals ordered the better the price, so we'd like to use some of the fundraising dollars to order medals and offer them at an affordable cost to participants, or as a perk of membership.


Our Impact

Together we can make a big difference in the world around us:

  • This project is a global relay with the opportunity to have a big impact.  What if we somehow encouraged thousands of people to run/walk to work rather than drive?  Or pick up trash and recyclables along the running trails.  Not only is this an opportunity to start a health and fitness revolution, but we can also help "green up" our environment.
  • This project started out with a single run and a tweet.  It has grown significantly within its first year.  And all indicators are that it is going to continue to grow as more and more people learn about it.
  • Get involved.  Be a leader.  Be a motivator.  Donate your time, your effort, or a few dollars to the project, and together we can make a big difference.  If nothing else, I hope you will at least consider joining the relay and then maybe tell a friend about it.

Press Coverage


CNN's Headline News "The Daily Share"

Runner's World Magazine

greatist.com Health and Fitness Blog

Search for #earthathon on twitter for the latest posts

And many other social media sites and blogs...

Your Challenge

Get CRAZY HEALTHY!!!  Step it up a notch.  Run, walk, hike or jog a little every day.  Add it into your routine.  Run/walk to work or school.  Just get your exercise in.  You'll be amazed at the results.  My personal story is that I had high cholesterol and the doctor figured I was still young and that it was just hereditary.  I started eating healthy and started running too.  I went back to the doctor and my cholesterol was low and normal, and the doctor gave me 2 thumbs up and said "keep doing whatever you are doing".  So I shall keep on running.  And I hope you'll do the same.  Motivate yourself to motivate others!

Our Challenge

Get CRAZY HEALTHY!!!  And also encourage thousands of others to do the same.  In order to be prepared for the relay's growth, funding is important and has been the most significant challenge thus far.  Many ideas and marketing strategies have been delayed due to lack of funding.  This is where you can help us overcome the financial hurdles by providing some much needed start-up funding.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you simply cannot contribute financially, I totally understand because I have been there.  It's okay!  But there are many other things you can do:

  • Join The Relay. It's FREE!!!
  • Help Motivate and Encourage Others!
  • Tell your friends, or share the project to your favorite social media sites.
  • Go Green!!!  And get CRAZY HEALTHY!!!

Thank YOU !!!   Go Run :)  Go Walk :)  Go Hike :)  Go Jog :)

earthathonrelay.com

story:
I am a girl from China, now studying in Switzerland. Due to the fear of being unaccustomed to foreign diet, I have brought some specialties of beef jerky from hometown, and they has won considerable popularity after sharing with local friends, so I come here to try to promote unique air-dry beef jerky in my hometown, hoping that more people will like it! Also, I can earn my own living expenses required to study by sharing delicious food. Next, I'll introduce the beef jerky that I recommend to you all.


Airdry beef jerky comes from Hulun Buir Prairie in China, vast grassland entirely away from industrial pollution and urban waste pollution, and the cattle are all raised by grazing and fed by 100% edible grass. Air-dry beef jerky is the daily snack for herders. Our beef jerky are all independently produced by families of our own without adding any additive ingredients!and Select the best silverside of 1500g to making only 500g air-dry beef jerky 

Select the best Beef in making.

Cut into strips along the beef texture after cleaned and preserve it for one day to make it tasty

Air drying!

Cook or fry them after air-drying. (According to personal taste!)

Conduct vacuum packaging for easy conservation finally and you can carry around!

Because the cattle in ranch are all fed by pasture with any hormones in the body does not contain, the consumption of this beef does not cause obesity. Meanwhile, it is delicious and easy to carry, able to be preserved for a long time, thus is very suitable for office workers who cannot eat on time because of working overtime occasionally to replenish energy temporarily.


In order to ensure food clean and taste unchanged, the quantity that we make would not be too much, and it is expected to have 120KG air-dry beef jerky for the first batch. Two cattle in grassland are needed with production and processing cycle of 15 days.

Hence, I come here to raise 12,000 dollars, so that people who support me can enjoy our air-dry beef jerky in the shortest time.

If the whole goal of the project does not reach, we will also mail corresponding weight of the air-dry beef jerky according to the number of supporters and amount to show gratitude!

At the same time, I hope that I get to know people with great lover of food from all over the world through this event and share with each other!

Finally, I feel sorry for vegetarians who enter this page. (If the picture make you feel indisposed!)

Cut into strips along the beef texture after cleaned and preserve it for one day to make it tasty




Air drying!



Cook or fry them after air-drying. (According to personal taste!)



Conduct vacuum packaging for easy conservation finally and you can carry around!


Because the cattle in ranch are all fed by pasture with any hormones in the body does not contain, the consumption of this beef does not cause obesity. Meanwhile, it is delicious and easy to carry, able to be preserved for a long time, thus is very suitable for office workers who cannot eat on time because of working overtime occasionally to replenish energy temporarily.

 

In order to ensure food clean and taste unchanged, the quantity that we make would not be too much, and it is expected to have 120KG air-dry beef jerky for the first batch. Two cattle in grassland are needed with production and processing cycle of 15 days.


Hence, I come here to raise 12,000 dollars, so that people who support me can enjoy our air-dry beef jerky in the shortest time.


If the whole goal of the project does not reach, we will also mail corresponding weight of the air-dry beef jerky according to the number of supporters and amount to show gratitude!


At the same time, I hope that I get to know people with great lover of food from all over the world through this event and share with each other!


Finally, I feel sorry for vegetarians who enter this page. (If the picture make you feel indisposed!)

story:
Urns of Charaka: The Hope Door to Wellness


Wellness and my own personal journey in this venture..

As per the World Health Organization, Wellness is "...a state of complete physical, mental, and social well-being, and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity." Unfortunately, in a world where we can’t go for a day without contact with chemicals and toxins present in our food, water, the air we breathe and our surroundings... maintaining wellness becomes a challenge! And to top it all the great amount of physical, mental and emotional stress caused by our lifestyle and life choices!

Having lived most of my life under stress and ailments and never being quite a 100% in my personal or professional life, I embarked on a personal wellness journey two years ago. As I started seeing a huge transformation in my own health and experience of life, it turned into a venture where I realized that everyone needs and deserves to experience this way of being. For the past one year, the R&D team of Urns of Charaka (UOCH) has created 100% Natural & Organic Ayurvedic Products and Programs for Holistic Wellness through Detox, De-stress and Rejuvenation. We now need your help and funding with the next stages – packaging, final testing, setting up the manufacturing unit, working capital and setting up the E-commerce portal. We would like to thank you with our products and programs in return for your generosity and contribution!


Ayurveda & Wellness

Ayurveda is one of the world's oldest holistic (whole-body) healing systems that originated thousands of years ago in India. Ayurveda is recognized by the WHO and is one of the most recognized and widely practiced disciplines of alternative medicine in the world. 

It is based on the belief that health and wellness depend on a delicate balance between the mind, body, and spirit. The primary focus of Ayurveda is to promote good health, rather than fight disease. Thus it is not only a comprehensive medical system but also a way of living and the very concept of "mind, body and spirit" originates from Ayurveda.


Our Products

Our entire product range is 100% natural and organic. We have only used natural/herbal preservatives because artificial preservatives and chemicals not only mar the essence of the product but also end up doing more harm than good. The products comprise of the following:

·  Ayurvedic Herbs & Food Ingredients

·  Herbal Infusions

·  External application Products


Our Approach & Programs

In Ayurveda, it is the TRIDOSHAS - VATA, PITTA & KAPHA; their properties, functions, imbalances, vitiations with respect to MIND-BODY that interpret all normal, abnormal and diseased conditions. The principle and methods to attain back the balance of TRIDOSHA - is the underlying principle of treating, managing and healing all conditions of the body. When the TRIDOSHAS are balanced then the body, mind and soul are in harmony and we are in a state of wellness. Our products and programs strive to achieve the same.

We offer programs around: Detox, De-stress & Rejuvenation; that are the mainstay of Wellness. The 2-5 day programs are holistically designed to include using our Wellness Products along with your recommended Ahaar (Nutrition), Dincharya (Day’s routine) as per your Mind-Body type.  They will kick-start your way to Wellness and allow you to experience a healthier & happier state of being.

Detox Program (Shodhana) - This program is designed to get rid of unrequired  by-products, toxins from your system by assessing the Dosh-Dushya Imbalance. Detox in Ayurveda is not just the Liver-Kidney detox but clearing of digestive system, blood purification, channel clearing and mind clearing. A detoxifying regime at regular intervals for even a seemingly healthy individual is beneficial in maintaining the vitality of the body. The Detox Program packet will include: Detoxification Products, Detox Diet Chart, Day’s Routine Chart as per your Mind-Body (Dosha) type for the duration of the program.

De-stress Program (covered under Rogaghna and Shaman)- It is not the situation but the reaction to a situation that causes stress. And it is reflected in your physical, mental and emotional being. This program will address the root causes of your reactions that result into stress. It will equip you with the calm and balance to handle and manoeuvre when faced with various stress-inviting situations. Furthermore, our de-stress products can be readily used whenever you need them to ground and calm you and do away the damage caused by day to day stress. The De-stress Program packet will include: De-stressing Products, Diet Chart, Day’s Routine Chart as per your Mind-Body (Dosha) type for the duration of the program.

Rejuvenation Program (Urjaskar-Rasayan) - Ahaar digestion forms Rasa and Oja or the vital force of the body is derived as a result of this process .Oja is central to rejuvenation as it determines our body’s vitality and immunity. Our Rejuvenation products and programs will enhance your body’s resistance to disease, increase vitality and slow down the ageing process. The combination of internal and external application products will leave you feeling stronger, healthier and younger externally and internally. The Rejuvenation Program packet will include: Rejuvenating Products, Diet Chart, Day’s Routine Chart as per your Mind-Body (Dosha) type for the duration of the program.


The Perks

$10 - Detox Herbal Infusion pack

$19 - De-stress Bundle (De-stress Herbal Infusion pack & Calming Foot Soak)

$32 - Herbal Infusions Wellness Collection with three kinds of infusions for detox, de-stress and rejuvenation

$46 - 2 days Detox Program

$55 - 2 days Rejuvenation Program

$118 - 5 days Detox Program 

$145 - 5 days Rejuvenation Program



What we are funding?




Testimonials for our Products and Programs  (These products were crafted in our R&D lab and given to people who volunteered to use them individually or take one of our programs)


I started the detox program with much contemplation but am very pleased with the results. I was surprised to see that it helped me with my digestive system when I was experiencing irregular bowel movement and even the laxative was not properly helping. The results of the detox products were not instant as with any natural product but really amazing as my bowel movement is now regularized. The products, the diet and the daily routine recommendations are making me feel lighter and healthier. I believe the clearing of toxins is also showing on my face as it looks clearer and brighter.  I felt more energetic after 3 days into the program. And I also feel that the body is fitter... I had been experiencing some aches in my legs/calves and also shoulders for a while and I am not feeling much of that after the program. The infusions and the food ingredients are great tasting unlike most ayurvedic products and I am continuing to have them even after finishing the program. I also like that the program is holistic for the entire body inside out. I love the texture of bath products and they make me feel so light and fresh especially after a long day.  

--Kriti, 52 years, Female


I was planning to take some spa time so I jumped at the Rejuvenation Program. But it turned out to be way more than that.... After 5 days, I feel stronger and more energetic from inside. I feel that I have increased stamina to do more. The herbal infusion tasted great with honey. The face and body products feel quite luxurious in texture and fragrance. Since the products are completely natural and very unique, it felt like someone has hand-crafted them for me. 

The results on my face and body were amazing too. The rejuvenation ubtan was wonderful. Not only did it reduce the size of my pores, it had a great fragrance and a soft texture unlike anything I have used as scrub or ubtan. It leaves the face supple and never dry. It gives a certain glow that people seem to notice. I also get the feeling that it is lightening my dark spots. I can say more over a longer period of use! Since the program was customized as per my body-mind type, I felt that everything suited me really well... whether it was the face and body products or those for internal use. I feel refreshed and ready to take on things I had been postponing!

--Monika, 29 years, Female


I have great positive feedback to share for your products. The De-stress Infusion has excellent aroma... It reminded me of when it rains after a hot spell. It had a very pleasant after taste. No honey was required. And yes it is very calming!

I also used the foot soak after a tiring day at work. It refreshed me while helping me with the pain and tiredness in my feet. I was ready to go out for dinner with my family in an hour. :)

-- Sidharth, 38 years, Male

story:
Who are we and what do we do?

"Agents of Hope" is movement where we aid children with cancer through the donation of a nutrient rich supplement that greatly strengthens their immune system and provides a large amount of nutrients to help kids withstand the long durations of their treatments.



The benefits kids are having:

The natural dietary suplemment that kids are drinking provides them with enough nutrients that are helping them to: 

  • Prevent their hair loss.
  • Not feeling so weak after and during their chemotherapy.
  • Strengthen their immune system. 
  • Strengthen their defenses.
  • Prevent colds and respiratory complications. 
  • Increase their energy. 
  • Disminish secondary effects of chemotherapy.
  • Protect healty cells whilst helping to kill cancer cells during chemotherapy.
  • Reduce size of tumours.
  • Reduce pain that comes from treatments. 
  • Some kids are going into remission. 
  • Prevents liver damage that comes from chemotherapy. 


The scientific proof why it helps fight cancer:


The supplement is rich in fitonutrients called XANTHONES which provide a huge quantity of nutrients that act at a cellular level protecting organs and systems during the invasive treatments that children are subject to.

It has been scientifically proven that cancer is a disease that has its origin from cellular inflamation. XANTHONES aid in reducing cellular inflamation in a natural way and in some cases reduce some tumours.

Here is an article from PUBMED (scientific) demonstrating the positive benefits of XANTHONES against cancer cells:

Source: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19325754

We have kids going into remission after the constant taking of the supplement in a long term.

Taking the dietary supplement does not substitute medical treatment, but it is an additional source of nutrients for the body that greatly enhances the immune system and helps against cancer cells.

The dietary supplement does not cure cancer, but the quantity of nutrients that it provides to the body aids to have more and better probabilities of surviving cancer.


The results so far:

Since 2012 we have been helping children by donating the supplement in Mexico City and other sates.

The kids that have the opportunity to take the dietary supplement for at least 12 months have a better life quality than kids who do not take it and can even have a faster healing during their treatments.

Some kids have gone into remission thanks to the help of the supplement and their medical treatments.

Here are some pictures of donations to the children:








The Challenges:

Children need recurring donations to withstand their treatment during the long periods (years) they fight cancer.

Our main main challenge is getting consistent donations for children every month.

Many people donate one month only and we have to find more people to donate on next months.

This leaves children helpless again.

There are 7,000 new children with cancer each year in Mexico. So this becomes a major challenge because there are thousands of children to help.

Our goal: $3,000 USD.



Even though our long term goal is to achieve donations for a period of 12 months for 200 kids and help them have better opportunities of beating cancer, our first goal is to help 25 kids this month.

In order to help 25 kids each month we need to raise $3,000 USD.

All donations will be used to buy and deliver the supplement to kids directly in Mexico City and we will keep you posted with pictures and videos once we donate the supplement.

The more time kids take this supplement and implement all their medical treatments as told by the doctors, the better odds of surviving they have.

Just as their medical treatments that last for many years, the supplement should be given to them at the same time throughout months or years so that they have a better chance of surviving during their treatments.

With our $3,000 goal, we can help children for one month. But as explained before, we need to keep doing this every month to really help them.


When do we deliver the supplement?

Once donations are raised, the delivery will be made to each one of the children who are on a waiting list to get the supplement.

We will provide images and videos of the delivery and share it here.


We ask for the parent's commitment:

We ask for parents commitment to give each and every day the supplement to their children and we will provide letters from the kids and parents sharing any updates and information they can about their child's health and improvement.

We will also post these updates here along with more pictures and videos


Other forms in which you can help:

Helping kids for us is an obligation and a commitment. We believe that there are so many kind and caring people, aware of the importance of reaching this goal.

If we all put some effort in achieving this goal more children can have amazing results. We would love it if you become part of this movement and help them.

If you have the possibility to change things, and aid others, help us by giving kids a better chance of surviving. 

Help us spread the word! There are a lot of people that want to help but do not know how. If there is some reason why you can't donate, then please help us by sharing with your friends.

We can all make a huge difference. Kids battling cancer need us. They need you.

story:
Hello, we are Veg in a box, a plant based, non G.M.O., soy free, gluten free restaurant in Tucson Az. WE started as a food truck and rolled into an amazing brick and mortar location.  Now we want to get our burgers out into the world so everyone can have easy access to amazing Veg in a Box food.

The concept for the whole company came from Eriks want to become healthier.  As a Le cordon bleu trained chef he was making, and enjoying, some of the best food around, However, he could tell and feel that it was starting to have an effect on him.  Having noticed a weight gain and just not feeling that well in general, Erik started on a quest to make good food healthy.  The journey started with seeing what was out there already, what were people already offering to make living a vegan lifestyle easier.  After the disapoinment of seeing what is currently offered, the adventure began.  Erik started the food truck and built an excellent reputation at farmers markets around the burgers.  Offering a few different variants and constantly perfecting them.  Matt was a big fan of the food truck and stalked it around town so much that eventually Erik had no choice but to team up with him and start a Vegalution.  The Vegalution is vital for the growth of people for several reasons.  Eating less meat has a huge impact on the enviroment, from land erosion to water usage the animal agriculture system is harming our land and our bodies to degrees that are measureable.  Consumers need easy access to food that has accountability, for where it comes from and how it tastes.  Eating a more plant based diet has a long list of health benefits and we need to make it easier and tastier for people to make more plant based decsions in their diets on a daily basis.  We need to help out future generations understand the value of the food they eat and where it comes from.  We truly beleive that something as simple as an awesome veggie burger and start a converstion that might have never happened before, and get someone one the way to changing the world for the better with their diet.

We have the receipe, we make the burgers now and serve them in our restaurant, but we want to package them and get them into stores everywhere, and that is where we need your help.  We need to get the right sustainable packaging to ship the burgers.  We need to build our case so that we can have the burgers inspected and get the non G.M.O. verified stamp.  We need to have our facility inspected so that we can get the gluten free stamp.  We need kitchen equipment to make production on a higher scale possible.  When you help us achive our goal you are helping create a healthier America, you are making it easier and tastier for people to make a plant based meal decsion, you are helping future generations clean up the enviroment, you are helping to step away from G.M.O. food.  So what do you get? Besides knowing that you are helping us change the world, you will have some choices on cool rewards as thank yous.

There are some challenges that lay ahead of us.  Sourcing our quality ingredients and making sure they always meet our standards will not be easy.  Being able to get through all the tape nessecary to be able to put a non-gmo verified stamp on there, as well as the gluten free stamp is not going to be easy.  There are veggie burgers out there already and have an established name.  However, all these challenges are worth the pay off.  Having the confidence that the burger you are feeding your familiy(that they love eating) meets all your high standards for food is worth it.  Knowing the food you provide causes the least amount of harm possible, might make it taste that much better.  Veg in a Box is looking forward to the challenge of establishing our name and building customer confidence in us so that when you see our name, you know that product meets the standards of great taste, as well as being plant based, soy free, gluten free, and non G.M.O. 

Vegalution is the beginning, and you can be a part of it.  You can help change the diet of the world, but it has to taste amazing!  You can make the world you want to see, and make sure it is everything you want it to be for future generations.  Yes, eating a burger can change the world, one delicious plant based bite at a time.  The Vegalution will need funds to grow and accomplish all of its goals, however if you are not able to help with funding but still want to make a difference, please share!  Share our campagian, share our story, just tell someone about our name and help us get the word out.  We need your help to make this happen, and it might be the one person you tell about us that makes all the difference!  Every hundred people, well thats a dollar in change, so lets change the world one bite at a time.
