story:
(Le français suit)

A LITTLE BIT ABOUT ME:

I’m a young woman passionate about life ,my community and healthy lifestyles! I grew up in Mc Leods, in the North Shore of New-Brunswick, playing outdoors all the time! Regular physical activity might be the hardest pill to swallow but its the most valuable one!

  I’ve been a radiation therapist at the Dr. Léon Richard Oncology Center in Moncton since 2009. I have the health and wellness of the cancer patients at heart. Linking technology with human touch is my thing!

   I'm studying holistic nutrition part time at the Canadian school of Natural Nutrition.  I really connect with the holistic health approach. It considers the whole person; the mind, body and  spirit! When someone is sick, the body definitely needs proper care but I believe that for a true healing, the mind and spirit also needs it!

MY GOAL:

From june 4th ‘till the 8th, I’ll be biking 1200km around NB with the beautiful crew of  Héros du Coeur ! With the funds, I will organize holistic activities for cancer patients that are staying at the Mgr. Henri Cormier Lodge in Moncton. To promote holistic care, sessions of meditation, gardening, singing, walks, yoga,laughter yoga, tai-chi and musicotherapy will be offered. Professionals in those fields will give me a hand by teaching workshops and sessions. 

HOW YOU CAN HELP:

You can sponsor me by donating. Every dollar counts!  I wish to raise 3000$ to have the funds to pay professionals for their teachings and to buy specific equipment. For example, I’ll need a dozen yoga mats & blocks, one raised garden, gardening equipment, flowers, plants, two guitars, two guitar tuners, two guitar stands, maracas, songbooks, maps of different nearby walks, salt lamps, relaxation CDs and furniture for the meditation room. If you have any leftover equipment listed, you can also donate them! I’ll also need to get the 500$ registration fee which includes hotel, food and technical support for 5 days. You can even teach a session that promotes holistic healing!

THANKS :

Huge thanks to Consolvo Bike Shop in Moncton for gearing me up with a quality road bike and gear for my NB Tour! Thanks to Chantel Gaudet from Pura Vida Yoga in Dieppe for donating her time to teach a yoga class on a weekly basis. Thanks to Sequoia Dieppe and Vega for sponsoring me with Vega Sport plant based nutrition and supplements. Thanks to Lise Fournier who will be teaching amusing laughter yoga sessions. Thanks to Francine Mazerolle to be wiling to share her knowledge about relaxation methods and helping me to create a zen room for it. Thanks to Mathieu Francoeur for donating an art piece for the meditation room. Thanks to Lise Bourgeois for teaching meditation. Thanks to Michelle Reid for guiding patients in our beautiful nature parks. Thanks to Emmanuel Albert for taking professional shots of me. Thanks to Jeremie Doiron for donating his time to create a beautiful poster of my fundraiser. Thanks to Terry from KKP in Moncton for printing my posters for the cause.

Thank YOU for your time and generosity! :-D

********************************************************************

UN PETIT MOT DE ZOZO:

Je suis une jeune femme passionnée de la vie et de ma communauté! J'adore motiver les gens à suivre des bonnes habitudes pour entretenir leur santé. J'ai grandi à Mc Leods dans le Nord du Nouveau-Brunswick, en face de la Baie des Chaleurs et de la chaîne des Appalaches! J'étais toujours dehors en train de m'amuser! C'est vrai que faire de l'activité physique régulièrement c'est pas toujours facile à avaler mais c'est la ''pillule" qui nous ravigote le plus!

Depuis 2009, je suis radiothérapeute au Centre d'Oncologie Dr. Léon Richard à Moncton. J'ai la santé et le bien-être des patients à coeur. Pour moi, le contact humain est essentiel dans ce domaine si techniquement spécialisé.

À temps partiel, j'étudie la nutrition holistique au Canadian School of Natural Nutrition. J'aime vraiment l'approche holistique en santé.  Elle considère l'ensemble de la personne: le corps physique, le mental et l'esprit. Quand quelqu'un est malade c'est certain que son corps a besoin de soins appropriés mais je crois aussi qu'il faut porter une attention particulière à son état psychologique et spirituelle pour une guérison optimale.

MON OBJECTIF:

Du 4 au 8 juin 2015, je m'engage à pédaler 1200km autour du Nouveau-Brunswick avec la superbe équipe des Héros du Coeur. Avec les fonds amassés, je vais organiser des activités holistiques pour les patients atteints de cancer qui restent à l'Auberge Mgr Henri Cormier de Moncton. Pour promouvoir l'approche holistique, des sessions de méditation, tai chi, jardinage, musicothérapie, yoga, yoga du rire,chants et marches à l'extérieur seront offertes.

COMMENT VOUS POUVEZ M'AIDER?

Vous pouvez participer en contribuant financièrement. Peu importe le montant, chaque dollar compte! Je souhaite amasser 3000$ pour être en mesure de payer les professionnels qui enseigneront les sessions et acheter l'équipement nécessaire. Par exemple. j'aimerais acheter une douzaine de matelas de yoga, une douzaine de blocs de yoga, deux guitares, deux "tuners" de guitares, deux supports à guitare, des maracas, des livres de chants, un jardin surélevé, de l'équipement de jardinage, des carte de trajets de marches possibles des environs, des lampes de sel, des disques compacts de relaxation et des meubles pour la chambre de méditation. Je dois couvrir les coûts d'enregistrement de 500$ qui comprend l'hôtel, la nourriture et le support technique pendant 5 jours.  Si vous avez de ces équipements de surplus, vous pouvez m'en faire un don. Vous pouvez également enseigner une session sur un sujet qui encourage la santé holistique.

REMERCIEMENTS

Un gros merci à Consolvo Bike Shop de Moncton pour me commanditer en partie avec un vélo de route et de l'équipement de qualité! Merci à Chantel Gaudet de Pura Vida Yoga de Dieppe pour accepter de se déplacer à l'Auberge pour donner des classes de yoga une fois par semaine. Merci à Sequoia de Dieppe et Vega pour me fournir la gamme de suppléments Vega Sport à base de plantes. Merci à Lise Fournier pour donner des session amusantes de yoga du rire. Merci à Francine Mazerolle pour accepter de partager ses connaissances sur des méthodes de relaxation. Merci à Lise Bourgeois pour enseigner des sessions de méditation. Merci à Mathieu Francoeur pour faire la donation d'une oeuvre d'art pour la chambre de méditation. Merci à Michelle Reid pour guider les patients dans les sentiers de marches de nos beaux parcs communautaires. Merci à Emmanuel Albert pour m'avoir photographié professionnellement. Merci à Jeremie Doiron pour créer la belle affiche de ma levée de fonds. Merci à Terry de KKP pour l'impression des affiches pour la cause. 

Merci à VOUS pour votre temps et votre générosité. :-D

story:
The Audience will see you now...


SEE THE VIDEO for details!

For a limited time, the $10 donation level ALSO INCLUDES a limited-edition, hand-crafted, Donald Trump Pop-Up Card.


Cheaper Than Therapy (CTT) is a hilarious storytelling show of writers, and other awesome people, who share their true, personal stories before an appreciative audience in Montgomery, AL (USA).

For three years, only locals could benefit from the side-splitting cheap therapy that CTT provided, but now, the show goes global, with the opportunity to share your story, and benefit from others, from anywhere in the world!

While CTT will continue to have live shows, not only in Montgomery, but anywhere we find a venue, with the new global launch of our website, you can listen to stories and contribute your own, no matter where you live!

I have provided a video (above) as a sample of what we do at the live show - that's me, starting a revolution against women who squat and pee all over public toilet seats. (Sit down or clean up after yourself, for God's sake!)

The funds raised will be used to create a state of the art, integrated web presence with the ability to record and upload a story from anywhere. Funds will also be used to produce shows in multiple locations and a portion of the proceeds will be donated to a mental health provider in each city.

The name says it all. Storytelling is therapy. And it's cheaper.


Renea Dearing Dijab writes creative nonfiction and manages a blog at Cheaper Than Therapy, as well as produces the live show. She has been published in two anthologies: "Motherhood May Cause Drowsiness" and "That Time of the Month," (available on Amazon), as well as the Nashville Scene's "Vodka Yonic" column. (TN, USA)


CTT does not discriminate based on anything! You can be any color/ethnicity, sex, shape, size, age (18 and up, sorry kids!), of any sexual orientation or gender identity, of any faith, or none-at-all. Let  your freak flag fly at CTT! The only requirement is that you be kind , to others, and yourself.

story:
THE CAMPAIGN

I am a firm believer that if you truly want something, there is always a way to get it. Yes, you might have to get a little creative, but there is always a way. 

As soon as I found out about the Holistic Health Coach Training Program offered by the Institute for Integrative Nutrition (IIN), I knew it was for me. "That's it", I thought, "this is what I want to do". Yes. I got so excited about the program that I put on Amy Winehouse (don't judge) and danced around the kitchen. 

After calming down a bit and speaking with several IIN graduates, I proceeded to enroll in the program starting in September. I told myself I would find a way to pay for it between now and then because if I really wanted to do it (and I really do), I would find a way to make it happen.


At first, I was disappointed to learn that IIN does not offer any scholarships to its students. Paying for the program "out of pocket" would be a huge stretch for me (ok, let's be honest, totally impossible) after having lived and worked in the land of the devaluating peso, i.e. Argentina, for the last six years. Charging it on my credit card crossed my mind - what the hell, at least I would earn a lot of frequent flyer miles, right? And I could always take out a loan if I absolutely had to (and I will), but considering I still owe money from my undergraduate studies, I would prefer to avoid it at all costs. And then I had an idea! 

What if I created a crowdfunding campaign to offer my holistic health services to supporters at discounted rates in exchange for their contributions? That way, I could not only pay my tuition but also return my backers' investments in a meaningful way and jumpstart my professional career as a health coach before my classes even begin.

It just seemed like a win-win-win situation. So here I am, offering you guided meditations, yoga classes, weekend cleanses, 1-on-1 holistic health coaching consultations and programs, homemade farm-to-table meals and more in exchange for your support. I am even offering myself up as a personal chef for the weekend to the most financially generous backers (yes, my meat loving friends, you would have to go vegetarian for two days). You can also make a straightforward donation to my campaign without selecting a perk if you so wish. The choice is yours!

Sometimes things that look like road blocks turn out to be blessings in disguise. So, thank you IIN for not offering scholarships - this is so much better and on so many levels. I have again been reminded that you just have to trust that things always work out the way they are meant to because, well, they always do. That being said, maybe this isn't the final answer to my predicament, but it feels right, so I'm going with it and surrendering myself to this Indiegogo campaign. 

Oh, and before anyone gets too excited - this program is based in New York City but is now conducted entirely online and can be completed from just about anywhere, so no, I am not planning to move to NYC. Sorry mom!

[More information about health coaching and the IIN program is included at the bottom of this page, in case you're interested in learning more.]


THE PERKS

"Perks" is the name Indiegogo gives to the items mentioned above that I would like to offer to you in exchange for your support. You can find a description and the value of each perk on the right-hand side of your screen. 

I don't want your contribution to my campaign to simply be an investment in my education; I want it to be an investment in your health, no matter how small. Even if it's just a healing quote or a 10-minute guided meditation, I want you to reward yourself because you deserve it. Go ahead, indulge yourself. 

Perks can also be given to deserving friends, family members and/or co-workers as gifts. All perks are one hundred percent transferable. And of course, if you have any questions at all, please contact me immediately. I would love to hear from you.


DONATIONS
If you are not looking to take advantage of the perks, you also have the option to make a straightforward monetary donation in the amount of your choosing. Perks can also be combined with donations. 


One hundred percent of the proceeds from this campaign will go directly towards my tuition and fees at IIN. 



OTHER WAYS TO SHOW YOUR SUPPORT

Even if you can't make a monetary contribution, you can still support this campaign, and I would be very grateful if you did. Here are a few of the ways that came to mind. Of course, I am always open to your suggestions too.

  • Get in touch. Let me know if you would like to receive updates as I move forward and get my website and other online resources up and running. I will be posting recipes, healthy living tips and much more, and I would love to share all of it with you.
  • Donate skills. Trade your skills for mine! I am open to (almost) any kind of exchange you would like to propose, but I do have a specific interest in working with those who have photography and film-making skills as I am severely lacking in that department myself.
  • Spread the word. Share my campaign with others and/or keep me in mind in the future if you cross paths with someone who could benefit from health coaching and other holistic health services, such as yoga and meditation. 
  • Send love. Share a little piece of your heart with me. It is more than enough, I promise.

Thank you for taking the time to check out my campaign, and for your heartfelt support of my latest life adventure. I wish you much health and happiness now and always.

With love,

Alie


And now...

MORE ABOUT HOLISTIC HEALTH COACHING AND IIN

Some of you may be wondering, "what exactly does a health coach do anyways?" Good question.

Health coaches are mentors who work with clients to meet their health goal(s) and increase their overall health and happiness by addressing all aspects of wellness, including diet, exercise, relationships, career, spirituality and more. Rather than simply treating symptoms as Western doctors often do, health coaches challenge their clients to dig deeper and tap into their inner wisdom in order to a) identify the root cause of the health issue in question and b) make real, lasting changes.

I have realized through my own healing journey that we all intuitively know what it is we need to heal - it's a matter of learning how to access this information. There are of course many practices which aid us in uncovering this sacred knowledge we carry inside, many of which I have experimented over the years, but I have found health coaching to be a particularly effective method. 


>


I thought for years that I was eating and living in a "healthy" way, but the truth is that there is no one way that works for everyone. My personal experience working with health coach Stefanie Kleinburd of Luz Femenina helped me to look inside and re-evaluate things. I made several changes to my diet and lifestyle, and I have never felt better and more in tune with who I am. 

So, it should come as no surprise that I want to help others find the same kind of healing I have found by becoming a certified health coach myself. It just seems like the perfect way to combine my skills, experience and passion for holistic living. All I need now is a bit of time at IIN to make it happen.



The Holistic Health Coach Training Program at IIN is an innovative program designed to provide aspiring health coaches with a solid foundation on which to build their professional practices.

The program is unique in the field of holistic health in that it does not preach any one way of living holistically; it simply introduces students to the possibilities and encourages them to draw their own conclusions and help their clients to do the same. 

Over the course of the next year, I will be learning about more than one hundred dietary and alternative healing techniques from experts in the field. I will also be receiving the training and tools I need to launch my professional practice and begin working with clients, even before graduation. I can hardly wait.

If you are interested in learning more about IIN or would like more information on becoming a health coach, please contact me. I would love to hear from you.
story_txt:
THE CAMPAIGNI am a firm believer that if you truly want something, there is always a way to get it. Yes, you might have to get a little creative, but there is always a way. As soon as I found out about the Holistic Health Coach Training Program offered by the Institute for Integrative Nutrition (IIN), I knew it was for me. "That's it", I thought, "this is what I want to do". Yes. I got so excited about the program that I put on Amy Winehouse (don't judge) and danced around the kitchen. After calming down a bit and speaking with several IIN graduates, I proceeded to enroll in the program starting in September. I told myself I would find a way to pay for it between now and then because if I really wanted to do it (and I really do), I would find a way to make it happen.At first, I was disappointed to learn that IIN does not offer any scholarships to its students. Paying for the program "out of pocket" would be a huge stretch for me (ok, let's be honest, totally impossible) after having lived and worked in the land of the devaluating peso, i.e. Argentina, for the last six years. Charging it on my credit card crossed my mind - what the hell, at least I would earn a lot of frequent flyer miles, right? And I could always take out a loan if I absolutely had to (and I will), but considering I still owe money from my undergraduate studies, I would prefer to avoid it at all costs. And then I had an idea! What if I created a crowdfunding campaign to offer my holistic health services to supporters at discounted rates in exchange for their contributions? That way, I could not only pay my tuition but also return my backers' investments in a meaningful way and jumpstart my professional career as a health coach before my classes even begin.It just seemed like a win-win-win situation. So here I am, offering you guided meditations, yoga classes, weekend cleanses, 1-on-1 holistic health coaching consultations and programs, homemade farm-to-table meals and more in exchange for your support. I am even offering myself up as a personal chef for the weekend to the most financially generous backers (yes, my meat loving friends, you would have to go vegetarian for two days). You can also make a straightforward donation to my campaign without selecting a perk if you so wish. The choice is yours!Sometimes things that look like road blocks turn out to be blessings in disguise. So, thank you IIN for not offering scholarships - this is so much better and on so many levels. I have again been reminded that you just have to trust that things always work out the way they are meant to because, well, they always do. That being said, maybe this isn't the final answer to my predicament, but it feels right, so I'm going with it and surrendering myself to this Indiegogo campaign. Oh, and before anyone gets too excited - this program is based in New York City but is now conducted entirely online and can be completed from just about anywhere, so no, I am not planning to move to NYC. Sorry mom![More information about health coaching and the IIN program is included at the bottom of this page, in case you're interested in learning more.]THE PERKS"Perks" is the name Indiegogo gives to the items mentioned above that I would like to offer to you in exchange for your support. You can find a description and the value of each perk on the right-hand side of your screen. I don't want your contribution to my campaign to simply be an investment in my education; I want it to be an investment in your health, no matter how small. Even if it's just a healing quote or a 10-minute guided meditation, I want you to reward yourself because you deserve it. Go ahead, indulge yourself. Perks can also be given to deserving friends, family members and/or co-workers as gifts. All perks are one hundred percent transferable. And of course, if you have any questions at all, please contact me immediately. I would love to hear from you.
DONATIONS
If you are not looking to take advantage of the perks, you also have the option to make a straightforward monetary donation in the amount of your choosing. Perks can also be combined with donations. 


One hundred percent of the proceeds from this campaign will go directly towards my tuition and fees at IIN. 



OTHER WAYS TO SHOW YOUR SUPPORT
Even if you can't make a monetary contribution, you can still support this campaign, and I would be very grateful if you did. Here are a few of the ways that came to mind. Of course, I am always open to your suggestions too.



Get in touch. Let me know if you would like to receive updates as I move forward and get my website and other online resources up and running. I will be posting recipes, healthy living tips and much more, and I would love to share all of it with you.




Donate skills. Trade your skills for mine! I am open to (almost) any kind of exchange you would like to propose, but I do have a specific interest in working with those who have photography and film-making skills as I am severely lacking in that department myself.



Spread the word. Share my campaign with others and/or keep me in mind in the future if you cross paths with someone who could benefit from health coaching and other holistic health services, such as yoga and meditation. 



Send love. Share a little piece of your heart with me. It is more than enough, I promise.




Thank you for taking the time to check out my campaign, and for your heartfelt support of my latest life adventure. I wish you much health and happiness now and always.
With love,
Alie


And now...

I have realized through my own healing journey that we all intuitively know what it is we need to heal - it's a matter of learning how to access this information. story:
HEALTH. DIGNITY. SOLIDARITY.

STAND WITH GREEK PUBLIC HEALTH AND HEALTHCARE.

"State Parties shall strive to ensure that no child is deprived of his or her right of access to such health care services ".  

Perhaps some Greek children suffering today for lack of basic medications are concerned and convinced and indeed note with satisfaction that " State Parties undertake to promote and encourage international cooperation to achieve a full realization of the right to health ". 

The words of these U.N declarations will treat not one child, they will not prevent one suicide, they will not prevent disease or care for the sick, 

 I urge all colleagues working healthcare, in Public Health and all of good conscience to stand with those in Greece whose right to health is being ripped away and to donate and take action to defend the right to healthcare, to ensure that the services, medications, vaccinations and supports so desperately needed are there for those who need them.  I urge you to support this international appeal. 

Prof Damian Mc Cormack FRCS Orth 

The Children's Hospital 

Temple St, Dublin.


Austerity and Health In Greece. 

In the past five years the healthcare and public health systems of Greece have faced almost insurmountable cuts; cuts of 40- 50% and growing, cuts that many of us who work in healthcare hopefully will never ever have to live through. 

These cuts are part of the regime of extreme austerity forced on Greece by the European Central Bank, the International Monetary Fund and others and they have had the dual impacts of both dramatically escalating the effects of the social determinants of health in Greece whilst at the same time stripping health and social agencies of much of their capacity to respond to these impacts.  

The United Nations Human Rights Commission and the World Health Organisation stipulate the meaning of “the right to health” in the following terms;

“The right to health is an inclusive right. We frequently associate the right to health with access to health care and the building of hospitals. This is correct, but the right to health extends further. It includes a wide range of factors that can help us lead a healthy life…

..the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights calls these the “underlying determinants of health”. ..The right to health contains entitlements. These include: The right to a system of health protection providing equality of opportunity for everyone to enjoy the highest attainable level of health; The right to prevention, treatment and control of diseases;  Access to essential medicines..”

And yet,

Despite every United Nations and World Health Organisation declaration on the centrality of health and the stated goals of reducing health inequalities, these declarations have proven meaningless in stemming the significant escalation of an imposed health crisis in Greece resulting in massive escalations in health inequality today.

The provision of basic healthcare, access to essential medicines and public health have not been spared in the austerity being forced on Greece, and the impact of these measures are becoming clearer by the day.

To date, the cuts imposed on the health system in Greece have resulted in reports of up to 40% of Greek GPs having left the country, other health professionals have worked with no pay for extensive periods. The impact on the population in general has been even more stark, basic childhood vaccinations are being missed, shortages exist in almost all areas of basic medical supplies.

The overall suicide rate in Greece has escalated by over 35%, since 2011.

In a situation where youth unemployment is now over 60% the impacts of the social determinants of health are all too clear. Many working people who have lost their employment have also lost their employment related health insurance and are reliant on a network of volunteer clinics and pharmacies, even the rudimentary access to basic drugs they may have once had. While a number of major drug companies have agreed, for the short term to maintain shipments to Greece, this situation may well not last and does not cover many basic supplies.

Capital Controls and the Current Crisis.

The current capital controls in place have hindered the ability of clinics and hospitals to purchase very basic supplies to keep going -  even where they have the money, from sheets, surgical supplies, diabetes testing kits, vaccines, basic equipment for pap smears, imaging materials, testing kits, chemotherapy supplies and supplies for the most basic support for child and infant health.

The healthcare and public health needs of Greece ultimately CANNOT be solved through appeals; they require a just and progressive political solution that places at its heart the absolute centrality of health as a human right.

We urge all healthcare and public health organizations to actively advocate for a settlement to the situation in Greece that ensures, protects and reinforces adequate funding for the current health and public health systems. Greek healthcare workers and Greek people neither need, expect nor want charity, but material and moral solidarity through this period is essential on every level to simply allow them to do their jobs with dignity and for those in need to get the basic care that all individuals have a right to expect.  

This appeal is to raise funds for basic medicines, vaccines and medical supplies to supply the network of 40 plus community clinics across Greece that provide support to those without health insurance including undocumented migrants.

These clinics are largely staffed by volunteer physicians, nurses and other health professionals and exist on a shoestring filling massive gaps opened up by the economic crisis in Greece.

What can we do ?:

· First of all you can donate.  Whatever amount you can afford.

· 100% of the money will be used to buy and deliver critically needed vaccines, medicines and supplies which will be shipped directly to the collective of popular community clinics in Greece. The precise list of needed supplies will evolve, but as an indication, the needs expressed by one clinic alone are listed below.

· Consider twinning your workplace clinic, ward, health unit, hospital or union branch with one of the 40 plus community clinics in Greece, this will allow union branches and individual facilities to establish direct links and better tailor supplies based on the specific needs and specialization of the clinic being supported.

· Consider sending a delegation to deliver supplies and meet, this will vary between clinics dependent upon capacity and upon the materials to be shipped.

· Consider asking your union to make a block donation to the appeal and to promote it across the specific networks available to you. In Britain, we will be working in collaboration with Greece Solidarity Campaign. In Ireland 

· Consider helping to coordinate and fund shipping of supplies or assisting with accessing the bulk purchasing capabilities of hospitals and healthcare institutions. With existing capital controls the direct provision of supplies, while complex, is an essential support, and one for which many larger healthcare organisations are uniquely positioned to assist with.

Support the medical solidarity actions in the country in which you live, 

Ireland: https://www.facebook.com/Ireland4Greece

UK: https://www.facebook.com/GreeceSolidarityCampaign

Canada:

In Britain, we will be working in collaboration with Greece Solidarity Campaign. story:
Bright H2O bottle is the world's first smart water bottle with unique features aimed to increase bicyclist safety. It is a versatile product which will keep you hydrated, visible and connected. No matter where you are, this bottle is here to help you with your city life and adventures in the wild. 

Bright H2O bottle is designed with the single most important goal of cyclist safety. Every day, on an average, there are two bicycle related accidents. Similar stats threaten the safety of pedestrians, hikers, joggers, wheel-chaired and segways. Over a third of these accidents are caused by cyclists being stuck by a car during dark (un)lighted conditions. As cyclists ourselves, we have always taken these risks very seriously. 

While designing Bright H2O, we also strongly thought about including the cell phone alerts. During long bicycle rides, we must either stay disconnected or make stops to check our phones. Taking your hands off the handle bar or being distracted with the notifications can be dangerous. We decided to come up a distinctive way to make cycling a safe and enjoyable experience without.  

While thinking of ways to make cycling safe, we focused on modernizing familiar devices involved during a bicycle ride. Everyone always carries a water bottle when going for a ride or commuting on a bicycle. Transforming the water bottle to increase visibility seemed like the most obvious choice. 

Today, we are glad to introduce you to our latest product called Bright H2O Bottle, world’s first smart illuminated water bottle which keeps you visible to the traffic and stay connected.With Bright H2O’s ability to set custom notifications, you can be caught up on your phone alerts and directional navigation with a quick glance at your water bottle. 

When riding during poor visibility hours like dusk, dawn or night, it is extremely difficult to judge if the traffic has noticed you. Bright-H2O has a special brightness intensity to make you visible whether you are in traffic during a bright sunny day or a dark-quiet neighborhood street. The bright light with the flickering patterns ensures attention from other drivers, riders or pedestrians sharing the road with you.  

 

The Bright H2O bottle has a special feature of setting various modes like: active mode, quite mode and night mode. These distinctive modes will allow you to customize the light during various activities like the active mode while cycling or camping, quiet mode for home or office, and the sleep mode for meditation or night light. Trying to spot the bottle, when you wake up thirsty in the middle of the night, will be a breeze with the night mode.

"The smart water bottle that will keep you safe and connected" 

The bottle has a strong battery life which stay lit for anywhere from 3-24 hours depending on the light patterns and sensors you’re using.

While trying to stay healthy, we didn’t want you to worry about whether the bottle is safe to drink from or how to keep it clean. During the design process, we made sure to choose BPA-free and dishwasher safe materials. This allows the bottle users to stay healthy and making it easier to clean it and be quickly back on the go.

The bottle is one-hundred percent leak-proof, hence, you can go on with your adventure and be assured that the water will be there to quench your thirst, when you need it.

HOW IT WORKS

When we call a bottle connected, we really mean connected. The models: BLE and PRO can be synced with your smart phone. The app will allow you to setup notifications to colors, blinking frequency or style by the type of app or contact. Solid blue light for a call from dad, a blinking green for roommate’s text and flashing white for important work emails. Doesn’t that make life easy!

The PRO model of the Bright H2O bottle will have wi-fi connectivity allowing you to receive web notifications for any web services like weather alerts, stock market changes or when the Houston Rockets win. 

NAVIGATION

The Bright H2O bottle will also navigate your way for you. Open up the app, enter your destination and go. The bottle cap on the handle bar or on your water bottle will transform into turn signals to direct you without having to check your phone or listen to your phone, hence, no distractions.

 

 

MOUNTS

Our remarkable bottle cap is designed with a rare yet highly functional feature to fit on any standard action camera mount. This gives you a wide range of mounting options when you are seeking adventure. Whether you mount it on your bicycle's handle bar, saddle, various adventure gears, camera tripods or on your vehicle, the Bright H2O bottle will be there to illuminate your way. 

 

 

PRODUCT MODELS

 

MOBILE APP

The BLE and PRO models of the BrightH2O bottle can be controlled from the companion app architected for an unparalleled user experience. You will be able to build and set custom patterns of lights and colors for phone or web alerts like voicemails, calendar reminders, weather or sports. These custom patterns can also be shared or downloaded. 

The app will allow intuitive interaction with the bottle's lights and sensors. You will be able to log or share your record breaking adventure performance stats with your peers.

 

REWARDS

 

 TIMELINE

 

PRESS

Maker Faire Houston 2016

 

STRETCH GOALS

 $25,000 in pledge unlocks:  BOTTLE ACCESSORIES 
ACCESSORY PACKAGE CONTAINING A WATER BOTTLE BIKE CAGE, CARABINER RING AND A HANDLE BAR ACTION CAMERA MOUNT FOR THE BOTTLE CAP

$50,000 in pledge unlocks: GLASS MATERIAL 
BRIGHT H2O BOTTLE IN DURABLE GLASS MATERIAL WITH SILICONE PROTECTIVE SLEEVE FOR HOT BEVERAGES, EXTENDED STORAGE DURATION'S AND EASY CLEAN.

$100,000 in pledge unlocks: NEW BOTTLE CAP COLORS 
BRIGHT H2O BOTTLE CAP IN ORANGE, BLUE AND BLACK COLORS WILL BECOME AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE

$150,000 in pledge unlocks: IFTT SUPPORT 
BRIGHT H2O BOTTLE WILL SUPPORT IFTT TO ALLOW YOU TO TAP INTO WIDE RANGE OF WEB NOTIFICATIONS. YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SET UP ALERTS FOR EVENTS LIKE HIGH POLLEN IN THE AREA, WEATHER UPDATES OR GET NOTIFIED OF YOUR NEXT MEETING.

$200,000 in pledge unlocks: PRO MODEL 
BRIGHT H2O BOTTLE PRO MODEL WILL BE INTRODUCED TO SUPPORT WIFI CONNECTIVITY AND VARIOUS SENSORS LIKE GYROSCOPE, ACCELOROMETER, MAGNETOMETER, BAROMETER, HUMDITY AND TEMPERATURE. WEB NOTIFICATIONS CAN BE RECEIVED WITHOUT YOUR PHONE WITH THIS MODEL.  

$250,000 in pledge unlocks: OPEN SOURCE APP SUPPORT 
WE WILL USE AISTIN BUS 24 OPEN STANDARD TO ALLOW YOU TO EXTEND THE CAPABILITIES OF BLE AND PRO MODELS OF BRIGHT H2O BOTTLE WITH THE HELP OF A PUBLIC API. THIS WILL ALLOW YOU TO INTERACT WITH THE BOTTLE BY PROGRAMMING CUSTOM FUNCTIONALITY WITH SENSORS SUCH AS PROXIMITY, AIR QUALITY, UV LIGHT

 

TEAM

 

Introduction Video:

How & Why this project started. 
 

 

 

 
 

Social Media:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bright.h20.bottle/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brighth2o/

 

Risks and challenges

- Will only be working high end materials that are safe for drinking fluids. 
- Software updates and patches will be made available.

Bright-H2O has a special brightness intensity to make you visible whether you are in traffic during a bright sunny day or a dark-quiet neighborhood street. The bright light with the flickering patterns ensures attention from other drivers, riders or pedestrians sharing the road with you.   The Bright H2O bottle has a special feature of setting various modes like: active mode, quite mode and night mode. These distinctive modes will allow you to customize the light during various activities like the active mode while cycling or camping, quiet mode for home or office, and the sleep mode for meditation or night light. Trying to spot the bottle, when you wake up thirsty in the middle of the night, will be a breeze with the night mode."The smart water bottle that will keep you safe and connected" The bottle has a strong battery life which stay lit for anywhere from 3-24 hours depending on the light patterns and sensors you’re using.While trying to stay healthy, we didn’t want you to worry about whether the bottle is safe to drink from or how to keep it clean. During the design process, we made sure to choose BPA-free and dishwasher safe materials. This allows the bottle users to stay healthy and making it easier to clean it and be quickly back on the go.The bottle is one-hundred percent leak-proof, hence, you can go on with your adventure and be assured that the water will be there to quench your thirst, when you need it.HOW IT WORKSWhen we call a bottle connected, we really mean connected. The models: BLE and PRO can be synced with your smart phone. The app will allow you to setup notifications to colors, blinking frequency or style by the type of app or contact. Solid blue light for a call from dad, a blinking green for roommate’s text and flashing white for important work emails. Doesn’t that make life easy!The PRO model of the Bright H2O bottle will have wi-fi connectivity allowing you to receive web notifications for any web services like weather alerts, stock market changes or when the Houston Rockets win. NAVIGATIONThe Bright H2O bottle will also navigate your way for you. Open up the app, enter your destination and go. The bottle cap on the handle bar or on your water bottle will transform into turn signals to direct you without having to check your phone or listen to your phone, hence, no distractions.  MOUNTSOur remarkable bottle cap is designed with a rare yet highly functional feature to fit on any standard action camera mount. This gives you a wide range of mounting options when you are seeking adventure. Whether you mount it on your bicycle's handle bar, saddle, various adventure gears, camera tripods or on your vehicle, the Bright H2O bottle will be there to illuminate your way.   PRODUCT MODELS MOBILE APPThe BLE and PRO models of the BrightH2O bottle can be controlled from the companion app architected for an unparalleled user experience. You will be able to build and set custom patterns of lights and colors for phone or web alerts like voicemails, calendar reminders, weather or sports. These custom patterns can also be shared or downloaded. The app will allow intuitive interaction with the bottle's lights and sensors. You will be able to log or share your record breaking adventure performance stats with your peers. REWARDS  TIMELINE PRESSMaker Faire Houston 2016 STRETCH GOALS $25,000 in pledge unlocks:  BOTTLE ACCESSORIES ACCESSORY PACKAGE CONTAINING A WATER BOTTLE BIKE CAGE, CARABINER RING AND A HANDLE BAR ACTION CAMERA MOUNT FOR THE BOTTLE CAP$50,000 in pledge unlocks: GLASS MATERIAL BRIGHT H2O BOTTLE IN DURABLE GLASS MATERIAL WITH SILICONE PROTECTIVE SLEEVE FOR HOT BEVERAGES, EXTENDED STORAGE DURATION'S AND EASY CLEAN.$100,000 in pledge unlocks: NEW BOTTLE CAP COLORS BRIGHT H2O BOTTLE CAP IN ORANGE, BLUE AND BLACK COLORS WILL BECOME AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE$150,000 in pledge unlocks: IFTT SUPPORT BRIGHT H2O BOTTLE WILL SUPPORT IFTT TO ALLOW YOU TO TAP INTO WIDE RANGE OF WEB NOTIFICATIONS. YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SET UP ALERTS FOR EVENTS LIKE HIGH POLLEN IN THE AREA, WEATHER UPDATES OR GET NOTIFIED OF YOUR NEXT MEETING.$200,000 in pledge unlocks: PRO MODEL BRIGHT H2O BOTTLE PRO MODEL WILL BE INTRODUCED TO SUPPORT WIFI CONNECTIVITY AND VARIOUS SENSORS LIKE GYROSCOPE, ACCELOROMETER, MAGNETOMETER, BAROMETER, HUMDITY AND TEMPERATURE. WEB NOTIFICATIONS CAN BE RECEIVED WITHOUT YOUR PHONE WITH THIS MODEL.  $250,000 in pledge unlocks: OPEN SOURCE APP SUPPORT WE WILL USE AISTIN BUS 24 OPEN STANDARD TO ALLOW YOU TO EXTEND THE CAPABILITIES OF BLE AND PRO MODELS OF BRIGHT H2O BOTTLE WITH THE HELP OF A PUBLIC API. THIS WILL ALLOW YOU TO INTERACT WITH THE BOTTLE BY PROGRAMMING CUSTOM FUNCTIONALITY WITH SENSORS SUCH AS PROXIMITY, AIR QUALITY, UV LIGHT TEAM Introduction Video:How & Why this project started.      Social Media:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bright.h20.bottle/Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brighth2o/ Risks and challenges- Will only be working high end materials that are safe for drinking fluids. - Software updates and patches will be made available.

story:
It is Essential

I am Emily Byrd and my mission in life is to empower and inspire others. I do this most powerfully through teaching yoga. This incredible practice has been transformative to my life, healing my body physically, building strength, flexibility, creating so much space that I can feel makes a difference; offering a deeper connection with my mind, body and spirit, healing my heart, awakening my passion and igniting my inner True North Star. At my Level Two Baptiste teacher training this past October, I listened very intently and heard the message: "This is your work." Teaching, Leading, Sharing this incredible practice is what I am meant to do in my life, this is my absolute truth.

The time is NOW to elevate our community, to have a physical place that is our vibrant home - where we are all committed to be in the work supporting each other in our parallel journeys. A home where we have transformative practices, build community, host programs, workshops and trainings that uplift, empower and provide catalyst for change, in lives and the world. 

I am opening a studio to create this space of transformation and connection and I need your help. As I am funding this on my own, there are a few crucial parts to our studio that we must have to operate in our fullest potential. The magnitude of your contribution will help us offer a safe, beautiful, energy-efficient space with infrared heat; facilitating a huge impact and change in the bodies, minds, heart and lives of all those who practice at Community Power Yoga.

Bring the HEAT, baby!

What is Infrared Heat and Why is it Important?

  • ​Infrared Heat HEATS OBJECTS, rather than heating the air; just as the sun heats the Earth and everything on it, this is exactly how Infrared Heating systems work! Forced air systems, baseboards, space heaters, etc. heat the air, and this heat can be lost in drafts, gusts, and in colder weather months, thus requiring the need to be replaced more often than heat that is created by Infrared Heating systems, which use medium to long FIR (Far Infrared energy) to heat objects.
  • ENERGY EFFICIENT: this technology saves so much on energy costs (nearly 40%-60%) to the studio, as well as the environment!
  • BENEFITS to the BODY:
    • SWEAT out the toxins!
    • LOSE WEIGHT - by practicing Power Yoga, with this high tech heat source, you will increase your metabolism and burn fat (..in addition to shedding EMOTIONAL baggage!)
    • REJUVENATE the skin, muscles and bones, resulting in a relaxed, energetic, renewed body after each time you practice!
    • IMPROVED & INCREASED BLOOD CIRCULATION
    • Increased FLEXIBILITY - Warm muscles are 3x more able!
    • PENETRATING HEAT heals from the inside out; muscles, tissues, ligaments, tendons and bones are able to benefit from this incredible sensation of being warm and moving through an intentional physical practice.

               We will be using Heating Green heaters in our space, if you want to know more:

https://www.heatinggreen.com/infrared-basics/

GIVE = GET

You have chosen the Incredible role as Supporter of Community Power Yoga, and as an pioneer backer to our studio, you have access to our one-time, intial offers. Be part of our community in a HUGE way!

We are projected to open late summer 2017, which is right around the corner! Acknowledging how important, imperative and humbling your contribution is, and how it makes such a difference to the beginning of our studio home, it is important to reward you in an abundant way. In what other way could we authentically do this than offering you access to practice and experience the life-altering work of Baptiste style Power Yoga?! 

GIVE & You GET. Feel GREAT about giving to a cause that will offer you a return that is so meaningful - a fully renewed, inspired LIFE. Funds raised in this campaign, along with my own personal contribution, pay for our heat source and studio build-out.

It has been SO fun creating these really incredible PERKS for you to enjoy as we launch the studio- from discounted ULTIMATE passes, studio swag, participation in Programs, even Teacher Training (jump on this!) We have SO much in store for you, and are thrilled to begin! 

 

ROCK IT OUT in CPY Style!

These awesome threads included in some PERKS offered... check it out!

 

 

COMMUNITY POWER YOGA START-UP BUDGET

Where is your contribution going?

I am SO THANKFUL for all of your support & want you to know where your heartfelt contribution is going. There are a lot of moving parts to starting something new, from the ground up (literally!), and with your help, I know we can Come Together and Create an AWESOME Studio!

 

The Impact

I encourage you to join us. Join the movement, Discover your passion, greatness and Be Up To Something  BIGGER than Yourself at Community Power Yoga.

The Time is Now to live in an inspired, eccletic, supported, thriving community; which is what we are absolutely aligned with, and look forward to sharing and co-creating with you. I want to see YOU grow and discover what is possible in your life, on and off the mat!

I committ to you fully - to the studio, to our community, to show up and authentically lead you in discovering your greatness, transformation and growth through this practice. My experience in teacher trainings with the Baptiste Institute, the 40 Days to a Personal Revolution program, and being complete and deep in the work of this methodology works. It is my greatest honor to be able to share this with you in such a real, meaningful way.

If you are seeking something, and not sure what it is, if you are ready to grow and want to experience a transformation, if you're talking about a revolution, if you want to have FUN and be part of a vibrant, colorful, committed community, THIS IS IT! This dream is not "for me", it's for you, for our community, and together we can make it a reality. Let's Do It!

 

Share the Love!

Make Some NOISE! Spread the word about this campaign and what it means to you. It takes a village and I am calling out, making a BOLD request of you, of our community, and supporters worldwide to help us create this Incredible space of Growth, Empowerment, and Possibility!

My heart is filled with immense gratitude for the oppurtunity to serve you in the highest way. Thank you for allowing me to travel with you along this path of Discovery and Greatness. I am beyond excited and honored to OM, practice, celebrate, and Be with you soon at Community Power Yoga!

 

Together we say, Namaste!

story:
There are many toss games out there and of course the most popular are beer pong and corn hole.  While playing these games at a party with a basketball game on tv, the light bulb turned on and Giant Pong came about.  So what is Giant Pong?

Giant Pong consists of 2 buckets and a regular size basketball.  Using a regular size basketball was the most important part of this game for me because it gives the player the same feel as shooting into a regular basketball hoop.  Also, the buckets are approximately the same diameter as a regulation hoop.

So how do you play Giant Pong?  First you fill the buckets with water.  Then set the buckets 13 feet apart.  There are 2 players on each side.  Players shoot from behind the bucket and score 2 points if it makes it in the opposite bucket.  If a player's shot comes off the rim, the defense scores 1 point if they catch the ball before it touches the ground.  And if you tip and spill the bucket, you automatically lose!

So in order for us to bring Giant Pong to you, we need your help.  Our manufacturer is ready to go once we are successfully funded.  So please checkout our perks and be part of the Giant Pong success!  Thank you so much for your support!

story:
Version française en bas de la page

MEET KOACH

 

Koach, the wearable device that analyzes the movements of your back to recommend you preventive exercises that fit with your physical capabilities

How to use Koach on a daily basis ?

An application that gives voice to the sensor

No download is necessary, you just need to go to Facebook messenger and to start chatting with Koach.

Koach at work

At work when you have remained in bad postures for too long, Koach recommends you an exercise to relieve your back.

Koach at home

At home, if you lift something too heavy for you, Koach alerts you before locking your back.

 

 

Koach in details

 

 

The product development of Koach

Core Muscles

Your body’s core muscles are located mostly in your back, abdomen and pelvis. This group of muscles provides the foundation for movement throughout your entire body, and strengthening them can help protect and support your back, making your spine and body less prone to injury and helping you gain greater balance and stability.

 

Hence the importance of an active lifestyle punctuated by daily stretch routines and reinforcement exercises in order to maintain and strengthen our back muscles.

The evolution of design

 

Science of Movements

The Koach 9-axis sensor and cutting-edge algorithms capture relevant indicators through core body movements. To determine these key metrics to unlock your true potential, Koach is based on medical research and experiments in yoga sessions. This state-of-the-art research has created new knowledge about moving technique, identifying characteristics for more efficient moves and poses.

 

Rewards

Rewards with wearable devices (from 25€ to 3 999€)

Koach Hero :

The wearable device, its application with a lifetime* subscription to two programs of your choice within :

Koach Super Hero :

The wearable device, its application with a lifetime* subscription to all programs of your choice. We are thinking about developing programs such as "Tango", "Classical Dance", "Gymnastics", "Tennis", "Volleyball", "Golf". Do not hesitate to contact us to give us feedbacks and new ideas about programs that can unlock your true potential.

Distributor Pack :

For sports centers, offer Koach to your customers to monitor them even outside the centers. Maintain their motivation and help them reach their goals by performing exercises that fit with their capabilities. Do not hesitate to contact us if you want to talk about more personalization.

For companies, offer Koach to your employees as the most efficient back pain prevention strategy to reduce lost days of work, lack of productivity. Do not hesitate to contact us if you want more information.

Rewards without wearable device (from 39€ to 79€)

Chatbot Lover : Koach can be useful even without his sensor. He will recommend you exercises that with the feedbacks that you will give him. Tell him the exercise was too difficult and he will give you one more simple instead next time. He will also guide you in the healing process in case of pain thanks to the Q&A Self-assessment.


ABOUT KOONDAL

Koondal creates solutions combining hardware, artificial intelligence, physiotherapy expertise to develop physical capabilities. Whether you’re an elite athlete, an everyday layabout, or somewhere in between, chances are you will eventually deal with back pain.  And while a typical response to experiencing back pain is to take it easy, either by laying down and gulping on antalgics or stopping any strenuous activity, this approach can undermine the healing process.

Studies show that the best prevention and recovery strategy is a combination of body awareness and physical exercises.

Koondal stems from the sanskrit word "kundalini" in the concept of Dharma, refers to a form of primal energy said to be located at the base of the spine.

Koondal has offices in Paris (France) and Belgrade (Serbia).

 

MEET THE TEAM

TIMELINE

 

DECOUVREZ KOACH

Koach, l'objet connecté qui analyse les mouvements du dos pour recommander des exercices adaptés aux capacités physiques

Comment utiliser Koach au quotidien ?

Une application qui donne une voix au capteur

Aucun téléchargement nécessaire, tu n'as qu'à te rendre sur Facebook Messenger et commencer une conversation avec Koach.

Koach au travail

 Après avoir adopté de mauvaises postures au travail pendant trop longtemps, Koach te recommande un exercice pour soulager ton dos.

Koach à la maison

A la maison, lorsque tu soulèves un objet trop lourd pour toi, Koach t'alerte avant de te bloquer définitivement le dos.

 

Koach en détail

 

Le développement produit de Koach

Muscles clés du corps

Les muscles de base de votre corps sont situés principalement dans le dos,  dans l'abdomen et dans le bassin. Ce groupe de muscles est fondateur dans l'étude du mouvement du corps. C'est ainsi que leur renforcement peut aider à protéger et soutenir votre dos en rendant votre colonne vertébrale moins sujette  aux sollicitations et aux blessures.

 

C'est pourquoi il est important d'associer à un mode de vie actif des exercices d’étirements quotidiens et des exercices de renforcement qui permettront de maintenir et de renforcer vos muscles du dos.

L'évolution du design

 

Science du Mouvement

Le capteur 9 axes de Koach ainsi que les algorithmes avancés permettent de disposer d’indicateurs pertinents traduisant la qualité des mouvements de votre corps. Pour déterminer les métriques clés pour débloquer votre potentiel, Koach s'est basé sur les résultats de sa recherche médicale et ses expérimentations dans des sessions de yoga. La recherche, axe fort de la démarche Koondal, a permis d’acquérir un savoir approfondi sur les techniques de mouvement en identifiant les caractéristiques utiles à l’obtention de mouvements et postures efficaces.   

 

Contreparties

Contreparties avec objet connecté (de 25€ à 3 999€)

Koach Hero :

L'objet connecté, son application avec abonnement à vie* à deux programmes de ton choix parmi "Yoga", "Fitness" "Peaceful Warrior", "Football", "Work".

Koach Super Hero :

Nous réfléchissons à développer des programmes comme "Tango", "Danse Classique", "Gymnastique", "Tennis", "Volleyball", "Golf". N’hésite pas à nous contacter pour nous donner des idées ou nous faire part de ton intérêt sur un des programmes.

Distributor Pack :

Pour les centres sportifs, proposez à vos clients Koach afin de les suivre même en dehors des salles de sport. Maintenez leur motivation, aidez-les à effectuer des exercices adaptés à leurs capacités. N’hésitez pas à nous contacter si vous souhaitez encore plus de personnalisation.

Pour les entreprises, proposez à vos collaborateurs un moyen simple de diminuer les conséquences du mal de dos au travail (arrêts de travail, perte de productivité, etc.). N’hésitez pas à nous contacter pour plus de précision.

Rewards without wearable device (from 39€ to 79€)

Chatbot Lover :

Koach peut t’être utile même sans l’objet connecté. Grâce aux exercices effectués et à tes retours, il pourra adapter ses recommandations. Dis lui que l’exercice effectué était trop difficile, il t’en proposera un plus adapté à la prochaine recommandation. Il t’accompagnera en cas de douleur grâce aux questions-réponses.


ABOUT KOONDAL

Koondal développe et distribue des solutions combinant hardware, intelligence artificielle et médecine physique pour développer les capacités physiques. Athlètes, seniors, ou au profil intermédiaire, tous sont concernés par le risque de troubles musculo-squelettiques. Koondal souhaite proposer une alternative scientifiquement rigoureuse à la combinaison d’anti-douleurs et d’inactivité physique en proposant des exercices adaptés aux capacités et aux objectifs physiques de chacun.

Koondal vient du sanskrit Kundalini qui, au delà d'être un type de yoga, signifie la puissante énergie spirituelle qui s'enroule dans la base de la colonne vertébrale.

 

L'EQUIPE

TIMELINE

Whether you’re an elite athlete, an everyday layabout, or somewhere in between, chances are you will eventually deal with back pain.  And while a typical response to experiencing back pain is to take it easy, either by laying down and gulping on antalgics or stopping any strenuous activity, this approach can undermine the healing process.Studies show that the best prevention and recovery strategy is a combination of body awareness and physical exercises.Koondal stems from the sanskrit word "kundalini" in the concept of Dharma, refers to a form of primal energy said to be located at the base of the spine.Koondal has offices in Paris (France) and Belgrade (Serbia). MEET THE TEAMTIMELINE DECOUVREZ KOACHKoach, l'objet connecté qui analyse les mouvements du dos pour recommander des exercices adaptés aux capacités physiquesComment utiliser Koach au quotidien ?Une application qui donne une voix au capteurAucun téléchargement nécessaire, tu n'as qu'à te rendre sur Facebook Messenger et commencer une conversation avec Koach.Koach au travail Après avoir adopté de mauvaises postures au travail pendant trop longtemps, Koach te recommande un exercice pour soulager ton dos.Koach à la maisonA la maison, lorsque tu soulèves un objet trop lourd pour toi, Koach t'alerte avant de te bloquer définitivement le dos. Koach en détail Le développement produit de KoachMuscles clés du corpsLes muscles de base de votre corps sont situés principalement dans le dos,  dans l'abdomen et dans le bassin. Ce groupe de muscles est fondateur dans l'étude du mouvement du corps. C'est ainsi que leur renforcement peut aider à protéger et soutenir votre dos en rendant votre colonne vertébrale moins sujette  aux sollicitations et aux blessures. C'est pourquoi il est important d'associer à un mode de vie actif des exercices d’étirements quotidiens et des exercices de renforcement qui permettront de maintenir et de renforcer vos muscles du dos.L'évolution du design Science du MouvementLe capteur 9 axes de Koach ainsi que les algorithmes avancés permettent de disposer d’indicateurs pertinents traduisant la qualité des mouvements de votre corps. Pour déterminer les métriques clés pour débloquer votre potentiel, Koach s'est basé sur les résultats de sa recherche médicale et ses expérimentations dans des sessions de yoga. La recherche, axe fort de la démarche Koondal, a permis d’acquérir un savoir approfondi sur les techniques de mouvement en identifiant les caractéristiques utiles à l’obtention de mouvements et postures efficaces.    ContrepartiesContreparties avec objet connecté (de 25€ à 3 999€)Koach Hero :L'objet connecté, son application avec abonnement à vie* à deux programmes de ton choix parmi "Yoga", "Fitness" "Peaceful Warrior", "Football", "Work".Koach Super Hero : Nous réfléchissons à développer des programmes comme "Tango", "Danse Classique", "Gymnastique", "Tennis", "Volleyball", "Golf". N’hésite pas à nous contacter pour nous donner des idées ou nous faire part de ton intérêt sur un des programmes.Distributor Pack : Pour les centres sportifs, proposez à vos clients Koach afin de les suivre même en dehors des salles de sport. Maintenez leur motivation, aidez-les à effectuer des exercices adaptés à leurs capacités. N’hésitez pas à nous contacter si vous souhaitez encore plus de personnalisation.Pour les entreprises, proposez à vos collaborateurs un moyen simple de diminuer les conséquences du mal de dos au travail (arrêts de travail, perte de productivité, etc.). N’hésitez pas à nous contacter pour plus de précision.Rewards without wearable device (from 39€ to 79€)Chatbot Lover : Koach peut t’être utile même sans l’objet connecté. Grâce aux exercices effectués et à tes retours, il pourra adapter ses recommandations. Dis lui que l’exercice effectué était trop difficile, il t’en proposera un plus adapté à la prochaine recommandation. Il t’accompagnera en cas de douleur grâce aux questions-réponses.
ABOUT KOONDALKoondal développe et distribue des solutions combinant hardware, intelligence artificielle et médecine physique pour développer les capacités physiques. Athlètes, seniors, ou au profil intermédiaire, tous sont concernés par le risque de troubles musculo-squelettiques. Koondal souhaite proposer une alternative scientifiquement rigoureuse à la combinaison d’anti-douleurs et d’inactivité physique en proposant des exercices adaptés aux capacités et aux objectifs physiques de chacun.Koondal vient du sanskrit Kundalini qui, au delà d'être un type de yoga, signifie la puissante énergie spirituelle qui s'enroule dans la base de la colonne vertébrale. L'EQUIPETIMELINE

story:
OUR STORY

2017 is the year that diabetics can finally beat the cruel debilitating disease we call Diabetes Type 1 and Type 2. There is now a FDA approved artificial pancreatic device that can mimic the pancreas to send bursts of insulin straight to the liver so it can function properly and metabolize carbohydrates.

 

SAFE AND IMPRESSIVELY EFFECTIVE

Artificial Pancreatic Treatments, (APT) is in fact a medical breakthrough, and the only current safe and effective way to stop the progression of diabetes.  Regardless of the severity of the patient, APT is effective and will help.

 

Artificial Pancreatic Treatment was developed and then tested in a number of university and centers of excellence including Harvard, UC Davis, University of Arizona, Scripps, and the Mayo Clinic, just to name a few (see publications)

 

TREATING THE ROOT CAUSE INSTEAD OF THE SYMPTOM

Diabetes is not about elevated blood sugar. It’s a symptom.

APT treats the root cause. Artificial Pancreatic Treatments directly correct the core problem of diabetes, which is improper carbohydrate and lipid metabolism.  This lack of proper metabolism is the direct cause of the many complications of diabetes; kidney failure, blindness, amputations, heart disease, stroke, neuropathy, progressing wounds, fatigue, sexual dysfunction, diabetes dementia and depression.

 

APT WORKS FOR BOTH TYPES OF DIABETES 

Since APT addresses the core problem of diabetes, it is effective for both Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes.  It was first used in 1984 with Type 1 patients, where the progression of the disease was slowed and in some ways stopped in the most severely ill.  In 1992 studies of Type 2 patients began, and the same effectiveness has been proven for Type 2 diabetes.  After 100,000 treatments, there is no doubt that the therapy works on both Type 1 and Type 2 patients.

 

HOW THE TREATMENT WORKS

Currently, a patient must come to the clinic once a week for a 6 hour treatment.  This may seem like a detractor until the many physical benefits are understood, and patients understand that as the body begins to repair itself from the years of diabetes damage, the less often patients will have to come to the clinic. Patients quickly begin to feel their bodies change and suddenly, do not mind coming to the clinic for their treatments due to their new quality of life, and the reversal of effects that were causing life-threatening complications.

 

DRAMATIC OUTCOMES

APT is not a subtle treatment where marginal improvement is a victory. APT is an “extraordinary” medicine for even the most ill.  In fact, the more ill the patient, the more dramatic the response.  Going from very ill to well, is particularly satisfying to practitioners.

 

GET YOUR VOUCHER NOW

This treatment is so effective, we anyone with Type 1 or Type 2 Diabetes to see for themselves what the safe and effective APT treatments are like. And that’s why we're offering vouchers. This is an opportunity to experience the benefits of treating the root cause instead of just treating the symptoms. 

Many insurance companies cover this life-saving treatment and if they do, your voucher will most likely cover the co-pay. But unfortunately, some ill-informed insurance companies don’t and this voucher will help  you offset the costs. Plus, if your insurance company has yet to hear of APT, let us know your insurance company and we will reach out to them to give them the necessary credentials so that they are likely to add this treatment to their list of approved safe and effective diabetic treatments. 

We're all part of this circle of life. When one person is hurting, we all hurt.  After signing up for a voucher, spread the word of this newly available treatment so that others with Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes can also get a second chance at a healthy life free of the symptoms of diabetes.
