story:
that are looking for better and easier ways to take common medications, vitamins, and supplements.  We are campaigning to make some new products on OTF strips that our suppliers are asking for.

 wants to help people with a vastly improved alternative to pills and liquid medications, on an Oral Thin-Film (OTF) platform. This is a small, thin strip that sticks on your tongue or inside your cheek, and dissolves, releasing ingredients into your body.

The failure to swallow pills is a common and important barrier to medication administration for children and their parents.  20 to 40 percent of children are unable to and 40 percent of American adults have difficulty swallowing a standard size pill. As a result, nearly 10 percent will stop taking medications earlier than prescribed.

Over 140 million Americans suffer from pill fatigue

and now together we can change that!

GET INVOLVED - GET REWARDED

 

 

We've met with all the major retailers and they all love our electrolyte product but want it to taste sweeter rather than salty for more general use.  In fact, they liked the idea so much they asked for more types of products,

 "Build us a whole line".

So that's what we are doing, 

and

that's where YOU can help.

 

 

 

In short,  Solves Strips®  is changing the way people take medication, making the experience easier, taste better, and more pleasant.  No more getting pills stuck in your throat, or needing a glass of water to swallow, or tilting your head back rapidly to help slide them down. 

Millions of people young and old are battling the daily challenge to swallow a pill. Our grandparents, our young children become stressed and upset. Just the thought of taking a pill is stressful. Because of these challenges, many people choose not to take medication when needed. This poses health problems on top of health problems. PACE has the cure to bring peace of mind and happiness to taking medication.

 

 

  

 

We'll do regular updates when we hit certain milestones in development and sales on both our company page  www.pacewellness.com  , www.solvesstrips.com and Indiegogo. 

Legal Disclaimer: Delivery of Rewards/Perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

 

 

 
 

 
Below is the Interview about our Solves Strips(R)
winning the EMS World Expo with the hosts from 
ProMed Network Medical Media.
 
http://blog.promednetwork.com/tag/ems-world-expo/
 

 

 

This means after  10 months you will start receiving the products
that are completed.

 

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION - FOR INTERNATIONAL ORDERS

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

We are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo. 

The link below can assist you in calculating duties.

Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency:

http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-and-tax-calculation/

Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. Our invoices are in U.S. dollars, and being converted to Canadian dollars for purpose of duties and taxes, by Canadian Customs.

Here's a link to find the CBSA offices where you can actually go and do the clearance, and save some significant dollars:

http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/do-rb/services/lvs-efv-eng.html 

We already have a product online for kids called 

Solves Strips® Pediatric Electrolyte.  www.solvesstrips.com. 

When kids get sick they throw up easily losing fluids and electrolytes.  We consulted with Doctors for the right amount of electrolytes to use during these frustrating times for parents. This strip has a larger dose of sodium and potassium, making it salty, and was designed to get electrolytes back into their system so they can then sip water without sugary drinks that might make them throw up again.  

(below is an add campaign we ran for our Pediatric Electrolyte)

 

 

  

            

(below is an add campaign we ran the week of July 4th, 2016 for our electrolytes)

   

 

Susanita has tried 2 products 

 Tom uses them for everything! 
 

  Marcus Rocque (purchased online)

My experience with the Solves electrolyte strips has been completely positive. For the most part, I find that I get similar benefits as with drinking a Gatorade, but faster, without the unneeded sugar, and at a fraction of the cost. If I feel that I need a boost when exercising (or even just when feeling groggy at work), I'll take a strip and fairly quickly feel more energized and less dehydrated. Doing the same with Gatorade
would be much harder on my wallet and waistline. 

I've also found the strips very useful if I ever have a headache from having one too many the night before. A couple of strips and a big glass of water and I quickly start to feel better and ready to get on with my day.

I went through my initial order quite quickly (partly from giving away packs to friends who loved them) and happily ordered more. Especially at the bulk pricing it was
very inexpensive and worth it for me.
Marcus Rocque

Colleen W

Between doing hot yoga regularly and not eating the best diet some days I end up with severe cramps in my feet and lower legs to the point that I cannot stand. Within 3 minutes of taking the Solves electrolyte strip the cramps are completely gone. Before the strips I would take ibuprofen that was largely ineffective and it would take hours for the pain to subside. I now keep the Solves Electrolyte strips at the bedside for when the cramps hit in the middle of the night. This brings me to another major bonus of the strips, you do not need a large glass of water to take the strips. Place them on your tongue and within minutes relief. With other electrolyte products  I have to stir for a few minutes to dissolve the crystals or wait for the tablet to dissolve. Finally, the Solves Strips taste great!

Colleen W., BN/RPN/RN

Jamie P

"My 6 year old son was sick with a flu and so I gave him the Solves Strips pediatric electrolyte. It dissolved quickly, and he even gave me a thumbs up."

 

Nicole Vincze ◊ Fitness Enthusiast & Competitor ◊ @alloutfitness_training ◊ Dog mom ◊Certified Personal Trainer ◊ Let's get Fitt      

Having my Solve Strips is equally as important as having my Nikes! With as much; weights, kickboxing, soccer and spin I do I need to keep hydrated and keep my electrolytes up! Also being a bikini competitor I love that these little strips are only 15g sodium where sports drinks are anywhere from 250-400g sodium!

Nicole Vincze

 Mommy Bloggers 

"These new and easy to use strips dissolve quickly, taste great and contain no sugar or carbs. I love how portable they are and easy to carry in your bag!  Whenever my son is sick and I am worried about him being dehydrated I use the strips instead of the drinks he hates. No more complaints! "
Angela van Tijn, OneSmileyMonkey.com

"New Pediatric Electrolyte Strips from Solves Strips are the easiest way to get kids to take their medicine! They’re portable, taste great, and dissolve quickly, so they’re ideal for kids who don’t like taking pills (that’s pretty much all of them, right?)"
Olivia Lasting, This West Coast Mommy

"Sometimes, life can be difficult, but everything is made better by all the cool new inventions on the market that make things quick and easy for us. One of those such inventions really HAS to be Solves Strips! A small, thin film that you stick directly on your tongue, Solves Strips makes taking medications THAT much easier! Simply pop one in your mouth, and quickly take your medications without all the icky bitter tastes!" Christina Anthis, The HippyHomemaker

 

A video testimonial from Beth...

What is an OTF strip?

Call it what you want; dissolvable strips, film strips, oral strips, medical strips, but the technical term is Oral Thin Film strips (OTF). OTF strips have been around for 15 years, however, it wasn't until recently that they advanced enough to be able to hold higher amounts of medical ingredients to be useful. OTF's are small, thin strips containing medical and/or nutraceutical ingredients. An OTF can be placed on the tongue or inside the cheek, where it dissolves within seconds. Once dissolved, it is absorbed into the oral mucosa of the cheek, which contains rich layers of cells and blood vessels. This area can pull the molecules of active ingredients into the bloodstream and throughout your body.

What's special about OTF?

What makes an OTF strip so incredible is the way the active ingredient is absorbed into the body. It is absorbed primarily through the Oral Mucosa and more specifically the Buccal Mucosa which is the rich layer of cells and blood vessels in the cheeks. This area along with the sublingual area, which is the major salivary glands, can pull the molecules of the active ingredient into the blood stream incredibly fast. This results in much quicker absorption and ultimately creates a faster reaction. What this means for patients taking an OTF strip is the potential of relieving symptoms faster than a pill or liquid and in most cases without upsetting the stomach or Gastro Intestinal tract (GI-tract).

Why is an OTF strip more ideal than a pill or liquid?

The answer is simple – it dissolves quickly, it tastes better, and it’s far easier to take than choking down a pill. 

What are Solves Strips®?

Solves Strips® are the evolution of wellness within the pharmaceutical and nutraceutical industry. Solves Strips® are OTF strips, that dissolve quickly, taste great, and are easy to take. Therefore eliminating the need for pills or liquid medications. Contact our Solves Service Team to learn more about Solves Strips®.

Why take Solves Strips® over other strips on the market?

Solves Strips® have taken OTF strip technology to the next level, benefiting individuals, their families, and medical practitioners alike. Solves Strips® technology has surpassed the competition with the ability to place medical and nutraceutical ingredients of various sizes and still have plenty of “room” left to include fun, delicious flavors. In other words, Solves Strips® are designed for maximum effectiveness and taste better than pills or other strips while being compact, and quick dissolving. This makes Solves Strips® great for children, elderly, and basically everyone.

Where can I get Solves Strips®?

You're already closer than you think – you will soon be able to buy them right off Solves website. Just click on the Buy Now tab in the navigation link to discover products that are coming soon, and find a location near you.

Where can you take Solves Strips®?

Be it home, the office, school, the gym, you can use strips anywhere, anytime. Solves Strips® were created to make taking medicine and supplements easy, especially for those who hate swallowing pills and liquid medicines.

How do you take Solves Strips®?

Just place it on the inside of your cheek, or on the tongue and let the strip dissolve -It's just that easy. Don't worry it tastes great!

Do Solves Strips® taste like medicine?

Bleh. No, that is the beauty of Solves Strips®. While most medicines produce a bitter taste, with Solves Strips® technology you only get delicious, great tasting flavor. We wouldn't want to take it either if it tasted like medicine. 

Who can take Solves Strips®?
Solves Strips® are specifically designed to allow anyone from ages 2 to 104 the ability to take their doctor advised medications and supplements, comfortably. This includes children, elderly, adults, athletes, health care practitioners, individuals who struggle with swallowing or choking disorders and everyone else!

Are Solves Strips® ideal for Dysphagiac patients?

There is a large population of individuals who have life-altering difficulty swallowing, and for those, the idea of a pill that could potentially get stuck in your throat is daunting. This condition known as Dysphagia affects over 20% of all people and even more so in the aging population. Truth be told, the number of people that just don’t like swallowing pills is unmeasurable so pharmaceutical companies have various ways to get medicine into the body. Pills, liquids, injections, IV fluid, topical creams, slow release patches, are all some of the delivery options. Nothing has really been as convenient as a pill or liquid until now.

Who should take Electrolytes?

Those who especially benefit from Electrolyte restoration include: -Seniors, who are generally more susceptible to dehydration than healthy adults and are often reluctant to drink much water because going to the bathroom is difficult. -People taking prescription drugs or supplements that list dry mouth or dehydration as a side effect. -People with chronic GI conditions who have trouble absorbing or retaining fluids. -Children, who are more susceptible to dehydration, especially if they experience vomiting, diarrhea, or excessive sweating caused by heat, fever, or exertion. -Athletes to use before, during or after a workout.

GET INVOLVED - GET REWARDED

 

  Our company name is Pace Wellness (www.pacewellness.com)

      

 

Our Brand is SOLVES STRIPS®

(www.solvesstrips.com).

Connect with us on: Twitter, Facebook, Instagram

 

Our Mission

Solves Strips® is dedicated to enhancing the evolution of wellness, providing innovative and non-invasive solutions- one strip at a time.
 

Thanks for reading and feel free to join us in making medicine, supplements, and vitamins easier to take. 

 - Pace Team

Pace Wellness, Inc. and it's affiliated companies 

DOES NOT GIVE MEDICAL ADVICE

The Pace Wellness website, blog, Indiegogo site and social media sites, along with it’s subsidiaries, contain articles on many medical topics; however, no warranty whatsoever is made that any of the articles are accurate. Even if a statement made about medicine is accurate, it may not apply to you or your symptoms. Pace Wellness, along with site contributors, are not doctors, the medical information provided is, at best, of a general nature and cannot substitute for the advice of a qualified medical professional.

 Nicole Vincze ◊ Fitness Enthusiast & Competitor ◊ @alloutfitness_training ◊ Dog mom ◊Certified Personal Trainer ◊ Let's get Fitt      
Having my Solve Strips is equally as important as having my Nikes! With as much; weights, kickboxing, soccer and spin I do I need to keep hydrated and keep my electrolytes up! Also being a bikini competitor I love that these little strips are only 15g sodium where sports drinks are anywhere from 250-400g sodium!
Nicole Vincze

 Mommy Bloggers 
"These new and easy to use strips dissolve quickly, taste great and contain no sugar or carbs. I love how portable they are and easy to carry in your bag!  Whenever my son is sick and I am worried about him being dehydrated I use the strips instead of the drinks he hates. No more complaints! "Angela van Tijn, OneSmileyMonkey.com

"New Pediatric Electrolyte Strips from Solves Strips are the easiest way to get kids to take their medicine! They’re portable, taste great, and dissolve quickly, so they’re ideal for kids who don’t like taking pills (that’s pretty much all of them, right?)" Olivia Lasting, This West Coast Mommy

"Sometimes, life can be difficult, but everything is made better by all the cool new inventions on the market that make things quick and easy for us. One of those such inventions really HAS to be Solves Strips! A small, thin film that you stick directly on your tongue, Solves Strips makes taking medications THAT much easier! Simply pop one in your mouth, and quickly take your medications without all the icky bitter tastes!" Christina Anthis, The HippyHomemaker
  
 A video testimonial from Beth...





What is an OTF strip?
Call it what you want; dissolvable strips, film strips, oral strips, medical strips, but the technical term is Oral Thin Film strips (OTF). OTF strips have been around for 15 years, however, it wasn't until recently that they advanced enough to be able to hold higher amounts of medical ingredients to be useful. OTF's are small, thin strips containing medical and/or nutraceutical ingredients. An OTF can be placed on the tongue or inside the cheek, where it dissolves within seconds. Once dissolved, it is absorbed into the oral mucosa of the cheek, which contains rich layers of cells and blood vessels. This area can pull the molecules of active ingredients into the bloodstream and throughout your body.
What's special about OTF?
What makes an OTF strip so incredible is the way the active ingredient is absorbed into the body. It is absorbed primarily through the Oral Mucosa and more specifically the Buccal Mucosa which is the rich layer of cells and blood vessels in the cheeks. This area along with the sublingual area, which is the major salivary glands, can pull the molecules of the active ingredient into the blood stream incredibly fast. This results in much quicker absorption and ultimately creates a faster reaction. What this means for patients taking an OTF strip is the potential of relieving symptoms faster than a pill or liquid and in most cases without upsetting the stomach or Gastro Intestinal tract (GI-tract).
Why is an OTF strip more ideal than a pill or liquid?
The answer is simple – it dissolves quickly, it tastes better, and it’s far easier to take than choking down a pill. 
What are Solves Strips®?
Solves Strips® are the evolution of wellness within the pharmaceutical and nutraceutical industry. Solves Strips® are OTF strips, that dissolve quickly, taste great, and are easy to take. Therefore eliminating the need for pills or liquid medications. Contact our Solves Service Team to learn more about Solves Strips®.
Why take Solves Strips® over other strips on the market?
Solves Strips® have taken OTF strip technology to the next level, benefiting individuals, their families, and medical practitioners alike. Solves Strips® technology has surpassed the competition with the ability to place medical and nutraceutical ingredients of various sizes and still have plenty of “room” left to include fun, delicious flavors. In other words, Solves Strips® are designed for maximum effectiveness and taste better than pills or other strips while being compact, and quick dissolving. This makes Solves Strips® great for children, elderly, and basically everyone.
Where can I get Solves Strips®?
You're already closer than you think – you will soon be able to buy them right off Solves website. Just click on the Buy Now tab in the navigation link to discover products that are coming soon, and find a location near you.
Where can you take Solves Strips®?
Be it home, the office, school, the gym, you can use strips anywhere, anytime. Solves Strips® were created to make taking medicine and supplements easy, especially for those who hate swallowing pills and liquid medicines.
How do you take Solves Strips®?
Just place it on the inside of your cheek, or on the tongue and let the strip dissolve -It's just that easy. Don't worry it tastes great!
Do Solves Strips® taste like medicine?
Bleh. No, that is the beauty of Solves Strips®. While most medicines produce a bitter taste, with Solves Strips® technology you only get delicious, great tasting flavor. We wouldn't want to take it either if it tasted like medicine. 
Who can take Solves Strips®?Solves Strips® are specifically designed to allow anyone from ages 2 to 104 the ability to take their doctor advised medications and supplements, comfortably. This includes children, elderly, adults, athletes, health care practitioners, individuals who struggle with swallowing or choking disorders and everyone else!
Are Solves Strips® ideal for Dysphagiac patients?
There is a large population of individuals who have life-altering difficulty swallowing, and for those, the idea of a pill that could potentially get stuck in your throat is daunting. This condition known as Dysphagia affects over 20% of all people and even more so in the aging population. Truth be told, the number of people that just don’t like swallowing pills is unmeasurable so pharmaceutical companies have various ways to get medicine into the body. Pills, liquids, injections, IV fluid, topical creams, slow release patches, are all some of the delivery options. Nothing has really been as convenient as a pill or liquid until now.
Who should take Electrolytes?
Those who especially benefit from Electrolyte restoration include: -Seniors, who are generally more susceptible to dehydration than healthy adults and are often reluctant to drink much water because going to the bathroom is difficult. -People taking prescription drugs or supplements that list dry mouth or dehydration as a side effect. -People with chronic GI conditions who have trouble absorbing or retaining fluids. -Children, who are more susceptible to dehydration, especially if they experience vomiting, diarrhea, or excessive sweating caused by heat, fever, or exertion. -Athletes to use before, during or after a workout.
GET INVOLVED - GET REWARDED
 
  Our company name is Pace Wellness (www.pacewellness.com)
      
 
Our Brand is SOLVES STRIPS® 

(www.solvesstrips.com).



Connect with us on: Twitter, Facebook, Instagram
 
Our Mission
Solves Strips® is dedicated to enhancing the evolution of wellness, providing innovative and non-invasive solutions- one strip at a time. 
Thanks for reading and feel free to join us in making medicine, supplements, and vitamins easier to take. 
 - Pace Team
Pace Wellness, Inc. and it's affiliated companies 
DOES NOT GIVE MEDICAL ADVICE
The Pace Wellness website, blog, Indiegogo site and social media sites, along with it’s subsidiaries, contain articles on many medical topics; however, no warranty whatsoever is made that any of the articles are accurate. Even if a statement made about medicine is accurate, it may not apply to you or your symptoms. Pace Wellness, along with site contributors, are not doctors, the medical information provided is, at best, of a general nature and cannot substitute for the advice of a qualified medical professional.

story:
Bringing evidence-based care and humanity to childbirth.

ImprovingBirth was founded in 2011 by IB president Dawn Thompson to bring moms and maternity care providers together to support women and babies during pregnancy, childbirth, and the postpartum period. We work hard to foster connections in communities so moms have the resources to have safe, healthy pregnancies and babies and to make informed decisions during their childbearing year.

To date, we have hosted rallies across 49 U.S. states, in 3 additional countries, and we have built relationships with organizations in the U.K., Ireland, and Australia, reaching thousands of families and building relationships with hospitals, birth centers, and care providers. Many of those rally locations now have formal ImprovingBirth chapters that allow us to work closely with the community, offering continuous support on a local level.

But to do our work, we need your help.

ImprovingBirth works on a slim operating budget. Most of our contributions and proceeds from IB merchandise sales go straight back to running our education, awareness, and advocacy campaigns. While the majority of our organization is composed of volunteers, we do also pay the business professionals that help make our nonprofit a reality, most of whom still donate a great deal of their time. Hard as it may be to believe, we manage to do all of our work on more than two continents with a budget of only $100,000 a year.

Why should you donate?

At ImprovingBirth, we are all about giving back. That's why we are not just asking for your money; we're earning it by providing you with quality fitness trackers and smart watches. We want to help you reach your fitness goals and ask that you help us reach our goals as well!    

Enough about us. How about those trackers?

 

Fun for the kids

A focus on health should start when a person is young. Building a strong foundation focused on wellness and physical activity can set the tone for a lifetime of healthy practices. That's why we're offering the ImprovingBirth fitness tracker for kids!  

Our kids tracker has a 3D pedometer that tracks steps and distance. It offers sleep monitoring -- a good night of sleep is so important for kids!, an alarm, the time, date, and temperature. You can even review the accumulated data and set the display through your computer or app, which includes a personalized signature function for formatting it just the way your child likes! It comes with an adjustable two-toned band that is 259mm in length. We offer 9 colors, enough for every child in the family to have their own!

 

One for the adults, too!

We haven't revolutionized the fitness tracker -- we save that work for maternity care -- but we have brought one to you at a great price!  

Our basic tracker is iOS 7.0 and Android 4.3 compatible with USB charging and some great features. It has step and distance measurement, calorie and sleep management, time display, event and call reminders, sedentary alerts, an alarm, and much more. And there are 5 bright colors available for you to choose from.

 

Keeping track while on the go

Want something that is truly multi-function? Then our smart watches are for you! This has SO many features. You're going to love it!

Our smart watch has Bluetooth capability, an HD display, touch screen, two-way anti lost (find your phone OR your watch!) You can sync it with social media, play MP3/MP4, take pictures with the camera and self-timer. It also has a compass and the features of a fitness tracker. Choose from one of three stylish colors.

 

Fun for the whole family!

Fitness is best when it's a family affair. That's why we offer the family pack with 2 kids trackers, an adult fitness tracker, and a smart watch. There is something for everyone!

 

 

 

A color for every mood (and outfit)

Want our fitness tracker but can't decide on a color? You don't have to! The bands are interchangeable; you can wear a different one everyday. (Not all colors shown are available.)

 

 

 

 

 

 

How do I calculate shipping? Can you ship internationally?

Indiegogo has us covered. Shipping is added during the checkout process. We currently do not offer international shipping through Indiegogo, but international orders can be handled on a one to one basis. Please message us through the campaign or email us, and we will do our best to accommodate your order.

Is my donation here tax deductible?

Unfortunately, no. Since you will be receiving a product or service, your purchase is not tax-deductible.

Exceptions are for any perks that are money donations. Since you will not be receiving anything in exchange for your donation, these are tax-deductible.

story:
Now present in half of the lower 48 states, Fire ants are expected to adapt to nearly all regions of the US and have become a national biological threat.

These monsters prey on eggs, newborn birds, beneficial insects, even endangered native species.

In humans, the stings can cause severe allergic reactions highlighted by itching welts that last for days as the flesh around the bite decomposes.

Our Solution

FireAnt Technologies, INC. has developed a line of co2 powered pistols and rifles designed to fire a .75 caliber Chemball directly into the fire ant mounds. Destroying the fire ants in hours.








FAQ



How do I eliminate fire ants from my yard?


Join our Campaign!
Even if you don't want to buy a Xterminator, order some Chemballs and use a stick to press the ball into the fire ant mound.
Note: Be careful! This is not recommended and is extremely dangerous as the ants can attack you as you prepare to inject the ball. Just the vibration of you being near the nest can set the attack in motion!

Most people with more than a handful of mounds (five ant mounds per acre) will be satisfied with just chemballs. The Xterminator is desirable for larger properties, where greater control is required, or where more ants occur.
Especially the FAX-3 and FAX-4 with its range and rapid fire is ideal for reaching across fence lines, canals, along barns, all from the comfort of your vehicle or ATV.

Fire Ants are killing quail, deer, lizards, songbirds, horn toads, turtles; destroying our biodiversity.  Can't more be done?


That's the reason that Fire Ant Technologies, Inc. has developed and is now marketing its line of Xterminators to assist in the control of this alien species.
The more fun it is to terminate these creatures, the more control we gain.
Total control is not an easy, but if everyone will join the battle we can reclaim our parks, fields, forests, and neighborhoods.

Does FireAnt Technologies, INC. have additional control systems in review?

Yes. FireAnt Technologies has a research committee who closely relates with other research facilities across the globe to determine new and exciting means of eliminating and controlling alien species.
This includes a working relationship with universities, colleges, government agencies, and the private sector.
We are developing a remote field monitoring system through the use of drones, and sensors giving real time reporting to reduce damage from fire ants advancement
A ointment treatment for fire ant stings.

Is the product based on proven technologies?

Yes, the technologies utilized for the development, management and operations of the business are well proven, with a continual series of updates being incorporated into the systems as they occur.

story:
Award Winning Gadget Keeps Sports Enthusiasts Perfectly Hydrated

The world’s first electronic fuel gauge and app for hydration bladders -  monitor and maintain hydration levels on the move

Simply put, Hydrate Mate is a device which connects to your hydration bladder and monitors how much liquid you are drinking and how much you have left. 

It then sends that information to a specially developed smartphone app - and the app informs you how much liquid you have left in your hydration pack. It's just like viewing an electronic fuel gauge.

The app also keeps track and monitors the amount of liquid you are drinking.




Hydrate Mate: The Answer to an age old problem:


The question: How can I tell how much I have drunk from my hydration pack and how much I liquid I have left (without having to stop and take my pack off?)

The debate between which is better, "handhelds" or "hydration packs", has raged for centuries (according to our research it dates back to 23 AD with the works of the Roman philosopher Pliny the Elder...unless our Latin is not quite as strong as we like to think!)

It is widely agreed that hydration packs are far more comfortable and can hold more liquid more easily than bottles, but that they have one major draw back. You cannot tell how much liquid you are drinking, nor how much you have left.

This is a real problem for many reasons:

(a) There is the danger issue: If you are out in the middle of nowhere without easy access to more water - you need to be sure to drink enough to sustain you but not so much that you run out with miles still to go.

(b) There is the efficiency issue: If you are in a race and have a check point coming up soon, why carry loads of excess water when you can drink it and refill shortly?

(c) There is the maximising training and performance issue: If you know how much you are drinking from your pack, you can maximise both your training and your performance.

(d) There is the anxiety issue: the constant worry of whether you are drinking enough or too much, can you have more now or should you be conserving?

Hydrate Mate is the solution. 



Hydrate Mate: Features



Hydrate Mate: How Does It Work?

In a nutshell, with the help of Ricco Associates (a UK based engineering Company whose brainpower seems to know no limitation), we developed a sensor that measures the pressure in the hydration pack and from that reading calculates the amount of liquid left inside it.
We also added an internal accelerometer which measures the tilt  or angle of the bladder and therefore ensures the measurements provided are correct no matter how the bladder is positioned in the hydration pack.

Hydrate Mate: Block diagram of internal workings

Hydrate Mate: Very early days in the lab



Hydrate Mate: Communication Between Hydrate Mate & Smartphone

Communication between Hydrate Mate and Smartphone



What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to know there are others out there who think this is as good an idea as we do. 
  • We also need to raise a little more spondulicks, (ie cash) to get this into production and produce the first batch. 
  • So if you could just see fit to buy one (or two) products now (and then wait a few months to receive it), that is all we need. Your help here will really make a difference.
  • In return we'll give you a big discount on the retail price (huge, if you're quick) - and our exclusive free running buff.

Hydrate Mate: The Rewards

  • The first 100 people to buy a Hydrate Mate will receive a massive 50% off.       So £19.99 instead of £39.99 - plus 1 free Hydrate Mate running buff.

  • The next 250 people to buy a Hydrate Mate will receive 25% off. So that's £29.99 instead of £39.99 - plus 1 free Hydrate Mate running buff.

  • The next 500 people to buy a Hydrate Mate will receive 15% off. So that's £33.99 instead of £39.99 - plus 1 free Hydrate Mate running buff.



About Andrew Saville:

  • A keen Ultra Runner who loves the convenience of hydration packs  - but can't navigate for toffee - and became fed up with running out of water in the middle of nowhere!
  • For 23 years Andrew has run his own product design and development business that focusses primarily on producing products for the gift industry and exporting them worldwide. So when the idea for Hydrate Mate occurred to him (one lip-slathering, sunny, dehydrating day when once again he was totally lost, shocked and a little scared to find his hydration pack nearly empty all of a sudden) he was uniquely qualified to follow that dream (after a passing bedouin kindly refilled his hydration bladder and directed him to the nearest inhabitable Oasis (or Convenience Store as we call them in North London!) 


Risks & Challenges

We have had a lot of challenges on the road so far:

•  The greatest challenge was the technology. A proven method simply did not exist, so we had to create the technology. Our first few tries over several months failed spectacularly. But then we met Ricco Associates. With their help, a little over one year down the line, Hydrate Mate was finally born.

•  With the technology working and proven we then had to find a way to make Hydrate Mate compatible with all makes of hydration bladder. We have a very neat solution for that.

•  Having tested and proven the concept and made a working prototype, the main risk is now the timing. We hope to have the first production run finished by July 2016. There is however a slim risk that this will get pushed back a month or two. But we're confident our launch goal is totally realistic.


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that Hydrate Mate might not be for you. You might not be an outdoor type...we get that. Or you might just be skint... we get that too. 

Either way , if you could see fit to share our campaign with absolutely every single person you know on the planet (and some you don't) we'd very much appreciated it.


FAQ:

How does Hydrate Mate connect to my smartphone 

Hydrate Mate connects to your phone via Bluetooth

Will Hydrate Mate fit my hydration bladder?

Yes it will fit any hydration bladder. Depending on your bladder type you might or might not need to use an adaptor (which is included with Hydrate Mate as standard.)

Is the app free?

Yes the app is free 

Does the app work for Android and iPhone?

Yes the app will work for both Android and iPhone

Is the app ready for download now?

No the app is not ready for download yet, but it will be ready before the first Hydrate Mate is despatched.

It will be available from both Apple Store and Google Play

How long does the battery last?

The battery lasts 3,888 hours of continous use. When Hydrate Mate is not being used it goes into "hybernation mode" and does not use the battery

Can the battery be replaced?

No the battery cannot be replaced. 

But if you used Hydrate Mate for 12 hrs a week every single week, the battery would last you over 6 years.

How can I know when the battery will run out?

The battery life will be displayed through the App

Is there a warranty?

Yes one year

When will my Hydrate Mate ship?

We estimate it will ship in July 2016

Can you ship to different countries?

Yes we can ship worldwide


Thank you so much for helping fund our campaign... the only question remaining is...

How Will You Hydrate Mate?

A keen Ultra Runner who loves the convenience of hydration packs  - but can't navigate for toffee - and became fed up with running out of water in the middle of nowhere!
For 23 years Andrew has run his own product design and development business that focusses primarily on producing products for the gift industry and exporting them worldwide. So when the idea for Hydrate Mate occurred to him (one lip-slathering, sunny, dehydrating day when once again he was totally lost, shocked and a little scared to find his hydration pack nearly empty all of a sudden) he was uniquely qualified to follow that dream (after a passing bedouin kindly refilled his hydration bladder and directed him to the nearest inhabitable Oasis (or Convenience Store as we call them in North London!) 




    Risks & Challenges  
We have had a lot of challenges on the road so far:
•  The greatest challenge was the technology. A proven method simply did not exist, so we had to create the technology. Our first few tries over several months failed spectacularly. But then we met Ricco Associates. With their help, a little over one year down the line, Hydrate Mate was finally born.
•  With the technology working and proven we then had to find a way to make Hydrate Mate compatible with all makes of hydration bladder. We have a very neat solution for that.
•  Having tested and proven the concept and made a working prototype, the main risk is now the timing. We hope to have the first production run finished by July 2016. There is however a slim risk that this will get pushed back a month or two. But we're confident our launch goal is totally realistic.   
Other Ways You Can Help We understand that Hydrate Mate might not be for you. You might not be an outdoor type...we get that. Or you might just be skint... we get that too. 
Either way , if you could see fit to share our campaign with absolutely every single person you know on the planet (and some you don't) we'd very much appreciated it.


FAQ:

How does Hydrate Mate connect to my smartphone 


Hydrate Mate connects to your phone via Bluetooth
Will Hydrate Mate fit my hydration bladder?
Yes it will fit any hydration bladder. Depending on your bladder type you might or might not need to use an adaptor (which is included with Hydrate Mate as standard.)
Is the app free?
Yes the app is free 
Does the app work for Android and iPhone?
Yes the app will work for both Android and iPhone
Is the app ready for download now?
No the app is not ready for download yet, but it will be ready before the first Hydrate Mate is despatched.
It will be available from both Apple Store and Google Play
How long does the battery last?
The battery lasts 3,888 hours of continous use. When Hydrate Mate is not being used it goes into "hybernation mode" and does not use the battery
Can the battery be replaced?
No the battery cannot be replaced. 
But if you used Hydrate Mate for 12 hrs a week every single week, the battery would last you over 6 years.
How can I know when the battery will run out?
The battery life will be displayed through the App
Is there a warranty?
Yes one year
When will my Hydrate Mate ship?
We estimate it will ship in July 2016
Can you ship to different countries?
Yes we can ship worldwide



Thank you so much for helping fund our campaign... the only question remaining is...
How Will You Hydrate Mate?

story:
Bright Future for Mental Health

We are a humanitarian non profit organization, established by a group of passionate people who care about Psychosocial empowerment.
We have worked with over 16,000  Syrian refugees and low-income locals in Jordan over the past 3 years, providing much-needed free-of-charge counseling and psychosocial resources for refugees from the war-torn country.
Due to funding instability in the region, we face a grave challenge: to continue providing longitudinal services for our 4000 active clients in the face of sudden loss of previously-committed funding.
Any help that is provided to our campaign will help us avoid removing psychosocial services from vulnerable children and women, victims of war and patients suffering from mental illnesses.

Services provided

Details of Bright Future services:

  • The Fund will be utilized in Bright Future Psychosocial Projects.
  • Two clinics offer Psychiatric consultation and medications free of charge to 300 clients a month.
  • Assessment and Psychotherapy provided also free of charge to 200 clients.
  • Psychosocial activities in Za'atri camp, Amman, and Irbid targeting children, Adolescents, and Adults, serving 2500 clients.
  • Mobile Team that works in Amman providing medical and psychological services to people who are unable to reach our clinic, serving 70 clients a month.
  • Training in clinical Psychology and Psychiatry for BSc and MA students from Universities in Jordan, training 100 mental health professionals. 

The Impact

  • The Project was Founded three years ago and served many beneficiaries but our funding ended abruptly and without warning.
  • The work of Bright Future is ongoing, and providing continuity of services for clients is essential.
  • Many clients are still under therapy, including psychotherapy and medications.
  • Financial barriers prevent our clients from accessing Mental Health services, while our organization provides them for free.
  • We use a multidisciplinary approach to psychosocial wellbeing, and all the programs provided support the holistic well-being for the beneficiaries.
  • For more information about our activities you are welcome to visit our facebook page https://www.facebook.com/bf.for.mh/?fref=ts&ref=br_tf
Current Challenge

The main challenge we face in our  work is provisional funding while we solidify permanent funding sources.

  • In the past two years Bright Future team worked under tremendous pressure from lack or delay of funding. Despite the harsh conditions and lack of resources we continued to work voluntarily driven by our profound belief in our cause of helping the vulnerable and less fortunate.
  • We will work with minimal capacity to avoid abandoning our clients, and are open to opportunities for voluntary working and personal funding.

Ways You Can Help

Every financial contribution makes a significant difference for helping to keep providing services for clients.

You can also help us by spreading the news about our campaign. Sharing this page on social media will help us gain exposure.

If you know anyone that is interested and willing to help, we would appreciate you're efforts of spreading the word to them.

Please feel free to contact us with any questions.

story:
Short Summary

As passionate rope jumpers ourselves, we've found that rope bags have generally been an afterthought. So, we decided to do something about it and have created a bag specifically designed for jump ropes. We wanted it to hold all our ropes, plus the other items we use (gloves etc.), and we wanted to be able to use it for all ropes, regardless of whether they have detachable handles or not.

This campaign will help get our first production run completed, and enable us to provide more colours (if you'd like them), and also expand our range of Go Gear and Go Jump products. We're starting with a 2-Rope bag and a 4-Rope bag, both in grey or yellow.

We genuinely believe that jump rope is the best all-round exercise that you can do. We hope that by making it easier for you to keep your ropes organised, take them with you, and keep them protected, more people will take up this awesome activity, and get more out of life -- as it has done for us.

What We Need & What You Get

We have selected a small manufacturer in Thailand who is able to produce a great product, and treats their employees well. This makes production cost slightly higher than other manufacturing countries, but we'd much rather have a great product and make sure our supply chain is fair, than get the cheapest product possible. We have travelled to Thailand (and will continue to do so on a regular basis) to meet our supply chain team and make sure that we can produce a top quality product, that treats all members fairly (including you, the customer!)

We need more than $5,000 USD to get us started and get the economies of scale for us to produce high quality bags at fair prices. That's why we have offered a huge number of discounted perks to get as many bags into the jump rope community as possible. Over 200 bags are being heavily discounted, so get in quickly before the best deals are gone. Please be aware that there will be $10 USD added to your perk for shipping from Thailand, unless you've managed to get in early and chosen the free shipping perk of your choice. Also, please be aware that ropes are not included.

While we are extremely confident that we'll reach our target, if we don't, we'll still produce the bags that have been ordered through this campaign, but we won't produce more than those orders. That means that you can have confidence that you will receive your Go Jump Rope Bag, even if we don't meet our target. Unfortunately, it will also mean that only those who have ordered will get the opportunity to use this amazing bag.

The Impact

As fellow rope jumpers, we know how much of a positive impact jumping rope can have on your health and well-being. We want to make it easy for you to store your ropes in an organised way, make them easy to travel around with, and keep them protected.

If we can help people like you to better manage your ropes, we're sure we can get more people jumping and grow this amazing, supportive community.

We can't wait to show you our new Go Jump Rope Bag and we think you'll be just as happy as we are with them.

Risks & Challenges

As with all new projects, there are some risks that we need to be aware of, and we've put measures in place to reduce these risks.

  1. Product Delays - As we are using a small manufacturer (to ensure fairness and quality), there is a risk that the shipping date may change. We'll be keeping you informed about the progress of the manufacturing and expected shipping dates as we proceed. Our manufacturer has given us a provisional completion time of 2 months from placement of order, so with our 1 month campaign and 2 month manufacturing time, we expect that you'll have your bag in about 3 months. If we get to our target earlier than expected, we'll place the order earlier, and let you know when that happens.
  2. Product Quality (pre-delivery) - We have had multiple companies produce samples for us, and we have selected a manufacturer that understands what we need in our products. We have a very good relationship with our manufacturer and have been working closely to ensure that the bags are produced to a very high quality standard. We will also be travelling to Thailand to inspect and make sure that the products meet this high standard. As well as our own inspection, we have engaged a third party to inspect every bag before it is shipped, as the third and final quality check, before you open your package at home. 
  3. Product Quality (post-delivery) - While we have established a rigorous quality control process above, we understand that at some point, a defective item might slip through. That's why we offer a 12 month warranty on all materials and manufacturing, so you can feel confident that our products will go the distance. If your bag is defective, we'll fix it or replace it at no charge to you. We also offer a 12-month satisfaction guarantee, so if you're not happy with your Go Jump Rope Bag, return it to us, and we'll refund you the purchase price of the bag.
  4. Shipping - Because our bags are produced in Thailand, we'll be shipping them from there too. This way, we can keep costs down by avoiding import duties and taxes in most countries. This does mean however, that shipping could take from 7-10 days from order. You will receive a tracking number for your order, so that you can keep up-to-date on your package's location, but we won't be able to offer 2-day shipping. We'll also be keeping a close eye on shipping times and will change the shipping company if it is not up to standard. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Do you know a rope jumper who might be interested in our bag? Make sure to share this campaign with them so they can enjoy the benefits of our tailor-made jump rope bag. Just use the share tools above to share the jump rope love!

story:
Karina Pelaez is a devoted business woman who worked as an interior designer and in the automated coffee industry for more than 10 years. After noticing that teeth were indeed getting darker after exposure to coffee and wine, she became interested in finding a solution to remediate to this nuisance. Her strong interest and belief in natural, organic and vegan lifestyle lead her to research and develop her own peroxide-free teeth whitening product with the help of renowned cosmetic dental professionals. Her design acumen was essential to the creation of our logo and branding.

NiuSmile Teeth Whitening Kit is a professional teeth whitening system for home use that recently came to life in April 2018. The whitening kit contains a new and advanced peroxide-free gel formula that ensures safe,  effective and fast whitening in just 10 minutes.

Our Professional Home Teeth Whitening and Oral Care Products are 100% peroxide-free and made only with Natural and Organic ingredients for a safe and effective method to achieve a whiter, brighter smile  with  no pain and no sensitivity! We can proudly say that NiuSmile is the most advanced peroxide-free teeth whitening kits on the market.

NiuSmile is a safe, fast and effective method to achieve a whiter, brighter smile and Our products are also Animal Cruelty-Free (PETA approved) and Vegan. 

Our products already generated a lot of buzz through social media as we already attracted more than  6000 followers on instagram (@niusmilewhitening) and more than 1000 followers on Facebook  in a relatively short amount of time. 

So far, our customers absolutely love our product.

We are raising funds through Indiegogo to mostly help us with manufacturing and  distribution as we need to greatly increase production because of increasing demand. We also are presently only shipping in North America  and are starting to get demand from different other countries (especially Australia, Great Britain, Spain and Italy). Therefore, we are trying to find budget to expand worldwide while the demand keeps growing. We would definitely need funds acquired through this campaign to be able to answer to that sharp increase of demand. We would also use these funds to expand our line of natural and organic teeth whitening products through Research and Development (ex: mouthwash, toothpaste). 

Our risks and challenges are mostly the fact that there are many teeth whitening products on the market which make the field really competitive but NiuSmile can overcome them through its solid branding and unique formula which contain the most effective, popular and widely used natural whitening ingredients in Activated charcoal, Coconut oil and sodium bicarbonate in the same gel formula. We have the potential to not only reach regular teeth whitening customers but also vegan, organic, natural ingredients and lifestyle oriented customers. 

Teeth Whitening is a really popular procedure worldwide. The value of the global tooth whitening market actually amounted to about 3.15 billion U.S. dollars in 2016, and is forecasted to grow to 3.78 billion U.S. dollars by 2021 which definitely shows the worldwide and global interest in this market. With our unique product, we have the potential to not only reach  regular teeth whitening customers but also the vegan, organic, natural ingredients oriented customers. Our strong branding gives us also the possibility to attract lifestyle oriented customers. 

We absolutely intend to be a strong player in the industry.

Our goal is to reach the 20 000$ mark for us to grow our brand effectively in a timely manner. If we tend to  reach a higher amount, efforts will be made to market our brand through aggressive web and social media marketing and ,therefore , greatly accelerate our growth

We would greatly appreciate that you could help us get to the next level ;)

story:
PERK: Customise the colour of the detachable pocket belt straps that combine to form a bumbag

The first 200 supporters will have the option to choose the colour fabric for their bumbag (belt pocket straps) from a selection of four swatches (cargo, navy, burgundy and black). The bumbag is part of the Dual backpack, included in the price and and will be shipped at the same time.


Technical Specification 

Note on product features:
We’re all conscious about our responsibility to and for the environment, so as we move out of prototype phase some of the material specs may be altered slightly in our quest to be more sustainable. We guarantee that the performance of Dual will not be altered or any of its stylish features.

Size: 28cm width x 39cm height

DURABLE | COMFORTABLE | SUPPORTIVE 
A combination of 100% nylon twill technical body with 100% polyester lining and water repellent polyurethane YKK AquaGuard(R) laminated zippers, the Dual backpack is waterproof and fit for the toughest urban weather conditions. Form fitting padded and reinforced back and adjustable straps work with the body to provide comfort and distribute weight whilst looking good. Reflective elements on the logos, straps and behind the belt pocket straps provide visibility in low light conditions.

CUSTOMISABLE | LIGHTWEIGHT | STABLE
The Dual backpack has detachable and adjustable sternum strap and detachable belt pocket straps for when you need them. The detached belt pocket straps also combine to form a bumbag for wearing on its own, storing and carrying items (even the detached sternum strap). The combination of wider sternum and belt pocket straps provide extra stability. Dual was designed to be lightweight and it's materials have been selected to achieve that. For further stability, the form fitting back sits close to the body to hold up to a 10L load including a 13.3 inch laptop in it's padded compartment.

Dual is designed for run commuting

Holizm

Holizm is a brand built around balanced combinations that bring purposeful innovations to enrich lives. Through this we believe we can inspire people to do more for themselves, others and the environment by feeling empowered and embracing the many opportunities life presents.

At Holizm we know there is an opportunity for run commuters to get more out of a backpack, which is why we designed Dual for runners looking to integrate fitness into their lives seamlessly.

Our form fitting Dual backpack enables items to be carried to and from work comfortably whilst run commuters run, but equally, one that can be used during meetings or after-work social occasions. 

At Holizm we believe in living a balanced lifestyle, one that integrates fitness, work and play. With Dual we created that balance and believe it can help others to achieve it in their lives. As a brand with balance at its heart, 10% of net profits from each Dual backpack will be donated to Mind which will help fund vital work for people dealing with anxiety, stress and depression.
 
We also believe in a direct to consumer model and are raising money to help move us from prototype to commercialisation. We know there is a consumer need and a lack of innovation targeting the run commuting community and believe we can bring balance to this equation for the benefit of the urban run commuter, other people and the environment. 

The Dual backpack design is registered.

The time is right to embrace the many opportunities life presents and do more for ourselves, others and the environment.

Thank you for your interest, we'd love you to get involved and join our movement.
Buy a Dual backpack now (!), choose your perk and we'll keep in touch.

Contact us:

holizm.com

@holizm_

Email: info@holizm.com

We know there is a consumer need and a lack of innovation targeting the run commuting community and believe we can bring balance to this equation for the benefit of the urban run commuter, other people and the environment. The Dual backpack design is registered.The time is right to embrace the many opportunities life presents and do more for ourselves, others and the environment. Thank you for your interest, we'd love you to get involved and join our movement.Buy a Dual backpack now (!), choose your perk and we'll keep in touch.Contact us:holizm.com@holizm_Email: info@holizm.com

story:
Steady Shot™

Steady Shot is a patented insulin injection aid that makes injecting insulin, rotating injection sites, and injecting while traveling easy and comfortable. Steady Shot was designed to improve the lives of diabetics by making day-to-day life easier and reducing the risk of lipohypertrophy, a condition that can occur when patients inject in the same area for an extended period of time. 

Steady Shot makes rotating injection sites easy by stabilizing the needle, allowing for one-handed injections, and control of the injection depth. You simply attach Steady Shot to your insulin pen and perform an injection like normal, but with the added stability and depth control of Steady Shot. Steady Shot attaches to all major insulin pen needles.

 

Our Story

My name is Shawn and I am Type I diabetic.

Whenever I eat carbs or my blood sugars are high, I need to inject insulin. Many days I feel like I am eating constantly, which means injecting insulin constantly as well. For 3 years it wasn’t a problem. But when I started to notice pain and bruising in my abdomen and thighs from not rotating injection sites, a condition called lipohypertrophy, I knew something needed to change.

My doctor always told me to rotate injection sites to avoid these problems, but being my stubborn self I didn’t because my arms, back, and butt were much more difficult to reach than my abdomen and thighs. Realizing this pain and bruising was now part of my new reality, I wanted to do something about it. I wasn’t willing to accept lipohypertrophy, so I built a simple guide with a recessed needle that would stabilize the insulin pen for easy one-handed use. Steady Shot was born. After 3D printing a few prototypes for use with my insulin pen, I was finally able to rotate to sites which I previously couldn’t reach and provide relief to my over injected areas. For the first time, I could use my left hand to inject and reach the far left side of my body. I could comfortably inject in my arms, lower back, and butt. After rotating for some time, my bruising started to fade and injections in my abdomen slowly got less painful. Now, I don’t have bruising or pain at all.​

I’ve been using different versions of Steady Shot for over 3 years. My own experience, paired with the feedback of others, has helped me improve the design. Injectors have found Steady Shot easier than traditional injections, felt less pain when injecting, improved dexterity for elderly injectors, have found rotating injection sites easier, and have found injections easier when pregnant or traveling. Untrained caregivers can properly insert the needle at 90 degrees safely into the subcutaneous tissue every time.​

Such a simple little device has drastically changed my life so I created this company to get Steady Shot in the hands of other injectors. 7.3 million Americans inject insulin and 38% have lipohypertrophy. With Steady Shot, it doesn’t have to be this way for the 2.8 million people suffering. While in college, I worked hard with a startup generator at UW-Madison, called Discovery to Product, whom helped fund the commercialization of Steady Shot and provide mentorship. After a long journey, Steady Shot is now available. I’m excited to hear injectors feedback after giving Steady Shot a try. I know Steady Shot will improve others' lives just like it has mine!

 

The Problem: Lipohypertrophy

30 million people in the United States have diabetes. 7.3 million inject insulin. 2.8 million of these people have lipohypertrophy. Lipohypertrophy occurs when fatty lumps appear on the surface of the skin in patients who routinely perform insulin injections. 

For diabetic patients, lipohypertrophy may be aesthetically displeasing, but it can also affect the rate at which insulin is absorbed and can lead to inconsistent blood glucose results. Blood sugars that are out of a healthy range can cause retinopathy, neuropathy, cardiovascular disease, and chronic kidney disease. 

It takes lipohypertrophy 2-3 months to heal. One Steady Shot lasts for 6+ months.

 

Late Stages of Lipohypertrophy:

 

     

    The Impact Steady Shot Will Have

    Steady Shot has the potential to help millions of injectors reduce their risk of developing lipohypertrophy and lessen their risk of further health complications developing. 

     

    With Steady Shot Injectors Can Now:

    • Inject with their non-dominant hand
    • Easily rotate injection sites and rest their over used injection sites
    • Inject at the proper depth and angle
    • Be less likely to bend or break a needle
    • Learn injections with less fear
    • Inject easeir with arthritis and dexterity issues

     

     

    How Steady Shot Works

             

                 

     

    1) Attach Steady Shot to your needle and press Steady Shot into your fat:

    2) Administer your dose 

     

    Why Injectors Love Steady Shot

    • There are no products on the market that help diabetics reach new injection sites
    • 2.8 million people have lipohypertrophy and need help rotating injection sites
    • Easier for newly diagnosed, elderly and caregivers.
    • Easier for caregivers, school nurses and nurses in training. 
    • More stability and less pain

     

     

    Kaylee

     

    Thank you! I tried my arm by myself for the FIRST time. Incredible. 10/10 LOVE

    I was diagnosed with diabetes a little over a year ago, and haven’t started pumping yet. With this I take a long acting insulin and fast acting insulin before meals. I haven’t been too adventurous when it comes to injection sites. Just my stomach, and I’ve tried my thigh a couple times. If I’m doing any other site, someone else does it for me because I HATE doing injections one handed. My first time trying the steady shot, I did my first EVER shot in my arm by myself, and it was SO easy. I love this product so much already and it really helps promote site rotation for people like me that are stubborn switching from their favorite spot. My tummy can finally have a break!!

     

    Issac

    "That was really good!! No tears, minimum resistance. All around happy with how the injection went. :) One happy mumma and baby bear!! Before when I went to use this type of needle I had to pin Issac (who was 3 at the time) down, literally lock him with my legs and use one arm to hold him down and inject. This was horrible for both me and Issac. I’m very relieved that @mysteadyshot has helped!! Yes he was a bit unsure but he still let me and this is an amazing gold star for us today!! Thank you Steady Shot"

     

    Steady Shot lets you use the "under the arm" technique

     

    Over the Arm

    • Harder to reach the recommended back of the arm
    • More likely to inject insulin in muscle tissue, which is not recommended
    • Difficult to inject at a 90 degree angle

     

    Under the Arm

    • Easy to reach the recommended back of the arm
    • More likely to inject insulin in subcutaneous tissue, which is recommended by healthcare professionals. 
    • Easy to inject at a recommended 90 degree angle

     

    Why inject in the back of the arm?

    Insulin should be injected in fatty tissue. There is much more fatty tissue in the back of the arm compared to side of the arm. If Steady Shot is injected in the muscle tissue, insulin can absorb too quickly and lead to health complications. 

     

    Lily

    "My @mysteadyshot came in the mail two days ago I have been loving it!! It makes shots in public and in the car so much easier and no more asking Matt or my parents to reach sites for me :)."

      

     

    Kristen

    I really like the steady shot, it is so simple and easy to use! I’m going to bring it to show my diabetes educators next time I go in! It has allowed me to use different sites I didn’t feel comfortable using before! I can now use arms on my own without asking others for help! I would absolutely recommend it to a friend. I have gained a lot more useable sites with the steady shot! It’s such a great device that is simple to use! I’ve always liked to pinch my sites and using arms alone not being able to pinch them terrified me! I can now do it on my own with ease!

     

    Spread the Word!

    If there is a friend or loved one who could benefit from Steady Shot, please share this campaign with them! Join us in assisting others to a happier life on our mission to bring easy, safe, and simple injections to everyone. Use the links at the top of the page (by the video) or simply copy/paste the URL above and share it any way you’d like :)

     

    The Perks: Delivering June 2020

    1 Steady Shot | Launch Special

    Experience easy injections with one, reusable Steady Shot to help inject insulin, rotate injection sites, reduce needle fear, and inject while traveling. Save $10! 

    2 Steady Shots | Buddy Pack

    Experience easy injections with two reusable Steady Shots to help inject insulin, rotate injection sites, reduce needle fear, and inject while traveling. Save $20! 

    Steady Shot Supporter Pack

    For those who support our mission. Receive Steady Shot merchandise only available on Indiegogo! You will receive one Steady Shot ink pen, one Steady Shot t-shirt, and one Steady Shot coffee mug. 

     

    Steady Shot Advocate Pack 

    For injectors who love our mission. Receive one Steady Shot and merchandise only available on Indiegogo! You will get one Steady Shot, one Steady Shot ink pen, one Steady Shot t-shirt, and one Steady Shot coffee mug. 

    Donate 5 Steady Shots

    Donate 5 Steady Shots to your favorite organization to help 5 injectors administer insulin, rotate injection sites, reduce needle fear, and inject while traveling.

    Donate 10 Steady Shots

    Donate 10 Steady Shots to your favorite organization to help 10 injectors administer insulin, rotate injection sites, reduce needle fear, and inject while traveling.

    Donate 25 Steady Shots

    Donate 25 Steady Shots to your favorite organization to help 25 injectors administer insulin, rotate injection sites, reduce needle fear, and inject while traveling.

    Clinic | Order 100

    Order 100 packaged Steady Shots to use at your clinic. This is a 20% discount from our typical wholesale pricing. 

    Retailer | Order 250

    Order 250 packaged Steady Shots to stock at your retail facility. This is a 20% discount from our typical wholesale pricing. 

    Distributor | Order 500

    Order 500 Steady Shots to distribute. This is a 20% discount from our typical wholesale pricing. 

    Investor

    Receive 1% equity in Steady Shot LLC.  Email shawn@mysteadyshot.com for more details about this perk. 

     

    How will the funds be spent

    • Design and manufacture a smaller size Steady Shot
    • Pay FDA Registration Fee and shipping validation
    • Influencer promotion

     

    How will extra funds be spent?

    • FDA 510(k) submission and clinical studies
    • Manufacturing different Steady Shot sizes and colors
    • Steady Shot for syringe
    • Marketing to raise awareness of the need to rotate injection sites

     

    How can you donate Steady Shots?

    1. Select a perk that donates an amount of Steady Shots. (consult your tax preparer regarding tax deductibility).
    2. Message us or leave a comment below with the name and address of the group you would like to donate to. 
    3. Get a picture of your group with your donated Steady Shots
    4. Get listed as a donor on our website.

     

    Where can you donate Steady Shots?

    • To your chosen hospital, nursing facility, school pharmacy, or patient advocacy group. 
    • If you have another location you would like to donate to, please message us or comment below.

     

      What are advocacy groups?

      Patient advocacy groups educate, advocate for, and provide support services to patients and their caregivers. Their primary mission is to improve the life of patients and their caregivers. Examples are the Veterans Association, Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation and the American Diabetes Association. 

      • https://www.va.gov/
      • https://www2.jdrf.org/
      • https://www.diabetes.org/

       

      Steady Shot in the press

       

      Diabetics invention is a injection innovation: https://news.wisc.edu/diabetics-invention-is-an...

      Student develops device to help with giving one-handed injections in awkward areas: https://www.diabetes.co.uk/news/2016/nov/studen...

      Invention could help diabetics with safer, surer insulin injections: https://news.wisc.edu/invention-could-help-diab...

      D2P project becomes career for graduating UW–Madison undergraduate: https://news.wisc.edu/d2p-project-becomes-caree...

      UW student’s invention makes insulin injections more efficient and safe: https://badgerherald.com/news/2016/11/15/uw-stu...

       

        Pictures

        Studies

        • Prevalence of Lipohypertrophy: A total of 26 studies with a total of 12,493 participants showed that the pooled prevalence of lipohypertrophy was 38%. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC59...
        • It take lipohypertrophy 2-3 months to heal: https://www.diabetes.co.uk/conditions/lipohyper...
        • Lipohypertrophy most commonly found in the abdomen: The abdomen is the easiest to reach injection site and is preferred by the majority of injectors. https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fe...
        • Glycemic control worsens with insulin-induced lipohypertrophy: Patients with insulin-induced lipohypertrophy are three times more likely to have nonoptimal glycemic control https://www.hindawi.com/journals/jdr/2018/4910962/
        • Spain spends 122 million Euros a year on excess insulin due to lipohypertorphy: https://www.fit4diabetes.com/files/5014/0724/78...
        • Spain number of diabetics: https://idf.org/our-network/regions-members/eur...
        • Lipohypertrophy may increase the total daily insulin dose and increase associated costs: https://www.valueinhealthjournal.com/article/S1...
        • 25% of diabetics take insulin: https://care.diabetesjournals.org/content/33/2/240

        Disclaimer

        Steady Shot LLC offers low risk, 510(k) exempt products that stabilizes the injection site. Steady Shot LLC is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or medical condition.  Steady Shot LLC is not a licensed medical or health-care provider and has no expertise in diagnosing, examining, or treating medical conditions of any kind.

story:
The Project

Creating an end to end online platform for you to: 

1) search and book the best health, wellness, & adventure retreats worldwide, and

2) continue your wellness journey through virtual retreats from the comfort of your home.

Phase 1: Launch MyTripWell.com, our wellness travel platform.

MyTripWell.com was launched in Feb of 2020 and is currently in the “prototype” phase. We’ve begun to help people kickstart their wellness journey by providing an easy way to search, compare, and book wellness vacations. You can check out the platform at https://www.mytripwell.com/

Phase 2: Build a secondary platform for wellness products and virtual retreats.  

In phase 2, we will launch a secondary platform focused on meeting you in your home. This will allow you to easily access virtual retreats and shop from our online wellness store to help continue your healthy lifestyle, even when traveling is not an option. These virtual retreats will be designed by highly certified wellness professionals, covering topics like stress and relationship management, personal fitness, and many other facets of health and wellness. The purpose of this platform is for you to experience the same benefits of an in-person wellness retreat at a fraction of the cost and from the convenience of your home.

Mission

We have a simple mission: to spread happiness, one trip at a time.

The Product

Our uniquely designed product provides for multiple search options to cater to every customer's needs. Whether you are looking to relax on a spa retreat, explore the Himalayas on a backpacking tour, or bring the whole family along to a wellness resort, we have the packages and the search engine to find your ideal getaway with just a few clicks.

 

Why MyTripWell.com Matters​   

Have you ever gotten home from a vacation and thought to yourself,

     “I need a vacation from my vacation?”

We get it, but it doesn’t have to be that way. In today’s world it is easy to get caught up in the daily grind of life. Here are some alarming stats:

  • 1/3rd of the population in the U.S is considered obese
  • A recent Gallup survey shows that 1/3rd of the employees feel burnt out 
  • Unhealthy diet contributes to approximately 678,000 deaths each year in the U.S
  • The probability of a marriage ending in divorce is almost 50% due to personal and professional stress

 

It's not news that we live in an unwell world. We know that life can be overwhelming; from family, to work, to the daily grind, it seems as though something is always calling for our attention and leaving us depleted at the end of the day. However, we believe that taking time to get unplugged from the busyness of life is key to maintaining inner peace and balance, no matter what life throws at you.

Unfortunately, we understand that finding your dream wellness trip can be a challenge. Based on our research, customers constantly face the following obstacles.

  Convoluted results: No easy way to find and book the right wellness package without spending hours on research.

   Lack of trust: Lack of standardization around what qualifies as a wellness resort/hotel in the industry leads to lack of trust in the market space and dissatisfied customers.

   Limited ability: Both customers and travel agents have limited ability to find the optimal wellness package out of the thousands of options available all across the globe.

 

With MyTripWell.com, you will be able to find your dream health and wellness retreat within minutes as well as continue your wellness journey through virtual retreats from the comfort of your home.  

                                                   

Mytripwell is the only platform to consolidate all wellness providers across hotels, resorts, tours and retreats onto one platform across all wellness categories. Additionally, 99% of our in-person trips are all inclusive with food, accommodation, and wellness activities included, thereby taking out the stress of vacation planning to ensure a great experience. 
 

 

Partnerships

We have partnered with some of the best wellness brands to provide you the best experience:

 

Where your money goes

 The funds will be used to...

 

About The Founder

 

 

A special mention: Covid-19

We know that the world is in a surreal place right now. Small businesses, retail and food workers, and so many others are feeling the impact of a stunned economy- and we are no exception. Now more than ever, we believe in the power of wellness, in finding an opportunity for growth during difficulty, and in refusing to give up on our vision- which is why we need you, especially right now. Your support of small startups like us is key to our survival in the world today. No gift is too big or too small- and as a thank you for your generosity, we’re offering you some pretty cool perks: from a T-shirt to a free 5-Day Stay in Hawaii and 10% off any wellness trip you book with us for the next two years, our team has pulled together to make sure you understand how much your support means to us at the moment. 

When you donate to this campaign, you're helping people avoid burnout, you're funding small retreat providers who have dedicated their lives to the wellness of others, and you're making a "well world" possible.

 

Perks

To thank you, here's what we'll give you.

*Please note that the travel gift certificates are valid for 24 months until June 2022. All the hotels have at least 4 star rating on trip advisor and include brands like Hilton, Hyatt, Marriott and others. You won't find a better deal than this!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not able to contribute but would still like to support us, here's how you can do that:

  • Share this campaign!
  • Follow us on social media, @mytripwell for inspiration, education, and updates.

Facebook | Instagram | Twitter | Pinterest
story_txt:
The Project
Creating an end to end online platform for you to: 
1) search and book the best health, wellness, & adventure retreats worldwide, and
2) continue your wellness journey through virtual retreats from the comfort of your home.
Phase 1: Launch MyTripWell.com, our wellness travel platform.
MyTripWell.com was launched in Feb of 2020 and is currently in the “prototype” phase. We’ve begun to help people kickstart their wellness journey by providing an easy way to search, compare, and book wellness vacations. You can check out the platform at https://www.mytripwell.com/
Phase 2: Build a secondary platform for wellness products and virtual retreats.  
In phase 2, we will launch a secondary platform focused on meeting you in your home. This will allow you to easily access virtual retreats and shop from our online wellness store to help continue your healthy lifestyle, even when traveling is not an option. These virtual retreats will be designed by highly certified wellness professionals, covering topics like stress and relationship management, personal fitness, and many other facets of health and wellness. The purpose of this platform is for you to experience the same benefits of an in-person wellness retreat at a fraction of the cost and from the convenience of your home.

Mission
We have a simple mission: to spread happiness, one trip at a time.
The Product
Our uniquely designed product provides for multiple search options to cater to every customer's needs. Whether you are looking to relax on a spa retreat, explore the Himalayas on a backpacking tour, or bring the whole family along to a wellness resort, we have the packages and the search engine to find your ideal getaway with just a few clicks.
