August 2015—Extensive user testing completed
December 2015— publication of our 204 page patent application
January 2016—Launch of Indiegogo Campaign
June 2016—Target delivery date of Prana to our Indiegogo backers

Who we are:
Based in San Francisco, we bring together a multidisciplinary team, spanning medical science, software/hardware engineering, game design, and app development experience. We were drawn together to build Prana out of our shared passion for health, meditation, and Yoga, with decades of practice dedicated to these areas between our founding team. Our founders:


Andre Persidsky: CEO, Co-Founder
Andre is an engineer, patented inventor, computer book author, and entrepreneur, with dozens of inventions from consumer electronics to medical devices.



Alex Ahlund: VP Interactive & Design, Co-Founder
Alex is a video game industry vet who has worn virtually every hat in the business, from game designer to executive producer, with extensive experience building engaging mobile apps.

Thank you for your support!
Please follow us on our Website, Twitter, or Facebook pages.







FAQ
Why does it matter how we breathe?
Beyond keeping us alive, how we breathe affects many aspects of our health. In particular, proper breathing is a gateway for rapidly triggering the relaxation response (parasympathetic response) which helps to put the body and mind into a deeply calmed state. Many of us are spending far too much time with our sympathetic nervous systems cranked up (fight or flight mode), which can worsen many serious health conditions.

Aren't respiration rate trackers already available?
Very few in the broader wearables space, and Prana goes much deeper than simply providing a respiration rate. It uniquely integrates three critical measures for assessing the true quality of our breathing: diaphragmatic breathing, posture, and breath patterns. By providing this complete picture of breathing, along with a gamified app training program, we believe we are offering something truly new and needed in the wearables space today.

Can't I just do breathing exercises?
Sure, but most people find it quite difficult and boring to commit to doing so for any extended period of time. Prana offers an engaging new way to learn healthy breathing habits while charting your progress over time. Prana also functions as a coach, giving you immediate visual feedback so that you know you are breathing in a proper way, along with maintaining good posture.


Does Prana track breathing and posture while walking?

When you sit, Prana tracks breathing and posture. And when you stand and walk around, it switches to activity/step tracking. The reason and strategy behind this is that the quality of our breathing/posture are much more susceptible to being compromised when we sit for prolonged periods of time compared to standing, and this is the main problem that Prana is striving to address (average office worker sits nearly 6 hours a day). When we are active and walking, we are already doing something good for our health, so we felt this was not the optimum time to be alerting the user. Additionally, when active, respiration rate naturally increases, so using that as one of the indicators of stress is not as valid as when sitting.



How can Prana measure posture from the waistband near the belly?
Prana started off as a belt, monitoring the posture component with a separate sensor positioned near the lower back. But turns out you can also measure posture from the belly and lower abdominal area. You can try it for yourself. Slouch and then sit upright and notice how the angles in that area change significantly. The challenge is that this signal is confounded with diaphragmatic breathing signals, and that's a big part of what we've been working on to disentagle.
How is Prana's battery charged?

Prana uses a lithium ion rechargeable battery, requiring charging about every 7 days. We started with a wired charging station, but eventually found an effective design for integrating a QI wireless charging system, so our wearable is completely wireless for maximum convenience.

story:
Campaign Overview

Cold Sores have finally met their match!  Meet, Garr – The Cold Sore Warrior(TM), a radically new supplement product with a formula and method of use from Root, LLC (Root) that will disrupt the over the counter (OTC) cold sore product market.  This is a private formula, privately used for twenty-two years, now available to the public for the first time.  The product has been in development for four years.  Thus far, all financing has been out of pocket.  The formula is comprised of all natural ingredients, the method of use is patent-pending, key branding elements are trademarked, and manufacturers under NDA are ready to produce.

In the segments to follow, I will speak both directly and on behalf of Root as a company, when appropriate.

Short Summary

I am Melissa Pagen, and I am Founder/Managing Member of Root, LLC, home of Garr, The Cold Sore Warrior(TM).   I have more than ten years of business development, marketing, and investor relations experience in both the public and private sectors.  For the past five years, I’ve held executive positions in small cap public companies.  I have also assisted with several small start-up companies on a freelance basis. I have developed, honed, and applied my skill sets in the industries of energy, water treatment technology, and film.

My work ethic and dedication is such that I have relocated for business to North Dakota, Ohio, Pennsylvania, and Texas over the years when that level of commitment was necessary to reach a business goal.  Now, I am launching a product that I have been incubating since age nineteen and developing for the past four years - my level of dedication to this product is unprecedented in a history that was already devoted to work.  In order to completely focus on this product, finish its development, and launch, I left my career in the energy sector that I worked incredibly hard to excel within.  It was a risk, but it was necessary to give this product the time and attention it needs to be fully realized.

Dating back a little further, I moved from Detroit to California at age eighteen with a mission of putting myself through college.  I had little more than lint in my pockets, so I started running a furniture store (as its sole employee) the day after my arrival and worked two shifts at the breakfast diner next to the furniture shop on weekend mornings, before opening the shop.  I saved money and albeit slowly, put myself through college.  I received several academic and artistic merit scholarships along the way which helped foot the bill.  I earned a Bachelor of Arts degree from The University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) after being accepted into their prestigious Film School, where I was graduated with the honor of summa cum laude, with an emphasis in writing. 

I have a new mission.  I want to share my product – comprised of a formula and method that has enabled my body to successfully defend itself from cold sores for many years – keeping cold sores from ruining important moments in my life - not by covering them up or making them heal faster, but by keeping them from being expressed on my face, altogether. 

Root plans to launch this product in the winter of 2016/2017.  The product has been meticulously branded from the inside perspective of someone who has dealt with cold sores and the threat of cold sores for a lifetime.  We have begun to establish and protect the brand through trademarks, a pending patent and by building out the brand’s visible presence with an edgy 3D character/mascot, a 3D animated teaser, and a website. Root has three manufacturers under NDA, who have submitted quotes for the first run of the product. This is where the Indiegogo campaign comes in.  We have gone as far as we possibly can with personal, out-of-pocket funding.  Root needs to raise capital in order to finance the first manufacturing run and get the product to market.  We are at the tipping point.

Contributions from this Indiegogo campaign will save a first kiss, first dates, a bride-to-be on her wedding day, hopeful candidates on a job interview, meeting the parents, picture days, and on and on.  Without the capital to finance the manufacturing, this incredible product remains suspended. 

In the past, I have had exposure to several investors through my professional roles – many of whom have been keenly interested in being a part of this mission, but always at an equity expense and level of control that I was not ready to relinquish.  It is important to find contributors who will see the intrinsic value of having this product available to the people who so desperately need it and should rightly have access to it.

While I am spearheading this project, I have been fortunate to have several talented, experienced, and successful individuals from varied industries who have committed to being advisors as Root’s product and business plan begins its rollout.  I can share the names and backgrounds of these advisors on a private channel.

What We Need & What You Get

Root, LLC is looking to raise $162,000.  The use of proceeds will be as follows:

Manufacturing        $   80,000.00

Marketing                 $   50,000.00

OPEX                          $   20,000.00

Platform Fees          $     7,500.00

Transaction Fees    $     4,500.00

                                      $ 162,000.00

(Once revenue is generated, continuing operations will be funded through product sales)

I understand that these numbers are low, but the intent is to organically grow the business through revenue from sales and with a hope of not ever using a debt instrument - which gets so many small companies in over their head.  The plan is to start with a complete online sales platform during the early stages, but will entertain brick and mortar channels when the product has enough of a presence to negotiate retail placement and terms with some measure of leverage.  A compelling reason for this is the risk of a brick and mortar fat cat rolling out a ‘store brand’ copy of the product.  Outside of store brands’ having capabilities of hitting much lower price points, is the concern that the integrity of the product will be compromised and resultantly reflect on our brand name product.  Here is a reference to that occurrence:

 New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman sent letters to four of the nation’s largest retailers — GNC, Target, Walmart and Walgreens — calling on them to stop the sale of store-brand herbal supplements after an investigation by his office allegedly showed that just 21 percent of the products tested contained the ingredients listed on their labels.

http://www.pbs.org/wgbh/frontline/article/can-r...

Since financial incentives are not permissible, Root will be offering a number of unique and compelling perks.  

We will offer an exclusive business photo shoot with an elite, NYC photographer, who has distinguished their talent and unique style in countless shoots of high-profile individuals, such as Warren Buffet, Mark Zuckerberg, Richard Branson, Samuel L. Jackson, Jimmy Fallon, and on, and on.  (http://www.davidyellen.com/portfolio/G00009Kf2T...) Travel & lodging not provided.

We will also offer a charitable perk, where every donation of a certain amount will fund one unit of the product to be sent to a developing country, where the much of the population is affected.  We are looking to partner with ProjectCure.org, (ranked by Forbes as one of the 20 Most Efficient Large U.S. Charities) as our conduit to those in need.  

We will also be offering handmade bracelets, made by a General Hospital Soap star, who has recently launched a line of artisan products.

We will also be offering luxury beach and bath towels - free of any logos or branding.

In addition to those unique perks, we will also offer merchandise to represent the product’s character, Garr – including but not limited to t-shirts and a plush, stuffed likeness of the character that can be used as a coping tool for children dealing with cold sores, to help them feel that they have a champion to comfort them while their body fights the virus back.  Even if your own children do not get cold sores, you certainly know of someone’s child who does.  Although the ingredients are natural, the product will not be recommended for children under the age of 12.  Garr, The (stuffed) Cold Sore Warrior, will be there for moral support until they are old enough to enjoy the benefits of the product itself.

If Root does not reach its entire goal with this campaign, it will run a second campaign until the goal is met.  If a second campaign is not successful, Root will revisit the offer made by the previously interested investors, in exchange for equity.  We will keep working at it until the product is launched.  As a last resort, Root has a quote with a manufacturer that will do a run with a much smaller initial quantity at a much higher cost per unit.  This will not be ideal for margins, but creates a fail-safe for a launch by winter, which is the peak season for cold sores.

The Impact

Cold Sores and the virus that causes them may not be life threatening in most cases, but they are prolific, painful, affect daily life, and make the sufferer feel powerless, as there is no cure.  The lowest estimate of people affected is 7 out of 10. 

Current methods used to address the virus and/or its symptoms of expression exist as anti-viral pharmaceutical prescriptions from a doctor and over the counter products (OTC).  Prescription antiviral medicines (e.g. acyclovir [Zovirax], famciclovir [Famvir], and valacyclovir [Valtrex]) are prescribed for episodic treatment or suppressive treatment.  Episodic treatment requires that the antiviral be taken when a reactivation and expression of the virus (outbreak) occurs and is no longer taken when the symptoms are gone.  Suppressive treatment, generally recommended for those who experience frequent outbreaks, requires that the antiviral be taken daily to suppress the virus from reactivation.  Suppressive treatment with prescription antivirals is not 100% effective in suppressing reactivation.  Antivirals used episodically or to suppress cannot stop future outbreaks, do not claim to prevent the expression of the virus, but claim to shorten the duration of the expression, or lessen the frequency in which outbreaks occur.

Not all who have the virus that causes cold sores have access to prescription drugs, and paying regularly for a prescription used to treat a condition that will continue in perpetuity but is not (in most cases) life threatening, is not a cost that can be absorbed by all socioeconomic groups.  As shown in the data below, there are millions affected in several developing countries.  It can be inferred that prescription medicines are not easily accessed for those populations. Once the company becomes self-sustaining, I will continue to seek out good-will channels to provide the product to people in these countries free of charge (beyond what's provided from perks).

Regional infection estimates

Estimates for HSV-1 prevalence by region among people aged 0-49 in 2012:

•             Americas: 178 million women (49%), 142 million men (39%)

•             Africa: 350 million women (87%), 355 million men (87%)

•             Eastern Mediterranean: 188 million women (75%), 202 million men (75%)

•             Europe: 207 million women (69%), 187 million men (61%)

•             South-East Asia: 432 million women (59%), 458 million men (58%)

•             Western Pacific: 488 million women (74%), 521 million men (73%)

 

Estimates of new HSV-1 infections among people aged 0-49 in 2012:

•             Americas: 6 million women, 5 million men

•             Africa: 17 million women, 18 million men

•             Eastern Mediterranean: 6 million women, 7 million men

•             Europe: 5 million women, 5 million men

•             South-East Asia: 13 million women, 14 million men

•             Western Pacific: 11 million women, 12 million men

http://www.who.int/mediacentre/news/releases/20...

 

With the increase in pursuits of healthy living, coupled with the intention of decreasing consumption/exposure to chemicals, and widespread notions of pharmaceutical companies having hidden agendas, there is a growing population of people resistant to contact with chemicals and to taking prescription drugs.  In part, these notions have contributed to a movement toward homeopathic methods. 

 Over the counter products currently available make claims to either provide relief of symptoms of an outbreak, to shorten healing time, or both. The OTC product currently with the largest market share, is an ointment/cream as the medium for the chemical docosanol.  This cream calls attention to the symptoms expressed on the face because of the product’s highly visible nature – in spite of efforts to be more discreet by creating other product lines that combine its core product with skin-colored bandages to camouflage the cream. 

The figure below presents data from 2014.  The OTC product with the most market share shortens the healing time of a cold sore.  Garr provides a natural, more effective way to enable the body to defend itself from a cold sore.

Risks & Challenges

One of the first obstacles facing the product is visibility within a sales platform that is completely internet based.  While the online platform simplifies other challenges, it is easy for products to get lost in a sea of information and other products with established brand recognition.  Root is fortunate to have some brand ambassadors with media exposure due to their professions, who have already agreed to give the product blasts on their social media. We are also hoping that the 3D animation is edgy enough to get some viral traction and views. Ultimately, we will need to spend some money on marketing efforts in order to ensure visibility, and we are still exploring which avenues are the best fit for the brand.  For example, Sirius Radio’s Comedy Central (channel 95) has the type of tone that we would initially see as a fit.

An inevitable future challenge will be increasing regulations for the 30 billion dollar supplement industry.  As the regulatory environment evolves with the booming supplement industry, Root should be ahead of the eight ball with its near-term entry to the market.  As Root grows and Garr, The Cold Sore Warrior(TM) gains visibility and market share, we anticipate Root having the position and the resources to evolve alongside regulatory bodies as they begin to increase and tailor their oversight efforts and measures.

A good challenge that we hope Root will face is how to transition to the right management team, once the product begins to outgrow current management – yours truly.  Additional team members are already teed up to assume posts once revenue is generated – including a Marketing Director with years of experience in the supplement industry.  Still, an effective product in a huge market, that has the capability of disruption, has the capacity to ‘blow up.’  It will be important to proactively assemble a talented, relevant team that has the reach and specific industry experience to carry the torch and take the product into the big leagues.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for taking the time to explore Root, LLC and meet Garr, The Cold Sore Warrior(TM)!  Even if you decide not to back us and become part of the Root family, we would be very grateful if you would use those Indiegogo share tools and pass the information on to anyone you know who deals with cold sores.  The whole reason this effort began was to make sure that others had the chance to fight back a cold sore.  The formula/method in Garr’s defense works and can truly change the life of a person who struggles with the threat of cold sores.  It changed mine.

story:
Project Simple Screen: Connecting Seniors to Technology

Established in 2002 with our headquarters in Markham, Ontario, Canada, Hipstreet is a growing global company specializing in Consumer Electronics and accessories.  Our consumer electronics and accessories products are currently sold through a wide range of channels, ranging from mass merchandisers to independent retailers.  

With an older demographic as a significant and important part of our customer base, our support team  has helped countless seniors with technical issues when trying  to use PC or tablet related products.  Over the years we have realized that today's operating systems and applications are simply not serving the senior population.  Recent studies also show that seniors are much slower to adopt technology, and also feel they face more challenges when learning to use tech as compared to younger generations.  Two in five seniors indicate that they have a physical or health condition that makes reading difficult and the majority of older adults say they need assistance when it comes to using new digital devices.

We felt there had to be a better way to help  seniors take advantage of all the benefits of today's technology, letting them connect with their families, friends and the world.

So we came up with Project Simple Screen.  We are developing a software application that will run on Windows operating system, but will enable a simplified and more intuitive user interface to make finding and operating their PC or tablet much easier.

The Project

Hipstreet is working with a team of developers to design, build, and test this software application.  We are looking for supporters of the development to help us reach our goal of $40,000 (CDN), but also want to create and grow a community of users who will receive early access and have a voice in how we develop this solution!

Our Goal

As a technology solutions provider, this project is meaningful and incredibly important to us.  Our goal is to create something that has a positive impact on a segment of society that will almost triple in size by the middle of this century! We want every senior to have the same opportunities for information access and communication that we enjoy every day.

story:
Meet Stephan. He’s a 28-year-old mechanical engineer. Like most young people, Stephan is active and enjoys the outdoors. His passions include hiking, skiing, running, kayaking and skydiving.      

 

 

 He is also fighting cancer.  

 

Eight months ago he heard the unimaginable, “You have an aggressive form of cancer.” In what became the most surreal moment of his life, Stephan was faced with a plethora of suggestions about the treatment he should undergo, the specialists he should visit and what type of diet he should be on. While he appreciated input from loved ones, Stephan wanted more. He wanted empirical data and the best researched approach to fighting testicular cancer. When our platform was in beta, Stephan discovered OncoGambit.

OncoGambit is, in simple terms, a user-friendly website created to confirm a patient’s treatment plan based on the cumulative recommendation of over 1100+ Cancer experts. After a few clicks, Stephan received instant confirmation that the treatment his oncologist recommended was not only the most up-to-date, science-based treatment, but also individually tailored to reflect the genetic profile of his tumor. OncoGambit also provided recommended doses of chemotherapy as well as the frequency and duration of his treatment. In addition, Stephan was also given vital information on survivorship care.

 

How OncoGambit Came to Be

We (Drs. Hannah Luu and Laura Bourdeanu) are both experienced Oncology healthcare providers and have seen lots of confusion and worry about treatment from cancer patients and their families. This genuinely concerned us because patients usually came to us highly anxious about their treatments and seem to be more worried about the treatment than they were about their disease.   

 

Because of this, OncoGambit came to us in an ‘Aha’ moment as a great way to relieve the uncertainty and fear of treatment.  We decided that, with the digital health trend and the advance of technology, more and more patients want information and want more control over their care.  Our goal with creating our site was to help create a quick and easy way for patients to get information regarding their cancer and their treatment options. 

The Impact

OncoGambit aims to boost survivorship rates by cross-referencing a patient’s treatment plan with cutting-edge cancer research to confirm the best course of action.

Risks & Challenges

OncoGambit launched our beta site in January 2016, revealing full capabilities as of November 2016. It continues to be improved for patients’ use. 

 Our greatest challenge is building awareness for our helpful tool. 

While the individuals behind OncoGambit work tirelessly to improve site accessibility, we need your help bringing this treatment tool to patients worldwide. A fully funded Indiegogo project will provide the resources necessary to make our site more accessible to cancer patients worldwide. We will use these resources to further develop this website and make it more accessible worldwide via patient advocacy groups, insurance companies, and cancer physicians. Without the proper funds to make this happen, our tool will not be known to people who need it most.

What We Need

OncoGambit is a tool that is with the patient from treatment to survivorship, and your donations will allow cancer patients around the globe to receive the best treatment available for their specific type of cancer. The funds raised from this campaign will be used to support further development of our website, and will also support efforts that will bring this treatment tool to more patients, cancer advocacy groups and cancer physicians.

As a “thank you” for your contribution of $20 or more, you will receive a free personalized cancer treatment report for you or a loved one. Your support will enable us to help patients cut through overwhelming amounts of information to determine the best treatment plan for them, which will positively impact survival rates across the globe.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute to our project financially, you can still help survival rates by sharing OncoGambit on Facebook and Twitter:

https://twitter.com/oncogambit

https://www.facebook.com/oncogambit

story:
There is a Global Antivenom Crisis. 

Snake bites kill over 100,000 people a year, and leave another 150,000 permanently disabled. Major manufacturers of antivenoms are discontinuing their products, as snake bites preferentially affect less lucrative developing world markets. The antivenoms that exist are developed using crude serological extracts from sheep that have been injected with snake venom. These traditional antivenoms are usually specific to only one snake, produce inflammation reactions in the patients, are cruel to animals, vary in quality by batch, and can only be administered once, as the second administration produces an life-threatening immune reaction against the horse/donkey proteins. The sheep antibodies contain less than 5% antivenom antibodies and are digested into Fab fragments with short half-lives, therefore requiring multiple expensive injections, and the antibodies have not been engineered for stability, meaning that the antivenom can spoil in areas without refrigeration where it is often needed.

The World Needs a fully human, thermostabilized, universal antivenom. 

A human bit by a snake will generate fully human antibodies against the snake venom, providing some protection in a subsequent exposure. For the past 16 years, Tim Friede has been boosted over 700 times with snake venom, including over 200 snake bits from live snakes. Over the course of these boosts, he has developed a remarkable immunity to snakes that would be ordinarily lethal, including cobras, taipans, black mambas, diamondback rattlers, and many others. He is resistant to a genetically diverse panel of snakes spanning the Americas, Asia, Africa, Australia, and Europe, indicating that he has affinity matured broadly neutralizing antibodies that can recognize and neutralize all snake venoms. Research on his blood have identified extremely elevated IgG4 anti-sera against snake venoms and a generally elevated IgG. Tim's blood contains the instructions for a universal, fully human antivenom.

How we'll do it ...

Tim had some of his blood drawn and sent it to Jake's labs. From there at Jake's labs, Ray extracted the RNA from his B cells and amplified the DNA that encodes his antibodies. Ray then converted that DNA into an antibody display technology to both read millions of his antibodies with genomic sequencing technologies as well as mine through his antibodies.

In Q2 of 2018, we at Mithros Bioscience will use a robotics platform to search through Tim's blood to look for the binders against venoms from all major snake species. From there we will narrow it down to a minimum set of concentrated fully human antibodies. 

This will act as an antivenom for the entire world.

Allowing a single dose that provides complete protection for all patients and greatly reduce costs.

story:
The Invictus Institute of Colorado

The Invictus Institute employs state-of-the-art procedures to reinforce the treatments currently available to trauma patients. Our mission is to drastically improve the lives of those suffering traumatic brain injuries (TBI), post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) and major depressive disorder (MDD). To this end, we aim to implement Four Pillars of Care: high-oxygen hyperbaric therapy, hormone replacement therapy, life coaching/psychotherapy, and ketamine infusion treatment. Peer-reviewed academic research has proven these methods more effective than the treatments being utilized at this time. Although our personal experiences as veterans and first responders first led us to pursue this endeavour, our ultimate objective is to draw upon recent scientific breakthroughs to revolutionize the way that mental health issues are treated in this country.

The founders of the Invictus Institute, Sam Peterson and Jeffrey Haugland, are both combat veterans who have suffered from PTSD, TBI and Depression. They are seeking to bring patient-focused care to the treatment of mental health. In addition to providing access to more effective treatments, 

The ultimate vision for the Invictus Institute is to provide access to more effective care, as well as, influencing policy change in the field of mental health. We will track the results of our treatment protocols through the use of pre and post treatment QSPECT scans, provided by our partner Cerescan. QSPECT scans are pivotal to our mission for two reasons. Our patients will be able to see the results of the treatments they have undergone in a visual representation. With this visualized data insurance companies and policymakers will no longer be able to ignore the quantifiable effects of more effective mental health care. 

By donating to our cause you will be bringing us one step closer to providing patients suffering from these disorders hope! If mental health has affected you or someone you know, please help us in our cause by donating 1 dollar. We are only asking for $1 dollar from anyone who has seen or felt the damage caused by mental health in their own personal life. 

What We Need 

We are seeking $75,000 to aid in the startup costs of establishing our first clinic. This money will go towards a downpayment on a multi-place hyperbaric chamber($50,000) as well as the purchasing of monitoring equipment and infusion pumps for ketamine infusions($10,000) as well the cost of clinic accreditation and an electronic records system. 

If we do not reach our goal the funds raised will go towards the purchasing of equipment that is necessary for daily operations. 

The Impact

Everyone in this country is affected by mental illness. it is estimated that 1 in 4 Americans suffers from some form of mental illness. With the recent explosion of mass shootings in our country, it is clear that we are in dire need of a better solution to our mental health problem. We believe that we can provide a solution by changing the process by which mental health disorders are treated. Our goal is to change the world! and we are asking for YOUR help! 

Risks & Challenges

The largest hurdle that we face is funding, we already have a team of licensed clinicians who are ready to step into clinical treatment rolls once we have established our first location. 

We will be tackling the issue of funding in a number of ways but crowdfunding is our first choice for fundraising. Other sources of funding include private investors, donations and loans. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If donating to this cause is outside of your ability we ask that you please share our video with your friends and family. The more exposure that we receive the faster we can begin treating patients and improving the lives of people around our country. 
  • Check out our website at invictuscolorado.com for more information on exactly how we are changing the face of mental health treatment.

story:
susty.

Sustainable or susty. products and services are exclusively curated from socially and environmentally responsible companies.

What You Get

Your membership includes discounts, perks and invitations to exquisite experiences that are uniquely personalized.

  • $1,760 Tier 1* | Prix Fixe Gourmet Dinner (Table of 4) + Private Chef with any vacation rental
  • $1,840 Tier 2* | Prix Fixe Gourmet Dinner (Table of 4) + Private Chef with any vacation rental
  • $1,920 Tier 3* | Prix Fixe Gourmet Dinner (Table of 4) + Private Chef with any vacation rental
  • $1,500 Tier 4* |  Prix Fixe Organic Groceries + Two-Day Vacation Rental (Individuals Only)
  • $250 Annual Membership

*Prices vary based on party size and required vacation rental booking in Los Angeles, San Diego or Santa Barbara, California.

What We Need

We are seeking to raise $125,000 to curate products, services and experiences based on your membership preferences. Funds raised through your membership subscription and any additional support will sustain:

  • Incorporation
  • Legal Services
  • Website/App Development
  • Advertising
  • Providing Concierge Services

If susty. meets it's goal Tier 1, Tier 2 and Tier 3 services will become available.

The Impact

Your membership will support many service industry professionals unable to work during this COVID-19 Pandemic:

  • susty. sources local service industry professionals
  • susty. offers members discounts on sustainable products 
  • susty. promotes eco|social responsible companies exclusively

Risks & Challenges

Providing concierge services during this COVID-19 pandemic may create risks and challenges in serving all our members requests.

  • susty. will adhere to strict state and local COVID-19 guidelines and rules to mitigate risks and challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not interested in membership please consider:

  • sharing our membership with your friends and family to get the word out;
  • using the Indiegogo share tools and make some noise about susty. on social media;
  • making any contribution to help us reach our goal.

​For your support you will receive invitations to enjoy exclusive curated experiences and products.

sustainably yours,

susty.

story:
Say welcome to CIRCL, your social distancing device.

CIRCL offers an effective solution to the current need for social distancing. In our schools, our companies or our retirement homes, the threat of COVID-19 is still very present and in order to be able to resume an efficient activity in the long term, it is important to find solutions.

Each CIRCL uses low energy Bluetooth technology to detect other boxes around it. Within 6 feets (2m) of each other, each CIRCL emits a sound to warn the user of its proximity to another person.

No configuration is necessary!

Out of its box, CIRCL works immediately and without configuration. It automatically detects each CIRCL around it.

Advantages 

 

 

 In order to fight the pandemic and avoid a further economic downturn, social distancing must be effectively implemented in as many places as possible.

Use CIRCL to protect your employees in offices or warehouses.

Our children's schools are also key places for the spread of the virus, hence the importance of setting up CIRCL there.

Retirement homes, laboratories, town halls, building sites, factories, company restaurants are other examples of places where CIRCL can be useful.

CIRCL therefore addresses itself to many people in order to protect as many of them as possible.

Ready to reopen your business with circl

 
Help your children and their friends have fun while social distancing.

 

 

  • In order to have a long life, CIRCL uses the low energy Bluetooth radio technology which allows a use for 3 months without having to change the battery.
  • CIRCL uses CR2477 batteries easily found on the market for about $1.5. It comes with one CR2477 battery.  
  • The default alarm proximity distance is 6 feet (2m). If you wish to change this distance according to your needs, we have released a mobile application that allows you to choose the minimum distance desired between each CIRCL.
  • You can also setup a familly member list, when family members get close to each other, CIRCL will not ring.

 

  • let's watch CIRCL in action !

 

  • The main button turns CIRCL on and off.

 

 

 

For the good integration of CIRCL in our daily newspapers, it seemed important to us to make it a tool adapted to everyone. It is therefore possible to wear it around your neck with the strap provided, but you can also put it in your pocket.

 

CIRCL is delivered with its battery, and we provide a lanyard for each CIRCL to make
it wearable.

 

Our team is currently developing an application that allows CIRCL to be updated in just a few seconds when a new feature is available. For example, CIRCL a panic button will be available on CIRCL to alert relatives or contact the authorities in case of an assault, without having to take your phone out.

As you can see, CIRCL can continually reinvent itself to allow users to continue to use it.

The application will be available on the App store as well as on the Play Store.

CIRCL was initially not the social distancing project it is today. We decided in March 2020 to evolve our project into the one it is today in order to propose an effective solution to the COVID-19 crisis.

CIRCL is now ready for production, pre-order it and get in july !

 

 

Check out first pieces from production !

 

 

Check out images from our first 2d design, 3d design to the production of the first CIRCL !

 

 

 

 

​WHAT THE HELL?

CIRCL is a social distancing box. Due to its simple use and its efficiency, it prevents close contact between two individuals at less than 6 feet (2m) by signalling the presence of the other by an audible signal. CIRCL helps to change habits today for a certain future, more than 6 feet (2m) away from the other.

WHO'S CIRCLING FOR?

CIRCL offers a solution for effective social distancing. It is therefore suitable for all spaces with many people, such as schools, offices, warehouses, retirement homes or even for your children and teenagers.

WHY USE IT?

Setting up an effective social distancing allows our companies to perpetuate work quickly while reducing health risks. Thus, using CIRCL is a commitment to the protection of individuals in the workplace or elsewhere.

DOES CIRCL WORK ANYWHERE ?

Yes, Circl works everywhere, both indoor and outdoor. Even in a noisy surrounding, the alarm will warn you if someone is too close to you.

DO I NEED TO DOWNLOAD A MOBILE APPLICATION?

No, Circl works fully when you unpack it. If you want to extend the detection features, then you can download the mobile App CIRCL ME.

HOW'S PRODUCTION GOING?

Initially, our project was not what it is today, but in view of the current pandemic, we thought it useful to transform it in favour of social distancing. Thus, our production line has already been launched and our first boxes are ready for use. We can therefore ensure delivery as early as July.

WHY THIS CAMPAIGN?

Launching this crowdfunding campaign allows us to have enough pre-sales so that we can launch the final production. In the meantime, we are finishing the packaging and the mobile application.

WHAT IS THE MOBILE APPLICATION?

Our team is currently developing a mobile application available on the Play Store as well as on the App Store in parallel with CIRCL. It will allow to set the minimum distance between each box which is 6 feet (2m) by default. In addition, the application will be able to update CIRCL in a few seconds when new features are available. 

HOW TO CONFIGURE IT?

We wanted to make CIRCL an easy to use tool to make it accessible to anyone. Just press the power button and it will be immediately recognized by all the other CIRCLs around it. To turn it off, nothing could be simpler, just press the power button again for 3 seconds. 

WHAT IS THE TECHNOLOGY USED?

In order to extend the battery life, we decided to use Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). This safe and reliable radio technology allows each CIRCL box to detect all the other boxes around it, without the need to synchronize them beforehand.

WHAT ABOUT THE BATTERY?

For efficient use, the included battery lasts for three months. CIRCL uses CR2477 batteries, easily found on the market for about $1.5. CIRCL comes with one CR2477 battery. 

IS THE DATA PROTECTED?

CIRCL emits weak BLE radio signals to operate. No location data is stored in CIRCL. It does not communicate with the mobile application, unless you want. Your data is therefore secure.

EXTRA CHARGES?

No additional fees apply after the purchase of CIRCL. All you need are spare batteries, which cost about $1.5.

AFTER THE COVID?

After the covid-19, CIRCL lends itself to many uses, such as setting up a panic button that will alert your loved ones in the event of an attack. This functionality can be added to CIRCL thanks to our mobile application.
story_txt:
Say welcome to CIRCL, your social distancing device.
CIRCL offers an effective solution to the current need for social distancing. In our schools, our companies or our retirement homes, the threat of COVID-19 is still very present and in order to be able to resume an efficient activity in the long term, it is important to find solutions.

Each CIRCL uses low energy Bluetooth technology to detect other boxes around it. Within 6 feets (2m) of each other, each CIRCL emits a sound to warn the user of its proximity to another person.

No configuration is necessary!
Out of its box, CIRCL works immediately and without configuration. It automatically detects each CIRCL around it.

Advantages 

 
 

 In order to fight the pandemic and avoid a further economic downturn, social distancing must be effectively implemented in as many places as possible.
Use CIRCL to protect your employees in offices or warehouses.
Our children's schools are also key places for the spread of the virus, hence the importance of setting up CIRCL there.
Retirement homes, laboratories, town halls, building sites, factories, company restaurants are other examples of places where CIRCL can be useful.
CIRCL therefore addresses itself to many people in order to protect as many of them as possible.
Ready to reopen your business with circl

 
Help your children and their friends have fun while social distancing.

 
 


In order to have a long life, CIRCL uses the low energy Bluetooth radio technology which allows a use for 3 months without having to change the battery.
CIRCL uses CR2477 batteries easily found on the market for about $1.5. It comes with one CR2477 battery.  
The default alarm proximity distance is 6 feet (2m). If you wish to change this distance according to your needs, we have released a mobile application that allows you to choose the minimum distance desired between each CIRCL.
You can also setup a familly member list, when family members get close to each other, CIRCL will not ring.


 
let's watch CIRCL in action !

 
The main button turns CIRCL on and off.

 
 
 

For the good integration of CIRCL in our daily newspapers, it seemed important to us to make it a tool adapted to everyone. It is therefore possible to wear it around your neck with the strap provided, but you can also put it in your pocket.



 

CIRCL is delivered with its battery, and we provide a lanyard for each CIRCL to makeit wearable.

 

Our team is currently developing an application that allows CIRCL to be updated in just a few seconds when a new feature is available. For example, CIRCL a panic button will be available on CIRCL to alert relatives or contact the authorities in case of an assault, without having to take your phone out.
As you can see, CIRCL can continually reinvent itself to allow users to continue to use it.
The application will be available on the App store as well as on the Play Store.

CIRCL was initially not the social distancing project it is today. We decided in March 2020 to evolve our project into the one it is today in order to propose an effective solution to the COVID-19 crisis.
CIRCL is now ready for production, pre-order it and get in july !
 

 

Check out first pieces from production !

 

 
Check out images from our first 2d design, 3d design to the production of the first CIRCL !

 

 
 

 
​WHAT THE HELL?
CIRCL is a social distancing box. Due to its simple use and its efficiency, it prevents close contact between two individuals at less than 6 feet (2m) by signalling the presence of the other by an audible signal. CIRCL helps to change habits today for a certain future, more than 6 feet (2m) away from the other.
WHO'S CIRCLING FOR?
CIRCL offers a solution for effective social distancing. It is therefore suitable for all spaces with many people, such as schools, offices, warehouses, retirement homes or even for your children and teenagers.
WHY USE IT?
Setting up an effective social distancing allows our companies to perpetuate work quickly while reducing health risks. Thus, using CIRCL is a commitment to the protection of individuals in the workplace or elsewhere.
DOES CIRCL WORK ANYWHERE ?
Yes, Circl works everywhere, both indoor and outdoor. Even in a noisy surrounding, the alarm will warn you if someone is too close to you.
DO I NEED TO DOWNLOAD A MOBILE APPLICATION?
No, Circl works fully when you unpack it. If you want to extend the detection features, then you can download the mobile App CIRCL ME.
HOW'S PRODUCTION GOING?
Initially, our project was not what it is today, but in view of the current pandemic, we thought it useful to transform it in favour of social distancing. Thus, our production line has already been launched and our first boxes are ready for use. We can therefore ensure delivery as early as July.
WHY THIS CAMPAIGN?
Launching this crowdfunding campaign allows us to have enough pre-sales so that we can launch the final production. In the meantime, we are finishing the packaging and the mobile application.
WHAT IS THE MOBILE APPLICATION?
Our team is currently developing a mobile application available on the Play Store as well as on the App Store in parallel with CIRCL. It will allow to set the minimum distance between each box which is 6 feet (2m) by default. In addition, the application will be able to update CIRCL in a few seconds when new features are available. 
HOW TO CONFIGURE IT?
We wanted to make CIRCL an easy to use tool to make it accessible to anyone. Just press the power button and it will be immediately recognized by all the other CIRCLs around it. To turn it off, nothing could be simpler, just press the power button again for 3 seconds. 
WHAT IS THE TECHNOLOGY USED?
In order to extend the battery life, we decided to use Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). This safe and reliable radio technology allows each CIRCL box to detect all the other boxes around it, without the need to synchronize them beforehand.
WHAT ABOUT THE BATTERY?
For efficient use, the included battery lasts for three months. CIRCL uses CR2477 batteries, easily found on the market for about $1.5. CIRCL comes with one CR2477 battery. 
IS THE DATA PROTECTED?
CIRCL emits weak BLE radio signals to operate. No location data is stored in CIRCL. It does not communicate with the mobile application, unless you want. Your data is therefore secure.
EXTRA CHARGES?
No additional fees apply after the purchase of CIRCL. All you need are spare batteries, which cost about $1.5.
AFTER THE COVID?
After the covid-19, CIRCL lends itself to many uses, such as setting up a panic button that will alert your loved ones in the event of an attack. This functionality can be added to CIRCL thanks to our mobile application.

story:
Get Fit & Lean Where You Are Right Now!

 

Imagine a total body gym that only weighs 2 lbs, yet produces up to 25 lbs of smooth resistance that feels like free-weights — and folds up to fit in your pocket or carry bag!

The OYO Gym is powered by our patented SpiraFlex® resistance technology used to keep NASA astronauts in shape on the International Space Station.  

World's only exercise device that applies resistance to both sides of muscle groups in one motion, building a balanced body in half the time. Combining strength with movement, without weight or momentum, our portable gym is the new way to get fit where you are right now! 

The OYO Gym is the "heavy duty" second generation of our popular DoubleFlex, featuring more resistance and cable extension — and this gym folds up to fit in your pocket or carry bag. 

What makes the OYO Gym superior to other fitness equipment like free-weights and resistance bands?

Free-weights work great but are not portable, and trying to control momentum can cause joint pain. Resistance bands produce progressive resistance (like rubber bands), which means the muscle is only fully activated at the end of the movement. 

SpiraFlex resistance is smooth and linear like free-weights, without the weight or momentum. SpiraFlex FlexPacks rated at 5 and 10 lbs. snap onto the OYO Gym, providing up to 25 lbs. of smooth resistance (feels like more, as you can't use momentum like weights), yet this gym weighs less than 2 lbs. 

The OYO Gym is the only device that provides abduction and adduction resistance during a single exercise movement, building a balanced body more efficiently. Also, since the DoubleFlex does not use gravity, a much wider range of functional exercises is possible in all planes of movement. 

Whether you are an athlete or just beginning to exercise, the OYO Gym can help you achieve your fitness goals right now, where you are!

The OYO Gym PRO wirelessly connects our OYO Coaching App for iPhone (iOS) for real time pace coaching, rep counting and tracking of workouts. 

No matter which perk level you choose, iOS backers can download our free OYO Coaching App for the iPhone from the Apple App Store to stream video workouts and do the OYO 10 Week Challenge. OYO Gym PRO users can connect wirelessly to the app for real-time coaching and rep-counting. 

If your mobile device is on a platform other than Apple iOS, you can still stream workouts on our website or on our Vimeo channel.

 

 

 

 

Founder / CEO, Paul Francis, invented the first resistive exercise device in space for NASA

 
Inventor Paul Francis was in the coffee shop below his office reading an article about NASA searching for a solution to prevent astronauts from losing bone density and muscle mass during long duration space flights. Francis believed his SpiraFlex resistive technology could be the answer. He contacted the Chief Medical Officer at NASA and was invited to give a presentation at Johnson Space Center, which led to his SpiraFlex team developing the first Resistive Exercise Device (iRED) for use in space. So far, over 50 crewmembers on the International Space Station have kept in shape using his patented SpiraFlex technology.  
 

 

OYO Fitness creates innovative fitness solutions to enable you to get fit On Your Own — helping you meet and beat life’s challenges.

OYO integrates SpiraFlex technology into fitness products that are lightweight, compact, and provide the same benefits as training with free weights.   

Studies show that resistance training not only builds bone density, lean muscle, and burns fat — you will also feel better, look younger, and live longer!

 

  

Paul Francis left the architectural profession to become an inventor (over 20 US and 32 foreign patents so far), launching products in the hardware, personal care and fitness industries. He has also licensed SpiraFlex resistance technology to Nautilus Inc. to power their top of the line home gym, the Bowflex Revolution. 

Francis founded OYO Fitness to integrate SpiraFlex into On Your Own fitness solutions that fit into your fast paced lifestyle. Can't make it to the gym? No problem. 

Ordering & Shipping:

How To Order the OYO Gym:

Select the perk package that you would like. We’ll collect your shipping information via the Backer Survey, sent 14 days after your pledge is made.

How To Order Multiple Rewards:

Unfortunately, Indiegogo doesn't allow supports to pledge for more than one reward. They suggest backing for multiple rewards one at a time. Here's what they say:

"Please note, at this time, we do not have a feature for you to be able to add multiple perks in a single transaction. As such, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk."

Add-ons/Upgrades:

  • Add-ons/Upgrades Through Backer Survey: Our Backer Survey is sent 14 days after your pledge is made.The Backer Survey will allow you to add on the Exercise Mat, the Shoulder Bag, upgrade to the PRO, add more OYO Gym / PROs to your order, etc.

Shipping:

After your Backer Survey is completed your reward will be shipped out on the following Monday.

More Information:

Distributor: 

If you’d like to become an OYO Gym distributor, please email us at info@oyofitness.com. 

Health Clubs, Instructors and Trainers: 

If you’d like to offer OYO Gym classes, bootcamps or virtual training, please email us at info@oyofitness.com. 

Corporate Wellness: 

The Pro model will be able to track and reward your employees for reaching fitness goals and you can use this data for insurance discounts. If you are interested to learn more, please email us at info@oyofitness.com. 

Physical Therapist: 

The OYO Gym is being used in physical therapy too. If you’re interested to learn more, please email us at info@oyofitness.com. 

Coach or Athletic Director: 

Teams are using the OYO Gym while on the road and for rehab. If you are ready to take our portable gym to the field, court or road, please email us at info@oyofitness.com.

Blogger / Journalist: 

If you’re interested in our story, please email us at info@oyofitness.com so that we can feature you in our updates and send you a press release.

Import Fees & Duties: 

The backer is responsible to pay for all import fees & duties.

OYO Fitness Director Nick Bolton discusses the benefits of the DoubleFlex.
 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 



The OYO Gym provides SpiraFlex resistance to opposite sides of muscle groups during each DOUBLEFLEX movement, in all planes of motion, building a balanced body in less time. 
 

Fitness Director Nick Bolton has created a range of workout programs for all fitness levels: from 5-minute targeted workout snacks, to full-body HIIT programs that will push you to your limits. 
Our yoga and Pilates programs add strength and flexibility to classic routines, and our Walking and Pump & Pedal workouts add strength training to daily cardio activities.   
Our OYO Coaching App (available for free download for Apple  iOS) offers new workout programs to Get Fit and Lean, while tracking progress to help get you into the best shape of your life.  
The included Exercise Wall Chart demonstrates step-by-step how to perform 75 exercises. 

 
 




  
Fitness Director Nick Bolton developed DoubleFlex workout and nutrition programs for all fitness levels, which were used in his highly successful 10-Week DoubleFlex Challenge Program. Using the original first generation DoubleFlex 3 to 5 times per week and following nutrition guidelines, 15 participants lost an average of 17 pounds and 19 inches in just 10 weeks.
The OYO Gym feels like free-weight or cable machine resistance, yet weighs less than 2 pounds. You can skip the crowded and expensive health club, and enjoy a total body workout at your convenience. 
 

 





This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped over 5,000 creators make their projects a reality.

story:
Hey Indiegogo! After the successful first run, we are continuing our specials here for you.

Meet Blincclip, the super bright bicycle reflector that blinks. 

 

 

We know how important it is to be seen when cycling in the dark. Blincclip is a high-performance reflector which clips in seconds to virtually any saddle. It blinks dynamically under the power of your movement so you can be noticed by approaching drivers. Blincclip will always be there blinking and reflecting headlights.

 

 Original Blincclip is featured on: 

Here Are Some Testimonials from around the globe:

"Sometimes it’s the simplest ideas that make the most sense. Case in point: Blincclip, a simple, double-sided flat card of reflective material that’s designed to blink while you ride. It uses no batteries, has no mounts to affix to (or break), and weighs less than a dollop of chamois cream."-- CyclingTips

"Just a couple weeks ago, I discovered that one of my blinking lights was not working as I was  leaving work in the rain, so I can definitely appreciate the value of a low tech backup." --James Thomas, Bicycle Design

"It is one of those simple, but very effective, 'why didn't I think of that' type products !"
 -- Mark Sander, UK, Designer of IF Mode, Strida folding bikes

"The Blincclip easily clipped on my saddle rails and has stayed there through sun, rain and high-speed descents. It is reassuring that it is there jiggling away and making me more conspicuous on the road." --Tom Webster, Singapore/London, Bicycle infrastructure engineer/amateur racer

 

Worry the rear light dies during a ride? 

Have you ever experienced the frustrating moment, to start riding home at night and realize the light battery is dead? It is an incredibly palm-sweating experience to cycle at night with a dead rear light. The fear of being rear-ended will haunt you throughout the journey and it is definitely an awful experience. Even worse, most of the time we don't notice it is dead halfway during the ride. Frustrated with such situations we decided to create a super reflector for those emergency moments.

 

 

Why blincclip is a better reflector?

Blincclip is super bright, Blincclip can blink by itself. 

To attract the motorist's attention,  a blinking reflector is more powerful than a static reflector. In case your light suddenly dies, Blincclip will always be there reflecting headlights to get you noticed.

 

 

How can a reflector blink?

This is where the magic happens. It simply hangs freely over the seat rails and responding to every movement as you pedal. The material, shape, size, and weight are optimized for the great pendulum effect. Plus, It blinks dynamically throughout every situation. It is responsive to the speed you are riding, terrain, and wind. On top of that, it goes static when you brake! 

 

 

As colorful as possible. You can easily flip it for daylight use with bright fluorescent yellow. Any additional brightness to your ride won't hurt.

 

 

Specs

Blincclip: 88 x 66mm. It is incredibly thin (1mm) and light (3.5grams). Carry one in your wallet for that spontaneous needs.

Blincclip is flexible, it can fit on any bike from foldie to roadie in a snap. No screw, no glue. Leaving your bike clean and sleek.

 

 

Material

We use 3M Diamond Grade reflector that is usually used for high-performance purposes such as in highways and airplane runway signs. It is incredibly bright and has an amazing viewing angle to ensure that you will be seen throughout any angle. It is also reassuring that Blincclip will be as durable as it can be.

 

 

Application

Have a saddle bag? No problem! with the included string, you can practically attach blincclip anywhere. So, you can go blincc blincc anytime.

 

 

Blincclip is designed to be used with other cycling accessories as additional visibility. 


 

 

This is us~~

Designed by the community for communities

We have amazing collaborators and testers that come together to make Blincclip great. Our community is growing and We hope you can join our ride too!

 

 

How it all started

It started back in 2011. Francis was involved in promoting safe-cycling in the community. He realized it is important to catch the driver's attention from far, and that allows more time for the driver to respond to the cyclist. He developed several versions of "safety flag" which move dynamically to attract attention from the drivers. The latest version is the Blincclip!

 

 

It looks incredibly simple! However, every material, shapes, sizes, weights and ways of attaching effect greatly in the blinking performance. Hence, Together with the community, we identify the needs, possibility and opportunity to make Blincclip perfect! Super Simple & Super Effective, KISS.

 

  Help us share our project :)

 

A Blinccat for good luck.

 

 

IMPORTANT NOTE** 

Blincclip is not meant to substitute or to replace a normal cycling light. Blincclip is designed to be a 'smarter' reflector and a quick backup for extra visibility. Kindly refer to your own local rules and law for further clarification. Ride Safe!

story:
Quick Update: We have shipped all the original orders!!
 
 
 

[This site is best viewed on a computer not a phone, and images may take time to load.]

Introducing the "Empowered Brain" System for Autism

The World’s First Wearable Social-Emotional Skills Coach for People with Autism

The Empowered Brain™ system by Brain Power aims to empower children and adults all along the autism spectrum to teach themselves practical life skills, and assess their progress numerically.  

 

Based on brain science from MIT and Harvard, these apps facilitate life skills such as language, emotional understanding, eye contact, control of behaviors, conversation skills, meltdown prevention, social connection, self-confidence, perspective-taking, and more. The system can help people with autism to better understand, interact with, and enjoy the world around them. These are the skills for self-sufficiency, and we believe that The Soft Skills are the Hard Skills™!

Empowered Brain apps run on Google Glass, which is a very impressive wearable computer. When you wear Glass, you can still see the world around you. Yet you also see (and hear) our social apps at the same time: through the see-through computer screen, and "bone-conduction" speaker. This is fundamentally better than an iPad or phone, because with those, your child is looking down and locked in another world. Empowered Brain keeps the wearer (such as your child) heads-up, hands-free, and engaged with the social world!

 

 

To give a brief example of one of our apps ("Emotion Charades"), the autistic adult or child sees an emoji floating on either side of the partner's face, and tilts her/his head to chose the one that matches the facial expression, for a reward.  Meanwhile, the software automatically monitors her/his performance as well as anxiety or stress level. (Learn more about this app, and our others, down below.)

 

 

Afterward, every response, all timings, and even measures of stress and anxiety can be accessed in your web account. It is like automatic session notes for the therapist or teacher, and it includes more data than any person could record during a session. For a parent, you can view past progress and predict the future. 

The user is not expected to wear the system all day. It is like piano lessons (but more fun), or sports practice (but can be done at home): to be practiced about 30 minutes per day. 

It feels like a video game but is clinically proven to address daily challenges of autism. 

We aim to help people with autism be understood, not cured; accepted, not isolated; empowered, not forced. As we say it, we aim to "empower every brain"!

A note on language: people prefer different words (e.g. "autistic" vs "with autism"; or how to describe "functioning" levels). At Brain Power, we try to switch among them. We don't want to offend anyone. We just want to do good science and help deserving people improve their lives! 

Empowered Brain provides value for parents, therapists, teachers, schools, practitioners, and of course people on the spectrum.  Read more to learn how it can apply to you. 

 

Patents pending worldwide.

Will my unique child be able to use it? 

Our years of experience with hundreds of children and adults all along the spectrum suggest the answer is likely yes. We have  published  peer-reviewed scientific papers showing Empowered Brain is safe, and is usable by autistic individuals across a broad range of ages and speaking / functioning abilities.

Parents are routinely surprised their children will wear these augmented-reality glasses even if they won't wear sunglasses. It may be because these glasses convert people's faces into cartoons, play their favorite music, and turn interacting with others into a rewarding video game.

Our Founder, and the Brain Power team, are deeply committed to bringing this award-winning, technology-based yet human-centric approach to every family touched by autism. That being said, there are some facts we would like to explain briefly.

  • Google Glass is a very technologically advanced,  and its "heads-up" nature makes it uniquely suited to instructive apps centered around social skills.
  • However, Glass costs $1500. 
  • This is by far the largest part of our price, and it is for Google, not for us.
  • Also, we somehow must cover costs of engineering a world-class, clinical-grade product, and the salaries of our engineers, doctors, scientists, educators, and others -- several of whom identify as autistic. 
  • Yet, out of our desire to reach families, we are offering heavy discounts on the basic package, and creative installment payments plans. Thus, you can pay less, and over time!

 

Brain Power's apps focus on useful and universal skills such as emotional understanding, empathy, eye contact, anxiety and stress management, attention, awareness of environment, transitions, communication skills, habits, and various cognitive skills. We take a very practical approach, and we have met with many, many families in great detail and have brought out tools into their homes and schools. 

Importantly, success and progress are measured not just in terms of the specific skill in each app, such as emotion decoding or eye contact. Rather, or in addition, we see success in terms of broadly useful features such as self-confidence, sense of self, agency, and decreases in anxiety. We have clinically observed decreases in ADHD symptoms following Empowered Brain sessions. We have observed flourishing of confidence in children and young adults in their regular lives (outside of sessions with the system) that has made their parents cry in joy.  

All of the Empowered Brain modules are engineered for users to teach themselves life skills crucial for happy self-sufficiency, and to generalize these skills into everyday life. We have studies how students in the classroom setting, for instance, apply the skills they learn from Empowered Brain to the rest of their schoolwork and social interactions at school.

All of this is made possible by advanced artificial intelligence and augmented reality inside our patent-pending software. However, the experience to the user (and parent/therapist) is very smooth and simple, and does not feel complicated or "academic". 

The goal is to empower the user to express more of the raw intelligence, or brain power, she or he already has (but which can sometimes be locked in or masked). Founder, Dr. Ned Sahin, often says that Brain Power "uses artificial intelligence to unlock natural intelligence."

Our apps are designed somewhat like video games, drawing on our natural desire to play and to compete. You can see some of them in action in the campaign video at the top of this page.

What makes our Empowered Brain apps unique is that they are also based on brain science and the principles of a modern movement known as "serious gaming". The "gamification" of learning and even clinical therapy has been scientifically demonstrated to have a profound positive effect, even in people who don't traditionally play games. 

Empowered Brain now runs on all Android smartglasses. This means that we have a long future and can adapt our system to new devices that emerge. That being said, we have selected Google Glass as the smartglasses of choice, after testing with many alternatives.  You will receive a brand-new Google Glass unit in the original factory box. 

 

It is NOT Fragile!

 

 

 

 

Empowered Brain is easy to use and we will train you ahead of time to make sure everything is smooth and great. 

  1. Your Google Glass unit is unlocked, and can be used anywhere in the world
  2. It is easy to use and we will supply how-to videos and web-casts 
  3. You will soon be teaching other people, and watching the delight in their faces.
  4. Glass will pair with iPhones as well as Android phones. Also, you can use it on WiFi as a completely stand-device. It does not need to be paired with a phone.
  5. Our software is also easy to use.
  6. Hundreds of people with autism have used and enjoyed it, as have their families. 
  7. Our clinical trials have demonstrated the system is very usable, across much of the spectrum. 

A heart-breaking question that parents of children with autism have vocalized to us many times is: “What would happen to my child once I am gone?”. These and other questions are what make us take our work so deeply seriously, day and night. We are committed to working dilligently, and scientifically, for your family and families like yours, to give answers and to inspire well-grounded hope. 

Empowered Brain measures numerical data and can give you a report on progress each day. This empowers you to know how your child is doing, and to make predictions about the future, grounded in real data. 

We also have recently developed a set of apps and tools that focus on job-preparedness and then job coaching. Stay tuned for more information. 

We know that having a job is probably the highest form of dignity and self-sufficiency, and we are committed to helping people gain employment.

The apps in the Empowered Brain core pack are the ones the families we interviewed desired first. Yet our patent-pending suite of science-based apps includes many more. Here are just a few.

Job Training and Onsite Coaching. For instance, we are finalizing a set of apps that focus on job skills. These form a job-coaching and job readiness platform, and are suitable for individuals who are a bit older and/or are ready for this deeply important life transition.

Anxiety and Stress. Two of our next apps focus on reducing stress and anxiety. They can even work with non-speaking and anxiety-prone individuals. They use artificial intelligence, and patented methods for detecting biomarkers of stress. 

Daily Activity Assist. For younger individuals or those working on foundational skills, we have an app that assists some of the simple daily tasks such as brushing teeth; and it makes them wildly fun and motivating.

In short, Empowered Brain includes benefits for young children all the way to adults, and people who do not speak all the way to  people employed at technology companies. Stay tuned for announcements about these newest apps. There is a lot we are ready and able to do! Yet, we need your help to get there. Together, we can rewrite the future of autism! Please, Empower Us!

Empowered brain offers an unprecedented way to evaluate your child’s (or your) performance and progress. Typically a teacher, therapist, or other practitioner would write notes manually after a session. These evaluations are necessarily subjective, and rooted in the practitioner’s particular clinical experience. Our system automatically generates session notes, and they include things like second-by-second accounts of body posture and attention that could not be noted by a human observer; and evaluations can made relative to all the people using the system in the world. 

After your child/client uses any of our apps or games, you can go to the web portal for a very detailed analysis of: a) the current game, b) long term progress, and c) predictions for the future. 

For instance, how many hundreds of times your child looked away in an hour, when she/he correctly guessed an emotion, levels of measured stress at every moment, minutes spent rocking, which graphics or music or rewards were most preferred, etc, etc. 

 

A) Current game and real time data the user can see.

Example report from a single session from a live clinical trial session.

The system updates the data second-by-second, so you can have a real-time report on the progress of your child during that particular session, as shown in the image above.

 

B) Monthly data report of the user’s progress.

Example of a progress report over the course of a month.

The system saves the information of your child’s progress for each game session on a monthly basis. It presents the information to you all in the same place.

 

C) Total data report of all sessions plus user’s potential growth.

Example of a performance report that is mapping the potential growth of the user.

The system saves the child’s data from each of the sessions played, provides a detailed report on his or her progress, and provides information on the child’s potential growth, based on  previous performance.

The cloud-based web portal is advanced beyond anything that currently exists. 

Parents often tell us it finally gives them the visibility and insight they have always wanted, and the reassurance of numerical, objective data. They appreciate that the assessment and criteria won't change if they move to a new town or new school, whereas in the past whenever they had a new doctor or teacher the whole evaluation process could start again from scratch. 

Therapists (BCBA's, OT's, SLP's, etc) tell us that the idea of automatically-generated session notes, with more detailed data than ever possible, is transformative for their practice. They also say that being able to offer this advanced (yet easy-to-use) technology differentiates them from their competitors.
