story:
UPDATE:

We upgraded the battery used in the Fridgmate, the actual battery endurance can be up to 50-90 days, depends on the capacity of your fridge. If you have a 500L fridge, the battery of Fridgmate lasts 50 days.



Fridgmate is a smart sterilizer made for your fridge to solve the above problems.

Fridgmate is a smart sterilizer device made especially for refrigerators. Using a dual mode sterilization approach, it works to destroy over 96% of bacteria that thrive in cold temperatures. These bacteria cause foul odors, food spoilage and can lead to gastrointestinal ailments, food poisoning and even types of stomach cancer.

In conjunction with a dedicated app that functions to monitor the conditions in your fridge, you have total control over how the product works. After one initial set up, you have the option of monitoring the functionality of the Fridgmate or you can leave this smart tool to work its magic without further interaction from you. 

Benefits:

  • It eradicates over 96% of the harmful bacteria that thrive in your refrigerator; 
  • It helps keep your refrigerator smelling fresh; 
  • It extends the lifespan of all your perishable foods.


This device was created out of one fathers actions to ensure his child's health, when nothing else could. When his son fell ill for long periods of time, it was concluded that the bacteria that was causing his ailments was found in the fridge. After months of trying to find a solution in vain, a chance encounter with an expert microbiologist led to a collaboration which resulted in the invention of The Fridgmate. Follow this link to see the entire story.


More than a year of research went into developing The Fridgmate, led by a team of scientists and microbiologits. The Fridgmate works on a dual mode smart sterilization technique;  releasing precisely calculated amounts of ozone in conjunction with anion burst which use their electric charge to eliminate odour causing material in the air. This is the safest and most efficient method to remove bacteria, as it leaves no chemical residue that can further contaminate or harm your food. Fridgmate uses a smart sterilization algorithm developed to ensure near total sterilization while maintaining a safe concentration of ozone.

Ozone sterilization is used all over the world. Because ozone has a powerful bacteria repressing outcome, it is also used in granary and meat freezing capacities to increase the shelf life of food. The Fridgmate specifically targets psychrophile bacteria - microorganisms that live and thrive in very cold temperatures. Some well-known examples include salmonella, listeria and staphylococcus aureus. These bacteria are responsible for countless illnesses worldwide each year. When these bacteria are left to thrive in your fridge, foods stored in the affected area can end up contaminated, causing various illnesses.

You also have the option to Deep Sterilize your fridge. You simply need to remove all the product from within the fridge and engage this feature on your device. We recommend this is done once a month.


Below video shows you the sterilization rate of the Fridgate reaches 96.26 percent.


Ozone Concentration Overflow Test video
Because of the smart algorithm Fridgmate uses, the ozone overflow concentration when the user opens the refrigerator door is less than 0.018 parts per million, which is about the same as during a thunderstorm and completely harmless to humans.

Some testing photos of the Fridgmate in the laboratory.

More than a year of research went into developing algorithms that would allow Fridgmate to effectively sterilize a refrigerator while maintaining an entirely healthy environment for humans.

The Fridgmate is powered by a battery that lasts up to 50-90 days, depends on the capacity of your fridge, and can be recharged via a micro USB port. 

The Fridgmate is also a smart device, meaning it connects to your smartphone via Bluetooth and is accompanied by an app available in both Android and iOS formats. The app has English and Chinese versions.

Through the app, you are able to check the sterilization process, cleanliness rating and the remaining power of your Fridgmate. If you don’t wish to monitor your device so closely, you are able to leave the Fridgmate to work on its own after the initial set up. No further manual input from you is required.


Fridgmate is extremely easy to start using, and set up is completed in three simple steps.

Step 1

Install the Fridgmate app on your phone which is available for both Android and iOS, power on your Fridgmate unit, and then connect it with your smart phone's Bluetooth.

Step 2

You need to input the capacity size of your fridge within the settings menu of the Fridgmate app and click save.

Step 3

Place the unit inside your fridge fresh room and let it work its magic!

The only other thing that you must do is recharge the unit, besides that, Fridgmate is completely self sustained, making your life much easier! 


The Fridgmate has a CNC-machined aluminum shell and its inner workings are manufactured from IP65 grade moisture-resistant hardware.
It’s designed to withstand the cold, humid environment of a refrigerator and has a lifespan of more than five years.



Dimensions: 103mm*48mm*50mm

Weight: 170g

Material: aluminium alloy+ABS

Bluetooth chip: industrial chipset from TI in America

Bluetooth version: 4.0

Transmission distance:

20 meters (Put the Fridgmate outside the fridge)

8 meters (Put the Fridgmate in the fridge with the door closed)

Battery: 2600mAH high quality rechargeable lithium battery

Input: 5V 1A

Battery endurance: 50-90 days, depends on the capacity of your fridge

Life span of battery: 5 years, 500 times charge

Charging port: Micro USB

Working temperature: -10-50 degree Celsius

Compatible phones and tablets: iPhone, Android Phones, iPad, Android Tablets


Real shoot photos of the Fridgmate



Why Indiegogo?

We've been working on Fridgmate for over a year. We are reaching out on Indiegogo because we know this product will change your life the way it has ours. This is your chance to shape what's next. 

Use of funds

Your money will only be used to produce your product - all funds pledged will be spent for manufacturing and component costs.

This project is flexible funding, we will proceed with production and ship the perks to our backers even if the full goal of the campaign is not reached. We are ready to get the Fridgmate out there and see the product grow. Jump on board!


Get yours today！




Sharing Fridgmate with your friends!

Want to express your care to someone or your friends? Share our campaign with them through the below 3 links. Sharing is caring!

Facebook   Twitter   Google+

Press Kit



Rocklauncher is a dedicated online platform focused on innovative consumer product offerings. Our value are founded in developing innovations that enhance lives and offer real time value. The products we represent are from high quality startups in Shenzhen, China that we have selected as strategic partners. Our team works closely with them on product development, testing and improvements. 

To find out more following the link here -  http://www.rocklauncher.com.


1. Will the cold and wet environments in the refrigerator affect the life span of the product?

The manufacturing material of Fridgmate is stainless steel ozone anion generator. It can function for more than 5 years under cold and wet conditions.

The internal structure of the Fridgmate is sealed and moisture-proof, which achieves IP65 moisture-resistant.

Fridgmate can function well for a long time when it is placed between -10 to 10 degree Celsius.

2. How do I know whether the sterilization is effective of not?

First, we focus on 6 categories of bacteria for professional testing. The most authoritative Chinese testing organizations, Guangzhou microbiological testing center released a report and we filmed the testing process in a video. Currently, we aim to kill the Psychrophile in the refrigerator and Fridgmate results excellent with 96.26% sterilization rate, which is the worldwide highest figure result.

Second, the food stored in the refrigerator is fresher with longer preservation period and there is no longer peculiar smell after putting Fridgmate in the refrigerator. This well shows that our product is effective in sterilization.

3. Is it effective in eliminating the peculiar smell of the refrigerator? 

There are two ways to eliminate the peculiar smell of the refrigerator. First, we can remove the organic components with strong oxidation of ozone. Second, with the use of anion, it will help shoot down the airborne dust or small particles which emit odors.

4. How long can Fridgmate help to extend the foods’ lifespan?

We conducted an experiment using a refrigerator in laboratory to compare the food preservation period with the use of Fridgmate. The result showed that with Fridgmate, the lifespan for strawberries were prolonged for 5 days, lettuce were prolonged for 10 days, chili were prolonged for 14 days and orange were prolonged for 21. Different food products have various preservation period extensions. 

5. Can I put Fridgmate in my car to eliminate the peculiar smell? 

Fridgmate is researched and designed for the conditions and bacteria survival of the refrigerator. If you put it in your car, as the ozone concentration, air humidity and concentration of negative ions are not enough in car, thus Fridgmate would not be able to function well. Therefore, we would recommend you to use it in refrigerator only. 

6. Although ozone can help with sterilization, inhaling too much ozone is harmful to human, how should I avoid this problem?

Having 0.1ppm of ozone in an environment for more than eight hours will be harmful to the human. On the contrary, inhaling a small amount of ozone would be beneficial to the human. For example, when there are thunderstorms, the ozone concentration in the atmosphere is about 0.04ppm, which is completely harmless. The core competitiveness of Fridgmate is its precise control of ozone emissions, ensuing the ozone concentration overflow is always less than 0.018ppm.

7. How does Fridgmate extend the lifespan of perishable foods?

Fridgmate will automatically release the right amount of ozone and anions according to the internal volume of refrigerator. This can effectively inhibit the metabolism of food and to inhibit the microbial pathogens from breeding. It also helps prevent food degradation and inhibit the generation of mildew.

8. Which layer of the refrigerator should I put to achieve optimal effect? Is it better to put it near the outside area to make ozone function well? Are there any positioning requirements? 

As the weight of ozone is 1.66 times to atmosphere, the air flow will slowly sink in overall trend. Therefore, we recommend putting it in the uppermost layer of refrigerator compartment. 

9. Is ozone harmful to the materials such as the plastic and seal bag in refrigerator? 

The internal manufacturing material of refrigerator is usually plastic while the seal bags are usually silicone in nature. These materials will not have any chemical reaction with ozone.

10. My fridge has 2 separate fresh room, shall I buy 2pcs Fridgmate?

Yes, we suggest you buy 2pcs, we have the right perk for you. If the fresh rooms are not separate, one Fridgmate is enough.

1. When is the prospective delivery date for the Fridgmate?

According to our plan we will start shipping Fridgmate before 20th of May 2016.

2. Who pays for the customs duties and VAT tax?

Customs duties and VAT tax varies by countires. If you incur a customs/VAT tax, your local custom will send you a notice. You can simply go to their carrier or post office to pay the tax before the product is released.

3.Is there a warranty?

Yes, the Fridgmate comes with a one year warranty. If you ever have a problem with it, just contact us and we'll do our best to make it right.

4.How do I get in touch with your team?

If you are unable to find your answer in the FAQ, please contact us at info@rocklauncher.com

5. I am a distributor. How do I contact you?

Please contact sales@rocklauncher.com.

Any questions about the product and the app, please feel free to contact us by email info@rocklauncher.com.


Sharing Fridgmate with your friends!

Want to express your care to someone or your friends? Share our campaign with them through the below 3 links. Sharing is caring!

Facebook   Twitter   Google+

Press Kit


We’ve been planning, sketching, prototyping, and testing the Fridgmate for months, and we felt that we have done all the necessary preliminary work prior to coming to Indiegogo. 

The Fridgmate that you see in the above video/photos are actual production units.

The only risks we face at this time is setting a new trend in motion. There has never been a product like this, so there may be some friction in introducing it to the market. 

This project is flexible funding, we will proceed with production and ship the perks to our backers even if the full goal of the campaign is not reached. Join us!

story:
Thank you for checking out our Indiegogo page! Help us fulfill our dream of making Redmayne Lodge a truly transformative and relaxing experience for many people.

I acquired the property in July 2015 and opened Phase one of Redmayne Lodge in August 2015, this now boasts one of the only Floatation centres in the north of england, as well as several other therapists offering a range of complementary therapies including, Colonic Hydrotherapy, Reflexology, Acupuncture, Tui-Na, Infra-Red Sauna, Hypnotherapy, a range of Massages and Holistic treatments.

www.redmaynelodge.co.uk


Phase two of the development took place January 2016 , this also offers several more therapy/consulting rooms & a studio for Yoga / Pilates

The third and final phase of our development would be to introduce a Weight/Health Management Clinic, however this would have a completely different approach to existing clinics.

Our aim is to  meet our customers needs with a new unique method.

  • Introduce a 3d body scanning system (www.fit3d.com) see website for more information on the benefits of using 3d body scanning.

  • Supply a package of 3d body scans (over a 3, 6 or 9mth period) ad hoc scans also available.
  • Offer the additional support from our in house Nutritionist, Dietitian, Lifestyle Coach.

This system will help with a wide range of conditions including: Obesity, Anorexia, and would also aid Bodybuilding, Pregnancy stages.

Our theory is that if you should take the weighing scales out of the process of trying to maintain an ideal size, as you can lose size and maintain weight as muscle weighs more than fat ! also a 3d scan has much more of a psychological impact 

What We Need & What You Get

We need the Investment to primarily purchase the 3d Body Scanner, Develop additional support software, setup a website, Promotional material. 

Luckily we already have the facilities and marketing plan.

Because we already have our floatation center (www.yorkfloat.co.uk),  we can immediately offer Infra-red Sauna or Floatation experiences, 

As soon as we reach £8k we will be able to offer 3D Body Scans with the option of Nutrition/Dietary/Life Coaching support. 

If for some reason we don't reach our funding target, we will still offer the floatation perks and look into leasing options for the 3d Body Scanning.

The Impact

We realise that there are millions of people who need help and support, in reaching their ideal  body size, and this has a huge impact on people's health and confidence.

Risks & Challenges

Luckily there aren't many risks or challenges with this campaign, as the infrastructure of incorporating this into our existing business is already available.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our Idea but aren't in the position to participate because you're not geographically close to us , we would like you to share this campaign with as many friends and family as possible or donate to our contribution perk, in return we will give you a mention on our social media and webpage.
story_txt:
Thank you for checking out our Indiegogo page! Help us fulfill our dream of making Redmayne Lodge a truly transformative and relaxing experience for many people.



I acquired the property in July 2015 and opened Phase one of Redmayne Lodge in August 2015, this now boasts one of the only Floatation centres in the north of england, as well as several other therapists offering a range of complementary therapies including, Colonic Hydrotherapy, Reflexology, Acupuncture, Tui-Na, Infra-Red Sauna, Hypnotherapy, a range of Massages and Holistic treatments.
www.redmaynelodge.co.uk



Phase two of the development took place January 2016 , this also offers several more therapy/consulting rooms & a studio for Yoga / Pilates
The third and final phase of our development would be to introduce a Weight/Health Management Clinic, however this would have a completely different approach to existing clinics.
Our aim is to  meet our customers needs with a new unique method.  Introduce a 3d body scanning system (www.fit3d.com) see website for more information on the benefits of using 3d body scanning.



Supply a package of 3d body scans (over a 3, 6 or 9mth period) ad hoc scans also available. Offer the additional support from our in house Nutritionist, Dietitian, Lifestyle Coach.  This system will help with a wide range of conditions including: Obesity, Anorexia, and would also aid Bodybuilding, Pregnancy stages.
Our theory is that if you should take the weighing scales out of the process of trying to maintain an ideal size, as you can lose size and maintain weight as muscle weighs more than fat ! also a 3d scan has much more of a psychological impact    What We Need & What You Get We need the Investment to primarily purchase the 3d Body Scanner, Develop additional support software, setup a website, Promotional material. 
Luckily we already have the facilities and marketing plan.
Because we already have our floatation center (www.yorkfloat.co.uk),  we can immediately offer Infra-red Sauna or Floatation experiences, 

As soon as we reach £8k we will be able to offer 3D Body Scans with the option of Nutrition/Dietary/Life Coaching support. 

If for some reason we don't reach our funding target, we will still offer the floatation perks and look into leasing options for the 3d Body Scanning.

story:
Our Story

We have three major problems
*First one
133 Million Americans Have at Least One Chronic Disease

The Top 5 chronic Disease are Heart Disease, Cancer ,
Stroke, COPD and Diabetes
4 Million require 50 Home Care Visits per year


*Second Problem
Doctors & Nurses Getting paid less & less by Medicare, Medical & ACA.
Every Doctor , Nurse Practitioner , Physician Assistant and Small Hospital Must Supplement their Practice With Concierge Service.
Patients have to wait days and weeks to get an appointment.

*Third Problem
Collaborating only with doctors in their own group , or hospital or even their own state is not enough . Over 35 Million people have rare diseases 

Solution

*For patients with chronic diseases  , we offer a Deluxe Concierge Service + Video

*For Collaboration, we have  the only Med Community with Free Video Consultation between Doctors nationwide. Complex cases can be solved in days rather than months saving Billions.



Concierge Service For The Masses-Uber of Healthcare

What is needed is Concierge Services for the masses.UCLA & Stanford  both  provide concierge care to affluent patients . What about families, seniors, businesses,and all taxpayers ? We provide a platform   for every doctor to set up Concierge service for the masses at no cost to him.Under this model, you can get an appointment within 24 hours .  A nurse may even be sent to your home. Cost to patients is low  and demand based.

  Patient Centeredness To New Level

Video Consultation that we provide is HIPAA compliant and  can help  most patients for post surgery, post emergency and post discharge management.Less use of Emergency room.

It is easily accessible from remote locations and overcrowded cities where just getting to the hospital may take hours in city traffic or bad  weather.  We need to empower families so that the patients can be treated at home and deliver care of the highest quality.


Collaboration With the Top Healthcare Specialists

No hospital or healthcare network (PPO or HMO) can afford to hire  all the top specialists  it needs. We provide  a platform for Free Video Collaboration  & Referrals between Primary Care Physicians and Specialists  to save lives in a timely manner. We also have a Facebook like interface where you can invite  other doctors to join your circle.

Why We Need You 

We’ve worked very hard over the past year to design CMPForYou.com. After countless hours in developing software with the help of tens of top notch programmers, we are finally ready to launch CMPForYou.com. With your support, we will be able to complete our project and bring CMPForYou to the US market first  and then to the global market. Through launching our campaign via crowdfunding on Indiegogo, we have the opportunity to connect with our very first supporters in a personal way. Your feedback is crucial to our long-term success, so we hope that you keep it direct and honest. Help us to improve CMPForYou.com so that we can do our part in helping you to look look younger, live longer and   stay  healthy. One of our millionaire friends before he passed away said," Take away all my wealth and give me back my health"  

We need your help  to make everybody healthy and happy !

Risks & Challenges

We have been selected by Founders Space   Accelerator out of many who applied. 
We need every doctor and nurse to join us whether  he belongs to a hospital, a group or a network or  has a solo practice.Every Patient should also join. Life you save may be your own or your child or grandchild.Need to solve a complex case or a  rare disease is today. Tomorrow will be too late.We understand that many hospitals do not allow doctors employed by them to offer services outside their hospital. That is not the case with nurses. Similarly doctors cannot practice outside their own state. This is not the case in any  other country.How sad that in a borderless  Internet we stick to these rules that make no sense specially for telemedicine . With your  help , it will all change sooner than later.  

We have some of the top people on our team

  • ·CEO  Christopher  Obereder https://www.linkedin.com/in/christopherobereder Serial Entrepreneur (35M user App), Was  Marketing Executive at Harvard University Ventures.
  • ·CMO  Dr. Anuradha Kapur   worked as a Physician for 17 years in CA, MASS , ME and CT
  • ·Marketing  Director:  Matt Ream https://www.linkedin.com/in/mream   Marketing/management professional with startup experience. Proven ability to directly impact the top and bottom lines through targeted marketing.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please   get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Please ask your doctor to sign up and your family members and friends to sign up on our web site.  We alone cannot do it.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Screen Shot of MedCommunity Site



How It Works For Doctors & Nurses


How It Works For Patients


FAQS

Do I talk to real doctors

Yes. CMP For You ( CMP hereafter) members only talk to actual doctors and nurses who are U.S. board-certified. When you request a consultation, CMP will connect you with a doctor licensed in your state. As a start we are launching this program only in CA.

What are some of the common conditions that we provide consultation for?

Common conditions include sinus problems, respiratory infection, allergies, urinary tract infection, cold and flu symptoms, cardiology, cancer, arthritis , diabetes  and many other non-emergency illnesses. Our doctors and nurses can help you with aging gracefully, memory loss, hearing loss, Alzheimers, managing menopause and other old age problems. Our concierge service is the best value for people who have chronic diseases. You can have a doctor or nurse come to your home if needed or the doctor can give you priority appointment within 24 hours.

Can CMP handle my emergency situations?

CMP is designed to handle non-emergent medical problems. You should NOT use it if you are experiencing a medical emergency.

Can I request a particular doctor?

Yes, you can request a particular doctor, if he is available on our web site. CMP is designed to support your relationship with your existing doctor. It is also means of establishing  a new  relationship with one of our doctors to get second opinion or even third opinion. Please know that all CMP doctors are highly qualified and go through rigorous training and credentialing. We have the largest physician database  of any telehealth provider with board-certified, state-licensed doctors  and we will continue to enlarge this database as more and more doctors realize  the benefits of joining CMP

Can I use it for my family?

Yes, you can use it for your family. We allow you to use the CMP service for you, your spouse and your dependents and other members who are too young to join or too old to join on their own.

Can I get a prescription?

Yes if you request a video consultation, you can get a prescription. It is up to the doctor to recommend the best treatment.CMP  doctors do not issue prescriptions for substances controlled by the DEA as given in our terms. See the names of those drugs in our terms that both doctors and patients have to sign.

How are prescriptions sent to the pharmacy?

CMP does not dispense prescription drugs. If the doctor prescribes medication, it is submitted electronically  or by phone to the pharmacy of your choice. We have a database of most pharmacies in the USA.

How does scheduling work on CMP For You?

With CMP you can simply schedule a video appointment from the comfort of home. 
In contrast, the average wait time to see a doctor in a metropolitan areas is 20 days!

Can I be turned down for a pre-existing condition?

Our doctors do not turn patients away because of pre-existing conditions.

Can I call CMP outside of the United States?

Yes  video  consultation are available  from outside of the United States.

Is there any way that I can get the benefits of  CMP For You For Free?

Yes! New users  in USA can earn $2 USD on CMP   For You just by sharing us on your Facebook page or by successfully inviting your family and friends.  The amount you earn from sharing, inviting, will be added to your account, which will automatically be applied when you complete a transaction for Video consulting or office consulting  or concierge consultation. If you earn enough money this way, your consultation will become Free.

Which cards and payment types can I accept with CMP?

With CMP you can charge almost any kind of credit or debit card:U.S. businesses can accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, JCB, Discover, and Diners Club.

What are Telehealth reimbursement codes?

An overview of how telehealth reimbursement works is as follows: Medicare/Medicaid, depending on State, may reimburse for the telehealth session + a telehealth originating site fee (CPT code Q3014).

What are State Laws and Reimbursement Policies for Video Consultation & Telehealth

Please go here http://cchpca.org/state-laws-and-reimbursement-policies

Do private insurance plans usually cover telemedicine services?

24 states and the District of Columbia require that private insurers cover telehealth the same as they cover in-person services.  Many other insurers cover at least some telehealth service--and many more have expressed interest in expanding their telehealth coverage. To find out if your insurance company covers telehealth services, please contact your benefits manager

Why can't I use Internet Explorer or Safari?

Unfortunately Internet Explorer (IE) and Safari do not support the technology we use to provide a CMPForYou.com video connection. It is possible to install a plugin for IE to get CMpForYou.com to work, but if you are going to download and install something, we recommend you download Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox instead.

Is Video Consultation HIPAA compliant?

Yes it is.Being HIPAA compliant means addressing every patient's privacy and keeping all identifiable health information guarded and secure. It means understanding how to operate according to the Privacy and Security Rules.

 

Common problems and solutions for clinics and Doctors or Nurses wanting to use.

Often users at a large clinic or hospital face difficulties using video because of security provisions health IT staff put into place.

Only Internet Explorer is installed on the computer- Many EHRs are built specifically for Internet Explorer. As a result, IT staff will only install Internet Explorer and often not allow other applications such as browsers to be installed

Firewall is blocking access to  or preventing it from working correctly- For security reasons, IT staff will often block access to websites and network ports that are not typically used in health care.

SOLUTION:

Based on our experience working with clinics and doctors, we recommend using a laptop or Chromebook for Video. There are several advantages to this approach. For example, you can have a dedicated laptop that is shared among providers and can move the laptop between rooms wherever needed. Also, you can position the  laptop next to the clinic computers with the EHR; this allows the provider to meet with the patient via video using the laptop and chart in the EHR on the clinic computers.

story:
“Tungaj Transformers are available in three different styles.”

The air around us is full of electro-phonic waves: from radio antennae, cellular phone towers, satellites, microwaves, wi-fi routers, and so much more. While invisible, they are not all harmless. Countless studies indicate that this radiation can interfere with sleep, mood and even health. The British Medical Journal published a study proving that people who live in proximity to cellular towers are more likely to suffer negative symptoms, including fatigue, lack of concentration, dizziness, loss of appetite, difficulty sleeping, depression, memory impairment and more. But in this day and age, we can’t live without technology, from laptops to televisions to microwaves to cell phones. Even if we were to stop using such devices, we could not escape the non-ionizing radiation they produce, because it is all around us, particularly concentrated in high-density urban areas. 

 But we do not have to give up this technology, or even avoid it, thanks to the Tungaj Transformer. Like an electrical transformer, which safely converts one voltage into another, the Tungaj Transformer converts the potentially harmful and disruptive non-ionizing radiation produced by today’s technology, rendering it harmless. Scores of users from around the world attest to its efficacy, describing how, after installing a Tungaj Transformer into their home or workplace, they sleep more soundly, feel more rested, are better able to concentrate when at work, and have more energy and a generally more positive mood. 


 How Does It Work? 

With the installation of the Tungaj Transformer, atoms of pure carbon, gold, silver, silicon and other elements establish torsion/scalar energy. This type of energy had already been researched by the great scientist and inventor of international repute, Nikola Tesla. Among other things, Tesla developed the alternating current generator, which is used in every household. He invented the coil that creates scalar energy. After many years of research and tests, we have finally managed to develop the Tungaj Transformer, which creates harmony and a healthy wavelength. The Tungaj Transformer is an intricate combination of knowledge about the subtle, supportive forces of nature that help human beings to establish existential balance.


Protect Yourself Against Non-Ionizing Radiation From:

  •   Radio antennae
  •   Satellite Dishes
  •   Wi Fi Routers
  •   Cell Phone Towers
  •   Microwaves 
  •   Smart Phones 
  •   Wireless Chargers
  •   Much More

What is Inside?

 After years of experimentation, Vrhovnik (pronounced “Ver-ho-nik”) developed an optimal combination of pulverized stones and minerals which transform non-ionizing radiation that is produced by electronic devices that rely on projected signals. These materials include gold, silver, silicon, pure carbon, selenium, quartz and other minerals. These are mixed in a suspension of sand and housed inside transformers of various sizes and designs, which can be selected by users to suit their tastes and the space they wish to protect.


 I’m Naturally Skeptical of Such Things. How Do I Know It Works?

 The Tungaj Transformer won a gold prize in the International Invention Expo in South Korea, and has been certified as effective by independent, objective scientists from the Institute of Bioelectrophotonics in Germany. In addition to these objective indications of its efficacy, there are the testimonies of scores of people, from many nations and walks of life, who simply feel better—much better—after living with Tungaj Transformers. 


“The latest research was made in the laboratory of plant cytogenetics, where they used the Allium M test. The results tell us that Tungaj Transformer protection really works. The genotoxicity level in an onion exposed to non-ionizing radiation was much higher than the same onion, exposed to the same radiation but also placed next to a Tungaj Transformer.”


Measurement made with GDV technology 


From the graph we can see that solar power plant during it's working proggress reduce intensity in space compare to non working time level. But intensity level of working solar power plant protected with Tungaj Transformer is even higher compare to non working time level. (Red - sunny, solar power plant working; Blue - night time, solar power plant is not working; Green - sunny, solar power plant working, protected with Tungaj Transformer)


Okay, Cool. Why Do They Look Different?

 A variety of designs are available, all of them functional Tungaj Transformers. The active material, the mix of pulverized minerals and stones, is contained inside the Tungaj Transformer, so its outer shape does not alter its efficacy, and is a matter of taste. Size does, however, with more of the active materials producing a strong transformer. Tungaj Transformers are available in a variety of sizes, suitable for a single room, a small apartment, and even an entire house. There are egg-shaped or round transformers, but they can also be made in the shape of totems, for placement on one’s desk or subtly in the corner of a room. Each Tungaj Transformer is crafted by hand, and their aesthetics will suit a variety of tastes, from craftsman-style carved wood or hand-painted, gilded eggs to streamlined reflective metal spheres that would look sharp in a minimalist office.


About the Project


Video in words: 

Drago Vrhovnik and the team at the Tunjice Natural Health Resort have spent years, and a considerable investment of financial resources, into developing and perfecting the Tungaj Transformers. Each one is meticulously crafted by hand, inside and out. This is a slow, laborious process, and is expensive—not an ideal business model to meet the huge demand for Tungaj Transformers, around the world. The team has maxed out its own resources, both in terms of time and funding, and needs additional assistance to move forward, beyond producing a few dozen transformers per year. This Kickstarter project will allow for the development of a new, more efficient and less expensive system for producing Tungaj Transformers, while still maintaining the level of quality and efficacy. It can improve the lives of anyone who uses one, and the demand is such that it far outstrips the capability of Vrhovnik to produce his invention. With your help, the Tungaj Transformer will become not only more available, but significantly less expensive to produce, and therefore to distribute.  


 How Do I Know Which Size to Choose?

 While the look of the Tungaj Transformer is entirely up to you, and the aesthetic does not affect its functionality, the sizing does, and the size should be chosen based on the space in which you plan to use it. Therefore we recommend the following: 

  • Personal – a miniature Tungaj Transformer, which you can take with you to meetings, on trips, in the car…whenever you go. 

  •  Room-Sized – a Tungaj Transformer, in totem, egg or sphere shapes, that is suitable for a single room, such as an office, living room or bedroom. 
  • -Business – larger, more powerful Tungaj Transformers, in egg or sphere shapes, wherein a single transformer is sufficient to protect a small home, apartment, or office


Tungaj Transformer totem shape

All of them are handmade, made of clay. Bottom plate made of wood (olive tree or wallnut or pear)                                                                  

Size:    
  • Personal..................6 cm
  • Room sized.............20 cm
  • Business sized........27 cm

Tungaj Transformer in egg shape

“Each of them is unique, hand-made from clay…” 9 cm tall and 5 cm diameter. Black. White. Silver.

Tungaj Transformer in sphere shape

“Sphere shaped, chrome with a black or white ceramic plinth”
  Diameter 6 or 8 cm.


 How Long Does It Take to Work? 

Tungaj Transformers do not require any special installation, and can be placed anywhere. They work non-directionally, and so we recommend placement in the middle of the space you wish to protect. Non-ionizing radiation passes through walls, and the protective nature of the transformer likewise functions even with stone or metal walls or dividers. Users have reported positive effects within 24 hours, though since the effects are subtle and more passive than active, living with Tungaj Transformers, over weeks and months, results in the most evident positive changes. 


Wait a Sec, How Do You Pronounce That? 

Tricky to pronounce, right? We’ll help teach you some Slovene! Pronounced “toon-guy,” the Tungaj Transformer was invented by Drago Vrhovnik, a specialist in bio-electrophonics who, for 17 years, has run an internationally-renowned natural health center nestled at the foot of the Alps, in Slovenia. The Natural Health Resort is in the village of Tunjice (in Slovene a natural heath spa is referred to as a Zdravilni Gaj, hence the transformer’s name, combining Tunjice (“toon-ee-tzay”) and Gaj (“guy”). 


About the Natural Health Resort 

Thousands of visitors per year, some from as far off as Japan and Argentina, travel to this center to take in the “living water,” and engage with energy points that occur naturally in the land on which the center is built. Independent scientific tests demonstrate that there is, indeed, a different sort of energy present at the center. The Eurasian tectonic layer passes directly beneath the resort. The subtle subterranean movements of this layer produce gentle, impalpable vibrations that have demonstrated a positive effect on the human body. The rich history of the area is even more astounding when one learns that archaeologists found a prehistoric shark’s tooth and the world’s oldest known fossilized sea horse here, on a site high in the mountains, attesting to the fact that this was once the floor of an ancient sea. The numerous independent, objective scientific tests undertaken at the resort demonstrate that the energy truly is different here than elsewhere. This is no placebo effect, but the real deal. It is in this environment that the Tungaj Transformer was invented, and where they are constructed, each one by hand. 


 More about the Tunjice Natural Health Resort

 Founded in 1998, the Tunjice Natural Health Resort and its products have won numerous awards, including medals at the IENA Fair in Nuremberg in 2006, the International Crafts Fair in Celje in 2005, the International Innovation Fair in Geneva in 2007 and the Korean International Women’s Exposition in Seoul in 2008. (you can read more: Natural health centre Tunjice)


Tungaj Transformer team

 

Thanks for Your Support!

From all the Tungaj Transformer team, we are enormously grateful for your support, in any form it might take, from well-wishes to pledges. We can’t do it without you, and we are here for you. Be in touch if you have any questions and we wish you all the best.


Risks & Challenges

We think that best way to avoid risks is to have a good product backed with extensive research. That is why we have been developing, testing and honing this product for more than 8 years. In-depth research on the efficacy of the Tungaj Transformer, both our own and that undertaken by independent bodies, confirms that it really does work brilliantly. 
We will begin more extensive production as soon as we reach our goal. We have found more artisans to work with in order to meet the extensive demand and just need the funding assistance to make our dream a reality. 
Please contact us if you have any questions or concerns. We would hope to become a global leader in this field, both in terms of our product and our service. Thank you so much for your support!

Other Ways You Can Help

Well, if Tungaj Transformer doesn’t sound like your cup of tea, or if your funds are momentarily limited, please feel free to share our project around.
story_txt:
“Tungaj Transformers are available in three different styles.”

The air around us is full of electro-phonic waves: from radio antennae, cellular phone towers, satellites, microwaves, wi-fi routers, and so much more. While invisible, they are not all harmless. Countless studies indicate that this radiation can interfere with sleep, mood and even health. The British Medical Journal published a study proving that people who live in proximity to cellular towers are more likely to suffer negative symptoms, including fatigue, lack of concentration, dizziness, loss of appetite, difficulty sleeping, depression, memory impairment and more. But in this day and age, we can’t live without technology, from laptops to televisions to microwaves to cell phones. Even if we were to stop using such devices, we could not escape the non-ionizing radiation they produce, because it is all around us, particularly concentrated in high-density urban areas. 
 But we do not have to give up this technology, or even avoid it, thanks to the Tungaj Transformer. Like an electrical transformer, which safely converts one voltage into another, the Tungaj Transformer converts the potentially harmful and disruptive non-ionizing radiation produced by today’s technology, rendering it harmless. Scores of users from around the world attest to its efficacy, describing how, after installing a Tungaj Transformer into their home or workplace, they sleep more soundly, feel more rested, are better able to concentrate when at work, and have more energy and a generally more positive mood. 

 How Does It Work? 
With the installation of the Tungaj Transformer, atoms of pure carbon, gold, silver, silicon and other elements establish torsion/scalar energy. This type of energy had already been researched by the great scientist and inventor of international repute, Nikola Tesla. Among other things, Tesla developed the alternating current generator, which is used in every household. He invented the coil that creates scalar energy. After many years of research and tests, we have finally managed to develop the Tungaj Transformer, which creates harmony and a healthy wavelength. The Tungaj Transformer is an intricate combination of knowledge about the subtle, supportive forces of nature that help human beings to establish existential balance.


Protect Yourself Against Non-Ionizing Radiation From:

  Radio antennae
  Satellite Dishes
  Wi Fi Routers
  Cell Phone Towers
  Microwaves 
  Smart Phones 
  Wireless Chargers
  Much More


What is Inside?
 After years of experimentation, Vrhovnik (pronounced “Ver-ho-nik”) developed an optimal combination of pulverized stones and minerals which transform non-ionizing radiation that is produced by electronic devices that rely on projected signals. These materials include gold, silver, silicon, pure carbon, selenium, quartz and other minerals. These are mixed in a suspension of sand and housed inside transformers of various sizes and designs, which can be selected by users to suit their tastes and the space they wish to protect.


 I’m Naturally Skeptical of Such Things. How Do I Know It Works?
 The Tungaj Transformer won a gold prize in the International Invention Expo in South Korea, and has been certified as effective by independent, objective scientists from the Institute of Bioelectrophotonics in Germany. In addition to these objective indications of its efficacy, there are the testimonies of scores of people, from many nations and walks of life, who simply feel better—much better—after living with Tungaj Transformers. 



“The latest research was made in the laboratory of plant cytogenetics, where they used the Allium M test. The results tell us that Tungaj Transformer protection really works. The genotoxicity level in an onion exposed to non-ionizing radiation was much higher than the same onion, exposed to the same radiation but also placed next to a Tungaj Transformer.”


Measurement made with GDV technology 
From the graph we can see that solar power plant during it's working proggress reduce intensity in space compare to non working time level. But intensity level of working solar power plant protected with Tungaj Transformer is even higher compare to non working time level. (Red - sunny, solar power plant working; Blue - night time, solar power plant is not working; Green - sunny, solar power plant working, protected with Tungaj Transformer)

Okay, Cool. Why Do They Look Different?
 A variety of designs are available, all of them functional Tungaj Transformers. The active material, the mix of pulverized minerals and stones, is contained inside the Tungaj Transformer, so its outer shape does not alter its efficacy, and is a matter of taste. Size does, however, with more of the active materials producing a strong transformer. Tungaj Transformers are available in a variety of sizes, suitable for a single room, a small apartment, and even an entire house. There are egg-shaped or round transformers, but they can also be made in the shape of totems, for placement on one’s desk or subtly in the corner of a room. Each Tungaj Transformer is crafted by hand, and their aesthetics will suit a variety of tastes, from craftsman-style carved wood or hand-painted, gilded eggs to streamlined reflective metal spheres that would look sharp in a minimalist office.


About the Project



Video in words: 
Drago Vrhovnik and the team at the Tunjice Natural Health Resort have spent years, and a considerable investment of financial resources, into developing and perfecting the Tungaj Transformers. Each one is meticulously crafted by hand, inside and out. This is a slow, laborious process, and is expensive—not an ideal business model to meet the huge demand for Tungaj Transformers, around the world. The team has maxed out its own resources, both in terms of time and funding, and needs additional assistance to move forward, beyond producing a few dozen transformers per year. This Kickstarter project will allow for the development of a new, more efficient and less expensive system for producing Tungaj Transformers, while still maintaining the level of quality and efficacy. It can improve the lives of anyone who uses one, and the demand is such that it far outstrips the capability of Vrhovnik to produce his invention. With your help, the Tungaj Transformer will become not only more available, but significantly less expensive to produce, and therefore to distribute.  


 How Do I Know Which Size to Choose?

 While the look of the Tungaj Transformer is entirely up to you, and the aesthetic does not affect its functionality, the sizing does, and the size should be chosen based on the space in which you plan to use it. Therefore we recommend the following: 
Personal – a miniature Tungaj Transformer, which you can take with you to meetings, on trips, in the car…whenever you go. 



 Room-Sized – a Tungaj Transformer, in totem, egg or sphere shapes, that is suitable for a single room, such as an office, living room or bedroom. 
-Business – larger, more powerful Tungaj Transformers, in egg or sphere shapes, wherein a single transformer is sufficient to protect a small home, apartment, or office


Tungaj Transformer totem shape


All of them are handmade, made of clay. Bottom plate made of wood (olive tree or wallnut or pear)                                                                  
Size:    


Personal..................6 cm


Room sized.............20 cm


Business sized........27 cm


Tungaj Transformer in egg shape


“Each of them is unique, hand-made from clay…” 9 cm tall and 5 cm diameter. Black. White. Silver.

Tungaj Transformer in sphere shape


“Sphere shaped, chrome with a black or white ceramic plinth”  Diameter 6 or 8 cm.

story:
Multi-Mini-Clinics 
                                                                           MMC

•Preface

I am Dr.Jihad Mahmoud Hasanain from Rafah . 
Iam  working  at Abu Yousef Al Najjar Hospital , Rafah " on the South of Gaza city
In addition to “ Tal-Alsultan UNRWA Primary health care center “ Rafah
I lived the three wars on Gaza within 2008,2012,2014
and  I started my voluntary work during last war (2014) , it was started to support children in their shelters and to reach the out-of access children where they live in poor and unhealthy no sanitized conditions

            During work in our new Clinic in Al Shapoora Refugees camp - Rafah

              after finishing the last steps  in our charitable clinic In Rafah 


     with simple words :

1.  I am about sitting three small medical clinics in poor areas of southern Gaza, mainly in Rafah Refugees Camps “ Al Shapoora , Al Shouka and  Alezba camps , to provide charity service of medical help at simple levels of general practice, pediatrics and primary care ,, in addition to education and awareness campaigns.

 one  of the  kids who  received medical care gently in her house due to the lack of medical centers  around !  

2.These medical points will be as team centers also, where teams leave towards more rural and bordered areas to provide medical help at homes and shelters and even at bare areas where people have no homes after last 3 wars . 

Why it is needed 

•Three Gaza wars (Dec2008, Nov2012, Jul2014) Brought Gaza life to hell, buildings down, no infrastructure, no clean water, no enough medical and health services The10th yrs siege on Gaza makes about 400 hundred medical doctors unemployed even the governmental hospitals need more far than this number


•According to PCHR Statistics about the 50-day war 2014, 2191 Palestinians were killed and more than 527 of them were children, about 3306 children were wounded and had temporary or permanent disabilities.


•According to the United Nations Relief and Work Agency (UNRWA), more than 300,000 Gazans had been sheltering in its schools on August19th 2014,  and up to 500,000 people have been displaced by the conflict


•The UN estimates that more than 20,000 homes have been reduced to rubble or rendered uninhabitable and workers are racing to avert humanitarian crisis by fixing damaged water mains and power lines

Why to combine Out-reach medical service in our project ? 

•The Out Reach medical services became necessary in Gaza to cover wide range of population of borderlines areas, people without shelters, uninsured people and people with low socioeconomic backgrounds and to cover another group of low educated careless group.


    at the beginning of this Idea , I turned my house to small clinic
" child during receiving medical examination after high grade fever , vomiting
           and diarrhea at the mid night  in my house "  

Lets see the Aims again 

•3 medical points to provide :

•Charity medical service at level of Pediatric,  general practice and primary care

•Education campaigns and awareness programs

•Easy accessible areas for rural and borderline areas

•Out-reach medical service to homes and shelters

The Mechanism of our Multi-Mini-Clinics work 

•Each team will combine :

1.2 medical doctors

2.2 nurses

3.Social worker


Essential Requirements

•Renting three apartments to start our
Multi- Mini –Clinics

•Completing their equipment needed

•Medications and pharmacologic materials

•Emergency trolley is needed at each clinic

•2 emergency bags needed at each clinic


Every Mini Clinic need
(we need 3 Clinics )

•Rent .. It is about 200 USD monthly changeable according to location +-50 USD
so need 2400 $ for each apartment . So renting  the three apartments cost
2400 x 3 =  7200 $

•Needed essentials :

•3 disks .. Each one costs 100 $..so the  total disks for  the three clinics cost
 100 x 3 x 3 = 900 $

•3 chairs  for medical stuff .. Each one costs 30 $ .. So the total chairs for  the three clinics cost
 30 X 3 x 3 =270 $

•6 Plastic chairs for patients .. Each one costs 15$ .. So the total plastic chairs for the three clinics cost
15 x 6 x 3 =  270 $

•2 beds with it’s covers  .. Each one cost 80$ .. So the  total beds and covering s  for the three clinics cost
85 x 2 x 3 =  510 $

•Emergency trolley.. Each one cost 500 $ ,, so the total E. trolley for the three clinics cost
500 x 1 x 3 = 1500 $

•2 emergency bags .. Each one cost  about 100 $ .. So the total E. bags for the three clinics cost
100 x 2 x 3 = 600  $

•1 Medical Oxygen Supplier for each Clinic  ..  “ Existed from local donors “

•Nebulizer, Stethoscopes, aoutoscopes, sphegmanometers, simple surgical tools “  “ Existed from local donors “

•Medical disposables including dressings, sutures , gloves, tongue depressors etc. “. 400 $

•Essential drugs needed at emergency sittings  “ 800 $ 

                        " how our First clinic looks like " 

     " a rare case of"  coloboma " discovered accidentally in our Clinic "

___

if you consider any assistance or ask for more details please refer to my accounts on Facebook DrJihad M. Hasanain or you can send me message via
 e-mail : dr.jihad90@gmail.com

You can help me by Donating to this online fundraising campaign and share the link widely with your friends, family and everyone who can contribute.

story:
Fresh Geek smart oil dispenser is much more than an oil pourer that protects your oil from oxidation and allowing for easy, no-fuss access to pour, it also provides freshness index of your oil, tracks your oil intake, and makes sure you take it for flavor and health. 

 

 

 

Ramadan Diet Plan Recipe With Fresh Geek Smart Oil Dispenser 

 

"What if, you could keep a track of how much oil you're consuming? Thankfully, now there is a way as Fresh Geek Smart Oil Dispenser is a gadget that you must have in your kitchen."

 

"The 'FreshGreek' Ensures That Your Salad Gets the Right Amount of Condiments"

 

We often keep a tab on the freshness of the meat, poultry, fish, vegetables and the safeness to eat them. But, oil, the primary and the most inevitable ingredient of every diet easily being neglected.

 

To get know the algorithm for the freshness of the oil, we partnered with State Key Laboratory of food science & technology of Jiangnan University.

 

Environmental temperature and air exposure have an influence on the oxidizing of vitamin E in your oil. The algorithm of oil freshness combined the temperature, air exposure times monitored by the sensor and the manufacture date of the oil, to make sure you cook with healthy oil.

 

Track and plan your oil intake is important to maintain calorie balance for weight control and health. It's easy. FreshGeek does all the measuring for you! FreshGeek helps you track daily oil consumption and control your oil intake with your smart phone. 

 

With the companion app, you can get even more details of your daily, weekly and monthly oil intake and personalized optimum diet suggestions. 

The FreshGeek app is AVAILABLE on both Android Play Store and iTunes Apple Store.

 

 

Keeps your family's oil consumption details in your pocket whenever you want to check with companion app. 

 

View your daily oil intake on the dashboard. FreshGeek can track per capita oil intake when you eating with families or friends.

 

Use our unique oil freshness algorithm to monitor your oil status to see if your oil is healthy and safe for eat. The light on the cap of oil dispenser will flash red when the cap keeped open for over 3 minutes. 

60 Points
When the freshness index of your oil lower than 60 points, you’re recommended not to use it.

 

Red Lights Alarm
The cap lights red when it stays unclosed and your oil exposed to air for over 3 minutes. 

 

View your daily, weekly, and monthly oil intake on the dashboard. FreshGeek can track per capita oil intake when you eating with families or friends.

 

Notifications will pop up on your smartphone to give you a sharp reminder when you take excessive oil. 


 

 

 

 

 

Heat, light, and air are the enemies of oil. However you store it, you should make sure that it stays cool, dark, and free from excess exposure to air. The dark green tinted body of FreshGeek is designed to decrease the chain reaction caused by light and heat and preserve the oil freshness. 

 

Clean and modern, FreshGeek is ergonomically designed to fit perfectly in one hand. Place it on the dining table, kitchen cabinet, pantry, or take it camping or to your friends' place to make sure dinner will be safe.

 

 

Gai Xia Technology (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. was established in 2015, incubated in Shanghai Rongs' Health Industry Co., Ltd. Gai Xia commits itself to implementing the Rongs’ long-term strategy of pursuing high quality edible oil. Conforming to the wave of mobile Internet and intelligent hardware, a lot of talents in fields of electronic hardware, computer software, health care, brand marketing etc, have been attracted by Gai Xia to provide families with a scientific solution to oil use in a healthy way.

Fresh Geek, the brand of Gai Xia Technology concentrates on exploring the food technology, which can lead a healthy life. As the first generation of intelligent oil bottle came to the public, it was recommended by many technology and lifestyle media. Fresh Geek is known as the first brand initiating the concept of Freshness Index in Edible Oil and makes it possible to monitor household oil consumption.

 

 

F1 How my oil consumption calculated? 
The integrated three-axis sensor placed within the cap will calculate oil consumption and show it on the companion app.

F2 How long should the cap last with daily use?
Based on our test, the cap can be used for over 5000 times.

F3 Will the battery corrode after long time storage in the kitchen?
The battery compartment is sealed design to prevent moisture and air. 

F4 How to clean it?
The body can be washed with water, and the cap can be cleaned with sponge and soft cloth.

F5 Will the oil leak to the outside?
FreshGeek comes with a leak-proof pourer design to prevent spillage.

F6 Are they BPA free?
Yes, the body is made of glass and the cap is made of food-grade PE and 304 stainless steel.

"What if, you could keep a track of how much oil you're consuming? Thankfully, now there is a way as Fresh Geek Smart Oil Dispenser is a gadget that you must have in your kitchen."
 

"The 'FreshGreek' Ensures That Your Salad Gets the Right Amount of Condiments"
 


We often keep a tab on the freshness of the meat, poultry, fish, vegetables and the safeness to eat them. But, oil, the primary and the most inevitable ingredient of every diet easily being neglected.

 
To get know the algorithm for the freshness of the oil, we partnered with State Key Laboratory of food science & technology of Jiangnan University.


 
Environmental temperature and air exposure have an influence on the oxidizing of vitamin E in your oil. The algorithm of oil freshness combined the temperature, air exposure times monitored by the sensor and the manufacture date of the oil, to make sure you cook with healthy oil.

 

Track and plan your oil intake is important to maintain calorie balance for weight control and health. It's easy. FreshGeek does all the measuring for you! FreshGeek helps you track daily oil consumption and control your oil intake with your smart phone. 

 
With the companion app, you can get even more details of your daily, weekly and monthly oil intake and personalized optimum diet suggestions. 

The FreshGeek app is AVAILABLE on both Android Play Store and iTunes Apple Store.

 
 

Keeps your family's oil consumption details in your pocket whenever you want to check with companion app. 
 

View your daily oil intake on the dashboard. FreshGeek can track per capita oil intake when you eating with families or friends.

 

Use our unique oil freshness algorithm to monitor your oil status to see if your oil is healthy and safe for eat. The light on the cap of oil dispenser will flash red when the cap keeped open for over 3 minutes. 

60 PointsWhen the freshness index of your oil lower than 60 points, you’re recommended not to use it.
 
Red Lights AlarmThe cap lights red when it stays unclosed and your oil exposed to air for over 3 minutes. 
 

View your daily, weekly, and monthly oil intake on the dashboard. FreshGeek can track per capita oil intake when you eating with families or friends.
 

Notifications will pop up on your smartphone to give you a sharp reminder when you take excessive oil. 

 

 

 

 

 

Heat, light, and air are the enemies of oil. However you store it, you should make sure that it stays cool, dark, and free from excess exposure to air. The dark green tinted body of FreshGeek is designed to decrease the chain reaction caused by light and heat and preserve the oil freshness. 

 

Clean and modern, FreshGeek is ergonomically designed to fit perfectly in one hand. Place it on the dining table, kitchen cabinet, pantry, or take it camping or to your friends' place to make sure dinner will be safe.

 





 

Gai Xia Technology (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. was established in 2015, incubated in Shanghai Rongs' Health Industry Co., Ltd. Gai Xia commits itself to implementing the Rongs’ long-term strategy of pursuing high quality edible oil. Conforming to the wave of mobile Internet and intelligent hardware, a lot of talents in fields of electronic hardware, computer software, health care, brand marketing etc, have been attracted by Gai Xia to provide families with a scientific solution to oil use in a healthy way.
Fresh Geek, the brand of Gai Xia Technology concentrates on exploring the food technology, which can lead a healthy life. As the first generation of intelligent oil bottle came to the public, it was recommended by many technology and lifestyle media. Fresh Geek is known as the first brand initiating the concept of Freshness Index in Edible Oil and makes it possible to monitor household oil consumption.

 


 

F1 How my oil consumption calculated? The integrated three-axis sensor placed within the cap will calculate oil consumption and show it on the companion app.
F2 How long should the cap last with daily use?Based on our test, the cap can be used for over 5000 times.
F3 Will the battery corrode after long time storage in the kitchen?The battery compartment is sealed design to prevent moisture and air. 
F4 How to clean it?The body can be washed with water, and the cap can be cleaned with sponge and soft cloth.
F5 Will the oil leak to the outside?FreshGeek comes with a leak-proof pourer design to prevent spillage.
F6 Are they BPA free?Yes, the body is made of glass and the cap is made of food-grade PE and 304 stainless steel.

story:
Who We Are

Mountain Willow Co. was founded by an all female team of mountain-dwellers from Park City, Utah, with a deep love of combining yoga with aromatherapy and herbs, Mountain Willow Co. has come to fruition with a lot of love and hard work! This company is full of women who have worked hard at becoming experts in their field, whether it be yoga, aromatherapy or herbal remedies and healing. Bringing that passion into light highlights the power of women and the amazing things we can do.

We want to arm other amazing people with the tools to take care of themselves in ways they didn’t know were possible. We want to bring healing, love, joy, nourishing and creativity to you in a seasonally curated package. We want to help you foster that balance between mind, body, soul and the earth.

With your contributions we will be able to produce curated boxes for you at an affordable cost each season. Since Mountain Willow Co. really is a family, by donating to us, you become a part of that family. We hope that Mountain Willow Co. becomes more than just a subscription box company but also a place where people can go to heal, learn, grow and explore.

Welcome to the tribe Willow Warriors!

 

Your Contribution

When making a contribution, it puts you on the list to receive either a full seasonal box, or some of our products that are included in the box depending on your donation level. Because we are still in the beginning stages of our company, each product you receive is made special for you. We use all organic and safe ingredients that have been tested on people only! Never tested on animals.

If we do not reach our full goal we will still use the funds for the items listed above.

 

Why We're Different

With so many unsustainable, harmful, unmindful products out there we want to source the very best options for alternative healing and health. Mountain Willow's deep love of the power of plants and aromatherapy as well as crystals, herbs, yoga and the magic that connects them is what drives us. We love the connection between mind, body and spirit and with mother nature. We are all connected deeply with the universe and this earth and we want to celebrate that connection and honor it. Plants, aromatherapy, crystals and yoga have a very high vibration and positive energy so bringing those into your life will bring that energy into your home and lifestyle and bring you closer to peace and tranquility and closer to yourself. Helping and healing people is our passion and giving people better alternatives to become the best and healthiest they can be in an all natural and organic way.

 

Your Impact

We’ve done everything we can to budget every little detail of our boxes, to find the best ways to keep things sustainable and inexpensive and fund this little dream on our own. As most of us know, you can do things alone, but it’s much better to do it with friends, that’s why we’re asking you, our family, friend and future friends, to contribute anything you can to help us in our dream.

 

We know that there are many different subscription box companies and it’s hard to see how Mountain Willow Co. might be different. We see this box as an opportunity for people to heal their bodies on the inside and the outside. We hope to expand your body, mind and soul awareness and to help you begin to see how this alignment serves in your life.

 

We appreciate every last dollar that people contribute. It means so much to see people contributing to what we do. We understand that not everyone can donate, but even just reading this and learning about Mountain Willow Co. is so appreciated! Please spread the word and follow our Instagram to keep up with our adventures!

(You can share Mountain Willow’s campaign from this page or just copy and paste the link!)

 

Thank you!

story:
Who We Are:

We are MEDMAR Clinic in Fresno, California.  In December 2008 the City of Fresno issued us a business license to dispense marijuana to patients.  For 7 years we have taken good care of the Medical Marijuana Patients in Fresno's Tower District and surrounding areas.

On February 4 , 2016 a court order was issued.  This order effectively closes all Medical Marijuana Collectives and Delivery Services.  This order is based on Fresno Municipal Code Section 12-306.N.56 prohibiting (but appearing to allow)  medical cannabis in clear violation of the Compassionate Use Act. We need $50,000 for legal expenses and a community advocacy programs to pressure the City of Fresno to allow Medical Marijuana Patients safe access to medication.

There are over 43,000 patients in the Fresno City/County area that will be affected by the closure of all Medical Marijuana Collectives and Delivery Services.  Many of these Patients suffer from terminal and/or severe diseases for which cannabis is the only treatment.  i.e.  glaucoma, cancer, HIV/AIDS, multiple sclerosis                 and epilepsy. 

Our patient testimonial videos say more than words ever could. Without medical cannabis all these people will suffer greatly, and without your kindness our community will completely lose medical cannabis.

What We Need & What You Get

We operate like no other cannabis clinic in the state.  Patient safety and privacy is a priority at MEDMAR Clinic.  The measures we have taken to protect the identity of our patients make Fort Knox look like a Chuck E. Cheese.  Patient information is stored in a highly efficient storage system impervious to any form of electronic attack.  Only the most basic information is collected, unlike other dispensaries which require lengthy questionnaires from first-time patients.

Our patients are seen in private consultation rooms by knowledgeable staff members who ensure they get: the medicine they need, the dose they need, and the dosing method that works best for their condition.  Our CUP "Compassionate Use Protocol" provides Doctor Recommendations and Medication to patients that are otherwise unable to pay.

Why do we need money?  On March 1, 2016 new state law goes into effect. Cities and counties that have not passed and enforced ordinances banning/regulating medical cannabis must do so before this date.  Failure to enact/enforce an ordinance triggers State law regarding medical cannabis.  Under state law, medical cannabis clinics may operate with state oversight.  Fresno has refused to allow medical cannabis clinics to operate within city limits since the introduction of the Compassionate Use Act in 1996, citing an ordinance that is both unconstitutional and in violation of state law.  The city, for reasons we don't fully understand, wants MEDMAR Clinic and every other cannabis clinic/delivery service in Fresno shut down for good.

We need $50,000 in the next Sixty (60) days for legal fees to seek Declaratory Relief from the defective City Ordinance, and Staff Resources.  The estimate for attorney fees is $35,000, and Staff/Resources $15,000.

We are leading a grassroots movement to pressure the city into reversing their decision to allow medical cannabis.  We will be: operating a phone bank; making flyers; appearing at city hall; speaking at city council meetings; and, campaigning on social media.  We can only hold out for so long before the reality of life means the staff will need to move on and the Medical Marijuana Patients are without recourse. 
A donation of any amount will mean that the future of Medical Marijuana is still possible in the City of Fresno.  Additionally, your donation will make the difference between safe access to safe medicine and a lifetime of pain and agony for 43,000 medical cannabis patients in Fresno County.

The Impact

Because of MEDMAR Clinic over Forty thousand cannabis patients in City/County of Fresno can safely access their medicine.  This Medicine is dispensed in a safe, and comfortable setting by a knowledgeable, and professional staff. Your contribution will not only save our collective, it will set the foundation that allows all medical cannabis clinics in the City/County of Fresno to re-open.

In December 2008 the City of Fresno issued a Business License for Genesis 1:29 dba Synergistic Cannabinoids dba MEDMAR Clinic.  Next, the City of Fresno gave us approval to operate a Medical Marijuana Clinic in the Tower District of Fresno.

Shortly thereafter, the City of Fresno claimed that they had issued the Business License, and had given us permission to operate from the Business Tax Licensing Division, Planning and Development Department, Tower District Commission, and Fresno Police Department, "by mistake."

James Sanchez, Fresno City Attorney vowed to close us "by whatever means necessary whether they are operating legally, or not."  James Sanchez, Fresno City Attorney  (Fresno City Hall Press Conference January 2009)

In August 2009, the City  of Fresno served a "Complaint for Public Nuisance", and arrested/incarcerated me for a Civil Complaint.  I've been arrested for this so many times in the City of Fresno my Attorney does not know the actual number.

We have been fighting this attack in Court since August 2009.  The Seven (7) year legal battle officially expanded on February 4, 2016 when the Fresno County Superior Court erroneously ruled in favor of Marijuana Collective Closures.  We were informed that were we to dispense marijuana, the Staff would be arrested, the Patients would be arrested, and the medication and Patient information would       be confiscated.

 Destroying MEDMAR Clinic, as well as, all other Medical Marijuana, Collectives, means that the City of Fresno has met the enforcement requirements of the State law.  This means that the illegal City ordinance, a de facto ban of Medical Cannabis, will remain in effect forever.  Over 43,000 medical Cannabis Patients, many of whom are unable to walk, or get out of bed, will be forced to travel long distances, out of Fresno County, to obtain their medication.

For many patients, this means no more medicine.  It means spending thousands of dollars a month on prescription medications with extremely unpleasant side effects.  It means pain and discomfort.  For some this means suffering and death.


Risks & Challenges


I'll be frank, the situation looks grim...  Dispensaries are closing their doors all over Fresno County.  The March 1st deadline is rapidly approaching and we are doing what many say can't be done; fight City Hall!

The City of Fresno has been fighting us and other collectives for almost a decade, and it hasn't ever been an easy fight..  Too many good people are serving prison sentences because they tried to do what we are doing.

Your donations WILL make the difference.  With money to pay our legal team, and to cover the expenses of our grassroots political movement and take care of our wonderful staff.  Together, we can make sure we're able to take care of our Patients for decades to come.


Other Ways You Can Help


If you don't have a credit card, and you still want to donate, please send a money order to Rick Morse @ 334 E. Olive Fresno, CA 93728.  We will deposit the money order into the assigned Bank Account.  Give us your e-mail so we can thank you.
Tell your friends and family.  Share the campaign on Twitter and Facebook.  Talk about it with your co-workers.  Speak to your City Council Representative.  Spread the word far and wide, however you can.

Get involved!  We need people in Fresno and around the world to put pressure on the Fresno City Council.  It can be as simple as sending an e-mail, or making a phone call.  If you are interested in becoming an advocate feel free to contact us at:
MEDMAR Clinic @ 334 E. Olive Fresno, California 93728 (559)442-8420,  E-mail is medmarclinic@att.net, Facebook is Medmar Clinic Fresno, Twitter is to be announced.  James Gunning, our Social Media Coordinator will provide you with the information you will need to get started.

Call the City of Fresno at (559) 621-8000 and voice your opinion.

Esmeralda Soria
Councilmember District 1

District1@fresno.gov

Steve Brandau 
Councilmember District 2

District2@fresno.gov

Oliver L. Baines III
Councilmember District 3

District3@fresno.gov

Paul Caprioglio
Councilmember District 4 

District4@fresno.gov

Sal Quintero 
Councilmember District 5

District5@fresno.gov

Lee Brand 
Councilmember District 6

District6@fresno.gov

Clint Olivier 
Councilmember District 7

District7@fresno.com

It really can't be overstated, spread the word. Tell your friends, your family, share the campaign on social media, whatever it takes to get this campaign visibility. People can't donate if they don't know about us!  

                Thank you...

story:
Hello family, friends and supporters!

My goal is to compete as a powerlifter for Lithuania in 2016 IPF World junior powerlifting championship in Texas. My dream since childhood was to visit the United States, to see beutiful nature and cities. I have been training at the "Big Z" sports club in Vilnius, Lithuania for the last two years.

I am getting ready for a very crucial and exciting year in my powerlifting career, and I could really use Your support!

However, the journey fees come at a high cost and it is quite difficult to save money while studying part time and dedicating myself to numerous hours of hard training.

I am asking for Your help to raise the funds, which will cover my journey to World Powerlifting championhips, in Killeen, Texas

Without the support that I get from my family and friends, I wouldn't be where I am today. Please help me reach the next level of my powerlifting career by donating what you can and help me on my road to world


Achievements:
2012 World sub-junior powerlifting championship (2 place) 74kg cat.
2013 European junior powerlifting championship (6 place) 74kg cat.
2013 World junior benchpress championship (7 place) 74kg cat.

2014 European junior powerlifting championship (4 place) 74kg cat.

2014 World Junior powerlifting championship (5 place) 74kg cat

2015 European junior powerlifting championship (4 place) 74kg cat.

2015 World junior powerlifting championship ( 3 place) 74kg cat.



I Thank You in advance for any support You send my way.
Please share, and support!
