story:
Well, hello! I'm absolutely blessed to have you here at this moment.
Let me start by introducing myself, my goals, my passions and my family to you... My name is Shealynn August and I raise two children (Landon Elijah age 8 and AnnaLee Grace 3).
I am currently starting a new journey with my children in two different ways, 1- homeschooling and 2 - a new business launch!  I am passionate about the environment, health, home and body!
I have, over the years, become conscious of many different aspects of our life, home and how I raise my children. Safe products being one of them... I have made multiple at home products... many of which worked out and I still do make and have, others not so much.
Some years ago I was in a panick to make my daughter something natural for her sore diaper rash, I came up with a quick concoction and decided after it miraculously worked so well, that I wanted to market the product.  I never got around to it until this past year. I have been brainstorming a list of all organic, non-gmo, environmentally conscious products I would love to share from my  home to yours.
I have supported the organic and non-gmo industry for multiple years and take pride in our home being geared towards all of these companies that provide excellent opportunity to live like so.
I have finally walked through open doors that are allowing me the time and energy to put into starting up and launching my little business which in turn will give from my home to yours - healthy, all organic, non-gmo products made with 100% therapeutic grade essential oils for home, health and body. To help a mother of two, start her passion and journey with further sharing my fervent heart to stay dedicated and devoted to giving families multiple products they can feel safe about and enjoy...
My challenges arise within a single income home, but I do not allow that to stop my dreams and passions. I have met some challenges in getting started, but nothing too much that would stop me from having the ability to accomplish them. Any challenges that arise, God goes before us and has seen all days ahead of us... I give glory to him for the perseverance and courage to maintain my eyes fixed on him as we venture out into our new journey.

Will you join with me this amazing opportunity by investing in my new business, August Sunshine?

All funds will go toward the help of starting this business, such as:
 product purchases, containers, utensils, website, labeling, advertising, extra time to put into this, etc...
I pray God blesses you for any contribution you are able to make. Be blessed my friend! From our home to yours, we thank you with deep gratitude!!

AUGUST SUNSHINE will offer an array of home, health and body products that are not only environmentally safe but safe for your home and family - organic and nongmo, made with 100% therapeutic grade essential oils! Please do not hesitate to contact me to find out more about the product line and what I will offer!

I am currently starting a new journey with my children in two different ways, 1- homeschooling and 2 - a new business launch!  I am passionate about the environment, health, home and body! I have, over the years, become conscious of many different aspects of our life, home and how I raise my children. Safe products being one of them... I have made multiple at home products... many of which worked out and I still do make and have, others not so much. Some years ago I was in a panick to make my daughter something natural for her sore diaper rash, I came up with a quick concoction and decided after it miraculously worked so well, that I wanted to market the product.  I never got around to it until this past year. I have been brainstorming a list of all organic, non-gmo, environmentally conscious products I would love to share from my  home to yours. story:
Every single second, someone in the world has a heart attack. 

Most heart attacks are swift, deadly, and difficult to predict. Without immediate medical attention, the survival rate drops significantly.

Fortunately, we have the solution.

Never Be Alone is a service that we developed based on our patent pending technology, that works with the majority of smartphones and wearable heart rate monitors that constantly keep track of your heart rate. If your heart rate falls out of what is medically acceptable normal range, our application will cause your smartphone to call 911 and notify them of your location using your smartphone's GPS, after giving the user a short interval to reset potentially false alarms.

When you sign up, you will be invited to input your current health conditions, medications, allergies, and other helpful information that 911 personnel will receive, and may want to consider when responding to an emergency.

After 911 is contacted, your smartphone will send a text message to your list of Emergency Contacts. If they are nearby and happen to be able to respond, they will have the option of attempting to come to your location for assistance, For example, they might call 911 and ask if there is anything they can do to help. Typically, this may involve performing CPR, using an AED defibrillator, or simply going to the front door to facilitate the responders in finding you. Why is that important? Well, if CPR and AED are administered within minutes of a heart attack, they can increase your chances of survival of up to 400%.

Yes, you read correctly, CPR and AED, administered within minutes of a heart attack, gives you four times the chance of survival.

Our software can also detect certain conditions that may result in a heart attack, before it occurs. For example, atrial fibrillation can cause your heart rate to rise up to 300 beats per minute, and requires medical attention to prevent your heart from stopping. If your heart rate monitor detects such an event, our application will respond for this emergency and cause your smartphone to summon emergency services immediately.

The best part of Never Be Alone is that it will cause your smartphone to call for help if the user dies from any cause, not just heart attacks. As long as your heart rate monitor and your smartphone function properly, if the user's heart stops beating for any reason, the application will cause your smartphone to call 911 automatically.

If you or a loved one want immediate medical attention in a life-threatening emergency, please contribute now!


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Spread the word using the Indiegogo share tools, visit our Facebook page, and follow us on Instagram and Twitter!

Privacy Policy

    1. Private medical information is just that - private. We never disclose any information you provide us without your express, written permission.
    2. Your medical information is protected by the U.S. Department of Health & Human Services (HHS) under HIPAA.
    3. HIPAA, the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996, requires companies to keep personally identifiable medical information confidential and protect such information from unauthorized use. Read more about HIPAA at www.hhs.gov/hipaa.
    4.  We are dedicated to protecting your information consistently and effectively. We will provide industry-standard SSL encryption of your digital records and immediately report any unauthorized access or distribution of your records to HHS.

story:
MiResource 

The Problem

One in four people are diagnosed with a mental health condition, but finding the right treatment is both complicated and time-sensitive. Information on providers in the mental health sphere is not easily accessible, leaving many without the care they need. 

Our Mission

I lost my sister Shelby to suicide my freshman year of college. With no prior experience in the mental health field, my family struggled to find Shelby the right care. At MiResource, we believe the information on mental health providers should be as accessible as it is for those who treat physical conditions. 

The Solution

MiResource makes finding the right mental health care for yourself and your loved ones simple. Our referral platform generates customized matches that fit the needs and preferences of users. We offer quality control through our different in-house filtering mechanisms and resource vetting done by our partners. This ensures that our user will be matched with the right provider, practicing the best evidence-based treatment for his or her condition.  

How can you help?

As students, we understand that cash can be short, but even small contributions make a huge impact. Share our mission with your friends, family members and schools, and together, we can improve the accessibility of mental health care.

story:
The Rambo Project (aka Ramboland) will be a living laboratory, demonstrating that cities can heal our ecosystems while supporting the lifestyles of our citizens with special needs in a far better and less expensive fashion than we do today.

Meet Ron Rambo, When he’s not working on his dream he’s hanging out at Square One coffee with his motley crew of companions or down at the local farmers market catching up with pals and getting some shopping in.

Ron was born with Cerebral Palsy, as a child this limited his ability to walk and control parts of his body. Since he was a young adult he has been in a wheelchair exclusively and since then has always made do with less than desirable conditions in small city apartments – which he has never been able to modify quite to his needs. Ron is a section 8, low-income renter which further limits his selection of housing – However it turned out the renting program offers a home ownership option. Between the program and a little bit of fundraising we thought we could pull this off.

 That’s how the project started. It happened that Ron’s parents had a small lot of land at the core of the block behind their house in the city, which they were willing to let him build on. Later Ron was introduced to Max, who is a green-oriented architect. Ron understood and liked the idea of a house that would not harm the planet (and maybe even benefit it) and still offer him everything he needs. The Rambo Project (aka Ramboland) was born!

As you can see from Ron’s letter below, there are a lot of programs out there to provide at least minimal support to our citizens with specials needs (although many of them have bizarre and arcane requirements that exclude many), but the amount of bureaucracy and red-tape that those millions of Americans have to go through, and the extent of discrimination and hardship they are subject to is not only torturous, but unnecessary.  As we’ve developed this project we realized that the improvements we need to make in our city’s infrastructure and building systems in the coming decades to achieve true resilience, could also hold some answers to how we might radically improve and extend the lives of some of our most vulnerable citizens. As Ron himself says, this project is just the beginning, pointing the way and hopefully directly leading to upgrading our systems for the benefit of all.


IN-KIND SUPPORTERS 

We have already received incredible support for this project. So far we have received a lot at the core of city block valued at over $100,000; consulting from some of the leading local and national scientists, engineers, designers, and builders totally an estimated $200,000; we have agreed to research and curriculum partnerships with Penn State University, Drexel University, UCLA, Thaddeus Stevens College of Technology, and several more in the works. We have pledges of product donations for water treatment technology, air quality sensors, energy and water meters, building-scale batteries, and many more in the works. Many are seeing the potential of this project, and how capable we are to realize it -- now we just need you to see it too! Please join Team Rambo, give generously, and help make this project a reality!



A Letter from Ron:

Hi Everyone, I’d love to share with you the story behind my housing project...

       I lived at the home of my parents, Joyce and Donald Killian, until 1997 when I was 36 years old.

After I moved into Lancaster House North on North Prince Street in 2003, I won a lottery to get on the waiting list for a portable section 8 housing voucher. After re-applying every year for 5-years I finally got notice that I was eligible for the voucher back in August of 2009.

I started looking for an apartment with my new voucher, but it would not be an easy pursuit as I had no luck in finding an apartment right away or a landlord willing to rent to me. For example, in the case of one apartment the housing authority said it cost $50 too much a month and the landlord would not reduce the rent and let me pay the remainder out of pocket. I continued searching for an apartment with no luck at all.

The housing authority has a time limit for the housing search and I had to apply for extensions until they told me I was out of the program because my time was up. To get back in I had to request a reasonable accommodation to remove the time limit for the search.

       As soon as I got back into the program, I found a great landlord but not the best apartment. I decided to take it anyway, and this is where I am now. The bathroom is not wheelchair accessible and the front door is difficult and dangerous as it is up a set of concrete stairs. Eventually, I had a ramp built so I can access the apartment from the rear door, but the bathroom is still too small for me to get in and out of the shower safely. Once a person is a section 8 renter for a year, they can apply for a home ownership program through Tabor’s Family Self Sufficiency (FSS) program. When I asked for an application Tabor said I was not eligible to apply because I would not be able to fulfill their work requirement.  I told Tabor that I knew that HUD does not put that restriction on people with disabilities in the federal regulations for the home ownership program. Tabor said they only knew what the housing authority told them.

       So I requested another reasonable accommodation from the housing authority to waive the work requirement. Despite that, Tabor still did not change their rules but the housing authority decided to allow me to bypass the FSS program completely in order to allow me to participate in the home ownership program. Tabor did give me a credit counseling session and I completed the Lancaster Housing Opportunity Partnership (LHOP) classes in October 2010, making me officially in the Section 8 home ownership program.

       I did much research on finding an old city property and retro-fitting it for wheelchair access until one day when my mom said, “too bad you can’t find an architect and build your own place on the lot out back.” On East Mifflin St. behind my parent’s house on East End Avenue is an undeveloped lot that my parents own. So I decided to take her up on her offer and started looking for an architect.

My search for a qualified architect ended when through my aide and landscaper, Brandon Sheetz, I made the acquaintance of Max Zahniser, an architect, green building consultant and educator. Since I have met Max, we have put together a group we are calling Team Rambo.

       The Team assembled by our process facilitator, Max, has been working pro bono to design and build me a home on the Mifflin Street lot. With this house we are creating a regenerative water system,  pushing toward radical accessibility, LEED Platinum and Living Building Challenge certification, a no-mow regenerative/permacultural landscape design, on-site energy production, pristine indoor air quality, other occupant health and comfort best-practices, and to the extent possible, using reclaimed, salvaged, and local building materials.

I’m so grateful for all that everyone on Team Rambo have done so far, and humbly request that you help them fully realize the fruits of their labor, and take this project to construction, so it can serve as a research and education tool, and a demonstration of an alternative to our entrenched special needs bureaucracy and the incredibly damaging way we develop human habitats.

Thanks for your time and best wishes to you,

Ron R Rambo

story:
As we progress on our journey promoting shooting sports in Ghana we need your support to achieve qualification for the Olympics in 2020, via the Commonwealth Games in 2018.

Since our inception in 2012 we are proud of our achievements – many being firsts for the African continent. We now have competitors at junior and senior levels, disabled and able bodied male and female, pistol, rifle and shotgun, and we soon aim to facilitate air pistol/rifle competitors.

In 2014 we travelled to Scotland and competed in the Commonwealth Games; a fantastic experience for our athletes. This was made possible, in the main, through fantastic support from our sponsors. These sponsors were mainly oil industry related and, by consequence of the crisis in oil prices, sponsorship has understandably decreased dramatically. Our current existence is based on sporadic support from sponsors, a trickle of membership fees and the fantastic personal support of our chairman. We have to be realistic though and accept that won't get us to Tokyo.

This is where you come in. With your support we can do it. Around the world associations like ours can rely on massive sponsorship, governmental support and funding streams we can’t even begin to imagine. As a developing country we don’t attract such support, but why should our athletes not have the opportunity to compete at the highest level? Imagine how you would feel watching the opening parade of the Tokyo 2020 Olympics, knowing you directly helped make that happen.

Please help us on our quest.

Will you help us?

To qualify for Tokyo we need to compete in several “qualifying” competitions in the next 4 years. None of these will be in Ghana, therefore costs to us are massive. Attending the Commonwealth Games in 2018 will also be a major milestone, however impossible without your support. A short time ago, our rifle shooters couldn’t train because we couldn’t afford to import the ammunition required. We sincerely hope that each and every one of you who will support us can see how pivotal you are in our dream. Without you it won’t happen. Please support us, we will make you proud.

How else can I help?

Your support to us, no matter how large or small, is massive to our cause. If financial support isn't possible you can still be very much part of our team by letting as many people as you can, know of our appeal through whatever means be it word of mouth or social media.

As we take part in the Tokyo 2020 Olympics we will hold dear each and every one of you who made it possible.

As Ghanaians would cordially say "you are invited". Please be a very appreciated, important and significant  part of our dream.

story:
VIVOGRAPH  smartwatch Polygraph

You have smartwatch Vivograph and you receive information about your emotional response to any events and actions around you in the real-time mode.

When your boss sets a task, your Vivograph will tell you how important is it for you. If you get a rise of positive emotions, it means you were interested. Go straight ahead to perform the task, the success is there for you.

 

You receive a report about a task fulfilled, and the Vivograph will tell you how much the performers were interested in doing it. Your emotional state is stable, then, all these were just routine activities.

 

You socialize and communicate, you obtain information from external sources - in all these cases the VivoGraph will tell you how important the information is for you. If you fail to fully understand something, or somebody holds back the whole truth from you, or is trying to cheat you, you might be able to understand it on the back you your mind, and the Vivograph will confirm or reject your doubts in the form of emotional peak.

 

Your body reacts to any external factors with certain changes (skin conductivity, pulse rate, blood pressure level, etc.). Vivograph sensors capture these changes.

 

SENSORS & COMPONENTS

 

 

Enjoy your life responsibly and Vivograph will notify you in advance about any emotional or physical changes in your body on the basis of the data from the built-in sensors.

 

IDPP - Intellectual Data Processing Program

Sensors readings are processed by a unique software called IDPP (Intellectual Data Processing Program) developed specially for the Smart Watch Vivograph.

IDPP allows the built-in sensors to control your psychological state. IDPP makes the Vivograph adjust to your body and identifies deviations in chosen sensors readings, it registers the data on the memory card together with time and location coordinates. Then it allows you to analyze these data.

VIVOGRAPH has five basic functions which work using data from different sensors. With IDPP, you can choose sensors that will be activated to employ the function you need. You can choose how often the sensors are read, they can be read continuously or with a given periodicity. You can specify at what value of readings deviation the frequency of sensors reading will increase. You can set up the maximum deviations of the sensors readings at which VIVOGRAPH will give you a warning. 

Most important, the IDDP allows you creating new unique functions taking into account your body’s unique features. You can choose certain sensors and readings which you want to track during a given interval or in relation to physical or psychological load. 

While you’re watching a movie, reading a book, listening to a lecture, just pick the sensors which determine your emotional state so you can see the subconscious response of your body to the information you get.

When doing physical activity, you can track the basic indications of your body in real time via certain sensors: heart beat rate and its changes in time, changes in blood pressure, how much oxygen is in your blood and the temperature of the body etc.

Sensors readings are taken at a certain frequency. When sensor readings significantly deviate from a normal value the frequency of readings increase for more detailed tracking of dynamics. If the readings get into the “red zone” which you can set manually, the IDPP will inform you by sound or vibrating signal or by an SMS to three pre-set phone numbers.

 

IDPP - controls basic functons

 

VIVOGRAPH APP

IDPP can be set up directly through the Vivograph menu or on the smartphone with help from the mobile app 

 

 You can use the VIVOGRAPH just like a smartphone

 

Recharging VIVOGRAPH is easy and simple

 

 

 

​Besides, we offer an optional VIVOGRAPH KIT which you can use to check the honesty of a person you’re talking with

 

 

 

Main features of the VIVOGRAPH

Modeling the VIVOGRAPH prototype

 

COMPARE WEARABLES

 

Available for ordering in Three Sizes & Five Colors

  • Size Small      5.4" – 6.5" or 137 – 165 mm
  • Size Large      6.3" – 7.7" or  160 – 195 mm
  • Size X-Large  7.5" – 8.9" or  190 – 226 mm

 

We suggest you Five Colors to choose from

 

Our Team

We are united by the idea of creating a unique and innovative wearable device to monitor health.

Our team of diverse professionals (psychologists, IT specialists, electronic engineers) has 10 years and more of experience in the respective fields. The team worked together for a long time and refined the polygraph, also known as lie detector. 

We have vast practical experience proven by tests with positive results and supported with confessions. 

We have developed several types of small-sized detectors. We have created several versions of unique software that allows quick assessment of a person's psycho-physiological state on the basis of bio-sensors readings.

Small-sized detectors with bio-sensors allows not only verify the tested persons honesty, but also to estimate his or her emotional tiredness and physical readiness of the body to perform assigned tasks.

On the basis of our accumulated experience we have developed a wearable polygraph in the form of smart watch - VIVOGRAPH. This device allows its owner to track his/her psycho-physiological state and to control emotions under certain important circumstances.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How does Vivograph work?​
A: Vivograph has built-in biometric sensors that can detect variations in heart rate, respiration and perspiration rates and skin conductivity. These are all direct indicators of someone's emotional state. Different emotions are matched to biometric signal patterns detected over time, which are then correlated with other types of data such as activity levels, calendar events, and location. This information is all processed by the Intellectual Data Processing Program to give you personalized and actual guidance regarding your physical and emotional state.

Q: What is IDPP?
A: Intellectual Data Processing Program allows you to adjust your Vivograph to take in consideration your particular physical peculiarities and then inform you of any emotional or physical stresses in the most precise way. IDPP gathers data from the sensors and performs processing and comparison of the data against the adjusted settings. Thus, IDPP makes your Vivograph personalized.

Q: How and where I can adjust the IDPP?
A: You have several options. IDPP may automatically tune itself for your body's specific characteristics. You can also choose and adjust any function from Vivograph menu and adjust as you wish. You can use the Vivograph mobile app and adjust the IDPP from your smartphone, or you can directly connect your Vivograph to a PC, or a laptop, and make the necessary adjustments with the help of Vivograph application.

Q: How long does it take to adjust my Vivograph's IDPP?
A: Under normal circumstances, with no emotional or physical stress, adjustments will take no longer than twenty minutes. Then you will have to confirm sensors' readings. You can return to the manufacturers' settings at any time and repeat the sensors adjustments for IDPP.

Q: How often the sensors readings are taken?
A: The smaller the deviation of actual reading from the average-set value, the less the readings frequency will be. Reading's frequency is determined by the IDPP, according to an actuated function. You can also set the frequency manually or decide over specific sensors readings you want to track.

Q: Can I track readings of a certain sensor?
A: Yes, with help from IDPP you can select one or several certain sensors and their readings will be taken at a frequency set by you.

Q: Can I use the Vivograph only as a Smartwatch?
A: Of course, you can. Insert a SIM-card and switch off the IDPP. You will be able to call and text, to shoot video and photographs.

Q: How does Vivograph connect to my smartphone?
A: Vivograph syncs with your smartphone via Bluetooth SMART (low energy). The wearable works in conjunction with the Vivograph mobile app, which is compatible with both iOS and Android. 

Q: What's the difference between Vivograph and other hi tech wearable?
A: Most wearable products focus on physical conditions only (e.g. measuring your heart rate, calculating your physical load) or tend to serve only one specific purpose (eg. analyse your breathing patterns). Vivograph employs the most advanced sensing technology in combination with state-of-art IDPP algorithms to figure out a complex view of your wellbeing (both emotional and physical) and give your data added "life context". Emotions are known to be a major factor influencing your physical health and generally all other aspects of life.

Q: What is the SMART EMOTIONS POLYGRAPH function?
A: With this function on, you may monitor your own emotional response on questions you answer. This will help you understand which questions cause the most intensive reaction and you can determine, for example, some topics that you will not want to discuss with a stranger, or, maybe you will want to go through these topics with your psychologist.

Q: Why do I need to watch my STRESS LEVEL?
A: Probability of stress situation occurrence directly depends on severity of emotional and physical stresses. Vivograph will tell you when it is necessary to take a break, relax and have some rest.

Q: Is Vivograph a medical tool?
A: No, Vivograph is not really a medical tool. Sensors readings and information from Vivograph may be used as an advice from a specialist. However, in case of health problems you need to see a physician.

Q: Can I show the Vivograph data to a physician or a psychologist?
A: Yes, it is your right. You can connect the Vivograph directly to a computer and transfer the data, or you can use the memory card for it.

Q: How accurate are the sensors readings?
A: Relative measurement error of sensors is from 0 to 3 %. Absolute instrument error of the sensors is determined by their manufacturers. We cooperate in order to minimize these errors.

Q: Does Vivograph measure the blood pressure?
A: Vivograph is equipped with a photoplethysmography sensor on the basis of which, and of other sensors the IDPP calculates relative change of blood pressure against average set value within a certain period of time.

Q: What measurement units are used in Vivograph?
A: Vivograph menu supports both US/Imperial and metric units.
You can, for example, select the temperature readings to be shown in Fahrenheit or Celsius, the distance in miles or kilometers, etc.

Q: How long does the battery last?
A: Vivograph can last up to 10 days in the smartwatch mode without charging. It takes about 2 hours to fully charge. Since it uses a Bluetooth Smart (low energy) connection, it will not drain your smartphone battery. IDPP significantly saves the Vivograph battery.

Q: How is Vivograph charged?
A: Vivograph comes with a USB charger which connects to the USB port on the strap's end.

Q: What materials the Vivograph is made of?
A: The Vivograph body is made of high-strength lightweight titanium and aluminum alloy. The silicone wrist strap is hypoallergenic, washable, durable and comfortable.

Q: Is Vivograph water resistant?
A: Vivograph has an ATM rating and it's officially 'splashproof', which means it can resist to usual scenarios like temporarily being under the rain or washing your hands.

Q: Are Vivograph wristbands interchangeable?
A: The bands are currently not interchangeable, as the biometric sensors are built into the band and designed to keep working with you as you move throughout the day.

Q: Is my personal information kept private?
A: We're very much concerned about the privacy of your data. As a user, you are in full control over which data you want to share. Moreover, Vivograph is equipped with a fingerprint sensor and, if it is locked, nobody but you can access the device.

Q: What will my pledge be used for?
A: Your financial contribution will go directly towards tooling and manufacturing the first batch of Vivograph. It will also be used toward the research and development involved in bringing this product to market, including implementing a sustainable product lifecycle. Please see our timeline above to get a more detailed picture of our product roadmap.

Q: How do I pay for shipping and where do you ship?
A: Worldwide shipping available. We collect a small fee in order to support our costs for shipping Vivograph nationally and internationally. 

Q: Why do I need the Emotions Polygraph?
A: This feature will let you track and control your emotional state, strength of your emotional response to different kind of situations, questions, scenes. Also, you can use Vivograph KIT for fun, e.g. run it as a 'lie detector' on your friends.

story:
Who We Are/What We're Doing

LL Corpus Cogere, Inc., is a Florida woman-majority owned company, committed to the innovative design, manufacture, sale, and support of affordable new age physical rehabilitation and wellness equipment, software and services solutions.

Our products are targeted to small and medium healthcare facilities and individuals unable to obtain required rehab and wellness equipment because of high cost, location and / or absent required patient treatment capabilities. 

LL Corpus’s products are conceptualized, formulated and designed within a collaborative effort and career experiences among physicians, physical and occupational therapists, engineering professionals, and former Fortune 100 executives, addressing current healthcare community needs, requirements and expectations. 

What is the IH-GAIT: MINI CLINIC?

The MINI CLINIC is a small foot-print integrated rehabilitation and wellness equipment and software solution for use by ambulatory and non-ambulatory patients, recovering from neurologic and orthopedic conditions and improving quality-of-life for wellness patients.

The MINI CLINIC safely lifts and secures patients, within a body harness, and provides physical and occupational therapy mechanisms, for conducting effective rehabilitation and wellness programs, within one piece of equipment and supports:

  • Positive patient recovery after an injury or a surgical repair, to move from non-weight bearing, to partial to full weight-bearing status.
  • Quality of Life improvement for wheelchair-bound ambulatory patients to conduct upper and lower body exercises.

The MINI CLINIC safely lifts and lowers patients, up to 400 pounds, from sitting to standing position and provide body support while engaged in a wide array of Red Cord, TheraBand, customized exercises and traditional rehabilitation accessories. 

The MINI CLINIC supports a wide range of patient diagnoses and conditions:

Rehabilitation: Stroke, traumatic brain injury, spinal cord injury, cerebral palsy, multiple sclerosis, amputees, and orthopedic injury.

Wellness: Wheelchair-bound patients to improve ‘quality of life’ conditions.

The MINI CLINIC incorporates a remote-control operated motorized patient lifting system that accommodates the vertical displacement of the center of gravity that occurs during normal Gait. When walking, an individual’s center of gravity typically moves through a vertical range from one to four inches, depending on walking speed.

This MINI CLINIC accommodates up to four inches of vertical displacement while maintaining a consistent level of unweighing. The MINI CLINIC provides fall protection and dynamic body-weight support and promote early intensive therapy and supports Standing Therapy for rehabilitation.

Therapy sessions are supported with the LL Corpus Cloud-based Patient-PT Assist Software App that provides a user-friendly E-Chart to manage patient goals, exercises and outcomes, vital signs, body pain points and record patient data and notes, on a digital tablet with Wi-Fi and Microsoft Azure Cloud, on real-time basis. The App also includes a TeleREHAB capability supporting sessions with the patient and therapist in different locations. All therapy sessions are videoed, via the tablet, allowing the therapist to review and evaluate patient exercises and body movements post session.

Patients are provided the opportunity to be immersed in a Virtual Realty scenario during the session to provide a distraction from the physical therapy. 

An occupational therapist may engage the same patient for ADL training using the OT Table Accessory. Mini Clinic presents limitless therapeutic exercises for different medical conditions and level of impairment to achieve individualized goals and outcomes.

A physical therapist, at JSS Medical Center, Mysore India, using MINI CLINIC reported that her stroke patient was able to start an early phase in rehabilitation because of the safe support mechanism it provides to assist the patient in standing and balance therapy, who required a maximum assistance of two persons, with risk of fall or injury. 

MINI CLINIC Prototype Video 

The MINI CLINIC Prototype Video demonstrates patient lifting, lowering, and securing and use of physical therapy exercises with Red Cord equipment. 

 

Who are Key LL Corpus Executives? 

The key company executives are the co-founders: Louise T. Lontoc and Kevin M. O’Sullivan. Both bring an array of vital skills, competencies, experiences and passion to LL Corpus that supports an effective and efficient business start-up and ongoing profitable operations.

  • Louise, a practicing PT, brings 20 plus years of health care and physical therapy patient-centric capabilities and know how.
  • Kevin, a recognized professional and consultant in executive management and governance, business development and technology design, has successfully assisting Fortune 100 businesses, international companies, and start-ups in his business career spanning 35 years.

What is the Genesis of LL Corpus? 

Louise, over the years, has been influenced by the plight of her and colleague experiences working with rehab and wellness patients, as expressed in ‘Pain Points’ that significantly impact cost, availability, safety, outcomes, face time, and productivity. Her passion, over the years, was to mitigate these Pain Points by designing more effective and affordable solutions to improve the potential for patients to successfully achieve their therapy plan goals.

Patient 'Pain Points' & Value Proposition

The disabled and injured encounter an array of problems in obtaining life-altering rehabilitation and wellness treatment including access, affordability, concern for their personal safety, and effectiveness.

The LL Corpus Value Proposition provides affordable and functional-rich, and safe and comfortable rehabilitation and wellness equipment that empowers patients to successfully achieve their therapy plan goals.

Therapist 'Pain Points' & Value Proposition

Therapists are traditionally concerned with patient, caregiver, and their own safety during therapy, and reduced patient face-time and personal productivity, resulting from outdated processes, protocols, and systems.

The LL Corpus Value Proposition provides therapists smart equipment and software that mitigates the potential for patient falls and therapist injury, increased patient-face time, improved productivity, and opportunity to improve patient positive outcomes.

The LL Corpus Team is passionate about providing the Mini Clinic to the countless millions of disabled people, around the world, who are unable to access or purchase an affordable capability-rich rehabilitation equipment for use for themselves or a family member.

What is the LL Corpus Giving-Back Program?

We are dedicated to our Giving-Back Program of donating MINI CLINIC equipment and supporting  services to deserving elderly without resources, disabled US Veterans and rural hospitals in the Philippines and India, who are unable to be obtain life-altering equipment.

Giving is part of our Corporate DNA! 

We truly want to make a difference in the lives of the disabled and severely-injured people by opening a new easy access and affordable channel for obtaining the necessary equipment to return patients to the life that they love.

How can You Help LL Corpus Improve Rehab & Wellness Patient Care?

Our Team is passionate about providing the  MINI CLINIC to the countless millions of untreated and under treated disabled people, around the world, who are unable to access or purchase an affordable capability-rich rehabilitation equipment for use for themselves or a family member.

Please help LL Corpus continue 'to the finish line' develop a truly integrated and effective physical and occupational therapy solution with a contribution to our crowdfunding campaign.

There is no minimum and all contributors will have our eternal gratitude! 

We want to make a difference in the realm of rehabilitation as what we recognize as difficult and impossible. Through MINI CLINIC, physical and occupational therapy will be attainable. Sessions and treatments will now be available, accessible and affordable in rural, urban, impoverished and underdeveloped areas.

After almost three years of planning, market research, design and development of three prototypes and a beta installation at the JSS Medical Center in Mysore India, we are ready to have the Mini Clinic: undergo electrical and safety assessments and certifications, commence initial manufacturing, installation at deserving hospitals in Philippines and India, and continue our research and development of wearable body sensors.

Our Crowdfunding contributions will be used exclusively to fund the critical activities outlined below.

  • Electrical and Safety Certification: Certify that IH-GAIT: MINI CLINIC is following US and EU equipment electrical and safety standards and manufacturing requirements.
  • Initial Manufacturing Run: Manufacture an initial five IH-GAIT: MINI CLINICs for customer installation.
  • Body Sensor Research & Development: Design wearable body sensors to monitor patient vital signs and body part motion during therapy sessions. The data obtained from the sensors will be captured and analyzed within the Patient E-Chart via customized algorithms, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and Cloud technologies.
  • Installation at Hospitals in Philippines and India: Install at two leading hospitals that need physical rehabilitation equipment with the rich capabilities of the MINI CLINIC.

Call to Action: Become a LL Corpus 'Helping Hands'

We invite all physical and occupational therapists, other healthcare community professionals, and fiends and colleagues to become 'Helping Hands' of LL Corpus.

If you sincerely believe that what we are building will increase access to affordable and capability-rich rehab and wellness equipment, please join our effort to help promote LL Corpus in your healthcare and social communities. Spread the word that LL Corpus has a creative new age physical rehab that will make a difference in positive recovery for disabled woman, men and children!

Perks to our amazing contributors include:

All contributors of any amount will be provided a LL Corpus 'Helping Hands' Certificate. 

It would be wonderful if you would contribute, even a modest amount, to our Crowdfunding campaign. If a contribution is not an immediate action, please consider a LL Corpus Face Book ‘Like’ and explore some of the other booster actions shown below.

Our founders, Louise and Kevin are always ready to Chat, email or talk about the exciting current and future and activities of LL Corpus. Reach-out and let’s start a conversation!

Louise – ll@llcorpus.com

Kevin – os@llcorpus.com

You can become a LL Corpus "Helping Hands' with acceptance of one, more or all of the below activities;

IH-GAIT: MINI CLINIC Profile

The MINI CLINIC is a full-featured small foot print rehab and wellness solution designed to assist physical and occupational therapists improve patients’ positive outcomes and recovery for a wide range of medical conditions in one self-contained and integrated equipment and software solution.

The key components of the MINI CLINIC are shown below.

The MINI CLINIC is designed with the functional physical and occupational therapy capabilities that provide for successful use by patients with the below medical conditions.

How does the MINI CLINIC Work?

The MINI CLINIC safely, with remote control, lifts and lowers the patient in a body harness, from a sitting position to standing, thereby, eliminating the physical handling of multiple therapists or caregivers in a secure environment. Focus is on exercise adjustment for musculoskeletal and neurological disorders with Red Cord and ThereBand and other accessories. The use of the MINI CLINIC involves the therapist and patient activities to:

  • Place body harness on patient.
  • Video therapy session.
  • Document and monitor patient therapy session on Mobile App.
  • Lift and lower patient to standing position from and to wheelchair, with Remote Control.
  • Conduct prescribed exercise program with customized exercises.
  • Immerse patient into a pleasing Virtual Reality scenario.
  • Conduct additional exercises with Red Cord and Theraband and other traditional accessories.
  • Conduct occupational training activities with use of OT Table attachment.

LL Corpus PT Supporting Exercises are custom-designed for use with the MINI CLINIC by senior and highly qualified state registered physical therapists with extensive experience in assisting rehabilitation and wellness patients.

There are currently 22 exercises completed and ready for patient use within their PT prescribed rehab or wellness programs. An additional 28 are in development and planned for inclusion in the Exercise Portfolio. They all are supported by an Exercise Guide and Video Instruction Sets.

The LL Corpus exercises support patients obtaining a mentally healthy and positive attitude for continuing their physical therapy program to obtain the planned benefits with much passion.

The use of the exercises, with the MINI CLINIC, generally brings about a level of personal fulfillment whether it be increased ability for patient's, for example, to lift leg up, improved standing tolerance, ability to maintain balance while moving arms and legs, increase in muscle strength and other possible levels of achievement.

Testimonials
story_txt:
Who We Are/What We're Doing
LL Corpus Cogere, Inc., is a Florida woman-majority owned company, committed to the innovative design, manufacture, sale, and support of affordable new age physical rehabilitation and wellness equipment, software and services solutions.
Our products are targeted to small and medium healthcare facilities and individuals unable to obtain required rehab and wellness equipment because of high cost, location and / or absent required patient treatment capabilities. 

LL Corpus’s products are conceptualized, formulated and designed within a collaborative effort and career experiences among physicians, physical and occupational therapists, engineering professionals, and former Fortune 100 executives, addressing current healthcare community needs, requirements and expectations. 
What is the IH-GAIT: MINI CLINIC?

The MINI CLINIC is a small foot-print integrated rehabilitation and wellness equipment and software solution for use by ambulatory and non-ambulatory patients, recovering from neurologic and orthopedic conditions and improving quality-of-life for wellness patients.
The MINI CLINIC safely lifts and secures patients, within a body harness, and provides physical and occupational therapy mechanisms, for conducting effective rehabilitation and wellness programs, within one piece of equipment and supports:

Positive patient recovery after an injury or a surgical repair, to move from non-weight bearing, to partial to full weight-bearing status.
Quality of Life improvement for wheelchair-bound ambulatory patients to conduct upper and lower body exercises.


The MINI CLINIC safely lifts and lowers patients, up to 400 pounds, from sitting to standing position and provide body support while engaged in a wide array of Red Cord, TheraBand, customized exercises and traditional rehabilitation accessories. 
The MINI CLINIC supports a wide range of patient diagnoses and conditions:
Rehabilitation: Stroke, traumatic brain injury, spinal cord injury, cerebral palsy, multiple sclerosis, amputees, and orthopedic injury.
Wellness: Wheelchair-bound patients to improve ‘quality of life’ conditions.
The MINI CLINIC incorporates a remote-control operated motorized patient lifting system that accommodates the vertical displacement of the center of gravity that occurs during normal Gait. When walking, an individual’s center of gravity typically moves through a vertical range from one to four inches, depending on walking speed.
This MINI CLINIC accommodates up to four inches of vertical displacement while maintaining a consistent level of unweighing. The MINI CLINIC provides fall protection and dynamic body-weight support and promote early intensive therapy and supports Standing Therapy for rehabilitation.

Therapy sessions are supported with the LL Corpus Cloud-based Patient-PT Assist Software App that provides a user-friendly E-Chart to manage patient goals, exercises and outcomes, vital signs, body pain points and record patient data and notes, on a digital tablet with Wi-Fi and Microsoft Azure Cloud, on real-time basis. The App also includes a TeleREHAB capability supporting sessions with the patient and therapist in different locations. All therapy sessions are videoed, via the tablet, allowing the therapist to review and evaluate patient exercises and body movements post session.

Patients are provided the opportunity to be immersed in a Virtual Realty scenario during the session to provide a distraction from the physical therapy. 
An occupational therapist may engage the same patient for ADL training using the OT Table Accessory. Mini Clinic presents limitless therapeutic exercises for different medical conditions and level of impairment to achieve individualized goals and outcomes.

A physical therapist, at JSS Medical Center, Mysore India, using MINI CLINIC reported that her stroke patient was able to start an early phase in rehabilitation because of the safe support mechanism it provides to assist the patient in standing and balance therapy, who required a maximum assistance of two persons, with risk of fall or injury. 
MINI CLINIC Prototype Video 
The MINI CLINIC Prototype Video demonstrates patient lifting, lowering, and securing and use of physical therapy exercises with Red Cord equipment. 

 
Who are Key LL Corpus Executives? 
The key company executives are the co-founders: Louise T. Lontoc and Kevin M. O’Sullivan. Both bring an array of vital skills, competencies, experiences and passion to LL Corpus that supports an effective and efficient business start-up and ongoing profitable operations.


Louise, a practicing PT, brings 20 plus years of health care and physical therapy patient-centric capabilities and know how.
Kevin, a recognized professional and consultant in executive management and governance, business development and technology design, has successfully assisting Fortune 100 businesses, international companies, and start-ups in his business career spanning 35 years.

What is the Genesis of LL Corpus? 
Louise, over the years, has been influenced by the plight of her and colleague experiences working with rehab and wellness patients, as expressed in ‘Pain Points’ that significantly impact cost, availability, safety, outcomes, face time, and productivity. Her passion, over the years, was to mitigate these Pain Points by designing more effective and affordable solutions to improve the potential for patients to successfully achieve their therapy plan goals.
Patient 'Pain Points' & Value Proposition
The disabled and injured encounter an array of problems in obtaining life-altering rehabilitation and wellness treatment including access, affordability, concern for their personal safety, and effectiveness.

The LL Corpus Value Proposition provides affordable and functional-rich, and safe and comfortable rehabilitation and wellness equipment that empowers patients to successfully achieve their therapy plan goals.
Therapist 'Pain Points' & Value Proposition
Therapists are traditionally concerned with patient, caregiver, and their own safety during therapy, and reduced patient face-time and personal productivity, resulting from outdated processes, protocols, and systems.

The LL Corpus Value Proposition provides therapists smart equipment and software that mitigates the potential for patient falls and therapist injury, increased patient-face time, improved productivity, and opportunity to improve patient positive outcomes.
The LL Corpus Team is passionate about providing the Mini Clinic to the countless millions of disabled people, around the world, who are unable to access or purchase an affordable capability-rich rehabilitation equipment for use for themselves or a family member.
What is the LL Corpus Giving-Back Program?
We are dedicated to our Giving-Back Program of donating MINI CLINIC equipment and supporting  services to deserving elderly without resources, disabled US Veterans and rural hospitals in the Philippines and India, who are unable to be obtain life-altering equipment.

Giving is part of our Corporate DNA! 
We truly want to make a difference in the lives of the disabled and severely-injured people by opening a new easy access and affordable channel for obtaining the necessary equipment to return patients to the life that they love.
How can You Help LL Corpus Improve Rehab & Wellness Patient Care?
Our Team is passionate about providing the  MINI CLINIC to the countless millions of untreated and under treated disabled people, around the world, who are unable to access or purchase an affordable capability-rich rehabilitation equipment for use for themselves or a family member.
Please help LL Corpus continue 'to the finish line' develop a truly integrated and effective physical and occupational therapy solution with a contribution to our crowdfunding campaign.
There is no minimum and all contributors will have our eternal gratitude! 

We want to make a difference in the realm of rehabilitation as what we recognize as difficult and impossible. Through MINI CLINIC, physical and occupational therapy will be attainable. Sessions and treatments will now be available, accessible and affordable in rural, urban, impoverished and underdeveloped areas.
After almost three years of planning, market research, design and development of three prototypes and a beta installation at the JSS Medical Center in Mysore India, we are ready to have the Mini Clinic: undergo electrical and safety assessments and certifications, commence initial manufacturing, installation at deserving hospitals in Philippines and India, and continue our research and development of wearable body sensors.
Our Crowdfunding contributions will be used exclusively to fund the critical activities outlined below.


Electrical and Safety Certification: Certify that IH-GAIT: MINI CLINIC is following US and EU equipment electrical and safety standards and manufacturing requirements.

Initial Manufacturing Run: Manufacture an initial five IH-GAIT: MINI CLINICs for customer installation.

Body Sensor Research & Development: Design wearable body sensors to monitor patient vital signs and body part motion during therapy sessions. The data obtained from the sensors will be captured and analyzed within the Patient E-Chart via customized algorithms, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and Cloud technologies.

Installation at Hospitals in Philippines and India: Install at two leading hospitals that need physical rehabilitation equipment with the rich capabilities of the MINI CLINIC.


Call to Action: Become a LL Corpus 'Helping Hands'
We invite all physical and occupational therapists, other healthcare community professionals, and fiends and colleagues to become 'Helping Hands' of LL Corpus.
If you sincerely believe that what we are building will increase access to affordable and capability-rich rehab and wellness equipment, please join our effort to help promote LL Corpus in your healthcare and social communities. Spread the word that LL Corpus has a creative new age physical rehab that will make a difference in positive recovery for disabled woman, men and children!
Perks to our amazing contributors include:

All contributors of any amount will be provided a LL Corpus 'Helping Hands' Certificate. 
It would be wonderful if you would contribute, even a modest amount, to our Crowdfunding campaign. If a contribution is not an immediate action, please consider a LL Corpus Face Book ‘Like’ and explore some of the other booster actions shown below.
Our founders, Louise and Kevin are always ready to Chat, email or talk about the exciting current and future and activities of LL Corpus. Reach-out and let’s start a conversation!
Louise – ll@llcorpus.com
Kevin – os@llcorpus.com
You can become a LL Corpus "Helping Hands' with acceptance of one, more or all of the below activities;


IH-GAIT: MINI CLINIC Profile

The MINI CLINIC is a full-featured small foot print rehab and wellness solution designed to assist physical and occupational therapists improve patients’ positive outcomes and recovery for a wide range of medical conditions in one self-contained and integrated equipment and software solution.


The key components of the MINI CLINIC are shown below.

The MINI CLINIC is designed with the functional physical and occupational therapy capabilities that provide for successful use by patients with the below medical conditions.

How does the MINI CLINIC Work? 
The MINI CLINIC safely, with remote control, lifts and lowers the patient in a body harness, from a sitting position to standing, thereby, eliminating the physical handling of multiple therapists or caregivers in a secure environment. Focus is on exercise adjustment for musculoskeletal and neurological disorders with Red Cord and ThereBand and other accessories. The use of the MINI CLINIC involves the therapist and patient activities to:

Place body harness on patient.
Video therapy session.
Document and monitor patient therapy session on Mobile App.
Lift and lower patient to standing position from and to wheelchair, with Remote Control.
Conduct prescribed exercise program with customized exercises.
Immerse patient into a pleasing Virtual Reality scenario.
Conduct additional exercises with Red Cord and Theraband and other traditional accessories.
Conduct occupational training activities with use of OT Table attachment.

LL Corpus PT Supporting Exercises are custom-designed for use with the MINI CLINIC by senior and highly qualified state registered physical therapists with extensive experience in assisting rehabilitation and wellness patients.
There are currently 22 exercises completed and ready for patient use within their PT prescribed rehab or wellness programs. An additional 28 are in development and planned for inclusion in the Exercise Portfolio. They all are supported by an Exercise Guide and Video Instruction Sets.

The LL Corpus exercises support patients obtaining a mentally healthy and positive attitude for continuing their physical therapy program to obtain the planned benefits with much passion.
The use of the exercises, with the MINI CLINIC, generally brings about a level of personal fulfillment whether it be increased ability for patient's, for example, to lift leg up, improved standing tolerance, ability to maintain balance while moving arms and legs, increase in muscle strength and other possible levels of achievement.
Testimonials

story:
Why SafelyMD?

Change, "I wish I could do something to help," to, "I'm glad I was able to help."

Every day, tens of thousands of people are transported to emergency rooms.  And when they arrive, the emergency room staff has to try to piece together a medical profile in order to provide the best possible care.  If the person being rushed to the ER is someone you know and love, you would do almost anything to help.  You would answer questions about medications, allergies and medical conditions.

But how do you know if you are giving the right answers?  Is dad's Carvedilol dosage 12.5 mg or 25 mg?  Does he take it twice a day or once a day?  It's hard to remember everything when you're under extreme stress.  Are you missing something?  And what if you aren't there to answer the questions?

"I need a list of his medications."

We at SafelyFiled have lived through late-night trips to the ER and know how important accurate information is.  As an example, the mother of one of our staff members has such severe allergy to latex that if she is exposed to it, she could die. How would the ER staff know about this life-threatening allergy unless they were told?  Who would tell them if she were unconscious?

Having an accurate medical history available can not only save lives, but can speed up the healing process, reduce the cost of care and prevent medical mistakes. 

That's where SafelyMD comes in.  As shown in the video, if there is a medical emergency, you can make sure, with SafelyMD, that the EMTs and ER staff can get the information they need.

How It Works

SafelyMD follows a simple two step process:

Step 1 - Get your medical data into a secure database.

Step 2 - Give authorized medical personnel access to that database.

Here is how it works:

Step 1 - After you sign up for SafelyMD, simply enter your data in the "Key Emergency Data" form  on the screen.  There are a lot of dropdowns to help.  This information gets stored in our secure database at Amazon Web Services.  You can update the information  at any time.  

Here is a screenshot of a portion of the Key Emergency Data form.

Here is a typical dropdown menu.

 

Step 2 - After you have filled out the form, print a couple copies of the card shown below.  Have your parents or grandparents put one in their wallets and put another one on the fridge in their homes.  That way, if there is an emergency, the EMT's can scan the QR code on the card and access the information you put in the database. It will show up on their smart phones or on their monitors. 

You can also print out a copies of the cards for your own wallet or purse.   That way, in the event a card is lost and you get a call from a hospital that your one of your parents is being admitted, you can read off the name and password on the card to give the hospital access to not only his or her medical data, but legal documents like a healthcare power of attorney or living will.

Go ahead, scan the QR code below to see how it works.

You can update the data without having to reprint the card.

About Us

SafelyFiled.com, LLC, which provides SafelyMD, is a bit unusual for an entrepreneurial  tech company.   Our founders are not young and tech whizzes.  We are, as much as we don't like to admit it, old.   We can't do the coding ourselves, but we suppose that is probably a good thing. What we do bring to the company, aside from seed funding and management, is an understanding of how to make sure the developers design a UX for people who are not digital natives, who need to use reading glasses to see what's on a screen, and who can never remember what those three vertical dots on the top right of a browser are for.

     Who's older?  John or Mark?  Guess our ages.

We also bring our life experiences into the products we design and offer.  We've lived through crises like the death of a parent, rushing a spouse to the hospital in the middle of the night, getting a call from the school that an ambulance is taking a child to the hospital, and getting sick while on vacation in another country.  When looking back on those crises, we've asked ourselves, "What did we need at that time?"  And our products are the answer to that question, both for ourselves and the millions of others in similar situations.

What We Need

We are raising $50,000 or more to do four things.  

  1. Make SafelyMD available for purchase through the Apple Store and Google Play. That will require some modification to our application.
  2. Establish the procedures and enter into contracts to accurately produce and correctly distribute the wearable QR tags.
  3. Make an investment in marketing.  Retaining a social network marketing expert is high our list.
  4. Keep SafelyMD secure.  While we have bank-level security built into the application, we need ongoing monitoring to watch for new threats.

If we don't reach our goal, we intend to invest primarily in our social network marketing campaign.  Since SafelyMD is currently functional, that may enable us to raise enough revenue via sales to invest in the other 3 activities listed above.

What You Get

Perks

We have some perks for anyone participating in our campaign.

By participating in our campaign at the $25 or more level, you get SafelyMD and SafelyFiled products at significant discounts.  SafelyMD currently costs $12 per year.  A $25 contribution gives you 3 accounts.

And the larger your contribution, the greater the savings.  SafelyFiled Family is currently priced at $15 per month or $165 per year.  It lets you store up to 2,500 documents (maximum per- document size of 1 GB). And it includes up to 12 SafelyMD accounts at no extra cost.  A $50 contribution gets you a full year of SafelyFiled Family - a savings of $115.  

If you have a small business, you may want to consider a $100 contribution, which entitles you to a SafelyFiled Pro Lite account, offering 1 TB of storage, 12 included SafelyMD accounts and the ability to share documents with up to 50 others.  The savings add up to $175.

SafelyFiled was recently awarded US Patent # 9,497,173 for its application that enables you to store, share and retrieve both digital and paper documents in one system. By participating in our campaign, you can, for very little cost, experience SafelyFiled's unique features and the most sophisticated sharing functions in the industry.

The Impact

Our mission at SafelyFiled with SafelyMD and our other offerings is to provide useful products to help you help the people you love. Your contribution to enhance SafelyMD impacts the world in three ways.

First, if you have elderly parents or grandparents, or a child or sibling with special needs, knowing that their medical histories are available in an emergency is comforting.  You are helping your family.

Second, while taking care of your parents and grandparents is important, a contribution to help enhance SafelyMD can help improve and reduce the cost of healthcare in the United States. Until Electronic Medical Records are universally available in the US, we are responsible for our own records, and SafelyMD can provide the beginning of the critical information needed to help reduce mistakes, reduce the cost of redundant tests and provide quick access to accurate medical information.  It can make local EMTs more efficient, decreasing the time needed to take care of an emergency.  All this can reduce healthcare costs overall, helping to keep insurance premiums and Medicare and Medicaid expenses under control.  It's a small step, but it is a step in the right direction for our healthcare system.

Third, in addition to helping your family and contributing in a small way to reducing healthcare costs in the US, a contribution to the SafelyMD campaign can help people you barely know or may never meet.  From the elderly couple down the street, to the family with a special needs child on the other side of the country, to the three siblings spread across the world trying to coordinate the healthcare and financial affairs of an elderly parent, your participation in this campaign helps make it easier for each one of us to help others.

Your contribution helps us fulfill our mission to make it easier for our customers to help the people they care about.

Risks & Challenges

Currently SafelyMD and other SafelyFiled products run on the same platform and share the same application.  We may, for a number of reasons, such as security, administration and legal, find it necessary to separate the two, running SafelyMD on a separate and independent platform.  This could potentially increase the effort needed to revise and update the application, increasing costs and detracting from the marketing efforts.

Since security is of paramount importance, it may be necessary to expend more resource in modifying code and procedures to respond to new security threats.

Currently, SafelyFiled and SafelyMD utilize the hosting facilities of Amazon Web Services and run on DynamoDB.  DynamoDB is a proprietary database application that is controlled by Amazon Web Services.  As a proprietary application, SafelyFiled is dependent upon its continued operation in its current form.  Modifications to DynamoDB may necessitate additional coding by SafelyFiled and increase costs associated with the technical activities.

We are aware that others, including Google, have unsuccessfully developed and marketed medical data applications.  And though we believe that our utilization of the QR codes, the patented underlying application, and our marketing focus increase our chances for success, the potential for failure exists as it does in every venture.

How Else You Can Help

If you can't contribute to the campaign, we understand.  There are thousands of very worthwhile causes in the world and nobody can contribute to all of them.  But there is something you can do that will cost nothing more than a minute of your time.

Let the world know about us.

Please help us get the word out about SafelyMD.  If you are on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter or any other social network, please like us or post a link to our Indiegogo page and say a few words about why SafelyMD might be important to someone.

Remember, SafelyMD just might help save the life of someone important to you.

story:
Women wear makeup to suit their moods and surroundings. It offers confidence, highlights features, covers blemishes, and presents a flawless look appropriate for the chosen activity.

But what about exercise?

Working out with a clear face is certainly the best option, however, for the first time in history, large groups of people are working out together and are serious about engaging healthy routines. Having spent considerable time working with companies in the beauty industry, Gianmarco noticed first hand during one of his gym sessions that women don’t like to give up a touch of makeup even while working out.

This is when he rushed to Laura, a friend who loves beauty products and also enjoys a healthy lifestyle. She quickly became excited about the idea: it was time the industry began offering cosmetics designed for women’s active lifestyles:

Our mission is very clear, concise and ambitious: become the world’s number 1 cosmetics brand for women that embrace an active lifestyle. We plan to start this journey of building our brand by launching on Indiegogo our first makeup line for active women.

You may be wondering what our name means?

HIIT is an acronym, that stands for High Interval Intensity Training, a form of exercise which has gained massive popularity worldwide. It describes the energy behind the brand and the personality of our customers.

HIIT training is all about short burst of intense exercise to achieve goals such as weight loss, endurance and strength building. It is a proven and energetic way to make transformations that lead to long term success.

Our first product line is Keep Moving. The name celebrates all women that take time in their busy days to achieve the benefits of working out and to all that are at the start of their journey.

Whether you already keep moving in a sweat drenched HIIT session, push yourself in the gym, run, climb, dance or stretch in a yoga class, we’ve got you beautifully covered.

***ALL OUR PRODUCTS ARE PARABENS FREE AND CRUELTY FREE, NEVER TESTED ON ANIMALS***

FOR CONFIDENTIALITY REASONS, WE CANNOT DISCLOSE OUR FULL INGREDIENTS LIST AT THIS STAGE. IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS, PLEASE CONTACT US DIRECTLY AND WE WILL BE GLAD TO ANSWER ANY QUERY

Crowdfunding has made the world a better place. It has helped thousands of creators, investors, dreamers and entrepreneurs turn ideas into reality.

Thanks to the kindness shown by backers across the globe, many start-up projects have become established businesses. 

We chose Indiegogo because it will allow us to raise the necessary backing to get HIIT Cosmetics started but also getting early adopters and backers closely involved so we can shape together our future direction.

When you select one of our perks, you become one of the first early adopters of HIIT Cosmetics. You will have the opportunity to try our awesome products, provide us with precious feedback and help us improve our current line and plan for future product launches. You will be helping to create the products that you want to have.

***ANYONE BACKING OUR CAMPAIGN FOR $89 OR MORE WITHOUT CHOOSING ANY OF OUR PERKS WILL STILL ENTER THE HALL OF FAME!***

Our first range of products is almost ready to launch. It has been a long journey from that moment in the gym until today. We have completed intense research and development, discovered what our target audience wants and created a new line of products that will exceed the expectations of early adopters and backers worldwide.

We will never be able to stress the importance that your backing will have. What we will do is respect your contribution and endeavour to everything possible to achieve success:

Our team represents the perfect synergy of passionate individuals that bring together expertise in all key areas necessary to take HIIT Cosmetics from successful crowdfunded project to established brand in the future. If you have any questions before or after backing our project, check out our FAQs below or you can email directly Gianmarco and he will reply to all enquiries promptly.

Through our extensive research, we have learned what defines an active lifestyle that leads to the benefits and well-being that the targeted demographic wants to enjoy. This can be summed up in our 3 foundational pillars:

Active women want to look good and feel confident when exercising. They choose outfits that they wouldn’t wear anywhere else, for the gym, exercise classes, running and other activities.

The first products that we are releasing here on Indiegogo will be our Keep Moving line. Keep Moving will offer women all the benefits our research has shown they desire from a cosmetics line designed for exercise.

Women living a healthy lifestyle are just as selective about what they apply to their skin as they are about what food they eat. Our team is always on the hunt to meet this criterion. Our plan is to continue this research and development long term to find even more solutions.

When you back us, you are helping to fund these new discoveries.

We will always strive to make our packaging is as practical as possible and that our products have the coolest textures we can provide.

These 3 pillars shape our core values and identity. They define where our brainstorming begins and where our research and development takes us. It is from this starting point that new products are created and launched. We will ALWAYS work our hardest and try make sure all products can incorporate ALL 3 pillars.

Our brand ambassadors are early adopters and strong supporters of our new brand. They embody all of our 3 pillars and strongly believe in our products and ambition to create a world-class brand and company for women just like them.

Where are your products made?

Our products are exclusively Made in Italy, a production epicentre of class and expertise in many industries and certainly in the cosmetics space. 

What is special about your cosmetics? Why would I preorder your products?

The beauty industry is packed with existing products on the market. We found out that many women find this frustrating and certainly confusing and overwhelming. This is also where we perfectly come in - we want you to avoid the famous paradox of choice. We have managed to pack as many features that active lifestyle women look for in a few products and we plan to do much more in the future, we are just at the start!

When can I receive my products?

If we hit at least 50% of our set target, we estimate to ship your products by end of October. All backers will be constantly kept up to date on the progress of our campaign and perk production/fulfilment. We encourage all backers, whether it be before or after the backing process to contact us.

Where does the backing money go?

Your backing, no matter how big or small is impactful. Your backing will go mainly towards bulk producing our first line of products, along with covering other costs which are key to start off any brand in any sector. Please check out our "How Your Backing Will Help Us" to have an estimated breakdown of how we are going to use the funds raised.

How do I pick my shade?

To begin with, we are launching the shades that are most popular on the market. We are pretty confident one of the three both for BeBrave BB Cream and Fee Light Foundation will suit your needs. Lashflex mascara only comes in one shade. Please refer to our "Shade Finder" section but if you have any questions, feel free to get back to us.

Do I get free shipping?

Any perk at above $50 gets free worldwide shipping.  For lower priced perks, we have affordable shipping rates of $6 within the EU and $11 for the rest of the world.

It is important to note that backers are responsible for paying local taxes on any products received. Our products are shipped from the EU.

I am still not sure, what should I do?

If none of the above answers your questions or satisfies your curiosity, we strongly encourage you to message Gianmarco directly and he will be honoured to answer any of your questions at any time.
story_txt: Women wear makeup to suit their moods and surroundings. It offers confidence, highlights features, covers blemishes, and presents a flawless look appropriate for the chosen activity.But what about exercise?Working out with a clear face is certainly the best option, however, for the first time in history, large groups of people are working out together and are serious about engaging healthy routines. Having spent considerable time working with companies in the beauty industry, Gianmarco noticed first hand during one of his gym sessions that women don’t like to give up a touch of makeup even while working out.This is when he rushed to Laura, a friend who loves beauty products and also enjoys a healthy lifestyle. She quickly became excited about the idea: it was time the industry began offering cosmetics designed for women’s active lifestyles:Our mission is very clear, concise and ambitious: become the world’s number 1 cosmetics brand for women that embrace an active lifestyle. We plan to start this journey of building our brand by launching on Indiegogo our first makeup line for active women.You may be wondering what our name means?HIIT is an acronym, that stands for High Interval Intensity Training, a form of exercise which has gained massive popularity worldwide. It describes the energy behind the brand and the personality of our customers.HIIT training is all about short burst of intense exercise to achieve goals such as weight loss, endurance and strength building. It is a proven and energetic way to make transformations that lead to long term success.Our first product line is Keep Moving.
