story:
Our Story

The Movement Sanctuary was formed behind one common theme:  the passion for movement and sharing it with others.  We know that through movement you bring happiness to all aspects of your life, our vision is to create an innovative training space that inspires people from all walks of life to connect, collaborate and have fun. 

Our warehouse in Downtown St Pete has received countless hours of love and labor from a diverse group of people in our community who deserve to see this vision come into its fullest expression. This is why we need you!   It has been a privilege and honor to have the opportunity to cultivate a thriving community focused on well-being.

Please consider donating to The Movement Sanctuary, in support of your fellow movers and shakers, so that they may share, grow and shine in a safe space. 

 

 

What we need to grow:

We've covered the bare bones to get started (thanks to our 'Cinco de Acro' Fundraising Festival and a small private loan), however we need your contributions to help transform this old artist warehouse into a superior training center and performance space for everyone to enjoy (in Air Conditioning)!

On top of a commercial air conditioning unit, we need to purchase equipment for the gym to accommodate different disciplines and to ensure safety of our students.  

To expand our vision,  we will need funding for the following projects and necessities:

  • Air Conditioning ($22,000 after installation)
  • Electrical Work ($4,000 with labor, right now fuses are blown constantly)
  • Raw materials & tools for facility improvements, like a new bathroom! ($7,000)
  • Lighting ($4,500 after installation)
  • Fun stuff: Aerial Silks, Mobility Tools, Juggling Toys & Rigging ($2,500+)
  • Additional crash mats, a rotating twisting belt, spotting blocks ($3,500+)
  • Ninja Warrior Obstacles ($2,000)
  • Sound system ($1,000)
  • Stage Costs: building materials, lighting, safety lines ($2,000+)
  • Have kiddo insurance so we can hold Kids Cirque Classes in the future! (Approximately $2,500 for the year)

Additionally, we will use these funds to get our non-profit off the ground and running. The focus of our non-profit is to bring yoga, meditation, juggling and Acroyoga into the school system and beyond.

 

Perks for your contribution:

Local or around the globe, you can experience The Movement Sanctuary too!

All of our monthly Membership Packages are 20% off for our Indiegogo Contributors -- with this contribution, you will be locked into that rate for 1 year!

Local Options:

  • Base Membership/Open Gym Membership: this gives you unlimited access to our facility during operational hours to practice on your own. 
  • Base Membership +1 / +2 / +3 / +4 / +5 Classes Per Week:  Each week, choose from our variety of classes to elevate your skill set.  You can choose 1-5 classes per week depending on your level of membership.  This level of membership includes our "Base" membership, so you can practice on your own PLUS have one or more structured classes as part of your practice.
  • Unlimited Membership: unlimited open gym and classes! 
  • Private Lessons: With this contribution, you plus one other person can have a one-on-one experience with one of our Movement Sanctuary instructors of your choice!  Whether you've done acro for years, or it's your very first day, training with a personal coach will 

Non-Local options: for those who would like to support The Movement Sanctuary, but live somewhere else on the globe!

  • T-shirts
  • Stickers
  • Handmade Handstand Blocks
  • Custom Handstand Canes
  • Juggling Balls
  • Video content packed with tips & techniques from our TMS Instructors.  We have three options available, buy one or buy all three! 
    • Therapeutics with Chris Kirchman
    • Acrodance with Aaron Tremper & Juliette Lauer
    • Acro101 with Erin Yonke & Jessica DeLeo

 

Options for private events, performances & workshops in your city!

  • Host a private event at The Movement Sanctuary!  Have your company's Holiday Party here, host your 50th Birthday Party in a cool warehouse or have a concert in our space -- whatever you can dream of we can make it happen.  We will provide the space and assist with coordinating the catering, beverages, rentals & cleanup -- PLUS you can have cirque-style performances at your event!  
  • Hire a performance for your event!  We have a huge ground of talented aerialists, acrobats, fire spinners and more.  Let us know what you'd like to see and we can curate a performance for your event. 
  • Bring The Movement Sanctuary to your city by having the Acrodance pro's (Aaron Tremper & Juliette Lauer) teach a weekend workshop in your city.  

 

The Impact on Saint Pete and beyond:

The value in this project lay not only in the individual physical bodies we are effecting, but the movement community at large.  By elevating the fitness level of our entire city and expanding everyone’s capabilities, we rise together.  Standing on the shoulders of giants we can see farther and become more.  

Included in our space we have a large diverse library, an art studio, a workshop and a music room -- because here we don’t just train the body, we train the whole, and the mind is an important aspect of that for balance.  This creation hotspot we've built so far will stand as a model for others, and of what we can achieve together.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

It's completely okay if you can't contribute financially to The Movement Sanctuary -- we've all been there!  Don't worry though, there are many ways you can contribute otherwise:

  • Please share this Indiegogo Campaign via Facebook, Instagram, E-mail and texts messages to friends. 
  • Donate old furniture, scrap wood or extra materials 
  • Give manual labor to our facility to help make it even more amazing!

story:
We know how important to clean our offices and apartments every day. It’s a pleasure to stay in a clean premise, because cleanness guarantees health for us. The main aim of cleaning our apartments is removing of harmful microbes and microorganisms together with dust and dirt. Microbes are causative agents of various disease, they are the source of unpleasant smells and the reason of spoiling of different surface areas. The permanent reproduction of bacteria is the problem which causes daily cleaning and airing of premises in order to keep them 100% clean.


* New bacteria grows every 20 minutes

Bacteria live not only on the surface areas but on different things and also on our children’s things. As a result we have a great number of dirty things, which we have to wash with the help of household chemical goods and even boil in order to disinfect them. And with the help of BioSmart all things will become sterile clean in 30 min. No boiling or household chemical goods, only safe ultra-violet light!


Only 30 min. of its work in a day and your premise and all things in it will be disinfected. We created device’s design which wouldn’t remind you devices which are used in hospitals (other UV irradiators have such look). It’ll ideally suit the interior of your apartment as a décor element.

In your bedroom

In your kitchen

In your bathroom


You haven’t control it, switch it on or switch it off, change the place of its location or set it up. People who use ordinary UV irradiators know that it isn’t convenient to control their work. The owners of such devices have to keep their eye on the time of irradiation and stay after work to disinfect the premises. BioSmart will do all this operations on its own! We invented some programs for convenient cleaning of any premise without your help, even if you aren’t at home!

BioSmart has three basic programs:

1. BioSmart switches on after switching off the main lightning. (perfectly suits a bathroom, a cloak room, an office and your house's basement)


2. BioSmart switches on in time which you’ve chosen. (you exactly know when you need to clean the premise and when nobody will be in it. Set up the device for example at 10:00 a.m., when you are at your work and your children are at school and BioSmart will clean the room from bacteria )


3. BioSmart switches on when nobody is in the premise. (it’ll perfectly suit a kitchen, a corridor or an office’s conference room)


You also can use BioSmart in the places of increased humidity and dust. Because of the existence of compactors BioSmart can successfully work in such premises as a basement and a garret, which we clean seldom. Special bactericidal lamps of the device are protected by decorative cover with compactors.

  • 2 bactericidal, without ozone lamps (UV-C) тм «OSRAM», capacity-16W/22W/32W
  • Total cleaning of the premises in 30 min- 18 square metres/25 square metres/36 square metres
  • 3 modes of operation without human’s interference: the device reacts 1) upon switching off the light in the premises, 2) upon going out of the human, 3) the device switches on at the define time
  • 3 modes of time settings: 30 min., 1 hour, 2 hours, it depends upon the size of the premises
  • It works in a standard electrical supply network = 110V-220V
  • The safeguard degree of the device and lamps – IP54
  • The length of the cable is regulated up to 8 m

You can choose the type of the plug after the finish of the company


BioSmart is absolutely safe for people and it’s very dangerous for bacteria and infections. While creation the device all demands of safe usage of ultraviolet light were taken into account. Built-in sensors wouldn’t allow the device to switch on if somebody is in the premise, and it’ll switch off by itself if somebody enters the room and the device will continue its work after you leave the premise.


Interested in writing about us? Our press kit is available for download here. Also, please feel free to email us at media@biosmart-ua.com or leave a message here on Indiegogo.

Risks and challenges

BioSmart was created first of all for us, our friends and relatives. And we’ll do our best in order to deliver qualitative product in time. Delivering delay can be because of supply of components, that’s why we think some plans ahead (plan B and plan C) as to production in order to make the delivery in time. There is little likelihood that delivering delay can be (we cooperate with our main suppliers for a long period and they had never let us down). Quality and safety of product are our main priorities and we wouldn’t supply the device until it wouldn’t correspond to common and our own standards.

And we’ll do our best in order to deliver qualitative product in time. Delivering delay can be because of supply of components, that’s why we think some plans ahead (plan B and plan C) as to production in order to make the delivery in time. There is little likelihood that delivering delay can be (we cooperate with our main suppliers for a long period and they had never let us down). Quality and safety of product are our main priorities and we wouldn’t supply the device until it wouldn’t correspond to common and our own standards.

story:
A Mission for Mom

Hi! I’m Melanie, the founder and owner of Hi-FiBar. Last year, my mom was diagnosed with type II diabetes and had to change her dietary habit and reduce her sugar intake. The problem is - most snack bars on the market have too much sugar, even the “healthy alternatives” use sugar-based syrup to hold everything together.  

Not being able to find anything good enough, I decided to use my years of training in food science and make one for her! At Hi-FiBar, we use a special dietary fiber blend to bind all the natural ingredients together.  Each bar has 2g or less sugar (from nuts and seeds) - this is 60-90% less sugar than other products out there!

 

Our Flavors:

  • Pumpkin Spice Orange (NEW!!)

  • Smoked Paprika

  • Lemon Zest Blueberry

  • Coconut Cranberry

 

My mom loves the bars - and so do many others!  We've sold hundreds of bars at local events and online.  Our newest fall flavor, Pumpkin Spice Orange, was an instant hit at the NJ VegFest and our granola sold out in an hour. Hi-FiBar is a great snack for everyone, but we need your help to get it into the hands of more people!

 

All Natural Diabetic Friendly Vegan No Added Sugar Gluten Free Soy Free

 

 

How you can help

Right now, all of our bars are made, packaged and sealed by hand by myself. While this is great for my mom, it’s hard for us to grow and get our bars in front of more people who would benefit from a truly healthy snack.  With your support, we can:

  1. Upgrade packaging to help preserve freshness and prolong shelf-life
  2. Register for UPC bar codes to get into stores
  3. Secure pricing for bulk raw material
  4. Scale up production

 

Goals

If we raise...

$3,000:   We can register for UPC bar codes on packaging

$7,000:   We can start upgrading packaging and scale up production

$10,000:   (GOAL!) Full upgrade onboard! “Choo-choo”!

$13,000+:   Full upgrade and we can start inventing new flavors! Suggestions welcomed!

**Note, no matter how much we raise, we will still be able to send you all the goodies, including the original (hand made) Hi-FiBar by Christmas.

 

The Goods

For your support, you will get our deepest gratitude and various goodies below.  All items will be shipped in time to arrive by Christmas, making Hi-FiBar a great holiday gift!

 

1.  Our Bars - most tiers come with a set of Hi-FiBar bars.  Variety Packs have our three original flavors and the Deluxe Variety Packs include the new Pumpkin Spice Orange.

Variety Pack with 3 flavors contain:

  • Coconut Cranberry
  • Lemon Zest Blueberry
  • Smoked Paprika

Deluxe Variety Packs also contain the NEW Pumpkin Spice Orange.

 

2.  Virtual hugs and shout out on our website: You’ll get a virtual hug from me and we will have your name on our website as a supporter (if you want).

3.  Hand-written thank you note: I want to say thank you personally for your support!

4.  Hi-FiBar T-Shirt: We have 2 designs available. We’ll collect your choice and size after the campaign is over.

5.  Foldable water bottle: Not enough room for a bottle or can’t carry a bottle of water through security? This BPA free, leak resistant, reusable, foldable water bottle is great for you! It keeps you hydrated and collapses flat when empty.

6.  Walking Enthusiast Kit: Walking is the most popular exercise in the country and this kit gets you all you need for a walk or short hike. It includes a shoulder pack with BPA-free water bottle, multi-function pedometer, zippered storage with earphone exit and reflective piping (strips) for safety. You can wear it across your body (like a slingpack) or around the waist (like a hip pack). Let’s get moving!

7.  The Charitable Hi-FiBar: We participated in the “Step Out: Walk to Stop Diabetes” event hosted by the American Diabetes Association this month. All the hard work on developing and making Hi-FiBar was worth it when I saw the smile of a kid, born with type 1 diabetes, enjoying a long deserved snack, Hi-FiBar.  We decided right there that we are going next year, too.  If you choose this option, we will donate $300 of product to an American Diabetes Association event in your name.

8.  Hi-FiBar Enthusiast: Love Hi-FiBar and have an idea for a new flavor? You are the Hi-FiBar enthusiast! I will work with you to develop a new flavor. You’ll be involved as much as you want and of course you’ll get all the other goodies too!

 

Risks & Challenges

No endeavor is ever without it's challenges - and while we hope to have smooth sailing we think we could possibly run in to some of the following obstacles we may have to work to overcome:

  • Like all other food products, there is always the risk of raw material shortages, price fluctuations or the need to replace suppliers to maintain quality.
  • It may take longer to find partners whom we trust and who meet our quality standard to help make the bars.
  • We may be required to make small adjustments to the formula when we scale up production, but we will make every effort to keep the same healthy nutrition profile.

 

We appreciate all your support and will keep you updated on the progress!

    -  Melanie

It may take longer to find partners whom we trust and who meet our quality standard to help make the bars.
We may be required to make small adjustments to the formula when we scale up production, but we will make every effort to keep the same healthy nutrition profile.

story:
What is HUMAN Science?

The foundation of who we are as people lies in our ability to experience life, and perhaps more importantly, feeling great about sharing those human experiences with the ones we love and care about. At HUMAN Science, our passion is to help make life's journey as enjoyable as possible, because we only have one life to live.

 

 

Tired of Medications?

Joint Repair Is The Solution You Have Been Looking For.

Young or old, Joint Repair helps reduce the ailments of life in your joints and body. Whether you find yourself compromised from genetics or any other unforeseen circumstance that has arisen in your life that has affected your freedom of mobility.

Joint Repair is specifically formulated to aid your immune system in repairing your joint tissues and structures, and reducing overall inflammation from the inside out. Making this all-natural drink a part of your everyday preventative routine will give those suffering from sore, achy joints, arthritis, auto-immune disorders and more a fighting chance!

Some Active Ingredients Derived Directly From Nature Include:

 

Want A Cream That Works When And Where You Want It To?

Pain can stop you from enjoying many precious moments in life. Creating the special memories that become highlights of your life story are too important for pain to get in the way, let alone much simpler, everyday activities that we want to enjoy. Our team has worked hard to find a great combination of ingredients to help relieve the pain that could be holding you back, and that is our Pain Relief Cream INTENSE.

Everyone will someday experience muscle or joint pain, whether it was from strenuous, repeated activity or through genetic expression. If you are looking for temporary relief or a pain solution for backaches, arthritis, strains, bruises and sprains, Pain Relief Cream INTENSE is for you.

Combining synergistic natural ingredients with a clever transdermal carrier system, a very effective combination of pain relievers can be delivered directly into the middle of your area of pain, creating a very different topical experience in pain relief. (Imagine dropping firefighting teams into a forest fire rather than standing on the side roads with a firehose!) It's also free of dyes and parabens.

Some Active Ingredients Derived Directly From Nature Include:

 

 

Hear What Others Have To Say!

 

 

 

Our Team

 

 

Steve started formulating supplements in the 1990’s as a hobby after gaining a large amount of free time that amounted from his break at Boeing. During that time, he became very intrigued by Ayurvedic, Chinese, and other herbal healing modalities around the world. Helping people has always been a priority for Steve, and developing supplements and health aids was a very rewarding hobby for him.

As his interest grew, so did Steve’s natural affinity for creativity and innovation in the health care field. A local fan base quickly developed that tapped into his knowledge around mainstream products. Steve was quick to notice that many supplement companies focused on the bottom line instead of creating the quality products that supported the end result of good health. One of Steve’s fundamental values is that helping people is about the good feeling you get from truly affecting a positive change in someone’s life, and that money is simply a byproduct of doing the right thing.

 

 

Trevor is very passionate about creating, whether it’s a material item you can hold in your hand or intangible items like branding and graphics. Trevor is driven to push limits making things faster, stronger and more reliable.

Trevor has an entrepreneurial spirit, and finds it is great to share it with his business partners. Trevor likes to build a strong team and create a solid business by challenging for growth utilizing minimal amount of funds, which is certainly no easy task. This is why more than ever; Trevor surrounds himself with successful and genuine people.

story:
Natural indoor rowing - the S1club

It is as natural and as healthy as the real rowing.

Our story in less than 1 minute:

At Biorower, we have been building ultra realistic rowing machines for more than 15 years. They are considered to be the best, and most natural rowing devices on the market.
As all of them were hand made, so they also were amongst the most expensive ones, with prices ranging between 14.000 and 31.000 EUR per device.This has all changed. We have invested heavily to change the game, and opt for cutting edge industrial production.

For the upcoming production run, we plan to manufacture at least 250 units for the price of

2.917,- EUR* + VAT for everyone outside the EU)
which is 3.499,-* EUR including 20% Austrian VAT for everyone inside the EU...

if we can get enough support from you.

Help us change indoor rowing for the better! Help us to bring natural, healthy rowing to the world.

Pre-Order, donate and spread the word!

*Tablet, shipping cost and possible import duty are not included.

Basic facts - Q&A

What will happen with my money?

We will finance the production of the S1club in larger quantities.

Why is rowing so healthy?

  • improves your strenght + your endurance
  • this specific workout helps to prevent burnout
  • clears your mind

The real rowing is one of the healthiest, most comprehensive workouts you can possibly do. It gives you both - strength and endurance. The rowing workout helps many people to clear their minds, make themselves tired, and catch a good sleep.

While the increased strength improves your muscle structure, the endurance training eliminates certain hormones which are required for stress related burnout symptoms.

Who is this rowing machine designed for?

Rowers, Gyms and Home-Fitness

It is specifically designed to make natural rowing possible for as many people as possible.

I am not a rower - will this work for me?

Yes. Tests we have carried out have shown evidence that the realistic rowing movement is easier to learn than rowing on linear drive ergs. (like the example in the picture below) All people tested proclaimed that rowing effectively on a Biorower appears to be more intuitive, logical to the body, and therefore easier to understand and apply than rowing on conventional ergometers, where rowers pull linear, which was perceived as “difficult” and “involving stiff muscles”.

Why conventional ergs are not the best option for your back

A linear pull basically resembles the movement of lifting weights with a round back from the floor.

As the linear drive is a movement that naturally harms the body, unless carried out with positioning correction every stroke, the movement contradicts with most people’s natural self-protective mechanisms. It is the fact that linear drive ergs force athletes to work against their natural self-protection mechanisms which makes training on these machines so “difficult” and “counter intuitive”.

 

So what is the difference to the boat and the Biorower?

Pulling on two independently functioning and semi-circular moving oar handles results in the strengthening of the involved muscle chains, as well as in an increased mobility of the entire torso. There is no linear wear on the spline.


It is the combination of round back and linear pulling which causes the problems.
This is why the older generations of rowers, those who did not use ergometers for their practice, do not have back problems today.

 
Many customers are not aware of these details, but they certainly feel a lack of mobility and increasingly stiff muscles due to the shock-absorbent reaction of the muscles chains along the spine column.
 
This video explaines the details:
 

 

How does the Biorower compare to the boat?

Precisely as natural and healthy for your body.

It compares very well. This is an overview of the S1pro versus the boat. The S1pro and the S1club have a similar geometry. It is important for your spline that the handles move in semi-circles.

 

At the start of the stroke, your hands will pull towards each other.

During the middle of the pull (rowers call it "drive phase"), the hands pull overlapping semi-circles - again, there is no linear pulling movement.

At the last part of the stroke (the finish), your hands pull outwards / away from each other. This results in greater mobility and power of the muscles of the shoulders, trizeps, brest, and back, without overloading them. It is as natural and as healthy as the real rowing.

Okay. Is the tablet included?

No. In order to connect with the included sensors (Bluetooth), and to use the Biorower App (included) you will need an android tablet with the following specs:

# Android 5.x or higher
# Bluetooth 4.0 or higher
# Screen resolution 1280 x 800 or 1366 x 768 (the app is currently optimized for these resolutions, with the next updates, the list is planned to be enhanced)
 

How much space will I need?

When in use: apprx. 200cm x 200cm
When in storage: apprx. 200xm by 50cm (simply put it upright next to a wall)

How will the S1club be shipped?

It will be shipped in a wooden box.
Approximate dimension: 100x80x60 cm
Weight: apprx. 60kg

Is the assembly difficult?

No. There is a clear cut manual. The assembly is a simple set-by-step process.
The assembly should be done by 2 people, and it usually takes roughly 20-30 minutes.

Can I see more pictures?

...of course. Here we go:

 

T H E   F E A T U R E S

Racing boat native spread and inboard length dimensions

The distance from oar lock to oar lock, also called span or spread is a crucial mark when it comes to setting up a boat. Every S1club comes with a standard span of 160cm.
Likewise, the inboard length is crucial to experience the same rotation angle as in the boat. Naturally, your Biorower comes with the racing shell native inboard length of 88cm.

The idea behind it…

The settings of the span and the inboard are crucial for every rower. Naturally, the Biorower features boat native measurements. As the resistance is not generated by water but by air, the span and inboard settings here are not responsible for the resistance calibration but for the similar amplitude compared to the boat.

 

Rotating handles

The rotating handles provide the BIOROWER typical multidimensional feedback. This means that you may feather and square the blades just like you would do it in the boat.

After all, a BIOROWER is a BIOROWER, not an ergometer.

Adjustable foot stretchers (foot plates)

In every new boat we sit in, the first thing we check is the position of the foot stretchers. Of course you do the same on your BIOROWER. A solid mechanism allows you to set your foot stretchers according to your individual body proportions.

 

Adjustable height difference from seat to heels

Just like in your boat. Simply adjust the height difference from your heels to the seat as you would do in the boat.

The idea behind it…
The angle of the knees, the resulting angle of the hip and of the ankle are essentially responsible for the ability to apply power that connects your foot stretchers with your blade. The BIOROWER is built provide the natural rowing feeling. This is what we believe it is important that you can adjust your BIOROWER to your boat measurements. However, as soon as athletes are off the water, they tend to set their training device to be as comfortable as possible. The boat, however, is not always comfortable. The height difference from your seat to your heels are mostly determined by the depth of your racing shell.

 

T h e   B I O R O W E R   A p p

 

Overview

  • Force and angle sensors measure your performance every stroke
  • One bluetooth sender on each side transmitts all data to a mobile Android device
    • The senders have micro-USB-rechargable batteries which last for 24 hours of consequtive training.
  • The included Biorower App provides live data about your performance, and about your technique
  • Share your training data online through the Biorower portal with other people from around the globe

Details

The new BIOROWER App performes a full biomechanical analysis of every rowing stroke you do.
It tells you important facts about your power balance (left / right), and your length of pulling.

Too much data? Keep it simple and use the cockpit view.
Too little data? Go to the signal mode, and check your force and angle curves.

Use your own smartphone or tablet as your display. Store training data on your device and upload it to the Biorower-Portal. Connect with your crew members online and share your progress data.

As a coach, you can form your team online and receive all training data instantly. You know exactly which athlete influences the boat in which way – selection has never been so easy and as transparent as with the Biorower. Let the facts work for you.

 

The Cockpit View

Left handle Stroke Length (80°)

Left handle Power per Stroke (158 Watts)

Right handle Stroke Length (65°)

Right handle Power per Stroke (206 Watts)

Total Power per Stroke of both hands combined (364 Watts)

Average Power of both hands combined (350 Watt)

Pace / 500m calculated to the actual speed of a singlescull (versus the way too quick speeds of standard ergs) (01:39)

Total distance travelled in km (0.015)

Stroke rate in the top centre (40 spm)

Average Stroke rate (39 spm)

Training time (0:00:04.3)

Stroke count (2)

 

The Signal Mode

The bottom curves indicate the applied force (blue for the right hand, orange for the left hand).
The long curves indicate the current position of the handles during the stroke cycle.
This mode is crucial for coaches and athletes to understand the influence rowers have on their boat.

 

Select the parameters you want to see live during your work out7

 

Get in depth reports of your training

 

Access your training data and share it with others online through the Biorower network

 

What other people have to say about the Biorower

 

“The BIOROWER feels very realistic compared with the boat”

Ondrej Synek (CZE),

Olympic Silver Medalist

World Champion

European Champion

 

Captain of the Cambridge University Eight 2015

“Although I had been rowing for years, I knew comparatively little about my technique. The BIOROWER unmistakably showed me how much potential my stroke has. Thanks to the live-feedback it helps me to professionally and continuously improve my rowing technique.”

Alexander Leichter (AUT)

 

“I learned to row on the Biorower”

3,5 years of rowing were enough for Team BIOROWERs Jakob Zwölfer to make his first international medal, getting Bronze in the LM1x at the European University Championships in Hannover. Jakob learned rowing in January 2012 on a Biorower at the age of 16. His first time on the water was in the first days of March 2012, after two months of Biorower training without ever beeing on the water. In April 2012, after two months of rowing on the water, Jakob put in a 2000m time in the single of under 8:00. Year by hear his best times became faster and faster. With 22 years of age, 180cm height and 70kg weight he was able to do a 7:15.

One year later, he put in a 7:00 over 2000m, winning medals at International University Championships, National Championships and competing at the U23 World Championships.

In 2017, 5 years after having done his first rowing strokes on the Biorower, the young athlete put in a 2000m-time of 6:54, just 8 sec. off the world best time in his age and weight category.

We are looking forward to follow his progress even more.

 

 

From beginner to Olympian in 7 years

My coach PetterLjungström and I started to work with Aram and the Biorower in 2009 when I was a beginner. We have been working with Aram ever since and with his help and knowledge in human physiology, rowing technique and biomechanics I can now call myself an Olympian.

Since I was introduced to sport and rowing as a 22 year old, it was crucial for me to get both individualized and targetbased training. There were many things I needed to learn and develop!

With Aram’s help, both on distance (through Skype), and by my side in Vienna (Austria), Stockholm (Sweden), Racice (Czech Republic) and Montemor o Velho (Portugal) I got faster every year.

His individualized coaching and mental support helped me to win my first gold medal in the Swedish Championships in 2013, both indoors on the erg and on the water. The following year I was selected to compete for Sweden in the European Championships, the World Championships and also at two World Cups.

A big goal in my career was the World Championships in 2015 which also was an Olympic Qualification Regatta. I managed to qualify an Olympic spot for Sweden which Idefended in 2016in a two month long selection period.

It was amazing to experience the Olympic Games in Rio – a dream I never would have been able to reach without Aram and Biorower by my side.

 

 

Bosön Elite Sport testing & training (SWE) Swedish National Rowing Team

Since 2012, the team around Lennart Gulstrand, Tobias Elgh and Tobias Lindberg are using the BIOROWER for testing and training with elite level athletes. “I consider the BIOROWER to be the best rowing machine on the market. This is why we bought it.”

 

The Biorower story

If you put in everything you are, winning is not an option anymore, but the logical consequence.

We stand behind our product with everything we are and everything we have.

There is no other way than seeing the BIOROWER become the new standard in 21st century rowing. It is realistically natural, it is healthy, and it has now become affordable for many people.

At the beginning of our story, there was a vision of a rowing machine that needs to be rowed like a boat.

So we did. Like young athletes, we started with no experience, no cash and certainly no support.
So what, we kept on going. I had 3 day-time-jobs, sometimes 4, to pay for my living and to grow the company. My partner invested is entire pension, month after month, for many years.


Learning to make the perfect BIOROWER, meant learning to perfectly understand the interaction between the athlete and the boat.

# Rowing efficiently, means understanding your individual potential. Every athlete has an absolutely unique body.

# Moving a boat truly fast, means understanding what the boat can do and what it cannot do. In order to controll your boat, you have to controll yourself. In order to get the boat going fast, you need to be able to feel it.

# Rowing together, means influencing the boat exactly the same way – not looking the same.

Today, we passionately manufacture rowing machines, our customers call “the most effective training device for real rowing”.

What makes a BIOROWER so special is the combination of three key elements:
– The way every BIOROWER is built (it has the exact set up and the adjustability of a racing shell)
– The mechanic feedback: With both inboards being independently connected to one shared resistance unit, the BIOROWER makes you feel what the boat needs from you in order to go fast. Even if you have never sat in a boat.
– The App, which allows rowers and coaches to get to know the influence athletes have on their boats. It allows all members of the team to connect and share their rowing data to save precious time to enjoy rowing more.

All of this leads to the point where athletes forget about the theory and start to row efficiently fast – because they understand how to use their potential. It is not important if you are tall or not, it is important that you understand what your potential is to row fast – and to learn how to use it.

That’s the mission of BIOROWER - become a part of it.

 

Are there any questions we can answer? Please contact us right away on indiegogo.com or in one of the following ways:

E-Mail: info@biorower.com

Phone & Viber: +43 676 635 95 12

Skype: "biorower rowing machines"

Facebook: www.facebook.com/biorower

Or visit our website www.biorower.com

 

Thank you for your support!

 

Additional Information for indiegogo:

The Biorower S1club is well in production, not a prototype!

story_txt:
Natural indoor rowing - the S1club
It is as natural and as healthy as the real rowing.

Our story in less than 1 minute:
At Biorower, we have been building ultra realistic rowing machines for more than 15 years. They are considered to be the best, and most natural rowing devices on the market.As all of them were hand made, so they also were amongst the most expensive ones, with prices ranging between 14.000 and 31.000 EUR per device.This has all changed. We have invested heavily to change the game, and opt for cutting edge industrial production.For the upcoming production run, we plan to manufacture at least 250 units for the price of2.917,- EUR* + VAT for everyone outside the EU)which is 3.499,-* EUR including 20% Austrian VAT for everyone inside the EU...
if we can get enough support from you.
Help us change indoor rowing for the better! Help us to bring natural, healthy rowing to the world.
Pre-Order, donate and spread the word!
*Tablet, shipping cost and possible import duty are not included.

Basic facts - Q&A
What will happen with my money?
We will finance the production of the S1club in larger quantities.
Why is rowing so healthy?

improves your strenght + your endurance
this specific workout helps to prevent burnout
clears your mind

The real rowing is one of the healthiest, most comprehensive workouts you can possibly do. It gives you both - strength and endurance. The rowing workout helps many people to clear their minds, make themselves tired, and catch a good sleep. 
While the increased strength improves your muscle structure, the endurance training eliminates certain hormones which are required for stress related burnout symptoms.
Who is this rowing machine designed for?
Rowers, Gyms and Home-Fitness
It is specifically designed to make natural rowing possible for as many people as possible.
I am not a rower - will this work for me?
Yes. Tests we have carried out have shown evidence that the realistic rowing movement is easier to learn than rowing on linear drive ergs. (like the example in the picture below) All people tested proclaimed that rowing effectively on a Biorower appears to be more intuitive, logical to the body, and therefore easier to understand and apply than rowing on conventional ergometers, where rowers pull linear, which was perceived as “difficult” and “involving stiff muscles”.
Why conventional ergs are not the best option for your back
A linear pull basically resembles the movement of lifting weights with a round back from the floor.


As the linear drive is a movement that naturally harms the body, unless carried out with positioning correction every stroke, the movement contradicts with most people’s natural self-protective mechanisms. It is the fact that linear drive ergs force athletes to work against their natural self-protection mechanisms which makes training on these machines so “difficult” and “counter intuitive”. So what is the difference to the boat and the Biorower?
Pulling on two independently functioning and semi-circular moving oar handles results in the strengthening of the involved muscle chains, as well as in an increased mobility of the entire torso. There is no linear wear on the spline.

It is the combination of round back and linear pulling which causes the problems.This is why the older generations of rowers, those who did not use ergometers for their practice, do not have back problems today.
 
Many customers are not aware of these details, but they certainly feel a lack of mobility and increasingly stiff muscles due to the shock-absorbent reaction of the muscles chains along the spine column.
 
This video explaines the details:
 


 

How does the Biorower compare to the boat?

Precisely as natural and healthy for your body.
It compares very well. This is an overview of the S1pro versus the boat. The S1pro and the S1club have a similar geometry. It is important for your spline that the handles move in semi-circles.
 
At the start of the stroke, your hands will pull towards each other.

During the middle of the pull (rowers call it "drive phase"), the hands pull overlapping semi-circles - again, there is no linear pulling movement.


At the last part of the stroke (the finish), your hands pull outwards / away from each other. This results in greater mobility and power of the muscles of the shoulders, trizeps, brest, and back, without overloading them. It is as natural and as healthy as the real rowing.


Okay. Is the tablet included?
No. In order to connect with the included sensors (Bluetooth), and to use the Biorower App (included) you will need an android tablet with the following specs:
# Android 5.x or higher# Bluetooth 4.0 or higher# Screen resolution 1280 x 800 or 1366 x 768 (the app is currently optimized for these resolutions, with the next updates, the list is planned to be enhanced) 
How much space will I need?
When in use: apprx. 200cm x 200cmWhen in storage: apprx. 200xm by 50cm (simply put it upright next to a wall)
How will the S1club be shipped?
It will be shipped in a wooden box.Approximate dimension: 100x80x60 cmWeight: apprx. 60kg
Is the assembly difficult?
No. There is a clear cut manual. The assembly is a simple set-by-step process.The assembly should be done by 2 people, and it usually takes roughly 20-30 minutes.
Can I see more pictures?
...of course. Here we go:



 
T H E   F E A T U R E S
Racing boat native spread and inboard length dimensions

The distance from oar lock to oar lock, also called span or spread is a crucial mark when it comes to setting up a boat. Every S1club comes with a standard span of 160cm.Likewise, the inboard length is crucial to experience the same rotation angle as in the boat. Naturally, your Biorower comes with the racing shell native inboard length of 88cm.
The idea behind it…
The settings of the span and the inboard are crucial for every rower. Naturally, the Biorower features boat native measurements. As the resistance is not generated by water but by air, the span and inboard settings here are not responsible for the resistance calibration but for the similar amplitude compared to the boat.
 
Rotating handles

The rotating handles provide the BIOROWER typical multidimensional feedback. This means that you may feather and square the blades just like you would do it in the boat.
After all, a BIOROWER is a BIOROWER, not an ergometer.
Adjustable foot stretchers (foot plates)

In every new boat we sit in, the first thing we check is the position of the foot stretchers. Of course you do the same on your BIOROWER. A solid mechanism allows you to set your foot stretchers according to your individual body proportions.
 
Adjustable height difference from seat to heels

Just like in your boat. Simply adjust the height difference from your heels to the seat as you would do in the boat.
The idea behind it…The angle of the knees, the resulting angle of the hip and of the ankle are essentially responsible for the ability to apply power that connects your foot stretchers with your blade. The BIOROWER is built provide the natural rowing feeling. This is what we believe it is important that you can adjust your BIOROWER to your boat measurements. However, as soon as athletes are off the water, they tend to set their training device to be as comfortable as possible. The boat, however, is not always comfortable. The height difference from your seat to your heels are mostly determined by the depth of your racing shell.
 
T h e   B I O R O W E R   A p p
 


Overview

Force and angle sensors measure your performance every stroke

One bluetooth sender on each side transmitts all data to a mobile Android deviceThe senders have micro-USB-rechargable batteries which last for 24 hours of consequtive training. 

The included Biorower App provides live data about your performance, and about your technique
Share your training data online through the Biorower portal with other people from around the globe

Details
The new BIOROWER App performes a full biomechanical analysis of every rowing stroke you do.It tells you important facts about your power balance (left / right), and your length of pulling.
Too much data? Keep it simple and use the cockpit view.Too little data? Go to the signal mode, and check your force and angle curves.Use your own smartphone or tablet as your display. Store training data on your device and upload it to the Biorower-Portal. Connect with your crew members online and share your progress data.As a coach, you can form your team online and receive all training data instantly. You know exactly which athlete influences the boat in which way – selection has never been so easy and as transparent as with the Biorower. Let the facts work for you.

 
The Cockpit View
Left handle Stroke Length (80°)
Left handle Power per Stroke (158 Watts)
Right handle Stroke Length (65°)
Right handle Power per Stroke (206 Watts)
Total Power per Stroke of both hands combined (364 Watts)
Average Power of both hands combined (350 Watt)
Pace / 500m calculated to the actual speed of a singlescull (versus the way too quick speeds of standard ergs) (01:39)
Total distance travelled in km (0.015)
Stroke rate in the top centre (40 spm)
Average Stroke rate (39 spm)
Training time (0:00:04.3)
Stroke count (2)

 
The Signal Mode
The bottom curves indicate the applied force (blue for the right hand, orange for the left hand).The long curves indicate the current position of the handles during the stroke cycle.This mode is crucial for coaches and athletes to understand the influence rowers have on their boat.

 
Select the parameters you want to see live during your work out7

 
Get in depth reports of your training

 
Access your training data and share it with others online through the Biorower network

 
What other people have to say about the Biorower
 

“The BIOROWER feels very realistic compared with the boat”
Ondrej Synek (CZE),
Olympic Silver Medalist
World Champion
European Champion
 
Captain of the Cambridge University Eight 2015
“Although I had been rowing for years, I knew comparatively little about my technique. The BIOROWER unmistakably showed me how much potential my stroke has. Thanks to the live-feedback it helps me to professionally and continuously improve my rowing technique.”
Alexander Leichter (AUT)

 
“I learned to row on the Biorower”

3,5 years of rowing were enough for Team BIOROWERs Jakob Zwölfer to make his first international medal, getting Bronze in the LM1x at the European University Championships in Hannover. Jakob learned rowing in January 2012 on a Biorower at the age of 16. His first time on the water was in the first days of March 2012, after two months of Biorower training without ever beeing on the water. In April 2012, after two months of rowing on the water, Jakob put in a 2000m time in the single of under 8:00. Year by hear his best times became faster and faster. With 22 years of age, 180cm height and 70kg weight he was able to do a 7:15.

One year later, he put in a 7:00 over 2000m, winning medals at International University Championships, National Championships and competing at the U23 World Championships.
In 2017, 5 years after having done his first rowing strokes on the Biorower, the young athlete put in a 2000m-time of 6:54, just 8 sec. off the world best time in his age and weight category.
We are looking forward to follow his progress even more.
 
 
From beginner to Olympian in 7 years
My coach PetterLjungström and I started to work with Aram and the Biorower in 2009 when I was a beginner. We have been working with Aram ever since and with his help and knowledge in human physiology, rowing technique and biomechanics I can now call myself an Olympian.
Since I was introduced to sport and rowing as a 22 year old, it was crucial for me to get both individualized and targetbased training. There were many things I needed to learn and develop!

With Aram’s help, both on distance (through Skype), and by my side in Vienna (Austria), Stockholm (Sweden), Racice (Czech Republic) and Montemor o Velho (Portugal) I got faster every year.
His individualized coaching and mental support helped me to win my first gold medal in the Swedish Championships in 2013, both indoors on the erg and on the water. The following year I was selected to compete for Sweden in the European Championships, the World Championships and also at two World Cups.
A big goal in my career was the World Championships in 2015 which also was an Olympic Qualification Regatta. I managed to qualify an Olympic spot for Sweden which Idefended in 2016in a two month long selection period.

It was amazing to experience the Olympic Games in Rio – a dream I never would have been able to reach without Aram and Biorower by my side.
 
 

Bosön Elite Sport testing & training (SWE) Swedish National Rowing Team
Since 2012, the team around Lennart Gulstrand, Tobias Elgh and Tobias Lindberg are using the BIOROWER for testing and training with elite level athletes. “I consider the BIOROWER to be the best rowing machine on the market. This is why we bought it.”

 
The Biorower story

If you put in everything you are, winning is not an option anymore, but the logical consequence.
We stand behind our product with everything we are and everything we have.
There is no other way than seeing the BIOROWER become the new standard in 21st century rowing. It is realistically natural, it is healthy, and it has now become affordable for many people.
At the beginning of our story, there was a vision of a rowing machine that needs to be rowed like a boat.
So we did. Like young athletes, we started with no experience, no cash and certainly no support.So what, we kept on going. I had 3 day-time-jobs, sometimes 4, to pay for my living and to grow the company. My partner invested is entire pension, month after month, for many years.
Learning to make the perfect BIOROWER, meant learning to perfectly understand the interaction between the athlete and the boat.
# Rowing efficiently, means understanding your individual potential. Every athlete has an absolutely unique body.
# Moving a boat truly fast, means understanding what the boat can do and what it cannot do. In order to controll your boat, you have to controll yourself. In order to get the boat going fast, you need to be able to feel it.
# Rowing together, means influencing the boat exactly the same way – not looking the same.
Today, we passionately manufacture rowing machines, our customers call “the most effective training device for real rowing”.
What makes a BIOROWER so special is the combination of three key elements:– The way every BIOROWER is built (it has the exact set up and the adjustability of a racing shell)– The mechanic feedback: With both inboards being independently connected to one shared resistance unit, the BIOROWER makes you feel what the boat needs from you in order to go fast. Even if you have never sat in a boat.– The App, which allows rowers and coaches to get to know the influence athletes have on their boats. It allows all members of the team to connect and share their rowing data to save precious time to enjoy rowing more.
All of this leads to the point where athletes forget about the theory and start to row efficiently fast – because they understand how to use their potential. It is not important if you are tall or not, it is important that you understand what your potential is to row fast – and to learn how to use it.
That’s the mission of BIOROWER - become a part of it.
 
Are there any questions we can answer? Please contact us right away on indiegogo.com or in one of the following ways:
E-Mail: info@biorower.com
Phone & Viber: +43 676 635 95 12
Skype: "biorower rowing machines"
Facebook: www.facebook.com/biorower
Or visit our website www.biorower.com
 
Thank you for your support!

The Biorower S1club is well in production, not a prototype!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Randall Mills, and I have been in the telemedicine industry for over 12 years, with our doctors providing prescriptions by phone or video conference to thousands of patients.  Please see our current web site at www.24hourphysicians.com

I have noticed that only a few of our patients have a primary care physician to coordinate their total care.  Many have their medical records at as many as 8 different providers, which are usually not available to all these providers and would takes weeks for each provider to collect.

We are trying to go one step further and create a place where all records can be stored, and all caregivers will have instant access to them.  And our doctors can be the "quarterback" of the patients total medical care.

We want to have our doctors be their primary care physician, whose job it is to coordinate all healthcare for each patient.  Just as with in-person primary care physicians, they can give advice (based on the complete medical history), write new or refill prescriptions and send them to a pharmacy of the customer's choice, refer them to labs if needed, and refer them to other primary care physicians and specialists as they decide is necessary for the patient.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are raising $100,000 to create the blockchain-based storage system, smartphone app, and web site.  These funds will go entirely to this development since we are already operating and profitable.
  • Join us for just $100 and we will give you one free doctor consult (value $99), and a 6 month Concierge Doctor Plan ($78 value) at no charge where you can get additional Dr. Consults for just $35.  We will also store the medical records you send us so our docs will have access to them when you call for a consult.
  • Have your family join for just $250 and we will give you TWO free doctor consults ($198 value) as well as a 6 month Concierge Doctor Plan at no charge ($132 value) where you can get an additional Dr. Consults for just $35.
  • Why not give one as a gift this year?
  • All funds raised will be used for this project.

The Impact

  • Your contribution will help the world by enabling people to have one source for medical treatment, accessed by their smartphone, which travels with them wherever they go.  Imagine moving to a different city and not having a local doctor?  No need with Engaging Healthcare since we can solve 70% of medical problems and refer the remaining 30% to local doctors near you.
  • Healthcare now has been operating since May of 2017 and is profitable on a monthy basis, but we need your help to make our vision of a universal portal for Engaging your Healthcare.
  • Ever gotten sick and did not know where to go, but ended up in an emergency room for a $1,200 bill?   It would be nice to simply open our site and call us, we will do the rest.

Risks & Challenges

Risks to us are that competitor companies beat us to the marketplace.  You can help us overcome this risk by joining us in this noble venture.  Those first in the marketplace tend to stay ahead, and so we hope to do as well.  Once we gather a patient's records, their probability of moving to another provider is low, so it is a race for patients.  We expect those joining us to remain with us for up to 40 years, on average.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like this idea but can't help now, please spread the word with your friends and remember us for when you need medical care in the future.  Please share this using the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
Good Morning World

 

Who Wants the Good Stuff?

We have developed a new line of organic and natural ingredient oral care line.  Our products are available in toothpaste and in mouthwash.  Four flavors are available in both - Spearmint, Peppermint, Cinnamon and Bubblegum.

What make our product different is in our mixing technology that results in no harmful ingredients.

We also are more environmentally minded with our packaging in glass.  No plastic bottles used.

 

Formulated to Nourish, Heal & Refresh 

 

Ready for Market

​

I told my grandmother how you helped. She said, "Bake them a cake!"-  Lorrie

"Amazing! I've been looking for truly  better toothpaste for years!" -Val

"Great new products!" Dr. Steven  DDS

Don't waste your money on cheaper products" - Mike

"Makes brushing a pleasure!" Anne

"Worth every drop!"-Alex

 

 

 

As Featured

story:
V-urify Touchless Dispenser for

     Drinking Water 

 

 

 

Meet the Maker 

 

Bhrigu Chadha

Co-Founder & CEO

The inventor and creator of the V-urify Touchless Dispenser for drinking water.

After spending over 2 years in improving his design based on user feedback he has developed a product like no other in its capabilities and price range.

A person with a passion for technology and a perpetual fervor for learning. Having filed 3 technology patents for programmable electronic devices he is finally ready to take his invention to the market to make lives better for everyone.

This product has brought together his lifelong dream to help people with technology while also educating the world to make it a better place through improved sanitation. 

 

How the V-urify Touchless  dispenser works

 

 

Toggle mode is ideal for domestic use.

Concealed Button makes it easier to change the mode for a consistent experience.

Continuous mode is ideal for offices, hospitals, schools, factories, hotels and other public places.

 

 

Issues with existing systems 

Studies have shown that Manual Drinking Water Taps come in contact with 3,200 bacteria from 150 different species on our hands.

 

The manual taps on drinking water dispensers are the most commonly touched surfaces.

They carry more than nine types of infections. 

1000s of people in hospitals, schools, offices, factories touch drinking water dispenser taps. 

These spread infections that cause fever, diarrhoea, vomiting, fatigue, abdominal pain, pimples, pneumonia and even flu.

 

 

We felt that this problem could be solved using touchless technologies which we were working on at that time.

We found that there was so much work that was being done touchless bathroom faucets, high-pressure water dispensers and even for dustbins. Yet there weren't affordable and versatile options for the more commonly used water dispensers. 

Along the way, we got a chance to better understand why the existing touchless solutions weren't largely adopted. They are hygienic only in high pressure, high capacity systems, and may undergo accumulation of rust, dirt, grime and bacteria over time. They require higher maintenance and associated costs. We wanted to provide a solution that didn't have such issues due to solenoid valves.

Vurify solves problems with both manual and existing touchless systems.

We wanted to provide a solution that didn't have issues such as corrosion due to solenoid valves and could function even at low pressure while providing better sanitation. 

 

Our DUAL PROTECTION Technology has solved these existing limitations and created a better solution.

 

 

FROM IDEATION TO PROTOTYPING TO TESTING AND FINALLY PRODUCTION 

 

We wanted to ensure that we didn't just create a basic solution to monetize but also involve the end user to help us better develop a product based on feedback. 

This process took us over 2 years taking our concept from ideation to prototyping and then testing the responses for each change in our module. 

Using this feedback, we tweaked not only the core functionality but also the ergonomics of its usage and the presentability of our product. 

 

 

During every stage of our product development, we got the opportunity to demonstrate our product to people from different domains. 

We were lucky enough to find early adopters with organisations who gave us access to a larger consumer pool for a wider spectrum of opinions. 

It is from these interactions we not only better understood the ideal price point for an every day consumer but also received inquiries from multiple distributors showing interest in this product. 

 

 

Probably being the first movers in this niche segment (touchless dispenser for drinking water at low pressure), we realised there is a mass need and a global scope of impact for the benefits that this solution offers. 

We wanted this to be a product that was accessible for all and the process of bringing down the cost took us a while to figure out - from a manufacturing perspective. Finally, while we are able to provide this solution at an affordable price in developing nations, we are also able to offer it at the same cost as a manual dispenser in developed nations.

Our goal is to ensure that the price shouldn't be a hindrance in spreading this technology or the message behind it. 

 

Replace all your manual water dispensers!

 

 

 

 

Finally at the manufacturing plant in North India!

 

Flew nearly 2500 kms to the manufacturer to monitor the manufacturing process of our touchless dispenser.

 

Walking in at the manufacturing plant nervous and excited to see the final parts being assembled after months of coordination.

 

Hands-on testing the circuits for the touchless module of the dispenser.

 

Watching the injection moulding of the dispenser.

 

Injection Molding of the Dispenser shade

Above is a glimpse of our first steps in the manufacturing process of our dispenser. 

Follow us to keep track of our progress as we create the Touchless Revolution.

 

Recognition

 

Sharing your support to provide safe water where it is required most

Water.org is an international non-profit organization that has positively transformed millions of lives around the world through access to safe water and sanitation. Founded by Gary White and Matt Damon, Water.org pioneers innovative, market-driven solutions to the global water crisis — breaking down barriers to give families hope, health and the opportunity to break the cycle of poverty.

 

We wanted to give back to our backers and make them part of the community we are creating around the touchless revolution.

 

As a startup, we understand the importance of every dollar and trying to make the most of every investment.

So we have decided to donate a part of the contributions made to us to the Water.org initiative to bring safe water to people who need it the most.

We understand the importance of safe water considering our product revolves around better sanitation and drinking water.

 

 

FAQ

 

Q1: Where can I use V-urify?

A1: V-urify can be used for both household and commercial purposes. You can use V-urify at offices, hospitals, malls, and even at homes. It may be even be used to dispense other beverages such as juice.

 

Q2: Can I take out the touchless tap and integrate it with another filter/dispenser?

A2: We intend to provide an integrated product, designed to deliver an optimum usage experience around the touchless feature. We cannot guarantee the same user experience if you try to take the touchless tap and use it with other dispensers. Also, the warranty would be void if you do that.

We would be launching other types of dispenser products integrated with touchless as well. If you are interested in a specific type of dispenser, you can provide your contact details (name, number, address) and we will notify you when those are ready.

 

Q3: Is there a battery in it? What if the power goes off?

A3: There is no inbuilt battery. Most of our target market such as offices, factories, hospitals, apartments have 24 hours backup. However, if you need backup, an easy plug and play mini battery backup (mini UPS) is available at an additional cost from us or directly from the market.

 

Q4: How durable is it?

A4: The container is made up of food grade material, which lasts for more than 5-7 years. Apart from that, we provide a 1-year replacement warranty on the entire product.

 

Q5: Can we take out or replace the tap?

A5: You can but it is not recommended or required.

 

Q6: Does it use electricity?

A6: Yes, a power adapter is provided along with the product.

 

Q7: How do I clean and maintain the product?

A7: Simply clean the outer product with a clean wet cloth. You may rinse the product from inside with clean drinking water or you may wash the product from inside with utensil detergent. Take care not to let water inside the electronic part of the tap.

 

 

Press

 

 

 

 

 

       Feel Free to Contact Us regarding any questions.
story_txt:
V-urify Touchless Dispenser for
     Drinking Water 
 

 

 Meet the Maker  Bhrigu ChadhaCo-Founder & CEOThe inventor and creator of the V-urify Touchless Dispenser for drinking water.After spending over 2 years in improving his design based on user feedback he has developed a product like no other in its capabilities and price range.A person with a passion for technology and a perpetual fervor for learning. Having filed 3 technology patents for programmable electronic devices he is finally ready to take his invention to the market to make lives better for everyone.This product has brought together his lifelong dream to help people with technology while also educating the world to make it a better place through improved sanitation.  How the V-urify Touchless  dispenser works  
Toggle mode is ideal for domestic use.
Concealed Button makes it easier to change the mode for a consistent experience.
Continuous mode is ideal for offices, hospitals, schools, factories, hotels and other public places.
 
 Issues with existing systems Studies have shown that Manual Drinking Water Taps come in contact with 3,200 bacteria from 150 different species on our hands. The manual taps on drinking water dispensers are the most commonly touched surfaces.They carry more than nine types of infections. 1000s of people in hospitals, schools, offices, factories touch drinking water dispenser taps. These spread infections that cause fever, diarrhoea, vomiting, fatigue, abdominal pain, pimples, pneumonia and even flu.  We felt that this problem could be solved using touchless technologies which we were working on at that time.We found that there was so much work that was being done touchless bathroom faucets, high-pressure water dispensers and even for dustbins. Yet there weren't affordable and versatile options for the more commonly used water dispensers. Along the way, we got a chance to better understand why the existing touchless solutions weren't largely adopted. They are hygienic only in high pressure, high capacity systems, and may undergo accumulation of rust, dirt, grime and bacteria over time. They require higher maintenance and associated costs. We wanted to provide a solution that didn't have such issues due to solenoid valves.Vurify solves problems with both manual and existing touchless systems.We wanted to provide a solution that didn't have issues such as corrosion due to solenoid valves and could function even at low pressure while providing better sanitation.  Our DUAL PROTECTION Technology has solved these existing limitations and created a better solution.  FROM IDEATION TO PROTOTYPING TO TESTING AND FINALLY PRODUCTION  We wanted to ensure that we didn't just create a basic solution to monetize but also involve the end user to help us better develop a product based on feedback. This process took us over 2 years taking our concept from ideation to prototyping and then testing the responses for each change in our module. Using this feedback, we tweaked not only the core functionality but also the ergonomics of its usage and the presentability of our product.  

 
During every stage of our product development, we got the opportunity to demonstrate our product to people from different domains. We were lucky enough to find early adopters with organisations who gave us access to a larger consumer pool for a wider spectrum of opinions. It is from these interactions we not only better understood the ideal price point for an every day consumer but also received inquiries from multiple distributors showing interest in this product.   Probably being the first movers in this niche segment (touchless dispenser for drinking water at low pressure), we realised there is a mass need and a global scope of impact for the benefits that this solution offers. We wanted this to be a product that was accessible for all and the process of bringing down the cost took us a while to figure out - from a manufacturing perspective. Finally, while we are able to provide this solution at an affordable price in developing nations, we are also able to offer it at the same cost as a manual dispenser in developed nations.Our goal is to ensure that the price shouldn't be a hindrance in spreading this technology or the message behind it.  Replace all your manual water dispensers!    Finally at the manufacturing plant in North India! Flew nearly 2500 kms to the manufacturer to monitor the manufacturing process of our touchless dispenser. Walking in at the manufacturing plant nervous and excited to see the final parts being assembled after months of coordination. Hands-on testing the circuits for the touchless module of the dispenser. Watching the injection moulding of the dispenser. Injection Molding of the Dispenser shadeAbove is a glimpse of our first steps in the manufacturing process of our dispenser. Follow us to keep track of our progress as we create the Touchless Revolution. Recognition Sharing your support to provide safe water where it is required most 

Water.org is an international non-profit organization that has positively transformed millions of lives around the world through access to safe water and sanitation. Founded by Gary White and Matt Damon, Water.org pioneers innovative, market-driven solutions to the global water crisis — breaking down barriers to give families hope, health and the opportunity to break the cycle of poverty.

 
We wanted to give back to our backers and make them part of the community we are creating around the touchless revolution.
 
As a startup, we understand the importance of every dollar and trying to make the most of every investment.
So we have decided to donate a part of the contributions made to us to the Water.org initiative to bring safe water to people who need it the most.
We understand the importance of safe water considering our product revolves around better sanitation and drinking water.
 
 
FAQ
 
Q1: Where can I use V-urify?
A1: V-urify can be used for both household and commercial purposes. You can use V-urify at offices, hospitals, malls, and even at homes. It may be even be used to dispense other beverages such as juice.
 
Q2: Can I take out the touchless tap and integrate it with another filter/dispenser?
A2: We intend to provide an integrated product, designed to deliver an optimum usage experience around the touchless feature. We cannot guarantee the same user experience if you try to take the touchless tap and use it with other dispensers. Also, the warranty would be void if you do that.
We would be launching other types of dispenser products integrated with touchless as well. If you are interested in a specific type of dispenser, you can provide your contact details (name, number, address) and we will notify you when those are ready.
 
Q3: Is there a battery in it? What if the power goes off?
A3: There is no inbuilt battery. Most of our target market such as offices, factories, hospitals, apartments have 24 hours backup. However, if you need backup, an easy plug and play mini battery backup (mini UPS) is available at an additional cost from us or directly from the market.
 
Q4: How durable is it?
A4: The container is made up of food grade material, which lasts for more than 5-7 years. Apart from that, we provide a 1-year replacement warranty on the entire product.
 
Q5: Can we take out or replace the tap?
A5: You can but it is not recommended or required.
 
Q6: Does it use electricity?
A6: Yes, a power adapter is provided along with the product.
 
Q7: How do I clean and maintain the product?
A7: Simply clean the outer product with a clean wet cloth. You may rinse the product from inside with clean drinking water or you may wash the product from inside with utensil detergent. Take care not to let water inside the electronic part of the tap.
 
 
Press            Feel Free to Contact Us regarding any questions.

story:
Coach Madlin & Counselor Keith

We are Gallup Certified Strengths Coach Madlin Mangrum and psychotherapist Keith Dorscht. 

Keith invented the The Communication Cure technology, based on over 20,000 hours of counseling.  The relationship version (Meaningful Talk) helps people connect at heart level in just 20 minutes or less. 

When Madlin introduced Strengths to Keith, they realized this technology would be perfect to solve a major problem for Strengths coaches: how to help clients go deeper beyond a "one-hit wonder" session.  34 Talks is the version aligned with Strengths.

We predict 34 Talks will become your favorite tool for fast connection and longer engagement.  Check out our proof of concept demo video with Paul Allen (Ancestry.com, Gallup, Soar.com).

What We Need & What You Get

We only need $3400 to complete production!  Why so little?

  • The proven technology already exists;
  • The prototype first Talk is now polished and ready; 
  • Distribution will be aided by the Soar.com coaching platform; 
  • Marketing to the entire Strengths world will be separately funded; so
  • We need to pay the talent and music fees to produce the remaining Talks.

Every donor of at least $134 will get the 34 Talks Kit for free!  Check out the other perks and contact us if you'd like to invest in other customized versions or add-ons.  

If our goal is not met, everyone will still get the promised perks - it just may take a year longer.

The Impact

34 Talks will produce powerful experiences.  With this simple tool, people can articulate their individual Strengths in a way that makes coaching easier and connection stronger.

Note 34 Talks is not a Gallup product and does not use Clifton Strengths intellectual property.  34 Talks simply helps people communicate about their natural talents, which many people identify using Strengths words (Learner, Empathy, etc).  The secret sauce is not the topic or the words, but how The Communication Cure technology helps people articulate their talents. 

We have seen this technology work in personal relationships and professional counseling.  Based on the recent public demo in Dallas witnessed by an audience of professional coaches, applying The Communication Cure to Strengths is going to take your coaching or counseling practice up a significant notch.

Risks & Challenges

We have mitigated risk of not completing this project, by:

  • accomplishing the most challenging part already; and
  • cross-training ourselves and having multiple sources so it keeps going if we lose anyone.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us share 34 Talks with the world!  Refer your friends and colleagues.  Send us a video or written testimony.  Tell us how we can improve the product or how we can serve you better.
